64b4(1): gsang ba'i snying po yin// rgyal ba kun dang mnyam sbyar bas// ma yi tshogs kyi 'du 'phro bsgom// rta bro 'khor cig dang po la// khro bo sprin gyis dbang bsdus na// dus gsum rgyal ba rol pa mdzad// rta bro 'khor
64b5(1): ni gnyis pa la// rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du// rigs 'dzin yum dang rol pa mdzad// 'di ni sku gsung thugs kyi bro// pad+ma gar gyi thugs dam bskang // 'dul ba'i bro bzhi byung ba la// gsang ba'i gnas
64b6(1): bzhi dag nas su// sprul pa chen po bzhi byung zhing // phyogs bzhi dag tu bro bzhi brdung // nub kyi phyogs su bro gcig brdung // klu rnams 'dul ba'i bro bo che// byang gi phyogs su bro gcig brdung // gnod sbyin
65a1(1): bsgral ba'i steng nas brdung // shar gyi phyogs nas bro gcig brdung // dri za 'dul ba'i za bo che// blo gcig m+b+hi y-i phyogs su brdung // grul bum 'dul ba'i za bo che// ye shes bro gar chen pa
65a2(1): 'byung // mtshams nas bro bzhi mkha' las byung // yi ge bzhi las sprul pa brgyad// rdo rje'i bro ni shar nas brdung // rta yi bro ni lho nas brdung // phur pa'i bro ni nub nas brdung // sprul pa'i bro ni byang nas
65a3(1): brdung // byang shar mtshams nas gzig gi mi chen brgyad// shar lho mtshams nas lcags kyi khyi yi bro// lho nub mtshams nas bse yi byan lag bro// nub byang mtshams su mche gtsigs phag gi bro// la la za byed
65a4(1): chen po 'dul// la la g.yo 'gul med par gnon// la la rtsal gyis dbang du sdud// la la dug gsum btson rar sbyor// la la phur pas dbyings su thebs// la la sbyor ba'i las rnams 'joms// la la nga
65a5(1): rgyal gshog pa'i phyir// la la thams cad brtan par byed// kun tu bzang mo'i mkha' dbyings la// tshom bu brgyad kyi bro ru gtams// rgyal ba kun dang mnyam par sbyor// kun tu bzang mo mkha' dbyings dag pa
65a6(1): la// rgyal ba stong gi dkyil 'khor bcas// khro bo chen po rta bro ste// tshom bu bdun gyi phyogs mtshams su// la la ye shes rol pa'i bro// la la dpal gyi longs spyod bro// la la dbang gi yul gyi bro// la
65b1(1): la thabs dang shes rab bro// glu ni blta ba'i rgyal po yin// bro ni phrin las chen po yin// tshig ni 'du 'bral med pa'i gzungs// dang po pad+ma rol pa'i bro// chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis brdung // yum gyi mkha'
65b2(1): dang sbyor ba'o// de nas shes rab thabs kyi bro// b+ha ga'i gnas nas rdo rjes brdung // de nas dbang po yul gyi bro// lha mo brgyad la thabs kyis sbyor// de nas 'dul bya dbang gi bro// rta mgrin rgyal pos 'khor
65b3(1): la brdung // de nas mos pa bskyed pa'i bro// ma sring rgya mtsho'i 'khor la brdung // de nas gdug byed thabs kyi phrin las bro// phyogs bcu ma lus dbang du sdud// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa'o// glu bro dam tshig
65b4(1): chen po yin// rtag par bdud bzhi 'dul ba'i phyir// bro ni bar chad med par brdung // lta ba chen po bskyed pa'i phyir// glu ni 'du 'bral med par blang // dkyil 'khor rang la gsal ba'i phyir// tshig ni snying po
65b5(1): 'dzab tu bzlas// phung po gtan nas gzhom pa'i phyir// bdud kyi tshogs la bro gcig brdung // nyon mongs gtan pa gzhom pa'i phyir// nyon mongs bdud la bro gcig brdung // lha yi bdud ni gzhom pa'i
65b6(1): phyir// lha bdud tshogs la bro gcig brdung // skye shi med par bya ba'i phyir// 'chi bdag tshogs la bro gcig brdung // bdud bzhi gtan nas brlag nas ni// bde ba tshad med bzhi dang sbyar// dug gsum rtsad
66a1(1): nas gcad pa'i phyir// rta bro 'khor gsum brdung bar bya// mnyes skong dgyes pa chen po'o// tshom bu lnga yi bro brdung bas// nyon mongs rtsad bcad ye shes lnga// lu gu rgyud du sbrel bas mi 'bral
66a2(1): gzungs// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ glu dang bro dang las kyi blta ba dang gnas dang nges pa bstan pa'i le'u ste gya dgu pa'o// // de nas yang pad+ma las kyi sems dpa' des/ bcom
66a3(1): ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan dbang gi rgyal// dbang gi las mchog 'di dag la// ma dad klu rnams btul ba ji ltar lags// zhes gsol to// dbang gi rgyal pos
66a4(1): bka' stsal pa// kye ma pad+ma las kyi sems dpa' che// dbang gi lha rnams ma lus kyis// ma dang klu rnams btul ba ni// nub phyogs dbang gi zhing khams su// pad+ma bsil ba'i dur khrod du// dbang gi rgyal po
66a5(1): chen po des// sku gsung thugs las sprul pa gsum// sku yi sprul pa khro bo rnam rgyal te// gsung gi sprul pa rta mchog rgyal// thugs kyi sprul pa gsang chen bdag/ bse khrab smug po'i 'od zer las// bse yi byan
66a6(1): lag smug po gcig/ sprul pa chen po mkha' la lding // ye shes spyan la rin chen mchu// gshog pa he khri lnga stong la// bse yi khro mchog lnga stong gnas// bya bu lnga brgya sprul pa lding // ye shes dri med spyan dang
66b1(1): ldan// zhe sdang 'thab sder me 'bar ro// de ni lding zhing 'dzum pa'i tshe// rta mchog rgyal pos gsung ba'i dbyangs thos tshe// klu rnams ma lus dmyal zag gcod// dregs pa 'khor bcas dbang bsdus
66b2(1): nas// thams cad dbang gis bsgral ba'o// zhes gsungs so// las kyi sems dpas yang gsol pa// bcom ldan dbang gi rgyal po che// klu rnams gdug pa de dag la// rdzu 'phrul bstan pa ji ltar lags// rdzu
66b3(1): 'phrul dbrog pa ji ltar bgyi// las kyi tha ma ji ltar bgyi// zhes gsol to// dbang gi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// klu rgyal chen po 'di dag gi// rgyal po brgyad ni rgyan du bya// klu bran gzhal yas rgyan du bya// rdzu
66b4(1): 'phrul sngags kyi bden pas dbrog/ drag po dbang gi las byas na// ma bsgral kyang ni ldang mi nus// rdzu 'phrul mthu rnams sngags kyis bsdu ba'o// thams cad zhi bar bya'o// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol
66b5(1): pa'i tan+t+ra las/ nyid kyi sku las sprul pa 'thon te// klu la sogs pa bsgral ba dang / rdzu 'phrul dbrog pa'i le'u ste dgu bcu pa'o// // de nas pad+ma las kyi sems dpas/ dbang gi rgyal po la gsol pa/ bcom ldan
66b6(1): gsang ba dbang gi bdag/ bdag la sogs pa'i don slad du// chos thams cad dbang gi zhing du yongs dag go/ zhes bgyi ba ji ltar lags// dbang gi rgyal pos bshad du gsol/ zhes gsol to// dbang gi
67a1(1): rgyal pos bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig pad+ma las kyi sems dpa' che// chos thams cad dbang gi zhing du yongs su dag go/ zhes pa ni thams cad rtsa ba sems nyid de// lo ma chos ni 'bras bu'o// rtsa
67a2(1): ba byang chub gnyis su med// gnyis med 'bras bu sems can 'di// kun la dbang bas dbang zhes bya// skyon gyis ma gos zhing yin te// kun tu rtogs pas yang dag go/ snod ni sangs rgyas zhing du dag/ bcud
67a3(1): ni byang chub sems su dag/ snod ni dur khrod gzhal yas khang // bcud ni khrag 'thung phyag rgya'i tshogs// snod bcud ye nas rnam dag pas// de las gol sa gang yang med// snod bcud gnyis ka byang chub
67a4(1): sems// byang chub sems las ma gtogs med// thams cad ma lus byang chub sems// byang chub sems ni thams cad rten// ji ltar snang ba sems yin te// rtsa ba yang ni sems nyid do// skad cig ma yi ting
67a5(1): 'dzin gyis// sngon nas bsags pa'i bag chags sel// thams cad chos su mya ngan 'das// sems ni sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das// sangs rgyas sems su mya ngan 'das// dug gsum dag la sku
67a6(1): gsung thugs// sku gsung thugs kyang sems can mya ngan 'das// sems can thams cad mya ngan 'das// sangs rgyas sems can mya ngan 'das// rgyu 'bras sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das// sangs rgyas byang chub
67b1(1): sems su 'das// byang chub sems las ma byung med// kun kyang byang chub sems nyid de// sems las ma gtogs sangs rgyas med// sangs rgyas nyid kyang med pa ste// sangs rgyas ming du btags pas
67b2(1): ma nor ma bcos de nyid dang // rang byung rang zhi bde ba la// ji ltar snang ba sems nyid de// sems nyid la ni dngos po med// dngos med dngos po de nyid don// gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid ni// chos
67b3(1): rnams kun gyi rtsa ba yin// sems nyid sna tshogs cir snang yang // chos kun byang chub sems su gnas// lha rnams so so'i snying po sgra// de nyid byang chub sems chen po// byang chub sems su 'dus pa'o// rnam
67b4(1): par mi rtog ye nas skye med cing // gzung 'dzin skyon bral mtha' gnyis ma chags dbyings// ye nas mnyam nyid rang bzhin ji bzhin dang // rnam rtog skyon bral smra bsam yul las 'das pa ste// de ni byang chub
67b5(1): sems chen po// yod pa dang ni med pa dang // rtag pa dang ni chad pa dang // dngos po dang ni mtshan ma dang // gzung ba dang ni 'dzin pa brgyad// spros pa'i mtha' brgyad sems kyi sgo mo ste// de ltar gnas pa'ang
67b6(1): ni sems kyi las// sems kyi yul ni rnam shes brgyad// sems kyi 'bras bu sangs rgyas so// sems kyi rtsal spyod bsgrub pa'o// sems kyi gnya' gnon dam tshig go/ lta ba gdeng dang ldan par blta// bsgom pa
68a1(1): sems kyi srog shing yin// thams cad skyed dang thams cad sdud// thams cad gcig pa sems nyid do// de ltar byang chub sems chen po// yod par snang ba byang chub sems// chag par snang ba
68a2(1): byang chub sems// gnyis ka yang ni sems nyid do// gnyis med dang ni sems nyid do// sems nyid la yang dngos po med// gang du yang ma sbas pas mthong ba nyid do// brjod du rdul tsam yang med pas// kun
68a3(1): tu khyab pa nyid do// ma shes 'khrul pas sems can no// ci yang med pas shes rab bo// bgrod du med pas mthar thug go/ byang chub sems ni me long ltar// ma nor ma bcos de bzhin te// rang byung rang bzhin
68a4(1): de nyid do// skad cig ting 'dzin byang chub sems kyi don// rig pas mkha' la rlung gis sprin phyags ltar// sngon nas bsags pa'i bag chags sel// dper na mun khung sgron btegs ltar// mun nyid snang bar
68a5(1): gyur pa bzhin// byang chub sems kyi don rig pas// 'dzin rtog kun kyang byang chub sems su gsal// yod mtha' med mtha' de ru rdzogs// rdzogs pa chen po zhes kyang bya// de ltar gnas de lta ba che// spyod pa
68a6(1): ma btsal yangs pa che// byang chub sems chen kun tu bzang // kun bzang yangs pa chos kyi dbyings// thams cad ma lus rdzogs pa che// de ltar gnas pa phun sum bde// sems kyi sangs rgyas bde ba
68b1(1): la// sprul pa phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas nyan// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ chos thams cad dbang gi zhing du yongs su dag pa dang sems su bstan pa'i le'u ste go gcig pa'o// // de
68b2(1): nas yang ni bshad bya ba// las kyi sems dpa' chen po nyon// thams cad dbang du bsdu ba ni// zla gam gdengs pa'i dkyil 'khor du// dbang gi lha rnams tshang bar dgod// dbang gi las kyis thams cad
68b3(1): 'gugs shing sgrol// gdug pa shing gi phur pa dgod// tho ba lcags kyu dgra sta bsnams// gzhan yang dbang gi da la dgram la// de yi las kyis thams cad dgug/ spyan drang bzhugs dang phyag 'tshal
68b4(1): mchod// smon lam btab la 'dod don gsol// khugs pa'i lha rnams gsal ba dang // bstod bcol las la bsgo ba'o// dbang sdud las kyi ting nge 'dzin du zhugs pa yis// srid pa'i dbang chen rnams kyang
68b5(1): las la brtson// sum brgya drug cu bka' yi las la brtson// phrin las mnyan pas 'khor du grags// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ 'khor mkha' 'gro dbang du bsdu ba'i le'u ste go gnyis
68b6(1): pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal po pad+ma he ru ka la/ pad+ma las kyi sems dpas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan dbang mchog dbang gi rgyal// ma rungs gdug pa klu gnyen
69a1(1): 'di// gdug pa che zhing ma rungs pa// 'byung po phal cher kun gyi rten// 'byung po kun gyi rten yin pas// 'di la gdul thabs ji ltar lags// dbang chen 'dus pas bka' stsol cig/ ces smras
69a2(1): so// de nas dbang gi rgyal po des// gsol ba'i don thugs su chud nas/ ting 'dzin 'bum phrag gi nang nas/ dbang sdud las kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / 'joms byed 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi g.yo ba'i
69a3(1): ting nge 'dzin dang / gzhan gyi rdzu 'phrul 'phrog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang // gdug pa spa bkong ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rol pa khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang // sprul pa
69a4(1): dgye ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rol pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtse gcig bsam pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / khyab byed sprul pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos nyid mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'khrugs pa med
69a5(1): pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'joms byed chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang // dka' thub drag po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ma nor rgyu'i ting nge 'dzin
69a6(1): dang / gdal ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / thugs rjes mi gtong ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sprul pa gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snying rje chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dang ba 'dren pa'i ting nge 'dzin la
69b1(1): sogs pa ste/ de'i nang nas klu rgyal rdzu 'phrul dbrog pa/ gdug pa can tshar gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// zhugs ma thag tu klu de dag thams cad mdangs nyams// rdzu 'phrul
69b2(1): klu'i gdug pa thams cad chad de bya gyu med/ rdzu 'phrul thams cad phrogs te nyams par gyur to// de nas yang slar dran pa rnyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gdug pa klu'i bu 'di la/
69b3(1): 'di lta bu'i las 'di byung ba ci/ zer nas yang lus 'di thams cad gdug pa'i rdzu 'phrul mgo stong lnga brgya rang gis sgreng ba'o// de nas dbang gi rgyal po des/ ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas/ drag po'i
69b4(1): sgrol sngags 'di brjod do// oM nA ga duM phyur/ nA ga duM phyur/ a lo ka ta la pra be sha phaT/ b+ha ga wAn ba su b+han d+ha pra be sha phaT/ b+ha ga bAn g+hi ba ro sha pra be sha phaT/ oM ru ru s+phu ru ta sha ma rung ka ti bi tsa bruM shi laM
69b5(1): ru ru dra e h+ye hi sa ma ya ma tang pra be sha pra tang dza laM yaM ha ha hi hi hUM phaT/ oM ba hu bi na d+ha nA ga bin du nA ga hi ra ya/ na ga dung dung pra be sha phaT/ ha he hUM pra be sha phaT/ b+ha ga wAn/ hrIHSh+T+r-iHpra be sha phaT b+ha ga bAn/
69b6(1): rag sha pra be sha phaT/ b+ha ga bAn/ nA ga le nA ga le/ dum ba le dum ba le/ a ka le a ka le/ s+pho Ta s+pho Ta le/ a kar ba in+d+ra pra be sha phaT/ dung pram dung pram/ pram pram phaT nA ga kar sha tIk+Sha hu ya sa me ru ni
70a1(1): kar sha ya/ nA ga pram bram shag/ nA ga ge ram sang pra ge ma ta nA ga hur pra be sha ya dza/ zhes brjod pas/ klu de dag thams cad bsgral te/ phung po zhabs dmar po brgyad kyi 'og tu dar gcig
70a2(1): bcug/ de nas slar yang ston te/ sbrul mgo nas bzung ste klad la bskor na dmyal thag bcad do// dar tsam du slar sos pas/ nyam thag par gyur nas da ci bsgral ba'i klu'i gzugs dang ro de gzhal yas khang
70a3(1): gi rgyan du bor ro// de nas klu rnams slar sos pa'i gzugs can klu rnams/ phyag bcu drug gis g.yas pa brgyad kyi dang por dga' bo gzung ngo // gnyis par nye dga' bo gzung ngo // gsum par klu'i rgyal po
70a4(1): stobs ldan gzung ngo // bzhi par legs ldan gzung ngo // lnga par sogs ma med gzung ngo // drug par mtha' yas so// bdun par dung bskyong ngo // brgyad par pad+ma'o// g.yon pa brgyad du/ dang po mgo dgu
70a5(1): pa'o// gnyis par mgo lnga pa'o// gsum par chu lha'o// bzhi par kar ko Ta'o// lnga pa ba ru Na'o// drug par klu gdol pa'o// bdun par klu mgo gsum pa'o// brgud par gdol pa nag po'o// de rnams phyag
70a6(1): mtshan du bsnan pa'o// bar bar na yang klu bran kyang 'jus pa yin no// de nas yang klu rnams dmyal thag bcad cing dbang du bsdus te/ gshog pa g.yas g.yon gnyis su gdengs/ bar bar zla ba dang nyi ma
70b1(1): stong stong gis brgyan gshog pa'i bar re re nas/ gnam lcags kyi mchu dang / lcags kyi sder mo byung / gshog pa g.yas g.yon gyi rtse mo nas/ sprul pa'i bya khyung re re gtibs te yod pa/ byu ru'i rkang pa la lcags
70b2(1): kyi sder mor yod pa/ mig me dang chur yod pa/ de ltar sprul nas/ gdug pa'i klu rnams bzung zhig zos so// pags pas rgyal mtshan byas/ sbrul mgo thams cad bregs nas gshog pa la brgyan pa/ gti mug
70b3(1): dag par byas pa'o// de nas klu gnyen thams cad sdigs pa'i sngags ni dbang gi rgyal po'i sku dang gsung las 'thon to// oM nA ga pa sha her te shag tshal bu ram sad/ ces gsungs so// de nas yang klu
70b4(1): gnyen thams cad bsgral ba'i sngags 'di 'thon to// oM nA ga he sa pa ra ma duM ba le sad/ bra me sham sad/ na ga he ram dun mu kha lo rbad/ mar ling sad na rbad ya/ de ni bsad pa'i sngags su gsungs so// de
70b5(1): nas yang klu gnyen de rnams gso ba'i sngags 'di 'thon to// nA ga pa sha yu ti ba la a/ klu rnams g.yos pa'o// de nas yang klu dang 'byung po tshar gcad pa'i sngags 'di gsungs so// oM pa sha nA ga dril ma ta pa
70b6(1): shag ga na sa ma ya swA hA/ oM sa ta pa ra ti he ra sad sha tha tA h+ya ya/ thams cad tshar bcad bsrung ba'o// de ltar dbang gi rgyal po pad+ma dbang chen des/ gdug pa'i klu tshogs tshar bcad de bsgral nas/ la la
71a1(1): gdan du bor/ la la phyag mtshan du bsnams pa'o// la la rgyal mtshan du bzhugs pa'o// la la las la btsud pa'o// de nas gsos nas slar bkod pa'o// de ltar bsrung ba dang tshar bcad pa
71a2(1): dang / sprul pa yan chad dbang du bsdus te/ klu rgyal 'bum gyis dbang gi sgo bsrungs pa'o// klu dang gnyen gyi sde rnams kyang shin tu ston pas gsungs pa la rjes su yi rang nas/ mgu ba dang rangs pas kun nas
71a3(1): khyab pas kun gyis ston pa la bltas te gnas so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ klu gnyen dbang du bsdus shing bsgral nas las la bsgo ba dang tshar bcad bsrung ba'i sngags gsungs pa'i le'u ste go gsum
71a4(1): pa'o// // de nas yang dbang gi rgyal po pad+ma he ru ka la/ las kyi rgyal po dang / pad+ma sems dpa' dang / phyag na rdo rje dang gsum gyis zhus shing don gtan la dbab pa ste/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces
71a5(1): gsol to// kye ma sangs rgyas 'dus pa'i yab// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa'i mchog/ bcom ldan yab las bdag nyan 'tshal// 'dus par chos kyi rnam grangs gsung // zhes gsol to// de nas bcom
71a6(1): ldan dbang mchog des// skye med chos kyi dbyings chen nas// 'gag pa med pa'i skur mtshon nas// sbrul skus 'gro don mdzad pa'o// de nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// phyag na rdo rje la sogs nyon// chos kyi
71b1(1): rnam grangs dbye bar bya// chos kyi rnam grangs dbye ba la// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// thugs kyi dgongs pa bsam mi khyab// thugs ni nam mkha'i dbyings dang 'dra// nam mkha'i dbyings la dpag tu
71b2(1): med// dpag med bsam las 'das pa'o// thugs ni dpag par dka' ba yin// sku dang gsung yang de bzhin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa yang // dpag par dka' bar gsungs pa ste// de bzhin
71b3(1): gsungs gi chos 'di la// sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ni// de yi rnam pa bshad pa ste// dbye ba'i rnam grangs dpag dka' yang // bsdu na gcig las med par gsungs// bsam du med pa'i chos nyid la// ma
71b4(1): nor rtogs na blta ba yin// ma nor pa dang ma bcos pa'i// ngang la gnas na bsgom par bstan// lta ba ma nor gdeng du gzhag/ bsgom pa ma bcos ma yengs pa// phrin las rol pa ma 'gags pa'o// yon tan
71b5(1): zad med gter dang ldan// gsang sngags bsgrub par bstan pa ni// lta ba dang ni spyod pa dang // dbang dang dam tshig shes pa gces// sangs rgyas 'dod pas stong par bsgom// stong pa'i ngang las ye shes
71b6(1): skye// skye ba med pa'i chos nyid la// 'gag pa med pa'i ye shes shar// skye 'gag med pa'i chos kyi sku// chos kyi sku yang sems yin te// sems nyid ye shes shar ba'o// nam mkhas gar khyab sems nyid
72a1(1): de// sems kyis gar khyab nam mkha' yin// ci snang cir srid cir bsgoms kyang // sems la ma rdzogs ye shes med// thams cad sems nyid ngang du shar// lta ba nam mkha' 'dra ba la// spyod pa
72a2(1): yangs dog med par spyod// rdzogs khyab rang byung ye shes yin// gcig dang du ma'i sgra las 'das// sems nyid kun tu bzang po la// ji ltar brjod kyang g.yo ba med// de ltar rtogs na rdzogs pa'o// gsang ba
72a3(1): yang ni brjod pa yin// byang chub sems ni rmad du byung // rmad byung byang chub sems chen la// rig pa ye brdal chen po yin// sems nyid rang byung ye shes yin// rig pa'i ye shes klong brdal bas// brdal ba
72a4(1): chen po'i chos nyid gang // ngang la mi g.yo bsgom pa yin// de las bsgom du med pa ste// ngang las ma yengs gnas par bya// kun bzang bde chen lhun grub pa// rig pa'i ye shes sems nyid de// ma bsgom
72a5(1): bzhag na bsgom pa yin// ma btsal pa nyid rtsol nyid yin// de ltar rtogs na sangs rgyas yin// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las/ lta ba bstan pa'i le'u ste go bzhi pa'o// // de nas
72a6(1): yang ni gsol ba'i don// dbang gi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// phyag na rdo rje las kyi rgyal// pad+ma sems dpa' la sogs nyon// chos kyi rnam grangs bstan pa ni// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la goms par
72b1(1): bya'o// lam gyi 'bras bu 'thob pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi bzung zhig/ skyon gyis ma gos pa 'thob pa'o// mngon par shes pa bsgom pa sgoms shig/ dngos grub thob cing nyes pa med pa'o// 'phags pa'i
72b2(1): lam yan lag brgyad pa bzung zhing rig par gyis shig/ gol sa med pa 'thob pa'o// gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis rtog cing spyod la rig par byos shig/ 'bras bu re dogs med par 'thob pa'o// byang chub
72b3(1): phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la nye bar spyod cig/ 'gag pa med pa'i 'bras bu 'thob pa'o// pha rol tu phyin pa bcu la spyod cig/ thabs dang shes rab la sogs pa bsgoms pas 'bras bu ma spangs gnyis
72b4(1): med pha rol phyin pa'o// pha rol tu phyin pa bcu ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas chags med ye shes chen po 'thob/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas bde ba'i ngang gi ye shes 'thob/ bzod pa'i pha rol phyin
72b5(1): pas mi g.yo ba'i ye shes 'thob/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas bya ba nan tan ye shes 'thob/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas gsal la rtog med ye shes 'thob/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas me
72b6(1): long lta bu'i ye shes 'thob/ stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pas mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes 'thob/ smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pas gsal la rtog med chos kyi ye shes 'thob/ thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong pa nyid
73a1(1): kyi ye shes 'thob/ snying rje'i pha rol tu phyin pas gsal dag ye shes 'thob pa'o// pha rol phyin pa'i don shes na/ sangs rgyas gzhan nas btsal mi dgos// chos kyi rnam grangs bstan pa
73a2(1): gces// sngags kyi mdo las tshig gi sde// yan lag rnam grangs rig pa yis// gang la thogs pa med pa yin// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ chos kyi rnam grangs bstan pa'i le'u ste go lnga
73a3(1): pa'o// // de nas dbang gi rgyal po des/ ma dad pa dregs pa bsgral ba las// gdug pa'i 'khor tshogs ma rungs pa// bdud kyi sde tshogs mang po 'dus// mgo brnyan tshogs dang sde mang kun// sprul cing ma
73a4(1): ngas byung ba las// sgol sngags drag po 'di rnams sku dang gsung thugs las 'thon to// oM ya ma kra ma her na 'dun sa da raM raM raM/ ba sha ru tri sa ma pra be sha phaT nan ya/ ka la ma e ne sad ram/ kha la dur ba
73a5(1): da ru tri pra ma ya sa ma ya pa shaM ka ra phaT/ ya ma stam b+ha pra be sha phaT/ kA la ma dun dun pra ma ya/ ma du gra lings da ha sa d+hi ga rbad/ baM ril ha sa tsi ta bun ya/ sa to pra ma sha lam 'ur mA ra ya/ gam pa ri dza/
73a6(1): pra sha kham/ ling rbad ya/ bdud rigs bcu gsum de yis bsgral// de ma thag nas sngags 'di brjod/ oM nA ga bin du gra he nan/ tra sa ba so sa dan ya/ gr-i h+Na ba ro sha tsa ling / stis sta ban d+ha ban khang raM sad/
73b1(1): nanA ga ru ya pra sha saM/ ked du kra ma na sham khyer ya/ pra sha laM sad laM pra ro ling ya/ nA ga sa ma yaM du na pa ro sad lam ya/ dar me kra ma nA ga se se sa na yaM/ dum pa ling dum pa ling / prad da tsha la khal te sad
73b2(1): lam/ nA ga shag tshal/ hi ra ya hi ra ya nan/ nA ga sad du ram/ praM yaM praM yaM/ mur tsa la mur tsa sa to nA ga praM ya/ bu di ri ram du/ ke nA ga u lu rbad/ nA ga mu ra sha ba laM khang / nA ga sa du raM pa ya/ hes pa ra ma
73b3(1): ya na ma dun niSh+Ta l+yaM h+ya se ya/ praM yaM praM yaM/ mur praM ya/ tsa ta tsa ta mur gra ling nan/ dun ni dun nA shag nA ga ses hur sad/ de yis gdug pa'i klu gnyan bsgral// de ma thag nas sngags 'di 'thon// a tsa pa tsa
73b4(1): la sham ya ling / yak+Sha kha tha kha tha sra ma yaM ya rbad na ling / sa ma ya dur tri he sa brad ling ya/ mur tsa la yag sha rag sha staM b+ha ni/ tshal pa tshal pa/ rbad su rbad su/ kha 'dar kha 'dar/ mur gra ling ya/ de yis
73b5(1): gnod sbyin ma rungs bsgral// de ma thag nas sngags 'di 'thon// oM sad du pra ma lam ba/ sha nan pra saM ya kaM laM he ra ya/ tsi ta ka laM su ma kri kaM rbad ya/ kha la ru tri mur tsa kha la dun/ sha laM brag la yaM/ di ri di
73b6(1): ri/ ra tsa dra ya thum sa ya/ pra ka sha laM sad de ni sa rbad na ling / de yis gza' dang skar ma bsgral ba yin// de ma thag nas sngags 'di 'thon// oM tri sha tsa pa la gug tsa ra ling / ha ma ba sha dur yang pra bi sha laM
74a1(1): pa ya/ kha laM mur ti sa ni sad/ hri ling rbad/ gur la rbud ya/ duM pa shaM rbad/ taM sa du rbad ya/ i laM taM rbad/ pra ma tig d+hi raM rbad ya/ de yis 'byung po thams cad bsgral// de nas yang nyid kyi sku
74a2(1): dang gsung dang thugs las sngags 'di rnams 'thon to// pra sha ka ra sha tra sa dza/ mur praM laM sa du kha la dun dun tsi ri tsi ri/ trA sa ya tA sa ya/ mur pa sha laM ya/ kha tsa lam pa rbad/ ra tsa a ti bal rbad rbad/ au
74a3(1): sang ka ra du ya ma du ri ya/ zhes rgyal po'i rigs thams cad bsgral lo// de nas yang nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs las sngags 'di rnams 'thon to// oM tsa tsa ba li gug ling / tsag sha gur pa sha ya/ mar
74a4(1): pa sha nam pa ya/ se te barbad lam tsa ra ling ya/ ga ta ga te mur tsa ga sha rbad ya/ pra ma grur du ling ya/ sad du tsa lo ro pa sha rbad na ling ya/ kha ya da na du mu ra ya/ pra ta tsa ka waM he sa sad/ shu laM du ka ling ya/
74a5(1): tsa ro pa sha rbad ya/ mur ti kha tang ma rang kha hi/ sa tu me kha du mi du gang ba laM/ sa du sa ma ling ya/ ShuHkaM pra tang tsa laM ya/ tsi ta pra sha gugs ling / sa to ru si ti ling rbad ya/ tsa ti mur tsa khra la rbad ya/ de ni
74a6(1): btsan gyi rigs thams cad bsgral ba'o// sgrol sngags de rnams kyis/ dregs pa de dag thams cad bsgral nas/ gya gyu med par byas so// de phyis kyang de bzhin du bsgral ba'o// sgrol ba'i sngags de thon pa yis//
74b1(1): ma rungs gdug tshogs thams cad bsgral// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+ta las/ drag po sgrol ba'i sngags rnams zon pa'i le'u ste go drug pa'o// // de nas yang dbang gi rgyal po'i sku
74b2(1): gsung thugs las/ 'byung po tri dza mA ra ya dza/ ga ma b+ha ri dza/ pad+ma d+ha ra hrIHa mo ga hriH/ ha ya g+h+ri ba hrIH/ suM ban ni hrIH/ gaM da ni laM rbad/ b+han d+ha gr-i h+Na ro Sha Na ba shaM pa ri dza/ sa ma ya khug/ dum pa dum pa ha ra re
74b3(1): hor re/ tsi le tsi le/ sur ba gur ba/ sham pa ri bag ka mngal hu ra ya/ ta le tu le/ ka ba ru bi 'gri ba ha ba/ de ni don gyis zon pa'o// 'di ni khyi brgyad kyi drag sngags 'thon pa'o// ku ku rak+ta hri kha la tshal
74b4(1): tshal chem rbad/ ku ku rak+Sha ya kha la dum ling rbad/ ku ku rak+Sha me ta me ta baM ri la rbad/ ku ku rak+Sha hI dung dung ril rbad/ ku ku rak+ka hri kha long ka baM ri la rbad/ ku ku rak+kha shaM ka ra baM ri la rbad/ ku ku rak+Sha hUM b+h+yo dum
74b5(1): pa le ri la rbad/ ku ku rak+Sha kha long ka ka ma la ril rbad/ de nas sbrang brgyad kyi sngags 'thon te/ oM dza ya du khug ling rbad/ sho na ka ka ling ling du khug ling rbad/ tsa ka shag ku ku shon rbad/ mu ti ka ma ling hur
74b6(1): rbad/ se ta sa ta breng rbad/ kur sham baM ling rbad/ khu ye sha laM rbad/ mu ru kha sa tsam ling rbad/ de nas yang long ba rgyab sbrel sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi drag sngags 'thon te/ oM li baM ril rbad/ kha ro li rbad/ pi shaM
75a1(1): li rbad/ sum pa sme li rbad/ kar sha li rbad/ gur bi li rbad/ tsing he li zad/ 'bu he li rbad/ shar gyi long ba brgyad kyi'o// oM rad ka la rbad/ mu ka li rbad/ sum pa sha li rbad/ mu kha li rbad/
75a2(1): tsa li rbad/ ga ga li rbad/ ga ga na su ga li rbad/ yur ta li rbad/ lho'i long ba brgyad kyi'o// ba da d+he li rbad/ mu kha li rbad/ kha pa li rbad/ sa pa li rbad/ kang ka li rbad/ kha kha li rbad/ sa ba tsa li rbad/ kang ki
75a3(1): li rbad/ nub kyi long ba brgyad kyi'o// karma ba ra li rbad/ trag tu li rbad/ sum pa li rbad/ pa tsa da na li rbad/ ha sa pi li rbad/ karma du ling rbad/ du mi li rbad/ mu kha tsa li rbad/ byang gi long ba brgyad kyi'o// de
75a4(1): nas yang dbang phyug ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad gser gyi seng ge nyi shu rtsa brgyad du sprul nas/ las la dbang ba'i dbang dpal gyis bskur te/ drag sngags 'di rnams kyi sgra brjod do// oM sri li rbad/ ru tri rbad/ gab li
75a5(1): rbad/ trang sa li rbad/ mu ra tsa rbad/ su kha ye rbad/ ha e rbad/ re tri rbad/ ha sa rbad/ sha thaM rbad/ baM rba na rbad/ ti ri rbad/ kha ro rbad/ ma ke rbad/ ba traM rbad/ kha ta rbad/ ha sa li rbad/ ka ma li rbad/ si pa li
75a6(1): rbad/ ba ro rbad/ da lo rbad/ hrim rbad/ kar sha rbad/ tsa ka rbad/ mu ka rbad/ ra ti ma rbad/ ga ro rbad/ sha la ma ti rbad/ seng ge nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi sngags de rnams 'thon to// de nas yang khro bo mgo dgu brtsegs
75b1(1): la sogs pa bzhi'i sngags 'di rnams 'thon to// kro ta ti ri ling rbad/ kro d+ha khug ling zad/ kro ta maM raM ti rbad/ kro d+ha kar sha ma bai ril rbad/ sgo ba mgo brtsegs pa khro bo'i sngags de rnams 'thon to// de ltar
75b2(1): yang drag sngags 'di rnams gsungs so// de nas yang gsang ba yum gzi ldan pad+ma can la sogs pa'i yum rnams kyis// ma dad pa chen po de'i yum dang / 'khor gyi rig ma la sogs pa ma rungs pa gdug pa'i
75b3(1): mtshon thogs pa ma rungs pa'i sgra 'byin pa de dag bsgral ba'i phyir/ drag po sgrol ba'i sngags 'di rnams 'thon to// oM karma ni laM ma ma ha sa pra sha ya/ ka ta ke ta tsi ta ma ra li/ ha saM ba ro da ro ma ma dum pa
75b4(1): ling / ha sa sa duM pa sha ling ya ya/ pa tsa rag sa ma ya/ sa du ba sa ram yaM kha li he ra rbad ya/ ma ma dum dum ling ya ya/ thum pa thum pa rbad/ mu long rdobs ya/ ka lam sa pa pra ka li rbad la/ mu ti ha sa laM tsa ta
75b5(1): tsa ti baM pa ri mug mug ha ra ya rngubs long ya/ sa ma ya da ru ni rbad ya/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ ma ti mA ra ya/ kha li he ra rbad ya/ rug rug chem che ma hi hi da kho kha rog su ni rbad mA ra ya nan/ gsang ba'i drag sngags
75b6(1): de rnams 'thon to// de nas yang ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi sngags 'di rnams 'thon to// oM 'bu bar 'bu bar 'bu ga nan shaSha ga ti tha pa ri shrI pa ro gul naM khri hri sad da du gra gya num pa ni skyes da tha ya/
76a1(1): drag po'i sngags de rnams 'thon to// drag po'i sngags de nyid rnams kyis dgug pa dang dbab pa dang / bcing pa dang gzhom pa dang dbab cing las gang yang 'grub par byed pa'o// zhes
76a2(1): gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ lha rnams kyi drag sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste go bdun pa'o// // de nas dbang gi rgyal po kun 'dus bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma dbang chen
76a3(1): 'dus pa'i gtso// sangs rgyas kun gyi yab chen po// gsung mchog dam pa'i lha sgrub pa// sangs rgyas kun 'dus gtso la bdag nyan 'tshal// zhes gsol pas/ dbang gi rgyal pos 'di skad ces bka' stsal
76a4(1): to// kye ma nyon cig gsang bdag thugs kyi sras// gsung mchog dam pa'i lha bsgrub pa// rtag tu bsgom par bya ba ni// legs par bshad kyis nges par zung // gsung mchog dam pa bsgrub pa ni// byang chub
76a5(1): lam ni nye bar bsgrub// bar du gcod pa shugs kyis bsgral// sngags dang phyag rgyas 'grub pa yin// tshig dang yi ges 'grub pa yin// glu dang bro yis 'grub pa yin// brtul zhugs chen pos 'grub pa
76a6(1): yin// gsungs pa'i sngags kyis 'grub pa yin// byang chub yan lag dag gis 'grub// 'grub thag nye la 'bras bu che// nyon cig sems dpa' gsang ba'i bdag/ dbang gi lha rnams bsgrub pa la// phun sum
76b1(1): tshogs pa ldan par bya// me tog chu gling rin chen gling // 'bru shing 'tshams la nyams dga'i gnas// gnam ni 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad 'dra// sa ni pad+ma 'dab brgyad 'dra// de lta bu yi gnas su bsgrub// yang na
76b2(1): brag dmar zla gam 'dra// mdzes pa'i stegs bu de ru brtsig/ rin chen sna lnga'i phye mas bris// dbus kyi zla gam dmar po sgo spod la// tha ma pad+ma 'dab brgyad ste// de mtha' gru chad gru bzhi gnyis// sgo dang khyud
76b3(1): du ldan par bya// dod la mdzes la pho brang gsal// de la dbang gi lha dgod de// rten gyi gsung gi yi ge dgod// dang po mchod pa'i rdzas kyang dgram// byin brlab pa yang de bzhin bya// de nas ting 'dzin rnam
76b4(1): gsum rim bzhin bsgom// shAn+ya tA yi sgra brjod pas// stong pa nyid du gsal ba'o// d+harma d+hA tu'i sgra brjod pas// khyab pa'i snying rje gsal bar bskyed// de las rig pa byang chub sems// dmar la bkra ba'i hUM du
76b5(1): gsal// de la bskyed rdzogs tshig kyang brjod// hUM las 'byung ba'i yi ge chad// de las 'byung ba'i cha yang bsnyam// de las b+h+rUM dang maM chad pas// rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas bsgom// nang ni dur khrod chen
76b6(1): po ste// gdug pa bsgral ba'i thong lpags mdzes// ka ba ka zhu ka gdan dang // gdung dang lcam dang dral dag dang // rgyal mtshan la sogs de bzhin te// dregs chen kun bsnol gdan tshogs dang // nyi zla pad+mar
77a1(1): bcas pa'o// de la dbang gi lha bskyed pa// de yi steng du hUM dmar re// pad+ma d+ha ra hri kro ta shrI he ru ka krang krang krang krang krang krang krang krang zhes brjod pas/ dbang chen pad+ma he ru ka/ sku byu ru'i sdong
77a2(1): bu 'dra ba/ phyag bcu drug pa dbu lnga pa/ zhabs dmar po brgyad du gtams pa/ zhe sdang rdo rje dang bcas pa'o// 'bar ba'i gshog pa bzhis brgyan pa/ gshog pa'i rtse gnyis la bya khyung re res mtshan pa/ de ltar
77a3(1): gsal ba'i dbu rgyan gyi khang bu lnga la/ rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas la sems dpa' dang sems ma sgo ba dang bcas pas bskor ba/ rigs kyi tshom bu lnga'i dkyil 'khor gsal ba/ khang bu lngan rta mgo re re yod pa/
77a4(1): rta mgo ljang gu rdog ma le brgan dpral ba dkar zhur te/ dpral ba dkar zhur gyi nang na tshe dang bla'i ga'u re gtams pa/ rna ba gnyis mig gnyis dang bzhin/ tshe'i lha mo bzhi gsung snyan pa/ tshe dang dbang thang gi
77a5(1): sgra 'byung ba/ zla gam sgo gcig pa'i nang na bzhugs pa/ lha mo bzhi dang bcas pa gsal ba'o// dbyings kyi tshom bu lnga'i dkyil 'khor nas sangs rgyas bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis bzhugs pa'o// thugs ka na ye shes
77a6(1): sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor la/ dpal be'u rin chen zur brgyad pa'i dkyil 'khor na/ snying po sngags kyis bskor ba yum dang bcas pa ste/ de ni ye shes sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor ro// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i
77b1(1): dkyil 'khor ni// phyag ni g.yas g.yon dbus kyi dkyil 'khor du// rol pa'i khrag 'thung lnga bcu brgyad// dbus ni zlum po pho brang la// de dbus zla gam sgo gcig pa// zlum po'i 'khor lo tha ma rtsibs brgyad
77b2(1): de// phyi rol gru chad gru bzhi sgo dang bcas// de la khrag 'thung lha tshogs gsal// gsal le sing nge gsal ba'o// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas gshog pa g.yas g.yon dbus su ni// dbus ni
77b3(1): zlum por bskor ba la// tha ma zla gam pad+ma brgyad// gru chad bzhi po sgo dang bcas// yum bzhi phra men bskor ba'o// rdo rje khams gsum rnam rgyal dkyil 'khor ro// lte ba ngan song sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor
77b4(1): ro// dbus su zlum pos bskor ba la// tha ma zla gam bzhi yis bskor// de la rtag pa'i rgyal po gzi brjid 'bar// 'khor bzhi gtso dang bcas pa dgod// ngan song sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// dur khrod chen
77b5(1): po'i dkyil 'khor te// dbus kyi zlum pos bskor ba las// thig bzhi btab pas ling tshe dgu// phyogs bzhi dbus dang lnga la ni// pho brang re res bskor ba'o// gru bzhi sgo dang bcas pa ste// de la yi ge dgod
77b6(1): pa ni// pad+ma la ma mo brgyad kyis bskor ba'o// de ni dur khrod chen po'i dkyil 'khor ro// hUM mdzad chen po'i dkyil 'khor ni// zhabs kyi 'og tu gsal ba ste// thig bzhi btab pas ling tshe dgu// nang du zla
78a1(1): gam re yis bskor// gru chad gru bzhi sgo dang bcas// de la khro bo bcu mnan pa// khro tshogs 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor te// sa le bar ni gsal ba'o// hUM mdzad chen po'i dkyil 'khor ro// zhabs
78a2(1): kyi 'og tu gsal ba ste// dbang chen sku la da la brgyad do// gcig tu bsdus nas gcig tu gsal ba ni// rigs bsdus lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// yum gzi ldan pad+ma can gyis thugs ka nas 'dud
78a3(1): pa dang 'khril ba dang sbyor bar gnas pa ni/ gsang ba yab la sbyor ba'o// de ltar brtul zhugs chen po bzhi dang / phra men ma go la ma kham rgya mo drug khyi sbrang dang long ba dang khro bo mgo brtsegs kyis bskor
78a4(1): ba'o// rin po che'i khri rkang gi bar na dbang phyug ma gser gyi seng ge nyi shu rtsa brgyad gzhug bsngal du 'degs so// de ltar gsal ba la/ thugs ka na rten la hu lu yig 'bru bcu gsum gyis bskor nas gnas
78a5(1): pa'o// de la 'di skad brjod do// hUM sku bzhi gcig tu bsdus pas kun tu zhal// phyogs bzhi rigs bzhi 'bar ba'i skur bstan pas// spyi mthon sna lngar snang yang nam mkha'i rgyan du ston// rigs kyi dbang
78a6(1): rnams rdzogs pas thams cad ma lus sgrol// hUM mdzad khro bo chen po brgyad kyi snying // chad par bcug nas nang du bsres te gsol// byams dang snying rje ldan pa'i tshul mnga' ba// rdo rje lcags kyu sbrul gyi zhags
78b1(1): pa bsnams// be con rnge'u chung dang shel gyi rde'u chung 'dzin// thod rlon khrag dang nang du bsres te gsol// phyogs bzhi rgyun du hUM gi sgra sgrogs pas// rdo rje byin chen 'bar ba gsor zhing brdeg/ gdu bu dpung
78b2(1): rgyan sbrul nag mi srun pa// hUM gi sgra sgrogs bskal pa'i me lce 'dra// sdigs mdzub rtse las bskal pa'i me 'bar bas// ma rig rmongs pa'i mun nag 'thib po sel// mi ldog sa la 'gro ba 'dren pa'i
78b3(1): rtags// thabs kyi zhags pa rdo rje lu gu rgyud// rdo rje rin chen las byung gshog pa ni// nyi ma stong gis brgyan pa'i the'u gshog can// zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod phrin las kyis// thams cad bla med byang chub
78b4(1): gnas su sgrol// dpa' bo ting 'dzin rnon po stag gi chas// rno gdug zlog byed rgya bye lcags kyi chas// shes rab ting 'dzin rdo rje 'chol ba'i chas// dbang gi bse khrab smug po gzi 'bar chas// dpa' brjid
78b5(1): mnyen lcug sbrul nag 'khril ba'i chas// dmar gsal dbang phyug za byed ting 'dzin mche ba'i chas// mthing ga le brgan shu ken dar gyi rgyan// gcan gzan rgyal po gtum pa gzig gi chas// phyogs bzhi
78b6(1): mtshams bzhi brgyad du yang // 'dul ba'i zhabs brgyad phyogs mtshams brgyad du bgrad// snying gar mkhrig ma nub cing sgal tshigs khong du 'joms// sdug bsngal nyam thag 'bod sgrog skad chen 'byin// oM na
79a1(1): sha staM b+ha ni/ ag sha sum b+ha ni/ gar ni sha hAM ka ra pra be sha phaT/ ga na da ga na ta hAM/ tshin+ta tshin+ta kro d+ha ni kro d+ha ni hA/ de ltar phyag rgya chen po gsal bar bskyed// hUM dbang gi rta gdong phrin las
79a2(1): mgyogs pa'i mthu// ye shes myur mgyogs shes rab rtsal gyi pha rol phyin// rtsal gyi rlabs kyis sa gsum cig car gnon// 'tsher skad gdangs su snyan pas gsang ba'i thugs dam bskul// rngam pa'i kha rtsal
79a3(1): tsha bas 'khor tshogs dbang du sdud// stobs drug 'gros su mgyogs pas rgyud drug thabs kyis 'dren// rol pa'i rta bro brdungs pas bdud bzhi thal bar rlog/ 'jig rten sgrol la mkhas pas mi mnyam thabs
79a4(1): kyis 'dren// de nas yum ni bskyed par bya// e h+ye hi sa ma ya s+t+waM e h+ye hi sa ma ya hUM/ ma hA shrI ga ma la sa ma ya hUM/ ma hA badz+ra shrI badz+ra ka ma la ya sa ma la s+t+waM/ oM a ka te pa te te ma hA ka ta ye swA hA/ zhes brjod
79a5(1): pas yum gzi ldan pad+ma can gyi skur bskyed do// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+ta las/ dbang gi phrin las kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor skyed pa'i le'u ste go brgyad pa'o// // de nas yang ni
79a6(1): gsungs pa ste// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor spyan drang ngo // skye med chos dbyings dag pa nas// zla gam dmar po dbang gi dkyil 'khor 'dir// dbang chen yab yum gshegs su gsol// gnyis su med pa'i tshul
79b1(1): gyis bzhugs// chos dbyings dag pa'i pho brang nas// ye shes khyad par gzhal yas su// ye shes dgu brtsegs dkyil 'khor kun// gnas 'dir brtse phyir gshegs su gsol// ye shes chen po'i klong dkyil
79b2(1): nas// ma lus gshegs shing bzhugs su gsol// sa ma ya dza/ sa ma ya staM/ pra be sha phaT/ A be sha a/ 'dod chags dag pas shes rab pha rol phyin// ma 'gags rol pa'i phyag rgya cir yang snang // bde
79b3(1): gshegs yab yum sku la phyag 'tshal lo// nyon mongs rtog pa'i dra ba kun bcom nas// ye shes dgu yi don dang rab ldan pa// dbang gi rgyal po'i sku la bkod gnas tshul// rigs chen lha dgu dag la phyag
79b4(1): 'tshal lo// gdug pa ma lus kun 'dul zhing // nyon mongs tha ba 'joms mdzad pa// mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// a ti pu ho// pra tits+tsha ho// shrI na maH/ kun bzang mchod pas mnyes par bya// yang
79b5(1): dag don gyi sku yang bsil// d+hA pe puSh+pe A lo ke// gan+d+he la sogs lha mo bzhi// mchod pa dag pa'i tshul du 'bul// rtsa ba brgyad dang yan lag stong // ra sA ya na la sogs rdzas// lha rnams kun la dbul bar
79b6(1): bya// dngas ma ma 'dres khu ba khrag/ sha chen la sogs mchod pa 'di// dbang gi lha la dbul bar bya// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa 'di// so sor ji ltar 'tshams pa bzhin du 'bul// oM AHhUM sku gsung thugs
80a1(1): kyi bde ba mchog tu bskyed par gyur cig/ sa ma ya sa ma ya dgyes pa chen po dam tshig mchog la rol cig/ ma trang kha ma trang kha gnod byed 'byung po tshogs ni bstab bo bzhes su gsol/ ka rug
80a2(1): sha ka rug sha bzhad pa'i gad rgyangs 'brug stong mang po ldir cig/ ha ha he ha ha he thugs dam bskang ba'i slad du phrin las grub par mdzod cig/ e h+ye hi e h+ye hi sdang ba'i dgra bo'i snying nas drongs shig ma srid
80a3(1): las kyi bdag/ sham pa ri sham pa ri khA hi 'jigs byed khro bo'i tshogs mang por sprul par gyur cig/ dkyil 'khor skyong ba'i bdag/ ha ro ya ha ro ya thabs kyi mchog tu dbul lo bzhes su gsol lo// sa ma ya
80a4(1): ho sa ma ya ho thugs dam yum la bskul lo thugs dam skongs shig/ ces bskul lo// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ rang bzhin dkyil 'khor spyan drangs shing bzhugs pa dang phyag 'tshal ba
80a5(1): dang / mchod pa 'bul smon lam btab pa'i le'u ste go dgu pa'o// // de nas yang phrin las bcol zhing snyan 'bul gsol bar bya ba ste/ dus mtha' me ltar 'bar ba'i klong rum nas// za byed khrag 'thung
80a6(1): le brgan 'bar ba'i sku// dbang gi phrin las rta mgo ljang gu las// 'od kyi gzi mdangs nam mkha'i mdangs su che// spyan gyi gzi mdangs phrin las rnam pa bzhi// sdang mig log pa'i spyan dmar zlog pas
80b1(1): ni// nga dang bdag tu lta ba'i khro bo kun// phyogs med zil gyis mnan pa snyan bsnyun gsol// zur mig 'phred kyis gzigs thabs bstan pa ni// gsang ba yum gyi tshogs rnams ma lus kun// gdung ba'i
80b2(1): tshul gyis sku la 'khril pa dang // zla gam 'od kyi 'phro 'du 'bul ba dang // b+ha ga'i gnas su ling+ga gdab pa'i phyir// thogs med zil gyis mnan par snyan bskrun gsol// ngan song yongs su sbyong ba'i
80b3(1): gzigs thabs kyis// log 'dren gtan srid 'khyams pa'i yi dwags dang // gti mug yongs su rmongs pa'i byol song dang // sdug bsngal bzod par dka' ba'i dmyal tshogs gsum// thar pa yang dag gnas
80b4(1): su drang ba'i phyir// 'khor ba'i g.yul las bzlog par snyan bstan gsol// dgyes mdangs zhi ba'i gzigs thabs bstan pa ni// srid gsum rab 'byams 'jig rten ma lus kun// mnyam nyid dbyings su
80b5(1): zil gyis gnan pa'i phyir// zhe sdang gtum khro zhi bar snyan bsnun gsol// khro rgyal spyan gyis bag chags ma lus kun// log par lta ba'i ling tog bsal ba'i phyir// pad+ma'i spyan gyis byin rlabs bskyed du
80b6(1): gsol// khro rgyal snyan gyi rdo rje 'khor byang las// gsan pa ma 'gags chos kyi sgra dbyangs kyis// nyon mongs rnam dag dbyings su dbang bsgyur zhing // dmigs pa ma chad sna tshogs sgra la sogs// sgra mtha' ji
81a1(1): bzhin bsgo bar snyan bsnun gsol// gzhan gyi snyan dang thun mong ma lags te// thugs rje'i snyan gyis nyam zag sgra lags na// ye shes snyan gyis bskul ba'i dbyangs lags na// phyi nang
81a2(1): gsang ba'i snyan gsum rdzogs pa yis// ji snyed gdul dka' 'dul bar snyan bsnyun gsol// khro rgyal 'bar bshangs kyi klong rum nas// dug lnga gsod pa'i mtshon cha ye shes sku// khams gsum sgrol ba'i
81a3(1): phrin las bcol ba ni// 'dod chags dbang bsgyur dri ma med pa'i sku// chags pa'i skyon rnams dag par snyan bskrun gsol// zhe sdang dbang bsgyur skye shi med pa'i sku// sdug bsngal phung po gzhom par snyan bsnun
81a4(1): gsol// gti mug dbang bsgyur ye shes 'khor lo'i sku// ma rig rmongs pa gsal bar snyan bsnyun gsol// nga rgyal dbang bsgyur yid bzhin rin chen sku// dregs pa'i nga rgyal gzhom par snyan bstun
81a5(1): gsol// sprin las dbang bsgyur thugs rje las kyi sku// skye shi rtsad nas gcod par snyan bsnyun gsol// khro rgyal rngam pa'i zhal gyi klong rum nas// hom lnga 'brel pa'i sbyin sreg chen por mdzod// za byed khro bo
81a6(1): dkyil 'khor ma lus kun// dug gsum za ba'i mgron du spyan 'dren na// rgyud drug gtor mar bzhes par snyan bsnyun gsol// pad+ma le brgan cir yang bsgyur ba'i ljags// zla gam 'phro 'du cir yang 'gyur
81b1(1): ba'i gsung // dri med rgyal po gsung rab mang po dag/ chu bo rgyun ltar 'bab par snyan bskrun gsol// thugs kyi khro bo mang po phra mo bsgoms pa yis// phra mo'i ting 'dzin ye shes he ru ka/ rdul gcig steng na
81b2(1): rdul snyed sku sprul pas// chos kyi dbyings kyis bsdus pa'i 'jig rten na// ma rig rmongs pas mdongs pa'i skye 'gro dang // rnal 'byor dam la gnas pa'i sgrub pa po// thog ma med pa'i dus nas 'khor bar
81b3(1): 'khor// gzung 'dzin chags pa'i dbang gis bsags pa yis// rgyud drug bag chags ma lus ji snyed kun// thams cad gnas su dag par snyan bskrun gsol// sku yi khro rgyal rngam byed bsnyen pa'i lha// thod
81b4(1): rus me ltar 'bar ba'i khro bo hUM sgra can// zhag chen thig le dmar chen tshom bus brgyan// sprul pa'i rgyan tshogs skar ltar 'khrugs pa yis// dug lnga skyon gyis myos pa'i skye bo rnams// gdug pa ma lus 'dul
81b5(1): bar snyan bstan gsol// thugs dam dbang gis log 'dren bstab pa'i phyir// dbu rgyan tshogs la snyan bskrun gsol ba ni// dbang rnams rdzogs pa'i phrin las 'grub par mdzod// rta mgrin sogs la snyan
81b6(1): bskrun gsol ba ni// srin po 'dul ba'i phrin las 'grub par mdzod// ye shes tshogs la snyan bskrun gsol ba ni// mkhyen rab rdzogs pa'i phrin las 'grub par mdzod// phyag mtshan rdzogs pa'i snyan bskrun
82a1(1): gsol ba ni// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phrin las 'grub par mdzod// gshog pa'i tshogs la snyan bsnyun gsol ba ni// klu chen 'dul ba'i phrin las 'grub par mdzod// thod sbrul tshogs la snyan gsan
82a2(1): gsol ba ni// gdug byed bzlog pa'i phrin las 'grub par mdzod// khro rgyal tshogs la snyan bsnyun gsol ba ni// khro bo 'dul ba'i phrin las 'grub par mdzod// gzi ldan tshogs la snyan bsnyun gsol ba
82a3(1): ni// yab yum sbyor ba'i phrin las 'grub par mdzod// dpal chen tshogs la snyan bsnyun gsol ba ni// lhun gyis grub pa'i phrin las 'grub par mdzod// ces gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ snyan
82a4(1): bstan gsol ba dang bstod pa'i le'u ste brgya tham pa'o// // de nas yang dbang gi rgyal po pad+ma he ru ka la/ bsnyen pa dbul bar gsungs pa ste// mgrin pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lor gsung dag pa
82a5(1): pad+ma lce'u bcu drug gis mtshan pa de'i lte ba la gsung gi yi ge a dmar po// de'i mtha' mar hu lu 'bru bcu gsum gyis bskor bas yi ge'i phreng bar gnas pa'o// spyi bor bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo la le'u tshe
82a6(1): sum cu so gnyis/ de'i dbus na thugs kyi yi ge oM dkar po/ tha ma hu lu yig 'bru bcu gsum gyis bskor ba'o// dar dkar gyi yol du bres pa la dngul gyi gzer chen lu gu rgyud du yod pa'o// rin chen skyogs
82b1(1): ni gtsang ma la// zil pa bzhin du yi ge gnas// snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo 'dab ma brgyad dpal be'u chad zung dang bcas pa'o// yi ge hUM dmar la bkra bar gnas/ tha ma hu lu yig 'bru'i bskor// lte ba sprul
82b2(1): pa'i 'khor lo la// 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi ste/ de'i dbus su swA ser gnas pa la// yig 'bru bcu gsum sngar dang 'dra// me rlung las kyi 'khor lo la// gzhu yi dbyibs 'dra ba dan mtshan// dbus su yi ge hA
82b3(1): ldang ngo // sngags kyi 'bru rnams gong dang 'dra// de ltar gnas pa gsal ba la// oM hu lu hu lu phaT/ e A ra li hUM hrIHdza/ zhes brjod pas// dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi thugs dam bskul ba'o// rta mchog
82b4(1): rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ hu lu'i don bstan pa'i le'u ste brgya dang gcig pa'o// // de nas ston pa dbang gi rgyal po la// spobs pa dang ldan pa'i phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma dbang chen dbang
82b5(1): gi bdag/ dbang gi bdag la bdag nyan 'tshal// 'gro ba phyi rabs don gyi phyir// dbang gi don rnams bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pas// dbang gi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// sangs rgyas thugs ni sras
82b6(1): chen po// khyod la sogs par dbang rnams bskur// lha dbang rim pas bskur bar bya// dbang chen 'dus pas dbang bskur bas// sems bskyed bsre dang brda yis bstan// legs pa nyes pa'i dgongs pa
83a1(1): brjod// snod min pa la bstan pa min// gsang sngags nyes dmigs 'di lta bas// da rung legs par gsol ba gdab// dad ldan shin tu ngang tshul bzang // lus dang srog la mi phangs
83a2(1): par// dka' thub dka' ba spyod pa ni// slob dpon dam pa de la ni// ba la be'u bzhin du 'breng // de lta bu yi slob ma la// dbang stegs rim par bcas nas su// sems bskyed pa dang rjes 'jug bya// khrus
83a3(1): dang gtsang sbras lus brgyan la// so shing dang ni gegs bsal lo// bar du lha tshon sta gon bya// dbang gi dkyil 'khor bri ba ni// 'khor lo rtsibs ni brgyad pa la// dbus su zla gam sgo dang bcas// rtsibs
83a4(1): brgyad nang du zla gam re// gru bzhi sgo dang bcas pa'o// de la dbang gi lha bkod la// rdzas dang rgyan rnams tshang bar bsag/ dbang gi bum pa dmar po ru// de ru gsal bar bskyed pa'o// le brgan dar gyi
83a5(1): gdugs su mtshan// ras dkar ma nyams yol dang chings// bkra shis pa yi rdzas su bsag/ zhal zas mang po de bzhin no// dang po bsnyen pa bya ba dang // bar bar gyur nas mchod pa dang // nub ni tha mar
83a6(1): dbang bskur ro// mdzes pa'i lus rgyan dris byug pa'i// slob ma gdan bting nub nas shar// sngon gyi mig mkhan rgyal po yis// shel gyi gtsag bu thogs nas ni// ma rig ling tog bsal ba ltar// de ring bu
83b1(1): yi rab rib bsal// maN+Dal pra be sha phaT// 'di yis lha rnams mthong bar 'gyur// phyag 'tshal gus pas lus btud la// hUM de ring phan chad bu khyod kyang // rgyal ba kun gyi sras yin pas// dkyil 'khor
83b2(1): bzang po 'di la ltos// lha dang slob dpon 'di dag la// smad pa dag tu ma byed cig/ de nas dam chu de blud la// khyed kyis legs par gsang bar byas// gal te de las nyams gyur na// dam chu de yis skyon
83b3(1): byas nas// mnar med pa yi dmyal bar 'gro// khyod kyis legs par bsrungs byas na// sangs rgyas kun gyi sras su 'gyur// zhes dam bsgrag pa'o// de nas lha rnams rim par dbang bskur ba ste/ e ma gsang
83b4(1): mchog gsang ba'i bdag/ rig pa bde chen rgyal ba'i yab// sangs rgyas kun 'dus rgyal po yi// sku gsung thugs kyi dbang bskur bas// rigs kyi dbang mchog thob par shog/ kro d+ha d+he ba a a/ thugs kar
83b5(1): sbas pa gsang ba'i yum// rgyal bas bsngags pa'i gzi ldan pad+ma can// gsang mdzod yum gyi dbang bskur bas// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i dbang thob shog/ pad+ma rA ga kro d+hI a a/ hUM dug lnga gnas su dag pa
83b6(1): yi// rigs mchog sangs rgyas chen po lngas// skal ldan khyod la dbang bskur bas// ye shes lnga yi dbang thob shog/ hUM badz+ra d+h+ri ka/ oM dzi na dzi ka/ swA rat+na d+h+r-i ka/ oM A ro li ka/ hA pra dz+nyA d+h+r-i ka/ oM hUM/ hUM bde chen
84a1(1): gsang ba yum gyi mchog/ sangs rgyas thugs dam dgyes skong ma// gsang ba yum gyi dbang bskur bas// shes rab ye shes dbang thob shog/ mr-i d+hA tI shwa ri/ la~M de Sha ra ti/ maM mo ha ra ti/ b+hai rA ga ra
84a2(1): ti/ taM badz+ra ra ti a/ rtog pa'i tshogs dag bde ldan byang chub sems// don la sems dpa' brgyad kyi dbang bskur bas// rigs rnams kun gyi dbang bskur sbyin// tsit+ta pra ti a a/ hUM yul las dag pa byang
84a3(1): chub sems ma brgyad// mdzes pa'i sku mchog mtshan dang dpe byad ldan// byang chub sems ma brgyad kyi dbang bskur bas// mdzes ma brgyad kyi dbang mchog thob par shog/ tsit+ta ma la ya a a a/ chos sku nam
84a4(1): mkha' lta bu'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang // 'gro ba'i don mdzad kun bzang yab yum sku// sangs rgyas 'di yi dbang bskur bas// bde chen gsang ba'i dbang thob shog/ d+harma dz+nyA na kA ya hUM a/ nyon mongs gnas
84a5(1): su dag pa las// sprul pa'i bcom ldan thub pa drug/ de ring khyod la dbang bskur bas// so sor 'dul mdzad dbang thob shog/ mu ni kr-i swA ha/ mu ni hUM swA ha/ mu ni suM swA hA/ mu ni praM swA hA/ mu ni k+ShaM swA hA/ mu ni
84a6(1): ye swA hA/ hUM a A/ log rtog mtshan ma'i dngos po rnam dag nas// 'gro ba'i don du rig pa'i sgo ma bzhi// skal ldan skyes bu khyod la dbang bskur bas// zhi rgyas dbang drag dbang rnams thob par shog/ dzaHhUM baM
84b1(1): hoH/ hUM a/ hUM chos kyi dbyings las rgyal ba'i skur bzhengs nas// ye shes lnga las rta mgo lngar bstan te// sangs rgyas kun gyis bkur ba'i rgyal po mchog/ log rtog bdud rnams 'dul bas dbang thob
84b2(1): shog/ ha ya g+hI wa kro d+ha oM hUM a/ hUM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas kun gyi sras chen po// ye shes sems dpas dbang bskur bas// gnyis med de yi dbang thob shog/ dz+nyA na tsit+ta maN+Da la hUM
84b3(1): a/ chos sku zhi ba'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang // gdug pa 'dul phyir dus la mi 'da' bas// bcom ldan he ru lnga yi dbang bskur bas// log pa'i gdug rtsub 'joms pa'i dbang thob shog/ kro d+ha ma hA maN+Da la
84b4(1): hUM a/ khro mchog thugs dam dgyes skong ma// kro tI shwa rI dgyes pa'i yum// gsang ba yum gyi dbang bskur bas// shes rab yum gyi dbang thob shog/ dz+nyA na kro tI maN+Da la hUM a/ tshogs brgyad gnas gyur go rI khro
84b5(1): mo brgyad// rig pa rtags kyi phyag mtshan so sor 'dzin// khro mo rol pa'i dbang bskur bas// gnyis med don gyi dbang thob shog/ ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha hUM a/ yul brgyad gnas su dag pas phra men tshul du
84b6(1): 'dzin// 'gugs 'dren las kyis dpal gyi thugs dam skong // phra men thogs med dbang rnams thob par shog/ he he he he he he he he hUM a/ rtag chad gnas su dag pa'i rta gdong sgo ma bzhi/ so sor 'dul skal
85a1(1): rnam bzhi rdzogs mdzad pa'i// sgo ma bzhi yi dbang bskur bas// ye shes bzhi yi dbang thob shog/ ba ma ta yi hUM a/ khams gsum rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor ma rungs 'dul// g.yas pa rdo rje'i gshog
85a2(1): pa brgyad du gdengs// g.yon pa rin chen gshog pa brgyad du gdengs// steng dang 'og dang bar bar na// rdo rje the'u gshog re res brgyan// steng ma gnyis ni rdo rje'i rgyu las byung // gshog pa'i dang ru rtse mtshan
85a3(1): la// dbang gi sprul pa chen po ste// bya khyung 'bar ba'i skur bstan pas// de ring khyod la dbang bskur bas// klu gnyen 'dul ba'i dbang thob shog/ tsit+ta badz+ra ga ru Da a// 'bar ba'i gshog pa bzhi po la// dra
85a4(1): ba mo dang glog 'gyu ma// bar bar skabs na nyi ma stong gis brgyan// khams gsum rgyal dang mi g.yo mgon// khro mchog 'bar ba'i skur bstan nas// tshom bu 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gsal// rdzu 'phrul klu
85a5(1): rnams dbang du sdud// rdo rje gshog pa'i dbang bskur bas// thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i dbang thob shog/ kro ta ba pa hi a/ 'og ma gnyis ni rin po che yi rgyu las byung // bar bar skabs su zla ba stong
85a6(1): gis brgyan// tshom bu gsang ba'i lha mo'i tshogs// dbang mchog de yi dbang bskur bas// bkra shis phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang thob shog/ khams gsum rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor lha tshogs mang po kun// skal
85b1(1): dang ldan la dbang bskur bas// kun las rgyal ba'i dbang thob shog/ kro d+ha hUM a/ hUM ngan song gnas rnams yongs su spyod mdzad pa// gzi brjid rgyal po khro mchog mang po'i tshogs// bde gshegs gtso mchog
85b2(1): dbang bskur bas// dug gsum nad rnams 'joms pa'i dbang thob shog/ oM AHhUM swA hA/ hUM rig pa tshom bu'i dkyil 'khor nas// mi dge bcu rnams gnas su tshar bcad nas// pha rol phyin pa'i dbang mchog
85b3(1): 'di bskur bas// bgrod med sa la phyin pa'i dbang thob shog/ kro d+ha sid+d+hi a/ hUM dpal gyi sku mchog gnyis med rol pa'i stabs// dur khrod chas brgyad gsang ba'i ngang du rol// dur khrod chen po'i dbang
85b4(1): mchog 'di bskur bas// ta na ga Na rol pa rtags chen dbang thob shog/ hUM kro ta hu lu hUM phaT/ hUM bde gshegs sku la dkyil 'khor dgu gsal bas// ye shes rigs 'dus gsang ba'i dbang dang ldan// dbang
85b5(1): chen dbang mchog de yi dbang bskur bas// sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur thob par shog/ dz+nyA na d+harma maN+Dal hUM a/ hUM 'dod pas chags pas nyon mongs dug gsum rgyu// de dag 'dul phyir dka' thub rta yi
85b6(1): dbu// chags pa'i nad[:]spangs sangs rgyas rigs kyi dbang // khyod la bskur bas thams cad 'joms pa'i dbang thob shog/ ga[:]nA[:]d+h+r-ika[:]a a// nyon mongs gti mug gnas su[:]dag bya'i
86a1(1): phyir// brtul zhugs gdug pa phag gi dbu// bde gshegs zhing khams bsrung ba dang // sra sti med par 'joms pa'i dbang thob shog/ ba ra hi ba ra a/ nyon mongs nga rgyal zhe sdang gnas su dag
86a2(1): bya'i phyir// brtul zhugs khyi yi mgo can sprul pa'i mchog/ rin chen rigs kyi zhing khams bskyang ba dang // rgyas pa'i las kyis bdud dpung 'joms pa'i dbang thob shog/ ku ku rak+Sha dz+nyA na gar+b+ha hUM a/ nyon
86a3(1): mongs phrag dog gnas su dag bya'i phyir// brtul zhugs bya yi mgo can sprul pa'i mchog/ las kyi rigs kyi zhing khams bskyang ba dang // brtul zhugs drag pos log 'dren 'joms pa'i dbang thob shog/ trag
86a4(1): rak+Sha dz+nyA na karma hUM a/ mi mthun gnyen pos gzhom pa'i phyir// brtul zhugs bzhi yi dbang bskur bas// sa le de ni rgod pa dang // brtul zhugs dbang ni thob par shog/ tshogs brgyad gnas su dag nas mthun
86a5(1): pa'i sku ru sbyor// phra men ro sha stobs kyi pha rol phyin// gdug pa 'dul phyir spyang mo'i tshogs dang rol// 'gugs 'dren phra men dbang mchog thob par shog/ dza dza ma hUM/ nyon mongs dug gsum nad kyis
86a6(1): gdungs pa yi// bdud dang srin po 'dul ba dang // las kyi mtha' rnams grub par bya ba'i phyir// mkha' 'gro dmus long tshogs kyi dbang bskur bas// rgyab 'brel sum cu rtsa gnyis dbang thob shog/ li tsa li
86b1(1): dza hUM a/ mi 'jigs sku ni stobs dang ldan// gsung dang thugs ni phrin las mdzad// gser gyi seng ge nyi shu rtsa brgyad dbang bskur bas// bdud dpung 'joms pa'i dbang thob shog/ sing ha dza ma b+ha la ka ra ma
86b2(1): ne hUM hUM// hUM ye shes dgu yi don ldan zhing // theg pa dgu yi bye brag tshul// mgo dgu brtsegs pa'i rkang gcig po// dbang mchog de yi dbang thob shog/ dz+nyA na sa ma ya a/ hUM de bzhin gshegs pa gsang ba'i
86b3(1): yum// bkra shis dam pa'i mdzod 'dzin ma// gsang ba'i yum bzhi'i dbang bskur bas// pad+ma rigs kyi dbang dang dngos grub thob par shog/ ma ma a sha ni hUM sid+d+hi sid+d+hi a/ hUM dbang chen thugs kyi dkyil nas
86b4(1): ni// thugs las bkye ba'i pho nya mo// 'thon ni spyan gyi mthongs nas 'thon// phrin las brtul zhugs thogs pa med// rtsa khro ma mo bcu gsum yin// khros na rU tra nag po sgrol// sgrub pa po la dbang dang dngos
86b5(1): grub 'bebs// bdud kyi dpung rnams 'joms pa'i mthu mo che// ma mo rtsa khro de yi dbang bskur bas// stong phrag brgyad cu 'dul ba'i dbang thob shog/ ma ma khri mu karma hUM a/ hUM drag po'i las rnams byed pa'i
86b6(1): mchog/ gdan gyi ma mo chen mo ste// dbang gi zhabs kyi bar nas bton// khrag gi ma mo bco brgyad byung // las rnams thogs med byed pa'i mchog/ dbang mchog de yi dbang bskur bas// 'joms byed ma mo'i
87a1(1): dbang thob shog/ ma ma nr-i ma he hUM dza/ hUM dbu yi ral pa'i bar rtse nas// 'joms pa'i ma mo tsa ti ste// gdug pa ma lus kun 'dul ba// sprul pa'i ma mo'i dbang thob shog/ na mo saM hUM a/ ye
87a2(1): shes dbyings las grub pa mo// rigs mchog gsang ba 'dzin pa ste// ma mo de yi dbang bskur bas// phrin las 'gro don byed par shog/ ma ti ka laM dza/ las kyi sgo ma chen mo ni// dbyings nas grub par byed pa
87a3(1): mo// dbang mchog de yi dbang bskur bas// phrin las rgya mtsho byed par shog/ ka ra sha hUM a/ sku las sprul pa'i mkha' 'gro ma// 'bum phrag g.yas kyi mkha' 'gro ma// 'bum phrag g.yon gyi mkha' 'gro
87a4(1): ma// mkha' 'gro mi bzad dbang bskur bas// rig pa mthu yi dbang thob shog/ A ra yi b+hi da ta ba hUM a/ zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+ta las/ lha dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste brgya dang gnyis
87a5(1): pa'o// // de nas mngon par shes pa bzhi'i dbang gsungs so// mngon shes dag dang ldan pa yi// mig ni rnam par dag pa ste// ra ri khal khol med pa dang // rnam dag kun tu mthong ba yi// mngon par shes
87a6(1): pa'i dbang thob shog/ a A ho// snyan ni mngon par shes pa ste// thams cad sgra dang gang de thos pa dang // bden pa gzhan myong thos pa'i dbang // rnam dag dbang ni thob par shog/ sku yi mngon shes bsam
87b1(1): yas te// bying ba med cing rmug pa med// gang la thogs pa med pa ste// mngon shes dbang ni thob par shog/ a thugs ni mngon shes ldan pa ste// pha rol gzhan gyi sems shes dang // sangs rgyas rnams
87b2(1): kyi thugs shes pa// thugs kyi mngon shes dbang thob shog/ tsit+ta a/ rdzu 'phrul bzhi yi dbang bskur bas// thogs rdug med pa'i dbang thob shog/ byang chub yan lag bdun gyi dbang bskur bas// rtsa ba byang
87b3(1): chub sems la 'dun par shog/ yan lag brgyad kyi dbang bskur bas// 'phags lam brgyad kyi dbang thob shog/ pha rol phyin bcu'i dbang bskur bas// ma spangs mya ngan 'das pa'i dbang thob shog/ gsung
87b4(1): rab yan lag bcu gnyis dbang bskur bas// gsung dbyangs dag pa sangs rgyas dbang thob shog/ bde gshegs zhal nas gsungs pa yi// ma 'dres sangs rgyas chos ni bco brgyad dbang // de ring khyod la
87b5(1): dbang bskur bas// mngon par sangs rgyas dbang thob shog/ byang chub phyogs ni bden pa'i chos// sum cu rtsa bdun dbang bskur bas// byang chub lam de ma gol bar// byang chub sems kyi dbang thob shog/ b+ho
87b6(1): d+hi tsit+ta sa ma ya a a/ zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+ta las/ gsung 'gag pa med pa'i dbang gi le'u ste brgya dang gsum pa'o// // de nas shes rab ye shes kyi dbang / gsang ba'i dbang
88a1(1): mchog bskur ba ste// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// lhag pa byang chub sems kyi dbang // mtshan ldan de dang de la blang // sangs rgyas dam pa de yis ni// brjod par bya ba 'di dag
88a2(1): go/ gsang ba kun gyi spyod yul min// theg pa chen po'i rigs yin nam// dka' thub dka' spyad spyod nus sam// bstan na rtogs pa mi za'am// b+ha gar 'o byed mi rtog gam// gsang ba gzhan la mi spel
88a3(1): lam// des na da dung bshol bar byos// gal te theg pa'i snod yin na// bu yi rtog pa 'di ru smros// zhes so// de nas de ru smras pa ni// bdag ni theg pa chen po'i snod// dka' thub dka' spyod spyad par
88a4(1): 'os// b+ha gar 'o byed mi rtog dang // gsang ba gzhan la bdag mi spel// de ring dam pa bdag la gsol// zhes smras so// de nas mnyam gzhag ting 'dzin des// thabs dang shes rab 'brel par
88a5(1): byed// dga' ba nyi shu rtsa gcig gzung // gtsang ma'i snod kyis dbang bskur ba'o// gzung thabs dang ni bskur thabs so// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ shes rab ye shes kyi dbang gi le'u
88a6(1): ste brgya dang bzhi pa'o// // de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes dpal rta'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho rta mchog dbang chen 'dus// dpag tu med pa'i tshe yi bdag/ tshe yi bdag las bdag nyan
88b1(1): 'tshal// tshe yi bdag pos bka' stsol cig/ ces gsol to// de nas dbang gi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med// de yi don ni bshad par bya tshe/ zhes bya ba srog la bya// srog ces bya ba
88b2(1): tshe la bya// de yi don dang ldan pa na// dbang dang dngos grub de ga yin// dbang la rnam pa gsum du bshad// tshe la rnam pa gsum du bshad// phyi nang gsang ba gsum du bshad// tshe la rnam pa gsum yod
88b3(1): de// dang po rdzas la bsnyen pa yin// de nas phye ma bsgrub pa yin// de nas ril bu gong bu yin// de la tshe bsgrub bya ba ste// dkyil 'khor rnam gsum dbye bar bya// dang po rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor
88b4(1): bsnyen// de nas 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dal du bsgrub// de nas rigs bsdus dkyil 'khor du// gong bur bsgrub cing dbang dang dngos grub blang // de nas dpal ldan rta yi rgyal po dgod// mtha' ma phyogs
88b5(1): bzhir sangs rgyas so// mtha' ma lha mo brgyad du bskor// sgo ba dag dang bcas pa'o// bum pa lnga'am dril ba gcig/ mngar dang bu ram sbrang rtsi dang // rtsi bcud mar dang 'bras bu dang // bkra shis pa yi rdzas
88b6(1): rnams dang // dkar po bum pa'i mgul chings la// le brgan kha bcad dril ba yin// 'brang rgyas lnga dang bcas pa bsham// dang po so sor khrol bur bsgrub// gnyis pa la ni ril bu tshom bur bgo/ rigs
89a1(1): mthun dar gyis kha bcad do// gsum pa srang bcal ga 'ur dril// dang po srang dang tshad las bcad// bar chad bgegs rnams bzlog par bya// de ltar tshe dang 'brang rgyas dang // spyan gzigs
89a2(1): dngos grub zhal zas bskor// khrol bu phye ma gong bu bzhin// de la rtags kyi ltas kyang brtag/ dpral ba dang ni gzhom pa dang // dgug dang bstim dang bsrung bar bya// bskyed dang gnas dang bstim pa
89a3(1): yin// de ltar tshe yi lha rnams bsgrub// tshe mchog bdag po yab yum gsal// bskyed pa'i yi ge de bzhin bya// de nas las kyi gzhung btsug la// sngags kyi gzhug la A yu hUM dza ste/ bar du phebs dang tha mar
89a4(1): blang // oM A ro lig byaM rA ga ra ti b+h+rUM badz+ra A yu She hUM aH/ hUM dbus phyogs rA ga dmar po'i gzhal yas su// rma bya bsnol ba'i gdan steng dang // nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan steng du// bcom ldan tshe mchog snang mtha' tshe
89a5(1): dpag med// sku mdog dmar po rAM ga'i 'od kyis mdzes// yum chen na bza' dkar mo gnyis// dbang mchog rol pa'i tshul du bzhugs// bcom ldan yab kyi thugs ka nas// rin chen tshe yi 'od du
89a6(1): 'bar// mu tig dkar po lta bur 'dril// bcom ldan yum gyi mkha' dbyings nas// yum gyi tshe yi rang bzhin ni// rA ga dmar po'i 'od du 'khyil// dbang mchog dbu yi gtsug rum na// rta mchog zhur po'i nang
89b1(1): shed na// rin chen tshe yi za ma tog/ dar dkar 'od kyi yol du bres// gzer ni dngul gyi gzer du btab// nang na tshe yi 'od du 'bar// bcom ldan dbang gi rgyal po yang // tshe dang ye shes 'dren pa'i las ni
89b2(1): mdzod// rtag tu bsgrubs pa'i tshe lags kyi// rdo rje'i tshe mchog 'gugs pa'i las mdzod cig/ oM pu ru pu ru ha sa d+he ba ma hA pu N+ye pun+ya dz+nyA na yu ti dza/ shar phyogs zla gam gdengs pa nas// bcom ldan rnam par
89b3(1): snang mdzad kyang // tshe dang ye shes 'dren pa'i las mdzod cig/ lho phyogs zla gam gdengs pa nas// bcom ldan rin chen 'byung ldan yang // tshe dang ye shes 'dren pa'i las mdzod cig/ nub phyogs zla gam
89b4(1): gdengs pa nas// bcom ldan rdo rje mi bskyod pa// tshe dang ye shes 'dren pa'i las mdzod cig/ byang phyogs zla gam gdengs pa nas// bcom ldan don yod grub pa yang // tshe dang ye shes 'dren pa'i las mdzod
89b5(1): cig/ b+h+rUM badz+ra A yu She hUM dza/ zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ gsang ba tshe bsgrub pa'i le'u ste brgya dang lnga pa'o// // de nas bkra shis pa che'i lha mo bskul bar bya ste/ hUM gzhal yas gru yi
89b6(1): mtshan la ni// tshe yi lha mo chen mo ste// shar phyogs gangs ri dkar po'i zhing khams nas// dkar mo mdzes ma 'od kyi sked chings can// na bza' dkar mo shel ltar dag/ g.yu 'od sngon po'i mtha' chag
90a1(1): can// phyag g.yas dar dkar g.yab tu dor// g.yon pa dung gi bum pa bsnams// bum pa tshe dang ye shes gtams// shar nas 'gugs pa'i las mdzod cig/ oM la s+ye sa ma ya b+h+rUM dzaHA yu She hUM
90a2(1): aH/ hUM lho phyogs bai DUr+ya sngon po'i zhing khams nas// sngon mo mdzes ma 'od kyi mtha' chag can// na bza' sngon mo 'od du 'bar// mdzes pa gser gyi rgyan spras pa// g.yas pa dar gyi g.yab dor ma// g.yon pa
90a3(1): mthing gi bum pa bsnams// bum pa nges par tshe yis gtams// lho nas 'gugs pa'i las mdzod cig/ oM mA li sa ma ya b+h+rUM badz+ra A She hUM aH/ hUM nub phyogs pad+ma rA ga'i zhing khams nas// dmar mo 'od kyi
90a4(1): mtha' chag can// rA ga 'od kyi na bza' gsol// mtha' ma gser g.yu'i 'od kyis mdzes// g.yas pa le brgan g.yab dor ma// g.yon pa byu ru'i bum pa bsnams// bum pa tshe dang ye shes gtams// nub kyi phyogs nas 'gugs
90a5(1): pa'i las mdzod cig/ oM gI ra ti sa ma ya b+h+rUM badz+ra A yu She hUM aH/ byang phyogs in+d+ra ljang gu'i zhing khams nas// ljang gu mdzes ma 'od kyi mtha' chag can// na bza' ljang gu mdzes pa la// byu ru'i 'od kyis tshom bus brgyan// g.yas pa
90a6(1): ljang gu dar gyi g.yab dor ma// g.yon pa g.yu yi bum pa bsnams// bum pa nges par tshe yis gtams// byang gi phyogs nas 'gugs pa'i las mdzod cig/ oM nirti sa ma ya b+h+yAM badza A yu Sha hUM aH/ tshe yi lha mo chen mo
90b1(1): bzhi// bskor zhing tshe 'gugs 'di skad gsungs// hUM nga ni lA s+ye dkar mo ste// rdo rje sems dpa' thugs dam skong // ma bskangs par du sku mi rgya// nga ni mi yi tshe g.yang 'gugs// sgrub pa po la dngos grub
90b2(1): 'bebs// sangs rgyas kun la dngos grub bslang // tshe nyams pa yang slar la 'gugs// hUM nga ni mA le sngon mo ste// rin chen 'byung ldan thugs dam skong // ma bskangs bar du sku mi rgya// bde gshegs rnams la
90b3(1): dngos grub bslang // sgrub pa po la dngos grub 'bebs// tshe dang ye shes 'bebs par byed// hUM ba ni girti dmar mo ste// snang ba mtha' yas thugs dam skong // ma bskangs bar du sku mi rgya// sangs rgyas rnams
90b4(1): la dngos grub bslang // sgrub pa po la mi tshe 'gugs// tshe dang ye shes las kyang byed// hUM nga ni ni rti ljang gu ste// don yod grub pa'i thugs dam skong // ma bskangs bar du sku mi rgya// bde gshegs rnams la
90b5(1): dngos grub bslang // tshe dang ye shes 'gugs par byed// bum pa tshe yis gtams par bya// ye shes 'od du bskyil bar bya// hUM 'gugs pa'i lha mo lcags kyu ma// dkar mo mdzes ma thugs rje'i lcags kyu
90b6(1): bsnams// dri za'i lag nas tshe khug cig/ tshe dang ye shes 'gugs pa'i las mdzod cig/ badz+ra aM ku sha b+h+rUM badz+ra A yu She hUM a dza/ lho yi phyogs nas tshe 'gugs ma// phyag rgya'i lha mo zhags pa ma// sngon mo mdzes
91a1(1): ma zhags pa 'dzin// gshin rje'i lag nas tshe khug cig/ tshe dang ye shes 'dren pa'i las mdzod cig/ badz+ra pA sha hUM b+h+rUM/ badz+ra A yu She hUM a/ nub kyi phyogs nas tshe 'gugs ma// phyag rgya'i lha mo
91a2(1): lcags sgrog ma// dmar mo mdzes ma chen mo ste// klu dbang lag nas tshe drongs shig/ tshe dang ye shes 'dren pa'i las mdzod cig badz+ra s+pho Ta baM b+h+rUM badz+ra A yu She hUM a/ byang gi phyogs nas tshe 'gugs ma// ljang gu
91a3(1): mdzes ma dril bu bsnams// gnod sbyin lag nas tshe khug cig/ tshe dang ye shes 'dren pa'i las mdzod cig/ badz+ra g+haN+De ho b+h+rUM badz+ra A yu She hUM a/ hUM bdag cag phyag rgya'i lha mo bzhi// bde gshegs rnams
91a4(1): kyi thugs dam bskul// 'jug pa rnams kyi nyams chag skong // phrin las 'gro don chen po mdzad// zhing khams bde ba'i gnas nas bskyod// mya ngan 'das pa'i chos rnams sgrog/ ces pa'o// khrol bu phye mar
91a5(1): btag pa dang // phye ma ril bur dril ba dang // ga'u'i nang du stsal ba dang // tshad dang srang la gdab pa dang // phyag rgya bzhi yis rgyas btab dang // le brgan dar gyis gril ba dang // bum pa lnga yi dbus gnas
91a6(1): dang // g.yab pa dang ni 'gugs pa dang // bskyed pa dang ni spel ba dang // brtan pa dang ni mi 'phrog dang // gnas pa dang ni grangs rten dang // dral dang gzhom dang 'gugs pa yin// de ltar gsal nas yang
91b1(1): 'gugs shing // hUM pho brang dbus kyi lte ba la// byu ru rA ga dmar po'i gzhal yas na// zla gam kha sprod gzhal yas na// bcom ldan tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med// lha mo yum dang bcas pa ste// bde gshegs
91b2(1): rgyal ba kun gyis bskor// sangs rgyas zhing khams bde ba'i gnas// thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba ste// phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa rnams// kun kyang dbang gi lha ru ste// byu ru'i bum pa re re bsnams// tshe dang ye
91b3(1): shes gtams pa ste// sangs rgyas tshe yang ga 'ur gsol// bkra shis tshe yang bum par gsol// bde gshegs ye shes bum pa 'di// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlab mdzod// bde bar gshegs pas dbang
91b4(1): bskur mdzod// tshe dang ye shes lha mo ni// d+ha pe ma dang puSh+pe ma// A lo ke dang gan+d+he mas// 'byung ba lnga yi bcud bsdus la// deng 'dir dngos grub stsal du gsol// lha mo chen mo 'gugs pa mo// bde gshegs
91b5(1): rnams la mchod 'bul ma// rgyal ba rgya mtsho mnyes mdzad ma// thugs dam gnyen po skul byed ma// sangs rgyas kun la mchod 'bral ma// dngos grub ma lus 'bebs pa'i bdag/ bde gshegs thugs dam
91b6(1): rgyud bskul nas// mnyes pa'i mchod pa phul nas ni// mngon par shes pa'i dngos grub stsol// tshe dang ye shes dngos grub stsol// bum pa tshe yis gtams du gsol// tshe rnams ril bu thig ler dril// zhes
92a1(1): bskul lo// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+ta las/ tshe skul ba'i le'u ste brgya dang drug pa'o// // bar chad bgegs rnams zhi bya'i phyir// phyi nang gsang ba'i mtshams kyang bcad// 'das pa'i ma ma
92a2(1): rnams kyang bskul// dgug dang bstim pa'i las kyang bya// hUM bcom ldan pad+ma he ru ka/ khro mchog thabs kyi sku mnga' ste// mdzes pa'i na bza' dmar po gsol// pad+ma kro d+hI shwa rI ma// snying po tshe yi yi ge
92a3(1): a// yi ge a dmar 'od du 'bar// tshe yi rang bzhin gnas pa'i rten// A yu dmar po tshe yis gtams// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sku yang mnga'// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i gsung yang mnga'// mkha' dang mnyam
92a4(1): pa'i thugs kyang mnga'// sku tshe stsol cig ri bzhin brtan// gsung tshe snyan zhing grags dang ldan// thugs tshe gsal zhing mi ldog mkhyen// sku gsung thugs kyi tshe g.yang stsol// bcom ldan rigs kyi khro bo
92a5(1): bzhi// na bza' chas brgyad ldan par bskyed// bum pa tshe dang bcud kyis gtams// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsol// rigs kyi yum bzhi gsang ba'i yum// A yu tshe yi dngos grub stsol// phyogs bzhi lha
92a6(1): yi zhing khams na// go rI la sogs khro mo brgyad// sku mdog dmar po 'od 'phro ma// phyag g.yas le brgan g.yab re bsnams// g.yon pa byu ru'i bum pa bsnams// thugs ka zla gam re re na// A yu tshe yi sa
92b1(1): bon re// tshe yi dngos grub stsal du gsol// sangs rgyas dag gi byin rlabs ni// 'dir stsol tshe dang ye shes stsol// phra men chen mo brgyad rnams kyang // g.yas pa g.yab la g.yon pa bum// sku mdog dmar po
92b2(1): rgyan dang ldan// A yu tshe yi dngos grub stsol// mkha' 'gro 'bar ba'i tshogs bcas kyang // tshe dang ye shes 'dir stsol cig/ sngo dang dkar dang dmar dang ser// ljang gu la sogs sna tshogs kun// kun kyang rA
92b3(1): ga'i 'od du 'gyur// tshe dang ye shes 'dren pa'i las mdzod cig/ AM A yu dz+nyA na bin du b+h+yAM/ tshe b+h+yAM/ nr-i b+h+yAM/ yu ti b+h+yAM/ a b+h+yAM/ de nas ril bu gong bu la// dril la dbang gi rang bzhin du// gcig pa lha yi dkyil
92b4(1): 'khor du// rigs gcig tu ni dril ba dang // de la tshe dang ye shes dril// hUM bcom ldan dbang chen dbang gi bdag/ tshe yi bdag la dbang gi bdag/ tshe dang ye shes bdag po ste// gong bu gcig la thugs
92b5(1): kyi dkyil 'khor du/ mi 'gyur mi shigs rdo rje mo/ bslad pas mi 'gyur dag pa'i chos/ sangs rgyas kun gyis kyang ni gzigs par dka'/ phyag rgya bzhi yis rgyas btab pas/ rgya de kun gyis shig mi 'gyur/
92b6(1): ni chos kyi dbyings la bzhag/ phyag rgya gsal ba'i rang bzhin bdun/ dang po chos kyi phyag rgya ste/ gnyis pa nus pa sngags kyi rgya/ gsum pa sku dang ye shes rgya/ bzhi pa ye shes bzhi yi rgya/ lnga pa rigs lnga'i ye
93a1(1): shes rgya/ drug pa rgyal ba spyi yi rgya/ bdun pa ye shes byang chub rgya/ de ltar rgyas btab byas nas ni/ yang ni rgya de dbye bar bya/ de nas dngos grub thob par blang / de nyid don dang / de yis lhag ma
93a2(1): dbyings su bstims/ de ltar byas na tshe 'grub pa'o// rten pa'i tshe dang mi 'phrog pa/ de yang gnyis su shes par bya/ rta mchog rol pa'i tan+ta las/ rigs dang rgya dang 'go ba bstan pa'i le'u ste brgya dang bdun
93a3(1): pa'o// // de nas yang dbang gi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa/ g.yas g.yon phyag ni gdengs pa na/ gnon pa'i tshul du bya ba ni/ dbang chen nyid kyi phyag rgya yin/ srin lag gnyis dang mthe bong bsnol/ mdzub mo
93a4(1): mthe'u chung bsgreng ba ste/ gung mo sbyar la dbus su bsgreng / de ni rta mgrin phyag rgya yin/ sor mo bcu po bsnol byas nas/ rtse lnga gnas su bsgreng ba ni/ rigs lnga spyi yi phyag rgya yin/ g.yas g.yon phyag ni dbus
93a5(1): bsnol/ lus ni mi 'gyur drang bzhag nas/ mi g.yo ba yi tshul bzhag na/ ye shes sems dpa'i phyag rgya yin/ g.yas g.yon sor mo gnam la bsgreng / brdeg pa'i tshul du byas na ni/ 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag
93a6(1): rgya yin/ sor mo lag pa g.yas g.yon bsnol byas nas/ gshog pa'i tshul du byas pa ni/ khams gsum rnam rgyal phyag rgya yin/ mdzub gnyis hUM gi rgya bcings pa/ hUM mdzad chen po'i phyag rgya yin/ brkyang bskum
93b1(1): bgrad par gnas pa la/ g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs pa dang / g.yon pa brdeg pa'i tshul bcas pa/ dur khrod chen po'i phyag rgya yin/ sor mo bcu po dam bsnol nas/ rigs drug lam ni dgag pa'i tshul/ ngan
93b2(1): song sbyong ba'i phyag rgya yin/ mtheb mo gnyis po dam bsnol nas/ brgyad po gyen la gdengs pa ni/ rigs 'dus lhun gyis grub pa'i phyag rgya yin/ phyag rgya re la yi ge re/ yi ge re la 'od 'phro ba/ sngags dang
93b3(1): phyag rgya 'debs par grags/ gzhan yang 'jo tshul stangs stabs dang / gar bsgyur ba dang gar byed pa/ phyag rgya'i mchod pa yin par bshad/ ces gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ sngags dang phyag rgya
93b4(1): spros pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes/ dbang gi rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to/ e ma ho/ sangs rgyas kun 'dus rgyal po che/ rta zhes bya ba ji ltar lags/ mchog ces bya ba gang la
93b5(1): bgyi/ rol pa zhes pa gang la bgyi/ tan+t+ra zhes bya ba ji ltar lags/ kun 'dus rgyal pos bka' stsol cig kun 'dus mchog las bdag nyan 'tshal/ zhes gsol to// dbang chen 'dus pas bka' stsal pa/
93b6(1): sbrul sku phyag na rdo rje nyon/ rta zhes bya ba'i don bstan pa/ rta ni sems kyi rta pho la/ thams cad mkhyen pas mchog ces bya/ 'das dang ma 'das gnyis ka yin/ sems dang phyi mo gnyis med yin/ thams cad khro
94a1(1): po'i rang bzhin yin/ thams cad zhi ba'i rang bzhin yin/ thams cad gnyis ka'i rang bzhin yin/ thams cad gnyis med rang bzhin yin/ kun kyang yin la gang yang min/ de phyir bshad par
94a2(1): dka' ba yin/ rol pa zhes pa bde gshegs kyi/ dgongs pa yin par rgyal pas gsungs/ chos nyid la yang chos nyid rol/ de phyir rol pa zhes su grags/ tan+ta zhes pa rgyud la ste/ bde gshegs dgongs pas
94a3(1): brgyud pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang gsol pa// kye ma dbang chen kun 'dus che// pad+ma zhes pa ji ltar lags// rigs zhes bgyi ba ji ltar lags// zhing khams bgyi ba gang la bgyi// de yis don de
94a4(1): bshad du gsol// zhes gsol to// dbang chen 'dus pas bka' stsal pa// pad+ma zhes su grags pa ni// skyon gyis ma gos pad+ma ste// byang chub sems la bshad pa yin// gos pa med pas pad+ma ste// nam mkha'
94a5(1): dpe la bzhag pa yin// 'gyur ba med pas pad+ma ste// de yang nam mkha'i dpe la bzhag/ byas pas gos pa med pa ste// rin chen gser gyi dpe bzhin la// mdzes pas pad+mar byung ba ste// rin po che yi dpe la
94a6(1): bzhag/ gsal la dngos po med pa ste// me long bzhin gyi dpe la'o// de phyir pad+ma zhes su grags// rigs zhes bya bar bstan pa ni// dang po de las byung ba dang // bar du de yi bya ba byed// tha ma de yi rgyud
94b1(1): 'dzin phyir// des na rigs zhes bya ba yin// zhing khams zhes ni bya ba'i don// snang ba mtha' yas zhing khams te// snang ba sems kyi snang ba yin// zhing ni ma rtogs chos nyid ngang du bsgral bas zhing // nyon
94b2(1): mongs rtsad bcad khams la bya// pad+ma kun 'dus rgyal po la// rigs bzhi'i sangs rgyas la sogs te// kun gyis bskor bas pad+ma rigs kyi zhing khams yin// gsung rnam par dag pas snang ba mtha' yas//
94b3(1): bde gshegs gcig bsgom rgyal ba kun gyi ngang / de ltar gsal bar zung zhig/ ces gsungs so// de nas yang ni bka' stsal pa// thugs las rgyal ba yab lnga yin// 'byung ba lnga las yum lnga byung // rnam par
94b4(1): shes pa'i tshogs brgyad las// de las byang chub sems dpa' brgyad// yul las sems ma brgyad du byung // gnas gyur khro mo brgyad dang phra men brgyad// rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad las// ye shes kyi ni
94b5(1): khyi brgyad byung // rbad dang pho nyar bya ba dang // kun gyi gnyen por byung ba yin// kun gzhi 'od kyi thig le las// rta yi brtul zhugs byung ba yin// gti mug 'od kyi thig le las// phag gi brtul zhugs byung
94b6(1): ba yin// 'dod chags khrag gi thig le las// bya yi brtul zhugs byung ba yin// nga rgyal dag gi thig le las// khyi yi brtul zhugs byung ba yin// brtul zhugs chen po bzhi po 'dis// thams cad 'joms shing
95a1(1): dbang du sdud// sangs rgyas bde gshegs thugs dam skong // zhing khams yongs su dag pa'o// 'di ni brtul zhugs chen po yin// dmus long sum cu rtsa gnyis ni// mkha' 'gro ma yi sprul pa
95a2(1): yin// da ni las rnams byed pa'i mchog/ ma mo rnams ni rtsa dang thig le'o// de ltar gsal na las rnams thams cad gsal ba yin// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las// zhu lan dpe don dang
95a3(1): sprul pa 'phros pa'i le'u ste brgya dang dgu pa'o// // de nas dbang chen 'dus pa chen pos bka' stsal pa/ phyag na rdo rje la sogs nyon// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham pa la// dbus su pho brang zlum por
95a4(1): bskor// mtha' ma 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa// gru chad gru bzhi sgo dang bcas// mtha' ma me ris bskor ba ste// dbang chen thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ro// dbus ni zla gam sgo gcig pa// tha ma pad+ma 'dab ma
95a5(1): brgyad// gru chad gru bzhi sgo btod pa// de mtha' gru bzhir byas pa ni// dbang chen gsung gi dkyil 'khor ro// dbus ni zlum po dang ldan pa// mtha' ma re cha dgur gsal ba// gru bzhi sgo dang khyud ldan
95a6(1): pa// dbang chen sku yi dkyil 'khor ro// gru bzhi lhan pa'i dkyil 'khor la// mtha' ma rin chen 'bur dod pa// de mtha' gru bzhi sgo dang bcas// dbang chen yon tan dkyil 'khor ro// dbus ni gru bzhi lham
95b1(1): pa la// gra la zla gam re re bcad// zhal bzhi phyi la btod pa ni// dbang chen 'phrin las dkyil 'khor ro// dbus ni zla gam gru gsum la// tha ma zla gam bzhis bskor ba// dbang chen brtul zhugs dkyil
95b2(1): 'khor ro// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lhag pa la// dbus su zla gam sgo sprod bya// tha ma gru gsum brgyad kyis bskor// gru bzhi sgo dang bcas pa ni// khyi brgyad dkyil 'khor bstan pa yin// dbus ni gru gsum
95b3(1): 'bar ba la// mtha' ma 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad la// rtsibs re'i nang du zla gam re// dbus su dbang chen 'dus pa ste// zla gam re la sbyang mo re// gru chad gru bzhi sgo dang bcas// de ltar gsal ba'i dkyil
95b4(1): 'khor ni// sbrang brgyad dkyil 'khor bstan pa yin// dbus ni zlum po pho brang bcas// de yi phyi rim dag la ni// 'khor lo rtsibs ni ldan pa la// tshom bu lnga ru bshad pa la// dbus ni dbang gi rgyal po
95b5(1): yin// shar gyi pho brang dag la ni// de la 'khor lo brgyad du bya// lho ru 'khor lo brgyad du bya// de bzhin nub dang byang la brgyad brgyad bya// tshom bu bzhi la 'khor lo rtsibs ni sum cu gnyis// de la long ba re
95b6(1): re dgod// sgo ba khro bo bzhi yis bya// dmus long gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// dbus su zlum po bskor ba la// tha ma rtsibs brgyad ldan pa dang // gru bzhi sgo dang sgo khyud ldan// gsang ba yum bzhi sprul pa
