96a1(1): brgyad// de la bkod pa sgrub pa ste// yum bzhi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor yin// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham pa la// khrag gi zla gam bco brgyad bya// khrag gi ma mo'i dkyil 'khor yin// dkyil
96a2(1): 'khor gru gsum 'bar ba la// tha ma pad+ma zla gam bcu gsum bya// sgo dang sgo khyud bcas pa ste// dbus su dbang gi rgyal po dgod// zla gam re la rtsa khro ma mo re// sgo ba dang bcas de bzhin no// de ni rtsa khro ma
96a3(1): mo'i dkyil 'khor yin// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham pa la// 'khor lo rtsibs ni drug pa bya// dbus su zla gam re re bya// dbus su dbang gi rgyal po ste// zla gam re la kham rgya re// sgo ba dang bcas bkod pa
96a4(1): ni// kham rgya drug gi dkyil 'khor ro// gru bzhi lham pa'i dkyil 'khor la// dbus su zlum po tshom bu dang // tha ma zla gam drug bskor ba// go la drug gi dkyil 'khor yin// dbus su pad+ma 'dab brgyad la// tha
96a5(1): ma rin chen 'bar ba brgyad// sgo dang sgo khyud bcas pa ni// rgyal mo dza ti dkyil 'khor yin// thig bzhi btab pa'i re cha dgu// tha ma 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gsum// sgeg mo ra la gcig dkyil 'khor
96a6(1): yin// dbus su zla gam 'bur ba la// phyogs bzhi gru gsum bzhi byas pa// mgo brtsegs khro bo'i dkyil 'khor yin// dkyil 'khor de rnams bstan pa ni// dmigs kyi dkyil 'khor bcu bdun yin// gong
96b1(1): gi dkyil 'khor dgu po ni// rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa yin// bdud rtsi chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang // dbang dang tshe la sogs pa yi// rtsal gyi dkyil 'khor brgyad cu yin// zhes gsungs so// dkyil
96b2(1): 'khor de yi rim pa la// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang // de bzhin rim par bgrang bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor sa gzhi brtag pa dang // las dang bya bas sbyang ba dang // ting nge 'dzin gyis sbyang ba dang // ro lnga
96b3(1): bsal dang brtag par bya// ga dar dang ni byi dor dag/ chag chag dang ni thig gdab dang // tshon rnams byin brlabs bri ba yin// dge ba'i rim pa ma nor bya// pho brang nas ni dmar po dgye// de ltar rim par
96b4(1): ldan par bya// sku'am gsung dang phyag rgya thugs// de la bkod la rim pas dgod// de la gnyis med bstim par bya// de ltar las rnams rdzogs par bya// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ dkyil 'khor spros pa'i
96b5(1): le'u ste brgya dang bcu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal po des/ mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs so// yang ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// dman pa
96b6(1): rnams ni don dang 'phrad pa'i phyir// rgyan gyi dbang rnams bskur bar bya// bdud dang srin po dregs pa thams cad dang // gdug pa'i nad dang gcan gzan khro bo dang // 'byung po ma rungs gza' dang byad stems
97a1(1): dang // gdon dang ma mo sha za mkha' 'gro ma// zil gyis mnan cing mi tshugs bya ba'i phyir// gdug pa 'dul rtags rta mgo lngas dbang bskur// dbang gi rta mgo phrin las mgyogs pa'i
97a2(1): mthu// ye shes myur mgyogs shes par pha rol phyin// don las ma nyams gdug pa so sor 'dul// bdud dang srin po klu gnyen tshar bcad nas// ye shes chen po'i ngang du sbyor byed pa// rta mgo lnga yis dbang
97a3(1): bskur bas// thams cad dbang du bsdu ba'i dbang thob shog/ oM dz+nyA na hri ba ya kro bi sha ha ne hUM sum b+ha hUM a/ chos longs sprul sku'i dbang bskur mtshon pa'i phyir// thod pa tshar gsum gyis dbang bskur bar bya
97a4(1): ste// hUM dung chen rang bzhin sgyu ma'i khong seng la// yul drug dbang po stong gi rgyan du che// dkar la 'tsher bas sangs rgyas kun dang sbyor// chos kyi sku las ma g.yos dkar ba ste// sangs rgyas rtags chen skam
97a5(1): po ra ri ni// skal ldan khyod la de ring dbang bskur bas// skye med chos sku'i dbang gi thob par shog/ d+har+m+ma d+ha tu A/ ra ri longs sku mtshon pa'i rtags// 'das dang ma byon da ltar gyi// de bzhin sangs rgyas
97a6(1): longs skur ldan// rdzogs pa'i rtags kyis dbang bskur bas// rdzogs nas 'gro don byed par shog/ d+harma ta ka na ma a hUM/ ji ltar mthun pas 'dul ba yi// so so rang rang las skal 'du// sbrul sku 'bar bas
97b1(1): dbang bskur bas// mi 'jigs pa yi sku thob nas// gdug pa 'dul ba'i dbang thob shog/ d+harmA d+hA tu ma ga ta ya A hUM/ da ni rgyan gyi sbrul gyi dbang bskur bar bya ste/ hUM sbrul chen gdengs ka dpal gyi rgyan du
97b2(1): che// sku la rgyan du mdzes pa yab yum gnyis ka'i rgyan// klu rgyal 'bum gyis dbang gi sgo srung ste// bkra shis g.yung drung rgya las mi stongs par// sbrul chen brgyad kyi dbang bskur thob par shog/ na ya ha hUM/
97b3(1): a/ thabs la mkhas pa'i ting 'dzin rol pa'i rtags// rno gdug zhen pa bzlog pa bdud kyi dpung bzhi 'joms// rgyal ba'i rtags su na bza' chen po gsol// 'jigs pa med pa'i rtags su rdo rje'i go ru
97b4(1): gtams// rdo rje go chas dbang bskur bas// cis kyang mi shigs dbang thob shog/ badz+ra ling ka ye hUM/ da ni gsung dag pa zhing lpags kyi dbang bskur te// gsung mchog thabs dang ldan pa'i rtags mtshon
97b5(1): pa// gsung rab yan lag don la ma nyams brdas mtshon nas// brjid chen zhing lpags dbang bskur bas// thabs kyi pha rol phyin pa'i dbang thob shog/ baM tIk+Sha maN+Da la a/ da ni glang chen pags pas dbang
97b6(1): bskur te// bde ba chen po'i sku mtshon phyir// brjid chen dbang sdud stobs dang ldan// sku yi phrin las rdzogs pa'i phyir// glang gi pags pas dbang bskur bas// stobs kyi pha rol phyin pa'i dbang thob shog/ ha
98a1(1): ti baM ba sha hUM phaT/ de nas stag gi pags pas dbang bskur te// gdug la so sor ma lus 'dul ba yi// dpa' bar 'gro ba na bza' rgyan gyis bklubs// drag po'i las kyis ma lus 'joms pa
98a2(1): yi// stag gi pags pas dbang bskur bas// smon lam pha rol phyin pa'i dbang thob shog/ baM ti byA gri ka bi ha hUM phaT/ da ni bse khrab smug pos dbang bskur ba// sra mkhregs rol pa'i rdzu 'phrul mnga' brnyes
98a3(1): pa// na bza' brjid 'bar rol ba sku yi rgyan du che// bse khrab smug po'i dbang gi bskur byas pas// tshul khrims pha rol phyin pa'i dbang thob shog/ he da re pa sha hUM/ rno gdug zlog byed lcags kyi dbang bskur
98a4(1): bas// 'bum bye sngon mo lcags kyi khrab// mi shigs mtshon gyis de la min// 'bum bye 'di yi dbang bskur bas// bsam gtan pha rol phyin pa'i dbang thob shog/ rat+na bu ne hUM/ de nas gzig lpags kyis
98a5(1): dbang bskur bar bya ste/ don phyir chags dang chags gzhan 'joms// gdug pa ma lus rtsar gcad phyir// gcan gzan rgyal po gtum pa gzig gi rgyal// rtags kyi thig le 'di yi dbang bskur bas// sbyin
98a6(1): pa'i pha rol phyin pa'i dbang thob shog/ ba ra ni ra sa ya// de nas dar gyi rgyan gyis dbang bskur bar bya ste/ hUM mthing nag le brgan shu ken dar gyi rgyan// chos sku 'gyur med shes bya thogs med pa'i// mthing
98b1(1): nag le brgan dar gyi dbang bskur bas// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i dbang thob shog/ pra dz+nyA d+ha ra ma d+hA tu A/ zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ rgyan dang na bzas dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste brgya
98b2(1): dang bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas yang ston pas dbang bskur ba'i las 'di bka' stsal to// byang chub sems kyi pha rol phyin pa bcu'i dbang bskur ba/ mthar thug pa gsang ba byang chub sems kyi dbang
98b3(1): bskur ba/ sems bskyed sngon du 'gro ba pha rol phyin bcu'i dbang bskur ba dang gsum mo// mthar zug byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur ba ni// byang sems yab yum brdas bskul ba// bde ba skye ba'i bar ni
98b4(1): ma chad pa// 'dren dang bskul dang dga' ba nyi shu gcig/ sa yi don dang ldan pa'i dus// 'phrul gyis phyi ma blangs pa'i tshe// de la sbyin dang bskyed byas la// sprin dkar gnyis med bgrod don dbang // nges par
98b5(1): ldan pas gsal byas la// gsal ba'i bskul ba 'di brjod na// nges pa'i don dang phrad par nges// nges par ldan pas gsal byas la// de bzhin gshegs kun ngo bor gyur// ring ba ma yin nye ba min// de la
98b6(1): gsal dbang 'di yis bskur// byang sems chos kyi sbyin pa gtong // de la rdzogs pas mthar thug gsal// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa'i dbang thob shog/ byang chub sems ni tshul khrims ldan// tshul dang khrims
99a1(1): ni 'bras bu gnas// tshul khrims pha rol phyin pa'i dbang thob shog/ byang chub sems ni bzod pa'i dbang // sems kyi ngo bor kun kyang bzod// bzod pa sems kyi ngang la gnas// bzod pa'i
99a2(1): pha rol phyin pa'i dbang thob shog/ byang chub sems ni brtson 'grus che// brtson la 'grus pa ye shes che// brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa'i dbang thob shog/ byang chub sems ni bsam pa gtan// bsam med dang
99a3(1): la gnas te pha rol phyin// bsam gtan pha rol phyin pa'i dbang thob shog/ byang chub sems ni shes rab che// shes rab ye shes gting dpag don// gnyis med rol pa bde ba'i mchog/ shes rab pha rol phyin
99a4(1): pa'i dbang thob shog/ byang chub sems ni stobs po che// mi 'gyur chos nyid dag pa la// rtog med rtogs pa de nyid stobs dang ldan// stobs kyi pha rol phyin pa'i dbang thob shog/ thabs dang shes rab 'brel
99a5(1): bas na// shes rab sngon du thabs song nas// byang chub sems ni thabs kyi don mthong ba// thabs kyi pha rol phyin pa'i dbang thob shog/ byang chub sems ni smon pa'i lam// smon lam dag pa chos nyid
99a6(1): don// smon lam pha rol phyin pa'i dbang thob shog/ byang chub sems ni snying rje che// snying rje'i lam mchog chos nyid don// snying rje pha rol phyin pa'i dbang thob shog/ ma bgrod lam la pha rol phyin// ci la ma
99b1(1): g.yos thams cad snang // pha rol phyin bcu ye shes dbang thob shog/ b+ho d+hi tsit+ta ma hA su kha a a a hUM/ rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ gsang ba shes rab ye shes kyi byang chub sems pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i
99b2(1): dbang gi le'u ste brgya dang bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma dbang chen kun 'dus che// dbang gi rgyal po dbang rgyal
99b3(1): che// dbang gi don rnams de ltar na// rdzogs pa'i dbang rnams bdag nyan 'tshal// kun 'dus rgyal pos bka' stsol cig/ ces gsol to// de nas dbang gi rgyal po des// gsol ba'i don thugs su chud nas//
99b4(1): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// spobs pa phyag na rdo rje nyon// rdzogs pa'i dbang rnams bshad par bya// dbang gi grangs ni de bzhin te// rdzogs pa'i dbang zhes bya ba ni// ye shes lnga yi dbang yin te// lnga la
99b5(1): ma 'dus gcig kyang med// ye shes lnga yi dbang bskur ba// sangs rgyas lnga yang de nyid do// 'og min gnas kyang de nyid do// chos kyi sku yang de nyid do// bde gshegs kun bzang de nyid do// hUM byang chub
99b6(1): sems la g.yos pa med// gsal la dag pa chos kyi sku// snang la rang bzhin med pa ste// me long ye shes dbang thob shog/ chos rnams stong pa'i ngo bo la// ngang las ma g.yos ye shes mthong // stong pa gsal ba
100a1(1): chos kyi sgra// stong nyid ye shes dbang thob shog/ stong dang gsal bar snang ba dang // gnyis med dpal gnas pa kun// ji ltar snang yang sems dang mnyam// mnyam nyid ye shes dbang zab
100a2(1): zhog/ chos nyid ma g.yos dbu ma te// mkhas rigs rnams ni so sor rtog/ gsal la ma 'dres byang chub sems nyid dang // sor rtog ye shes dbang thob shog/ chos rnams so sor gang bstan kyang // mam
100a3(1): nyid dang la gnas pa yis// bya rtsol thams cad bsam med dang du 'dus// bya ba nan tan ye shes dbang // de ltar ye shes rnam lnga'i dbang bskur bas// ye shes lnga yi dbang thob shog/ dbang rnams thams
100a4(1): cad der 'dus te// dus gsum bde gshegs kun gyi dbang // des dbang thams cad rdzogs pa yin// de ltar dbang bskur 'bras bu 'thob// ces gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+ta las/ ye shes lnga yi
100a5(1): dbang bskur ba bstan pa'i le'u ste brgya dang bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas dbang gi rgyal po kun 'dus des/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas chen po// sprul pa phyag na rdo rje
100a6(1): nyon// tshe dang dbang dang dngos grub ni// bar chod bgegs kyi glags med pas// de ma zag tu blang bar bya'o// tshe dang ye shes dngos grub rten// phun sum tshogs par bkram pa la// sid+d+hi dngos grub blang bar
100b1(1): bya'o// hUM sangs rgyas gsung dbyangs bsgrag pa yi// gsung mchog pad+ma rigs kyi dngos grub rnams// da ni blang ba'i dus la bab// bsnyen pa'i grangs kyang deng tshang ngo // sgrub pa'i dus kyang deng yol
100b2(1): lo// rigs mchog gsang ba'i lha rnams kyis// dngos grub mchog ni stsal re ran// dngos grub dam pa 'dir stsol cig/ bcom ldan dbang gi zhing khams na// zla gam gdengs pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// gsung
100b3(1): dbyangs snyan pa'i sangs rgyas dang // thugs rje'i byams mgon skyabs dag gis// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsol// sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos grub stsol// 'gag med ye shes sgras mtshan pas// gsung
100b4(1): mchog pad+ma rigs kyi dngos grub stsol// sangs rgyas sku yi dngos grub stsol// rnam par snang mdzad sku yi mchog/ rnam dag sku yi dngos grub stsol// sangs rgyas thugs kyi dngos grub stsol// rdo rje sems
100b5(1): dpa' thugs kyi mchog/ thugs kyi dngos grub 'dir stsol cig/ sangs rgyas yon tan dngos grub stsol// rin chen 'byung ldan yon tan mchog/ yon tan dngos grub stsal du gsol// sangs rgyas phrin las dngos
100b6(1): grub stsol// don yod grub pa phrin las mchog/ phrin las dngos grub stsal du gsol// rgyal ba kun gyi ngo bo nyid// bcom ldan dbang chen rgyal ba'i mchog/ rigs chen gsang ba'i bdag po ni// rigs bsdus
101a1(1): gsang chen 'dus pa yis// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsol// chos sku gsal la rtog med dngos grub stsol// hUM bde gshegs rgyal ba ma lus te// chos sku zhi ba'i ngang las skye ba med pa
101a2(1): las// skye ba gzugs sku phyag rgya chen por bzhug pa yi// rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor yang // tshe dang ye shes dngos grub stsol// ye shes dbyings las 'bar ba'i skur bstan pa// rta mgrin rgyal po 'khor
101a3(1): bcas kyang // tshe dang ye shes tshogs pa'i dngos grub stsol// rigs pa thugs kyi gzhal yas su// nyi zla 'od kyi gdan steng na// ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i gnas// 'phro 'du dgongs pa tshang lags
101a4(1): kyi// 'bum phrag ting 'dzin spyod pa'i dngos grub stsol// thugs mchog zhi ba'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang // 'bar ba'i cha lugs bzhugs pa ste// khrag 'thung rol pa'i phyag rgya 'bar ba'i tshogs// 'gro ba 'dul
101a5(1): ba'i lha dang lha mo'i tshogs// khams gsum dbang du bsdus nas zhi ba'i dngos grub stsol// tshe dang ye shes byang chub mchog gi dngos grub stsol// gdug pa'i tshogs rnams ma lus kun btul nas// bdud las
101a6(1): rgyal ba'i rgyal thabs bdud rtsi bsnams// mthu byin longs spyod dngos grub stsal du gsol// ngan song gnas rnams ma lus btul nas kyang // byang chub bde ba'i gnas la 'god mdzad pa// gnyis med bde/
101b1(1): ba'i dngos grub stsal du gsol// dur khrod 'bar ba'i chas dang rab ldan pas// dur khrod chen po'i dkyil 'khor gdug pa 'dul// rig pa mthu yi dngos grub stsal du gsol// byang chub sems ni rig pa'i
101b2(1): gnas// hUM mdzad chas ldan dur khrod brgyad dang ldan// khrag 'thung rol pa'i dngos grub stsal du gsol// bka' yi pho nya thogs med gdug pa 'dul ba'i tshogs// myur mgyogs longs spyod dngos grub stsal du
101b3(1): gsol// ye shes bzhi las gdug pa'i sku sprul nas// phrin las rgya mtsho 'gro don mtha' ru phyin// rig pa'i brtul zhugs nyon mongs tha ba 'joms// rdzu 'phrul drag pos gang la de yi phrin las ston// don las
101b4(1): mi nyams byang chub snying por gnas// de ring brtul zhugs mthu yi dngos grub stsol// dbyings las 'bar ba'i skur bstan nas// mkha' 'gro mi bzad las kyi mtha' sdud pa// ci 'dod phun sum tshogs pa'i
101b5(1): dngos grub stsal du gsol// ye shes dbyings las bskyed pa'i ma mo'i tshogs// thugs kyi phrin las sna tshogs mi dmigs kyang // gdug pa 'dul phyir ma mo'i sku sprul nas// phrin las myur mgyogs pho nya mang po
101b6(1): 'gugs// mthu dang rtsal gyi dngos grub stsal du gsol// las las grub dang ma mo mkha' 'gro dang // 'jig rten nor dang longs spyod dang // tshe ring nad med bde skyid phun sum tshogs// gang la des 'dul tshe
102a1(1): yi dngos grub stsol// dag pa byang chub dngos grub thob// dgos pa gang la gang 'dod pa// nor bu rin chen dpe bzhin dngos grub stsol// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ dbang gi lha rnams la
102a2(1): dngos grub slong ba'i le'u ste brgya dang bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas yang dbang gi rgyal po kun 'dus kyis/ dbang gi lha rnams la/ skong ba'i las nyams chag bshags pa dang / bskang ba 'di gsungs
102a3(1): so// 'dab chags kyi bya dmar sgro dang / shel smug tshom kham dang / de yis thugs dam bskang ba ste// nyams pa chag pa bskang ba dang / dngos grub dam pa 'thob par 'gyur// rtsa brgyad stong las sbyar ba'i bdud
102a4(1): rtsi dang // rdo rje'i mda' ma phog pa'i mngal khrag dang // thig le zags pa'i khrag chan dang // sha khrag sbyar ba'i gtor ma dang // rgyu mchog dang ni mkha' lding dang // 'di yis thugs dam bskangs byas
102a5(1): pas// pad+ma rigs kyi thugs dam bskang gyur cig/ 'di yi yid dang kun gzhi yis// dbang chen yab yum thugs dam bskang // 'di yis gsang ba'i sbubs khrag gis// rta mgrin rgyal po'i thugs dam
102a6(1): bskang // 'di yi rtog tshogs bzhi bcu gnyis// rdo rje dbyings kyi thugs dam bskang // 'di yi gzugs kyi phung po yis// rnam par snang mdzad thugs dam bskang // 'di yi tshor ba'i phung po yis// rin chen
102b1(1): 'byung gnas thugs dam bskang // 'di yi 'du shes phung po yis// snang ba mtha' yas thugs dam bskang // 'di yi 'du byed phung po yis// don yod grub pa'i thugs dam bskang // 'di yi rnam shes phung po
102b2(1): yis// rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs dam bskang // 'di yi 'byung ba lnga rnams kyis// sangs rgyas yum lnga'i thugs dam bskang // 'di yi rnam shes tshogs brgyad kyis// byang chub sems dpa' brgyad kyi thugs dam
102b3(1): bskang // 'di yi rnam shes yul brgyad kyis// sems ma brgyad kyi thugs dam bskang // 'di yi yid dang chos rnams kyis// kun bzang yab yum thugs dam bskang // 'di yi nyon mongs drug rnams
102b4(1): kyis// bcom ldan thub drug thugs dam bskang // 'di yi rtag chad bzhi rnams kyis// sgo ba yab yum thugs dam bskang // 'di yi 'od phung lnga po yis// ye shes sems dpa'i thugs dam bskang // 'di yi phung
102b5(1): lnga gnas gyur pas// khrag 'thung he ru lnga yi thugs dam bskang // 'di yi 'byung lnga gnas gyur pas// khrag 'thung yum lnga'i thugs dam bskang // 'di yi rnam shes tshogs brgyad gnas gyur pas// go rI khro mo
102b6(1): brgyad kyi thugs dam bskang // 'di yi yul brgyad gnas gyur pas// sing ha phra men brgyad kyi thugs dam bskang // 'di yi rtag chad bzhi po gnas gyur pas// sgo ma bzhi yi thugs dam bskang // 'di yi
103a1(1): gzhung bu nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis// gser gyi seng ge nyi shu rtsa brgyad thugs dam bskang // 'di yi rtsib ma g.yas g.yon gyis// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor thugs dam bskang // 'di yi gshog pa
103a2(1): g.yas g.yon gyis// khams gsum rnam rgyal thugs dam bskang // 'di yi mdangs chen bzhi po yis// gsang ba'i yum bzhi'i thugs dam bskang // 'di yi rtsa sgo rngubs chen gyis// dur khrod hUM mdzad chen
103a3(1): po'i thugs dam bskang // 'di yi lte ba sprul pa yis// ngan song sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor thugs dam bskang // 'di yi nang khrol sha khrag gis// dur khrod chen po'i dkyil 'khor thugs dam bskang // 'di yi bcud
103a4(1): bzhi po yis// brtul zhugs bzhi yi thugs dam bskang // 'di yi khrag bcud snying mchin gyis// rta yi brtul zhugs thugs dam bskang // 'di yi bcud rus rkang tshil gyis// khyi yi brtul zhugs thugs dam
103a5(1): slang // 'di yi sems bcud klad pa yis// bya yi brtul zhugs thugs dam bskang // 'di yi sha bcud tshil bu yis// phag gi brtul zhugs thugs dam bskang // 'di yi nang khrol smad lnga yis// sbrang mo brgyad
103a6(1): kyi thugs dam bskang // 'di yi mkhar bu brtsigs pa yis// long ba rgyab 'brel sum cu rtsa gnyis thugs dam bskang // 'di yi khrag mtsho dngas ma yis// mkha' 'gro ma tshogs thugs dam bskang // 'di yi yan
103b1(1): lag sde bzhi yis// mgo brtsegs khro bo'i thugs dam bskang // 'di yi dngas ma 'od chen dang // 'di yi tsit+ta srog spug gis// rtsa khro ma mo bcu gsum thugs dam bskang // zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol
103b2(1): pa'i tan+ta las/ dbang gi lha rnams thugs dam skong ba'i le'u ste brgya dang bco lnga pa'o// // de nas dbang gi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa/ de nas dbang gi phur pa bshad par bya// yang dag sems kyi phur pa
103b3(1): de// gzhan du gdab pa'i gnas med pa// rang rig byang chub sems la gdab// byang chub sems kyi phur pa de// sems can ma lus dag la gdab// thabs kyi rdo rje phur pa de// b+ha ga yangs pa'i dkyil du
103b4(1): gdab// thugs las bskyed pa'i phur pa de// mtshan ma rdzas la brten te gdab// rA tra nag po'i snying la gdab// phur pa bskyed pa'i rim pa ni// rin chen byu ru'i phur pa de// stod ni khro bo'i rang bzhin la// dbu
103b5(1): la rta mgo ljang gu 'bar// smad ni zla gam dmar po ste// dbu la rigs lnga rta mgo la// khong stod dbang chen der gsal dang // phyag ni 'gro 'dul lha ru gsal// g.yas g.yon khams gsum rgyal por
103b6(1): bskyed// hUM mdzad dur khrod smad brgyan pa// phyag kyang zla gam phur pa 'dril// dug gsum gcad cing gsad pa dang // khams gsum gdar sha gcad pa'i phyir// phur pa gzi brjid bskyed cing gdab// gsal
104a1(1): ba gsum dang ldan par bya// dug lnga'i rtsa ba khrag yin pas// khrag ni 'dod chags chen po ste// 'dod chags rtsad nas gcad pa'i phyir// dbang gi phur pas gdab par bya// thugs kyi sprul pa he ru
104a2(1): bzhi// gsal bar bskyed cing gdab pa'o// dug lnga rtsad nas gcad pa'i phyir// sprul pa he ru bzhis kyang gdab// bsgral nas gdab dang slar gso ba'o// oM pad+ma kI la ya/ a mo kI la ya/ tsa tsa ma ma kI li ki
104a3(1): la ya/ sa ma ya tsit+ta la phaT rbad ya/ de yis thams cad sgrol bar 'gyur// lha dang klu yang de dang 'dra// de yi las kyis thams cad dbang du bsdus shing bsgral bar bstan pa'o// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las//
104a4(1): dbang gi phur pa gdab cing las bya ba'i le'u ste brgya dang bcu drug pa'o// // de nas dbang gi rgyal po des// sbyin sreg las rnams bstan pa ste// de nas yang ni bka' stsal pa// bsod nams tshogs ni
104a5(1): bsags pa dang // yang na dmigs pa gtan bcol las// de yi las su sbyin sreg bya// rigs bzhi yan lag shes pa des// me yi thab ni brtsig par bya// me thab bya ba'i las rim ni// zla gam gdengs pa'i
104a6(1): dkyil 'khor bya// de mtha' zlum por bskor ba'o// de mtha' gru gsum dag tu bya// tha ma gru bzhi lham par bya// rgya shug dkar po tsher ma can// de yi nang ni brdzangs pa la// de ru rdzas sna bzhi po dang // dbang
104b1(1): gi rdzas rnams bsog pa ste// dmigs pa brtan zhing las bya na// dbang drag rdzas ni ling+gar bsreg/ bsod nams tshogs su bya ba na// 'bras dkar chan dang tsan+dan dang // zho dang mar khu mar bcud dang // 'o ma
104b2(1): khre dang bcas pa ni// sbyin sreg bya ba'i lha la 'bul// bstod dang smon lam gdab par bya// de yi las rim sbyar bas shis// bya thabs dang ni tshigs rnams dang // sngags dang phyag rgya swA hA shAn ting
104b3(1): ngongo// dmigs pa sgrol na dbang dang bam// mA ra ya khA hi raM dang bcas pa yin// de dang ldan par bsags nas su// ting 'dzin ldan pas sbyin sreg bya// hUM/ dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis// tshur gshegs tshur
104b4(1): gshegs 'byung ba che// me lha'i rgyal po drang srong che// 'dir gshegs bsreg blug mchod pa bzhes// dbang gi phrin las 'grub par mdzod// baM ni ba ta de ba shan ting ku ru shrI dza dza/ lha rdzas bzang po'i mchod pa
104b5(1): 'di dag la// byin gyis brlabs te dbul lags na// thugs rjes dgongs te bzhes su gsol// phyi mchod dag pa rnam lnga ste// gtsang mar sbyar te 'bul lags kyi// thugs rjes dgongs te bzhes su
104b6(1): gsol// bzhes nas de ring dgyes par mdzod// d+ha pe puSh+pe A lo ke gan d+he/ 'bras bu sman sbyar dag pa'i rdzas// dbang gi lha rnams mnyes par bya ba'i phyir// rdzu 'phrul dad pas 'bul lags na// thugs
105a1(1): rjes dgongs te bzhes su gsol// a su de dan da pA tsa ya hUM/ dkar gsum mngar dang dag pa'i rdzas// sngags dang phyag rgyas byin brlabs nas// dad pas 'bul gyis bzhes su
105a2(1): gsol// bzhes nas phrin las 'grub par mdzod// a 'bra ba ling shAn ting ku ru swA hA/ hUM zla gam gdengs pa'i dkyil 'khor du// bcom ldan dbang chen kun 'dus la// dag pa'i sbyin sreg mchod pa
105a3(1): 'bul// phrin las dam pa 'grub par mdzod// shrI pA baM ni sa ga na swA ha/ hom lnga 'brel ba'i dkyil 'khor du// gdug pa ma lus bsgral ba dang // byang chub lam la dgod pa'i phyir// sbyin sreg 'bar ba'i
105a4(1): mchod pa 'di// rta mgrin khro bo'i sku la mchod par 'bul// dmigs bya che ge kha raM khA hi// ho/ tshom bu lnga yi dkyil 'khor du// bde gshegs rigs lnga yab yum sras 'khor bcas// dag pa'i mchod pa 'di
105a5(1): 'bul gyi// phrin las bsgrub phyir bzhes su gsol// hUM oM aM swA hA/ shAn ting ku ru swA hA/ me ltar 'bar ba'i klong rum nas// hom lnga 'brel ba'i klong yangs su// khrag 'thung 'gro ba 'dul ba'i tshogs// dam
105a6(1): rdzas 'bar ba'i mchod pa 'di 'bul gyi// drag po'i phrin las bsgrub phyir bzhes su gsol// kro d+ha shrI he ru ka ma hA mAM sa rak+ta pA tsa kha raM khA hi/ hUM g.yas g.yon zabs shes 'brel ba'i klong dkyil du// khams
105b1(1): gsum rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor ma lus la// dam rdzas sbyin sreg 'bar ba'i mchod pa 'bul// dmigs pa brlag cing 'khor ba stongs par mdzod// staM b+ha gr-ih+Na kro d+ha mA ra ya khaM ra khA hi// rigs pa hom gyi dkyil
105b2(1): 'khor du// hUM mdzad chen po'i dkyil 'khor ma lus la// drag po'i sbyin sreg 'bar ba'i mchod pa 'bul// dmigs pa gtan nas 'pho ba'i las mdzod cig/ ba li pU dza rak+ta pany+tsa kha raM khA hi/ dur khrod 'bar
105b3(1): ba'i klong yangs su// khro bo 'bar tshogs mi bzad pas// rig pa ye shes me sbar bas// nyon mongs gdug pa gtan nas bsreg/ dam rdzas sbyin sreg mchod 'bul bas// phrin las rgya mtsho 'grub par
105b4(1): mdzod// oM rak+Sha kro d+ha mA ra ya khA hi/ bde chen rigs bsdus dkyil 'khor du// dbang gi lha tshogs bcas pa la// dam rdzas sbyin sreg 'bar ba'i mchod pa 'di 'bul bas// lha rnams mnyes shing gdug pa
105b5(1): 'joms par shog/ shrI tAMHa shaM pa ma ta hUM raM swA hA/ de ltar mchod pa phul ba dang // lhag ma ga go bsreg pa dang // drag po'i smon lam btab pa dang // phrin las rnam bzhi rdzogs pa dang // thabs la dbang ba'i
105b6(1): bro yang brdung // de yis las kyi mtha' yang 'grub// ces gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+ta las/ dbang gi sbyin sreg bya ba'i le'u ste brgya dang bcu bdun pa'o// // de nas yang ni bka' stsal pa// rU tra
106a1(1): nag po bsgral ba ltar// de la pho brang bca' ba dang // rU tra bsgral ba'i sha khrag de// bstab dang sbyin sreg bya ba'o// bstab pa 'di ltar dbang gi lha rnams la bstab po// ma dad chen po bsgral ba
106a2(1): 'di// thugs dam gnyen po 'dis bskang ngo // 'di yi kun gzhi gnas chen 'di// dbang gi rgyal po nyid la bstab// 'di yi gtsug gi phud ka 'di// rta mgrin rgyal po nyid la bstab// 'di yi bcud dang 'od
106a3(1): tshogs rnams// rdo rje dbyings kyi zhal du bstab// 'di yi 'od chen dngas ma 'di// ye shes sems dpa' nyid la bstab// 'di yi sha khrag phung po 'di// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i zhal du bstab// 'di yi sbrul chen
106a4(1): gzhung bu 'di// khams gsum rgyal po nyid la bstab// 'di yi zhabs ni g.yas g.yon ni// hUM mdzad chen po'i 'khor la bstab// 'di yi yid ni nag po 'di// ngan song sbyong ba'i lha la bstab// 'di yi dur khrod
106a5(1): nang khrol 'di// dur khrod chen po'i lha la bstab// gsang ba'i rigs can 'di dag ni// lhun gyis grub pa'i lha la bstab// 'di yi yan lag dpung bzhi yang // brtul zhugs chen po bzhi la bstab// 'di yi
106a6(1): nang khrol smad lnga ni// mkha' 'gro pho nya'i tshogs la bstab// sha dang khrag dang rus pa dang // dug gsum bsgral ba'i mchod pa 'di// ma mo mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la bstab// ces gsungs so// rta mchog rol
106b1(1): pa'i tan+t+ra las/ bstab pa'i las kyi rim pa'i le'u ste brgya dang bco brgyad pa'o// // de nas lhag ma ga go la/ bro brdung ba 'di gsungs so// sangs rgyas rgyal ba rnams kyi bka'// gar gyi dbang phyug chen
106b2(1): po ste// rak+Sha ma lus bsgral ba ste// phung po lhag ma ga go la// gdul bya'i bro gcig brdung ba ni// bro ni brtul zhugs chen po ste// rnam bzhi rdzogs pa'i bro brdungs pas// las rnams thams cad 'grub pa'i
106b3(1): bro// rigs bzhi khrag 'thung 'khrigs pa'i bro// bde gshegs rgyal bas dgongs pa'i bro// ma sring rgya mtsho gdung ba'i bro// ngan song 'khor ba 'joms pa'i bro// dug lnga gnas su dag pa'i bro// dug gsum
106b4(1): dbyings su brdung ba'i bro// sangs rgyas dgongs pa 'grub pa'i bro// nyon mongs gdung ba sel ba'i bro// rta yi bro ni nub nas brdung // khyi yi bro ni lho nas brdung // phag gi bro ni shar nas brdung // bya yi bro ni
106b5(1): byang nas brdung // bro ra chen po bzhi bcas nas// dang po bro yi gdangs bton pa// dus gsum rgyal ba'i thugs dam bskul// bar du bro yi gdangs bton pa// sgrub po dag la dngos grub 'bebs// tha mar bro
106b6(1): yi gdangs skra yis// 'khor ba ngan song gtan nas grol// brdungs pas byang chub sems sprin 'khrigs// skye 'gag med pa'i dbyings rum du// blangs pas rgyal ba'i thugs dam bskul// 'khor ba'i skyabs
107a1(1): ling chen po la// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rab mdar gnyer// ye shes dpag gi phan ka can// ru dpon ye shes lnga yis mdzod// kun tu bzang po'i mkha' dbyings su// khams gsum yang sgrol
107a2(1): chen po mdzod// lhag ma rjes shul dag la ni// brtul zhugs chen po'i bro brdungs pas// dug gsum rtsad nas gcod pa'i bro// rta yi brtul zhugs bro brdungs pas// srid gsum ma lus dbang du sdud// khro bo
107a3(1): rdo rje ga gon pas// rta skad rngam pa'i ngang las rol// shangs kyi rlung sgrom chen po nas// rdo rje mtshon cha'i char phab pas// dbang gi rta bro brdungs pa yis// dang po ga go gzhom par byas// bar mas lhag ma rol
107a4(1): par byas// tha mas gdug rtsub byang bar byas// lhag ma med par rdul du brlag/ dug gsum gnas su stongs par bya// rta yi dbu yi gtsug rum nas// de yi pho nya skar tshogs spros// mtshon cha skar ltar
107a5(1): 'khrugs pa'i bro// drag po gtum po lhan ner mdzod// thugs ka'i yi ge hrIH'phros pas// sbrul sku dbang du sdud pa'i bro// lhag ma med par gdar sha gcod// lho nas khyi yi bro brdungs nas// brtul zhugs chen
107a6(1): po las kyi bro// drag po gtum po dbang du sdud// phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhi brgyad dag tu// sprul pa khyi yi bro brdungs pas// thams cad tshar bcad bde la bkod// bde gshegs rnams kyi thugs dam
107b1(1): bskang // 'khor ba ngan song yongs su bcom// byang nas bya yi bro brdungs pas// srid gsum khams gsum zil gyis mnan// klu la sogs pa'i gdug pa can// zas su za zhing rngam stabs byed// rgyu drug lings
107b2(1): su 'debs par byed// sprul pa yongs su lding bar byed// sprul pa mi bzad ma rungs pa// la la lding dang la la 'phur// la la gzan la stod pa'i tshul// la la ldir zhing la la 'dzums// kha dog sna lnga 'bar ba
107b3(1): la// mi mthun gdug pa so sor 'dul// sprul pa bye ba las la 'gyed// gdug pa gtum po gtan nas 'joms// dbang gi bro gar yongs su ldir// lhag ma rjes shul med pa'i bro// rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs
107b4(1): dam skong // bro gar yongs su gding bar bgyi// shar nas phag gi brtul zhugs byung // gti mug 'joms pa'i las la mkhas// blang dang dor med drag po ste// sra sti med par 'joms pa'i bro// phag gi brtul
107b5(1): zhugs chen po yis// zas ni gtsang dme med par bza'// bang ni ngal dub med par rgyug/ tshems ni sra sti med par 'joms// khron du ma gyur gang yang med// srid pa'i khron pa rkong re mkhas// nyon mongs tha
107b6(1): ba gtan nas 'joms// 'dod chags rgya mtsho gting nas skem// nga rgyal brag ri rtse nas bsnyil// phrag dog zug rngu gtan nas choms// gti mug mun pa gtan nas choms// zhe sdang rtsa me rum du sod// ces
108a1(1): gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+ta las/ lhag ma'i rjes shul bro rdung ba'i le'u ste brgya dang bcu dgu pa'o// // de nas dbang gi rgyal pos las 'di dag gsungs so// gsang ba'i dngos
108a2(1): grub bsgrub 'dod na// rta mgrin rta yi rgyal po la// sprul pa'i he ru bzhis bskor ba// de ni yang dag bsgrub par bya// de yi yon tan rdzogs pas ni// 'di yi mthu dang dngos grub thob// byang chub snying po 'grub
108a3(1): par the tshom med// rigs dang mthun pa'i gnas dag tu// phun sum tshogs pa'i sgrub po des// las kyi rim pa gzhung bzhin bya// dkyil 'khor zla gam sgo gcig pa// tha ma zla gam bzhis bskor ba// sgo dang
108a4(1): bcas par bya ba'o// chag chag thig dang gri ba dang // rdzas dang ldan par bsham pa'o// dug shing phur pa lnga bsags te// byin gyis brlab pa byas nas ni// zla gam lnga la dgod par bya// mthun pa'i phyi nang
108a5(1): gsang ba'i rdzas// bdud rtsi gtor ma bzhin du ste// ma dad pa de bsgral ba las// rdul la sogs pa'i chu gsum gyis// lha rnams skra yi khrus su gsol// byang chub sems dang dri chen dang // mAM sa dang ni rak+ta
108a6(1): dang // dri chu ra swa ya la sogs// bdud rtsi dam pa sman sbyar nas// lha rnams kun la dbul bar bya// ma dad pa de bsgral ba yi// dbus ni snying la tha ma rtsib ma ste// sha dang khrag gis brgyan pa dang // rgyu ma klad
108b1(1): pa dbang po dang // bcas pa lha rnams dag la 'bul// rU tra'i snying khrag dngas ma ste// khrag chen mchod pa sgreng bar bya// de ltar mchod pa bya ba'o// de nas bsgrub pa brtsam par bya// zhes gsungs so// rta
108b2(1): mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ rta mgrin sgrub pa rdzas dang dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste brgya dang nyi shu pa'o// // de nas las kyi gzhung bstan te/ de bzhin nyid kyi ting 'dzin ni// chos rnams stong pa'i rang
108b3(1): bzhin bsgom// kun tu snang gi ting 'dzin ni// 'bras bu lam gyi gzhi ru gzhag/ thun mong ma yin khyab pa'i snying rje yin// de yi dran bskyed snying rje mchog/ snying rje lam du gzhag pa yin// de las rgyu shar ting
108b4(1): 'dzin hUM// sems kyi 'bras bu bstan pa yin// hUM las 'byung ba e shar bas// 'byung ba'i gzhi mo nam mkha' yin// hUM las yi ge yaM shar bas// rten pa'i rlung zhes shar ba yin// hUM las yi ge baM shar
108b5(1): bas// chu yi 'byung ba sa bon brtan// hUM las yi ge suM shar bas// sra ba sa yi rten du gyur// hUM las yi ge raM shar bas// smin cing brtas par byas pa yin// hUM las yi ge ke shar bas// ri rab chen po byung ba
108b6(1): yin// b+h+rUM las ri rab gzhal yas khang // rA ga pad+ma dmar po ste// ra ti zhes pa brtsegs pa yin// b+h+rUM ni gzhal yas zla gam dmar// de dkyil dmigs pa'i rten mnan pa// bdud dang srin po la sogs
109a1(1): pa// nyi zla pad+ma brtsegs pa'i tshul// gsang ba'i gnas ni dkyil du'o// de'i steng yi ge hUM shar bas// dmar la bkra ba'i yi ge hUM// de las sa bon sngags brjod pas// rta mgrin rgyal por gyur
109a2(1): pa yin// de la rigs bzhi'i sngags brjod pas// he ru'i rgyal por gyur pa yin// de ltar rang bzhin gsal bar bsgom// oM hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ de brjod rta mgrin rgyal por gyur// swA hA he ru ka kI la ya hUM
109a3(1): phaT/ a mo g+ha shrI he ru ka hUM phaT/ rat+na a mo g+ha shrI he ru ka hUM phaT/ karma a mo g+ha hUM phaT/ de ltar ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor gsal bar bsgom/ rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ rta mgrin he ru bzhi dang bcas pa
109a4(1): bsgom pa'i le'u ste brgya dang nyer gcig pa'o// // hUM dur khrod me ltar 'bar ba'i gzhal yas nas// chos dbyings dag pa lha yi gnas chen 'dir// rta mgrin rgyal po rta skad 'tsher zhing gshegs su
109a5(1): sol// gdug pa 'dul phyir klu dbang gdan la bzhugs// chos dbyings dag pa lha yi gnas chen nas// dur khrod zla gam gdengs pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// sprul pa'i he ru khro bo rgyal po bzhi// dgyes shing
109a6(1): brtan par bzhugs nas ni// dbang drag phrin las rdzogs par mdzod// hrI e A ra li dzaHhUM/ dbang drag 'joms mdzad srin po 'dul ba'i lha// rta mgrin rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa la// brkyang bskum srin
109b1(1): po gus pas phyag 'tshal na// thugs rje mchog gis bdag la dgongs su gsol// 'dul thabs drag po'i phrin las mi bzad rnam bzhi yis// dri za gshin rje klu dang gnod sbyin 'dul// phrin las dbang drag
109b2(1): drag po yis// mi bzad gdug pa 'dul mdzad mchog/ sprul pa he ru bzhi la phyag 'tshal lo// hUM mdzad hUM ste hUM gi rgyal po mchog/ lcang lor bcas pa'i pad+ma b+han d+ha la// tshe 'dzin mchog dang dmar chen dam
109b3(1): pas bkang // sbyor dang sgrol gyis thugs dam bskang lags kyis// rta mgrin rgyal po'i thugs dam bskang bar mdzod// sha chen mkha' lding shel sgong gzugs dang bcas// sman chen lnga dang tshe 'dzin byin
109b4(1): se// rdo rje las kyi chu dang pany+tsa a mr-i ta// sbyor dang sgrol ba'i thugs dam mchog lags kyis// he ru bzhi yi thugs dam bskang bar mdzod// pad+ma zil tig dri dang rak+ta dang // rdo rje las kyi chu dang pany+tsa a mr-i
109b5(1): ta// sbyor dang sgrol gyis thugs dam bskang lags kyis// mkha' 'gro ma tshogs thugs dam bskang bar mdzod// pad+ma b+han d+ha lcang lor bcas bdud rtsi// dbang gi rgyal po khro bo rta mchog la// bla med dam rdzas
109b6(1): bdud rtsi'i mchod pa mchog/ gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis 'bul lags na// thugs rjes bzhes nas dbang gi dngos grub stsol// 'bar ba'i sprul pa mngon par shar ba ni// rigs kyi sprul pa khro bo bzhi rnams
110a1(1): la// rnam dag bdud rtsi'i dam rdzas mnyes mchod 'bul// thugs rje cher dgongs dbang dang dngos grub stsol// zhes sman mchod dam pa'o// yi ge 'bru gsum sku gsung thugs// byin rlabs dam
110a2(1): pa mdzad nas su// sku gsung thugs su mdzad du gsol// kA ya sid+d+hi au/ wAka sid+d+hi AM/ tsit+ta sid+d+hi hUM/ hAM srid pa'i gcong snying zad par bya ba'i phyir// bdud rtsi chen po pany+tsa a mr-i ta// bla med sman gyi mchod pa
110a3(1): 'bul lags na// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal bzlog phyir bzhes su gsol// bla med mchog gi mchod pa dam pa sbyar ba 'di// ye shes lnga yi 'od zer rnam par 'phro// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yi rab brgyan
110a4(1): nas// dam tshig gsang ba'i mchod par bzhes su gsol// zhes mchod pa dbul lo// de nas 'dod don smon lam btab// dngos grub blang dang phrin las bcol// nye bar bskul dang bsnyen pa bskyal// de
110a5(1): nas las kyi bya ba bya// tshogs kyi mchod pa bya ba dang // bskang ba dang ni bshags pa dang // las bcol ba dang gdab par bya// oM hrIHba sha kI la ya hUM phaT/ des ni dbang gi phur pas gdab// swA hA kI la ya
110a6(1): rbad/ a mo kI la ya rbad/ rad ka ta na ki la ya rbad/ kar sha a mo kI la ya hUM phaT/ de ltar gsal bas gdab pa'o// de nas pro de 'khor gsum brdung // de nas mchod pa dbul bar bya// bstod pa dang ni
110b1(1): las bya'o// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ rta mgrin he ru bzhi dang bcas pa bsgrub pa'i le'u ste brgya dang nyer gnyis pa'o// // de nas yang bstod pa 'di gsungs so// hUM dmar nag zla gam gdengs pa'i
110b2(1): dkyil 'khor nas// dbang gi rgyal po pad+ma rta mgrin rgyal// rta mgrin rgyal po dregs pa 'dul ba'i lha// sku mdog dmar po me dpung 'bar ba 'dra// 'bar ba'i phyag gis gdug pa'i phyag mtshan 'dzin/ ral gri
110b3(1): sbrul zhags thod pa gri gug 'dzin// gdug pa'i zhabs kyis klu tshogs gdan du bting // na bza' 'bar ba sku yi rgyan du ston// glang chen ko rlon brjid chen sku yi rgyan// zhing lpags g.yang gzhi dag pa gsung gi
110b4(1): chas// stag gi pags pa dpa' bar 'gro ba thugs kyi chas// gdu bu dpung rgyan sbrul nag zil gnon chas// rdo rje'i gshog pa g.yas g.yon gdengs pa yis// thabs dang shes rab ldan de gdug pa zil gyis
110b5(1): gnon// rdo rje rtse mo bya khyung 'bar bas klu gnyen sbrum bur 'bru// mtshe gtsigs rkan sgra drag pos bdud dpung zil gyis gnon// sprul pa mang po skar tshogs bkye bas pho nya mang po 'gugs// dbu yi gtsug na rta
110b6(1): mgo 'bar bas ngan song 'dul ba'i thabs la mkhas// lhang lhang tser tser lan gsum sgra bsgrags pas// mya ngan 'das pa'i mtshams na tse re re// ngan song gnas rnams stongs shing ye shes don la
111a1(1): bskul// gsung rab mnyes pa sgra sgrogs shing // bde gshegs rnams kyi thugs dam bskul// 'khor ba gtan nas 'joms shing byang chub don la 'god// snyan pa'i sgra rnams bsgrags pas lha mo
111a2(1): dbyings su dgyes// ral pa dmar po bsigs pas bdud dpung zil gyis gnon// bdud bzhi bcom nas ye shes bzhi yi ngang la 'jog/ ngan song gnas rnams stongs te byang chub lam la 'god// dbang gi
111a3(1): rgyal po rta skad 'tsher ba khyod la bstod// sprul pa'i he ru khro bo'i rgyal po bzhi// rigs bzhi'i sprul pa khro bo bzhir sprul pa// phyogs bzhi dag na gnas pa ste// gdug pa 'dul phyir sku sprul pa// smug nag ral pa
111a4(1): 'bar ba'i thod phreng can// na gza' 'bar ba gsum mnabs pa// phyag na gdug pa'i mtshon cha bsnams// g.yas pa dang po dgra sta lcags kyu dang // tha ma gdug pa'i phur pa 'dril// g.yon pa me dpung ba
111a5(1): dan no// gdug pa 'dul phyir drag po'i las la brtson// sprul pa mang po yang dag las la brtson// mi bzad rngam pa'i sgra sgrogs shing // bdud dpung 'joms pa'i rkan yang brde ba// srid pa yongs la phan pa'i
111a6(1): bya ra mdzad// sku ni 'jigs stabs 'bar ba'i sku// gsung ni gdug pa'i nga ro sgrogs// thugs ni dbang gis brnag pa'i phrin las mdzad// gshog pa'i bar bar lcags kyu 'bar bas gtams// sprul pa khro
111b1(1): chung 'bar bas pa spu'i bu ga gtams// ye shes mkha' 'gro mang po las la 'gyed// srid pa'i ri rab yang ni 'gram nas bsnyil// rgya mtsho chen po'i gzhung yang skems par byed// me ri me dpung 'bar ba'i klong
111b2(1): na bzhugs// dur khrod chas kyis sku la rgyan du byas// mche ba rnon pos skye shi rtsad nas gcod// spyan mig bzlog pa tsam gyis khams gsum bran du 'khol// thugs rje dbyings su 'dren cing 'khor ba bla med sa
111b3(1): la 'khod// rngam chen he ru bzhi la phyag 'tshal bstod// ces gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ rta mgrin dang 'khor he ru bzhi la bstod pa'i le'u ste brgya dang nyer gsum pa'o// // de nas yang
111b4(1): dbang gi rgyal pos/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// long ba rgyab 'brel pa sum cu rtsa gnyis dang // dmus long las kyi 'khor brgyad bya ba yod de/ long ba rgyab 'brel pa sum cu rtsa gnyis ni/ mkha' 'gro ma sum
111b5(1): cu rtsa gnyis kyi sprul pa yin/ dmus long las kyi 'khor ba brgyad bya ba ni/ dbang gi rgyal po'i thugs kyi sgo srung brgyad yin te/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad las brgal nas/ rtse gcig ting 'dzin
111b6(1): dka' thub smyon pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas so// khro bo brgyad yod pa lta bu ma yin te/ thub pa dmus long las/ rnam par shes pa'i gzugs gang yang med do// lus gol bag chags pa las/ phyag bzhi gdug
112a1(1): pa'i mtshon cha thogs pa'o// mig med pa la gar yang rgyu ba der thogs pa med pa'o// sna med pa las dri thams cad lus kyis tshor ba'o// lce med pa las drag po'i sgra khong nas smra ba'o// rna ba med
112a2(1): pa las sgra thams cad khong nas thos pa'o// dmus long de lta bu des las gang la yang thogs pa med par byed pa'o// de lta bu de bsgrub par bya ba ni/ dbus su rta mchog rgyal po de// le'u tshe brgyad la dmus long
112a3(1): brgyad/ lha dgu sa ru bsgrub par bya'o// dkyil 'khor thig bzhi btab pas ling tshe dgu// tshon ni rigs dang mthun par bya// sgo gcig pa ni shar du'o// de la bsnyen sgrub spyi ltar bya// dang po sngon du 'gro ba'i
112a4(1): las// rim pa rgyas par ldan par bya// de nas gzhung la 'jug pa ste// ting 'dzin rnam gsum rim bzhin bsgom// de nas rig pa'i hUM de las// 'byung ba lnga po bskyed par bya// de las ri rab brtan par
112a5(1): bya/ de las phyi rin chen gzhal yas khang // nang dur khrod 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang // dbus ni zla gam gdengs pa 'od dang bcas// tha ma me dpung me ri 'bar ba'o// de la rA tra gdan du bsam// nyi zla
112a6(1): pad+ma sum brtsegs so// de la yi ge gsal ba ni// dmar la bkra ba'i hUM zhig bsam// cho ga gsum gyi sbyor ba yis// sngags kyang brjod pas gsal ba ste// dbang chen 'dus pa'i sku ru gsal// de las sprul
112b1(1): pa'i bkye tshul bskyed// li gaM ga ta hUM phaT/ li tsa saM pa hUM/ li hUM ba ti hUM/ li dza a sa me hUM/ li bu sha hUM/ li kha du hUM/ li pra ma sha ra hUM/ li kha ma le hUM/ sngags de re re brjod pa yi// dmus long 'khor ba re re
112b2(1): bskyed// ling tshe brgyad la bkod pa'o// bcom ldan dbang chen he ru ka/ khro bo'i rgyal po hUM sgra can// che bas bstod pas dbang phyug yang che'i dpal// 'bar ba lha yi lha la phyag 'tshal bstod// gdug pa 'dul
112b3(1): phyir bskyed pa'i dmus long brgyad// srid pa dbang du sprad pa rngams pa'i khro bo che// gdug pa ma lus 'dul bas dmus long gya nom pa// dbang gi zhing khams chen po bskyang ba dang // bdud dang srin po klu
112b4(1): rnams tshar gcad dang // dngos grub dam pa bsgrub pa'i phyir// dbang chen kun 'dul bka' 'khor bskyang ba dang // dbang drag las kyi phrin las bsgrub mdzad pa// dmus long las kyi 'khor la phyag 'tshal
112b5(1): lo// de ni bskyed dang bstod pa'o// de nas spyan ni drang bya ste// mi dmigs chos dbyings dag pa las// pad+ma dbang chen gshegs su gsol// gdug pa ma lus 'dul ba dang // dngos grub mchog rnams stsal
112b6(1): ba'i phyir// 'bar ba'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol// yul drug rten dag gnas brgyad nas// gdug pa 'dul phyir long ba'i tshogs sprul nas// dbang drag phrin las 'grub par mdzad pa'i mchog/ tshom bu
113a1(1): 'od kyi gnas su gshegs su gsol// 'bar ba'i zhing gi 'od ldan bshams pa la// dgyes shing rol te bzhugs su gsol// sa ma ya e h+ye hi dza/ rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ dbang gi rgyal po
113a2(1): la dmus long las kyi 'khor tshogs spyan drang ba dang / bskyed pa'i le'u ste brgya dang nyer bzhi pa'o// // de nas phyag ni 'tshal bar bya/ 'dod chags tshul gyis 'dod chags 'joms mdzad pa// 'dod
113a3(1): chags rgyal po pad+ma he ru ka/ dbang mchog gdug pa 'dul phyir dus las mi 'da' ba// pad+ma he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// khams gsum 'khor ba ru las bzlog pa'i phyir// gdug pa'i tshogs chen sku sprul
113a4(1): pa// las kyi dmus long brgyad po'i tshul// 'bar ba tshogs chen bdag la phyag 'tshal lo// srid pa'i gdul dka' ma lus 'dul ba dang // bka' yi phrin las ma lus bsgrub bya'i phyir// gsang ba mkha'
113a5(1): 'gro'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// a ti pu ho// 'byung ba dag pa'i mchod pa dang // rol mo sgra yi mchod pa dang // phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod// dngos grub blang la lhag ma sgreng // smon lam gdab dang
113a6(1): phrin las bcol// chag nyams bshags la rig pa'i me tog dor// hu lu 'dzab kyi dgongs pa bya// grangs tshad bstod pas 'phrin las bcol// 'byor pa tshogs kyis mchod pa bya// dmigs pas dgug ste
113b1(1): bstab par bya// lhag ma btang ste mkha' 'gro mchod// 'bum lnga'i bshags pa brgya pa 'don// da ltar byas la sgrub pa pos// gnan pa dang ni 'phang ba dang // sreg pa'i las ni yang dag bya// mtha' bsdu ba yi
113b2(1): las su gsungs// bskang dang bzlog pa bya ba ni// las gzhung bsrang bar bya ba'o// drag po'i bskang dang bzlog pa bya ba ni// drag po'i las gsum bstud la bya ba yin// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i
113b3(1): tan+t+ra las/ dbang gi rgyal po la dmus long dang bcas pa'i las kyi rim pa'i le'u ste brgya dang nyer lnga pa'o// // de nas dbang gi rgyal po pad+ma he ru kas gsungs pa/ bcom ldan dbang chen zhabs brgyad
113b4(1): kyi// 'og na khro bcu yod pa ste// phyogs mtshams brgyad du khro bo brgyad// bsnol nas gan rkyal la sogs pa'o// stobs po che dang hUM kA ra// dbus su gan rkyal kha sbub bo// zhabs brgyad long bu man chad
113b5(1): de// khong du nub nas mnan pa'o// de nas dbang gi rgyal po pad+ma he ru kas// khro brgyad 'bar ba mi bzad skur bstan pa// 'og min dur khrod 'bar ba'i gdan// steng du rdo rje 'bar ba'i gur// bar du rin
113b6(1): chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang // dkyil 'khor thod pa 'bar ba'i gzhal yas na// khro bo chen po brgyad ni gnas pa ste// de yang bsgrub par bya ba ste// dbang gi rgyal po kun 'dus te// khro bo bcu yis bskor
114a1(1): ba bsgrub// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham pa la// dbus su zlum po zla gam bcas// mtha' ma 'khor lo rtsibs bcu par// gru bzhi 'bur dang sgo bcas bri// las kyi rim pa de bzhin bya// sku'am
114a2(1): gsung ste phyag rgya thugs// 'khor lo bcu la dgod par bya// de la rdzas ni de bzhin gzhag/ rnam gsum rim gyi ting 'dzin bsgom// 'bras bu lam dang rgyu ru bshad// 'byung ba rim bzhin bskyed pa'o// de las
114a3(1): gzhal yas gsal bar bsgom// me 'bar ye shes 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang // phyi dang nang med kun tu nang // 'bar ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs bcu la// gru chad par khyams gru bzhi ldan// de ltar gsal ba'i
114a4(1): ting 'dzin bsgom// de yi dkyil du lha rnams so// oM hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha hAM kA ra/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha bi dza ya/ badz+ra kro d+ha nI la daN+Da/ badz+ra kro ta ya mAn ta ka/ badz+ra kro d+ha Ar+ya a tsa le/ badz+ra kro d+ha ha ya gr-i
114a5(1): wa/ badz+ra kro d+ha a pa ra dzi ta/ badz+ra kro d+ha a mr-i ta kuN+Da li/ badz+ra kro d+ha trai lo kya bi dza ya/ badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA ba la hUM/ 'khor lo bcu la hUM dgod de// rim pa ltar du shes par bya// hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ dbus su
114a6(1): hUM dmar la bkra ba yin par gsungs/ hUM las sngags de brjod pa yis// 'bar ba'i khro bor gyur pa'o// de ltar gzhal yas khang gi nang na ni/ rang ngo bzhugs pa'i gzugs dag pa bskyed pa dang / lha'i ting
114b1(1): 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor lo zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ ting nge 'dzin dang gzugs brnyan bstan pa'i le'u ste brgya dang nyer drug pa'o// // de nas lha rnams spyan drang ba// rnam par mi
114b2(1): rtog chos dbyings dag pa nas// dbang chen rgyal po kun 'dus gshegs su gsol// gnyis med rig pa thugs kyi gnas chen nas// hUM mdzad khro bo 'khor bcas gshegs su gsol// gnyis med rol pa chub
114b3(1): pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// sgo ba mgo brtsegs dag kyang gshegs su gsol// kro d+ha sa ma ya gri dza/ bde gshegs rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs chen po// sangs rgyas kun gyi yab chen po// dbang mchog kun 'dul
114b4(1): bzang po che ba'i lha// che bas che bar bstod pa'i dbang phyug yang che dpal// 'bar ba lha yi lha la phyag 'tshal lo// srid gsum gdug pa ma lus kun 'joms pa// gdug pa 'dul mdzad ye shes lha yi
114b5(1): lha// stobs kyi rim pa'i khro bo hUM sgra can// hUM mdzad khro bo bcu la phyag 'tshal lo// theg pa dgu la gnas shing sa dgu rim gyis sbyor// pha rol phyin bcu rdzogs shing mtha' gnyis mi spang ngang la gnas// sgo ba
114b6(1): mgo brtsegs bzhi la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas mchod pa rim pas 'bul// smon lam gdab dang 'dod gsol bya// lha yi bsnyen pa grangs su bskyal// gang 'dod dbang drag las dang sbyar// de nas lha rnams
115a1(1): bstod// hUM khrag 'thung 'bar ba'i skur bstan pa// dbu lnga phyag ni bcu drug ste// 'bar ba'i zhabs ni brgyad du gtams// gshog pa g.yas g.yon gnyis su gdengs// gsho rtse bya khyung 'bar
115a2(1): ba'o// nyi ma zla bas 'bar bar brgyan// dpal gyi chas brgyad sku la brgyan// 'bar ba'i phyag mtshan mang po rnams// dbu steng sangs rgyas lnga yis brgyan// dbu lnga rta mgo 'bar ba lnga// tshon gang 'od kyi 'bru
115a3(1): dang bcas// dbang gi rgyal po'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// hUM khro bo chen po hUM chen 'bar// brjid pa'i stabs dang 'degs pa'i stobs// mi bzad gdug pa 'dul mdzad pa// khro chen hUM ka ra la bstod// hUM
115a4(1): nyon longs kun las rnam par rgyal// rgyal ba rgyal ba'i rtags brnyes pa// chos dbyings dag dang mnyam par sbyor// bdud 'dul rnam par rgyal la bstod// rdzu 'phrul dang la mnga' brnyes shing // rtags kyi chos
115a5(1): dbyings dbyug pa yis// nyon mongs dra ba 'joms mdzad pa// 'bar ba dbyug sngon can la bstod// chos dbyings dag pa'i ngang nyid las// lhag pa'i ye shes skur bstan pas// log par lta ba'i gshin rje
115a6(1): sgrol// de gshed gshin rje'i gshed la bstod// chos nyid mnyam pa'i ngang nyid las// g.yo ba med pa mi g.yo mgon// de sbrul bdud dang srin po tshar gcod pa// khro mchog mi g.yo mgon la phyag 'tshal
115b1(1): bstod// 'dod chags gnas su dag byed pa// theg pa'i rta la rab brgyud nas// mchog tu klu dang gnyen po 'dul// rta mchog dpal la phyag 'tshal bstod// dag pa'i don mchog mtshon pa yis// mnyam nyid
115b2(1): nga gis thams cad 'joms// de phyir gzhan gyis mi thub ste// gzhan gyis mi thub pa la phyag 'tshal bstod// chos dbyings dag pa'i bdud rtsi yis// nyon mongs ma lus gnas su bcom// 'khor ba'i bdud
115b3(1): la ye shes rtsi gtong ba// bdud rtsi 'khyil ba de la bstod// khams gsum nyon mongs kun las rnam par rgyal// de don ma nor dbyings su sdud byed pa// de yi don gyis dug gsum gnas su stongs par
115b4(1): byed// khro chen khams gsum rgyal la phyag 'tshal bstod// ye shes stobs dang ldan pa yis// nyon mongs dra ba gcod byed pa// de las ma g.yos stobs po che// 'joms byed stobs po che la phyag 'tshal
115b5(1): bstod// ces gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ lha la bstod pa bstan pa'i le'u ste brgya dang nyer bdun pa'o// // de nas drag po gsang ba'i sngags bstan pa/ oM hrIHSh+T+r-iHhUM ya rbad phaT/ gardza gardza
115b6(1): hUM phaT/ ha na ha na hUM phaT/ da ha da ha hUM phaT/ pa tsa pa tsa hUM phaT/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM phaT/ ts+tshin da ts+tshin da hUM phaT/ b+hin da b+hin da hUM phaT/ s+pho Ta s+pho Ta hUM phaT/ ces pas rim par
116a1(1): gdab par bya/ spyi dril la gdab pa ni/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha pa ra bi d+har+tha ga ga na sa ma ya phaT rbad/ spyir dril bas gdab pa'o// gdab nas lhag ma bstab par bya// de yi lhag ma'i rjes shul la// yi
116a2(1): ge nyi shu'i 'phro 'du las// khro bcu rnams spros bro brdungs pas// yang sbrul khro chung tshon gang gis// drag po'i las byed bro brdung ngo // de nas mnan gzir bya ba yis// yi ge sngags kyi 'khor lo dgod// de ltar
116a3(1): bsam pa'i las rnams rdzogs// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ sngags kyi gdab pa dang bros mnan pa'i le'u ste brgya dang nyer brgyad pa'o// // de nas dpal gyis bka' stsal pa// de
116a4(1): nas rigs 'dus gsang ba yis// lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// thams cad rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor te// sgrub pa chen po byed pa dang // drag brdal drag po byed pa na// rigs 'dus gsang ba'i
116a5(1): kyil 'khor gsungs// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham pa la// dbus su pho brang zlum po bskor// thig bzhi btab pas ling tshe dgu// ling tshe dgu la pho brang dgu// dbus su pad+ma zla gam brgyad// shar gyi ling tshe
116a6(1): dag la ni// rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor te// tshom bu lnga yi dkyil 'khor ro// lho yi le'u tshe dag la 'gro ba 'dul ba ste// dbus su zla gam mtha' ma 'khor lo brgyad// nub tu rta mgrin dbang gi ste// zla
116b1(1): gam kha sprod dag dang ldan// byang du khams gsum rnam rgyal te// zlum po pad+ma 'dab brgyad do// shar lho'i ling tshe dag la ni// ngan song sbyong ba'i ngal ba ste// gru gsum zla gam bzhis bskor ba'o// lho nub ling
116b2(1): tshe dag la ni// hUM mdzad chen po'i dkyil 'khor te// le tshe dgu dang ldan pa'o// nub byang le tshe dag la ni// dur khrod chen po'i dal ba ste// gru gsum mtha' ma zlum po bzhi// byang shar zla gam sgo gcig pa// ye
116b3(1): shes sems dpa'i dal ba ste// tha ma gru bzhi sgo yis bskor// le tshe re yi mtha' ma yang // gru bzhi sgo dang bcas pa'o// gru chad kun la khyud ni 'jug/ de la lha rnams gsal ba ste// de ltar gsal bar bris
116b4(1): bsgom nas// dbang gi byin rlabs chen po 'byung // dbang bskur dngos grub blang ba yang // de ltar byas na dngos grub thob// ces gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ dbang gi rigs thams cad
116b5(1): 'dus pa'i dal gyi le'u ste brgya dang nyer dgu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// sems dpa' la sogs khyod rnams nyon// byang chub 'bras bu thob 'dod pas// dge
116b6(1): ba'i las su bstan pa ni// rtag tu mchod pa byed pa'i rten// mchod pa dad cing gus byas nas// yid 'ong mdzes pa sa gzhi la// ba yi rnam lnga'i go ma yen// spos kyi chu yis chag chag btang // mchod rten pad+ma
117a1(1): brtsegs pa yi// rin chen sna tshogs grub pa'i gzhal yas khang // de la pad+ma rigs kyi lha rnams bskyed// dus rnams rtag par bzhugs par bsgom pa'o// spyan drangs pas yang de la
117a2(1): bstim// mchod pa rnam pa lnga po dang // rmad du byung ba gsum mchod nas// de nas snyan pa'i sgra bsgrags shing // 'gro ba rgyud lnga'i 'khor los 'khor ba ru// sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor gzir ba'i 'gro gzigs
117a3(1): nas// thugs rjes sdug bsngal ma lus 'joms mdzad pa// thugs rje'i bdag nyid khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// sems can smin cing grol bar mdzad pa'i phyir// chos nyid de bzhin nyid la bzhugs gyur
117a4(1): nas// chags pas ma gos pad+ma ltar dag pa'i// 'dod chags dag pa'i bdag nyid khyod la bstod// sems can 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor nub pa la// thugs rjes thabs dang shes rab grur bzhag nas// zhi ba rin
117a5(1): chen rgya mtsho'i gling bskyod pa// kun gyi ded dpon chen po khyod la 'dud// sems can bkren pa chos kyis phongs gyur pas// ma rig mun 'thibs nang du song ba rnams// 'phags pa'i nor bdun dag gis tshim
117a6(1): mdzad pa// ye shes sgron ma khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// sems can las kyi chu bos bdas pa rnams// dam chos bdud rtsi'i zam pas sgrol mdzad cing // 'phags lam yan lag brgyad la 'god mdzad
117b1(1): pa// thugs rje'i bdag nyid khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// mchod rten de rin po che sna tshogs las grub pa'i thugs rje ye shes kyi rang bzhin du bsams la/ de'i bum pa'i nang du gnas pa'i snying po dang // mchod
117b2(1): rten chen po des las 'od zer du ma grangs med cing bgrang du med pas/ 'khrul pa'i sems can thams cad kyis// las dang nyon mongs sgrib pa yis// tshogs rnams thams cad byang byas nas// de bzhin
117b3(1): gshegs pa thams cad thugs// ye shes 'od zer tshul gyis bsdus byas nas// mchod rten de la thim pa yis// mchod rten chen po de nyid ni// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis// chos sku longs sku sprul
117b4(1): pa'i sku// ngo bo nyid du bsgom byas la// de la mchod pa kun mchod la// rten dang 'brel ba'i snying po bzlas// rigs kyi bstod pa kun byas la// de ma thag nas tshig 'di brjod// bcom ldan 'das te de bzhin
117b5(1): gshegs// dgra bcom yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas// rig pa zhabs ldan bde bar gshegs// skyes bu 'dul dang kha lo sgyur// lha dang mi yi ston pa'i mchog/ ngo mtshar cho 'phrul zung ldan pa'i// sangs rgyas sku
117b6(1): gsung lhun grub pa// deng 'dir bdag la dgongs su gsol// bdag gi sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung phyir// bdud dang mu stegs la sogs pham par bgyi ba dang // sems can las dang nyon mongs
118a1(1): rtog pa bsal bar bgyi// de las bdag cag rnams la ni// bskyab cing snang ba mdzad du gsol// de brjod la ni smon lam btab// ces gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ mchod pa'i
118a2(1): rten gyi le'u ste brgya dang sum cu pa'o// // de nas rab tu gnas par bya// thugs rje ldan pa'i ston pa yis// 'gro ba bde la dgod pa'i phyir// sku gdung dang ni ring bsrel dang // mchod pa'i rten ni
118a3(1): bzhengs par gsungs// sa dang pha rol phyin pa dang // smin pa dang ni grol ba'i phyir// mchod rten chen po bzhi yang bzhed // lhag pa dang ni zung 'jug dang // sku dang ye shes thob pa'i phyir// mchod rten bzhi/
118a4(1): yang bzhengs par bya// sgrib gnyis byang nas tshogs gnyis rdzogs// de yi phyir yang bzhengs par bya// las dang nyon mongs sgrib byang nas// 'bras bu byang chub thob pa'i phyir// de yang gzugs sku bzhengs par
118a5(1): bya// bdud kyi bya ra ba dang gnod sbyin mdun sa dang // gdug pa klu gnyen 'byung po'i rgyun lam de// thugs rje zhi ba'i phyir yang dgod par bya// thugs rjes de la mchod rten bzhengs pa ni// rgyu yi mchod rten
118a6(1): 'bras bu'i mchod rten no// rgyu dang 'bras bu 'brel bar snang bas mchod rten rang bzhin yin// shar du zhi ba'i rdo rje rigs kyi mchod rten bzhengs par bya// mchod rten zlum po rdo rje brtsegs pa'i ka ba
118b1(1): can// 'khor lo dang ldan rin chen lngas spras nas// 'khor lo dang ni gdug can dang // byu ru dang ni skyabs mdzad pa// dar dpyangs dang ni rin chen 'phreng // mi 'gyur lcags thag bzhi la'o// rin chen rigs
118b2(1): kyi zhing khams su// rin chen mchod rten sngon po la// gru bzhi pa la rin chen brtsegs// ka ba rin po che dang ldan// sgo ni rin chen nor bu'i dbyibs// nub phyogs pad+ma brtsegs pa'i mchod rten la// pad+ma stong
118b3(1): dang ldan par bya// zhabs ni zla gam tshul du gnas// rdo rje ka ba rin chen sgo// dmar po rgyan dang ldan pa'o// byang phyogs las kyi rigs kyi mchod rten te// ljang gu gru gsum 'bur dang bcas// rgya gram
118b4(1): brtsegs pa'i tshul du gnas// rin chen sna lnga'i rgyan dang ka bas mtshan// dbus su gser gyi mchod rten bkra shis sgo mang la// 'khor lo 'bar ba rdo rjes spras// snyan pa'i sgra sgrogs dril bu dang // byu ru dang ni
118b5(1): ye shes dang // 'khor lo thugs dam mchod rten te// 'khor lo mi 'gyur chos sgra bskor// dar dpyangs g.yas dang g.yon du ste// g.yas pa chos sku 'gyur ba med// g.yon pa shes bya thogs pa med// de ltar
118b6(1): mchod pa'i rten bzhengs pa// de la mchod pa rnams kyis ni// shar phyogs byams pa brtsegs pa'i mchod rten dang // snying rje rin chen brtsegs pa'i mchod rten dang // dga' ba pad+ma brtsegs pa'i mchod rten
119a1(1): dang // btang snyoms don kun 'grub pa'i mchod rten ni// phyi yi tshad med mchod rten yin// mchod rten rgyu ni chos kyi dbyings nyid de// byin gyis brlabs dang ldan par bya// sa gzhi chos kyi
119a2(1): dbyings su brlab// khri 'phang dge ba bcu dang ldan par byin gyis brlab// bang rim bzhi ni dran pa nyer gzhag bzhi// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi/ dbang po lnga/ bum gdan stobs lnga
119a3(1): dang / bum pa ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun/ bre ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang / de la sogs pa bskyed pa'o// yid kyi mchod rten ting 'dzin sku// nam mkha'i dbyings dang rgya mtsho 'jing dag
119a4(1): na// byang chub sems kyi mchod rten bris// de la ting 'dzin yid kyi mchod pas mchod// yang na mchod pa'i rten bshad pa// khri 'phang ye shes bzhi ru ste// gyen du khri 'phang rnam thar gsum// chags med pad+ma'i
119a5(1): gdan steng du// bum pa zlum po chos kyi rtse// gser gyi bre phul 'od zer 'phro// srog shing drang srong bla na med// dag pa rnam lnga'i mchod pas mchod// rang byung grub pa'i mchod rten brgyad la// byams ldan gter
119a6(1): gyi mchod rten dang // thar legs yongs rdzogs mchod rten dang // sprul pa'i mchod rten dam pa dang // yid bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i mchod rten dang // dpe med bsam las 'das pa'i mchod rten dang // yon
119b1(1): tan brtsegs pa'i mchod rten dang // rmad grags chos nyid mchod rten dang // khams gsum bde rgyas sgron ma'i mchod rten no// de ni rang byung mchod rten brgyad// sprul pa'i mchod rten yang na bshad// grangs
119b2(1): dang dpag las 'das pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i zhing khams na// sku yi mchod rten bsam las 'das// ting 'dzin brtan pa'i mchod pas mchod// rnam par dag pa'i zhing khams nas// shes rab spyan dang rdzu
119b3(1): 'phrul snyan// sku yi sangs rgyas kun gyis bskor// rnam par dag pa'i zhing khams na// gsung gi mchod rten bsam las 'das// gsung gi mchod rten thams cad kyang // tshangs pa'i sgra skad phun sum
119b4(1): tshogs// 'gro ba drug la gsal mdzad pa// sgra dang dbyangs dang sde yis mchod// rnam par dag pa'i zhing khams na// thugs kyi mchod rten bsam las 'das// mkhyen pa'i ye shes gsal ba yis// ma rig mun
119b5(1): pa sel bar mdzad// dmigs pa med pa'i mchod pas mchod// de ltar dbye dang bya ba ste// bskyed dang spyan drang bstim pa dang // phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod pa 'bul// bstod de 'dod yon gsol ba'o// zhes
119b6(1): gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ mchod rten gyi dbye ba bstan pa dang ngo bo bstan pa'i le'u ste brgya dang so gcig pa'o// // de nas yang ni las gsungs pa// mchod rten gzhal yas bskyed pa
120a1(1): dang // lha rnams bskyed pa bstan pa yin// rdo rje rigs kyi mchod rten du// khog par gzhal yas bsgom par bya// tshom bu lnga yi gzhal yas la// rin chen dra bas brgyan pa dang // rdo rje ka bas
120a2(1): mtshan pa'o// ka ba gdung dang bre phul re mig brgyan// 'khor lo rin chen 'od 'bar ba'o// dbus su rdo rje sems dpa' yin// tha ma rigs bzhi'i sangs rgyas yin// de la rang rang sems dpar ldan// de la
120a3(1): mchod dang las bya'o// rigs dang mthun pa'i mchod pa'o// rin chen rigs kyi mchod rten du// ka gdung bre phul re mig bzhi// tshom bu lnga yi dkyil 'khor la// dbus su rin chen 'byung ldan la// rigs bzhi
120a4(1): sangs rgyas dag gis bskor// sems dpa' sems ma 'khor dang bcas// de la rigs mthun mchod pas mchod// pad+ma brtsegs pa'i mchod rten la// tshom bu lnga yi dkyil 'khor yin// dbus su snang ba mtha'
120a5(1): yas la// phyogs bzhi rigs bzhi sangs rgyas yin// rang rang sems dpas bskor ba'o// byang phyogs las kyi rigs kyi mchod rten du// tshom bu lnga yi dkyil 'khor la// dbus su don yod grub pa yin// tha ma
120a6(1): rigs bzhi sangs rgyas te// rang rang sems dpa' dag dang ldan// de ltar rigs kyi mchod pas mchod// sngags dang phyag rgya gong bzhin no// sku yi mchod rten chen po ni// dbus su rnam par snang mdzad
120b1(1): la// sems dpa' sems mas bskor ba'o// gsung gi mchod rten chen po ni// dbus su snang ba mtha' yas la// sems dpa' sems mas bskor ba'o// thugs kyi mchod rten chen po ni// dbus su rdo rje sems
120b2(1): dpa' la// sems dpa' sems mas bskor ba'o// de la mchod dang 'dod don gsol// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+na las/ mchod rten lha bskyed pa'i le'u ste brgya dang so gnyis
120b3(1): pa'o// // de nas tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa// gnyis med dag pa'i zhing khams nas// rang byung mchod rten chen po brgyad// 'gro ba'i don du spyan drangs te// gzugs brnyan mchod rten dam pa la// byin gyis brlabs
120b4(1): shing gshegs su gsol// gsal la dag pa'i gnas mchog nas// sprul pa'i mchod rten brgyad po yang // 'gro ba'i don du spyan drangs te// gzugs brnyan mchod rten dam pa la// byin gyis brlabs shing gshegs su gsol// rnam
120b5(1): par dag pa'i zhing khams nas// sku'i mchod rten bsam las 'das// shes rab rtsal dang rdzu 'phrul ldan// sku yi sangs rgyas kun gyis bskor// 'gro ba'i don du spyan drangs te// gzugs brnyan mchod rten dam pa la// byin gyis
120b6(1): brlabs shing gshegs su gsol// rnam par dag pa'i zhing khams nas// gsung gi mchod rten bsam las 'das// sgra dang dbyangs dang sde yi sde// mkhyen pa'i ye shes gsal ba yis// ma rig mun pa kun sel ba//
121a1(1): dmigs pa med pa'i ting 'dzin bsgom// 'gro ba'i don du spyan drangs te// gzugs brnyan mchod rten dam pa la// byin gyis brlabs shing gshegs su gsol// rnam par dag pa'i zhing khams
121a2(1): nas// thugs kyi mchod rten bsam las 'das// mkhyen pa'i ye shes gsal ba yis// ma rig mun pa sel mdzad pa// dmigs pa med pa'i ting 'dzin bsgom// 'gro ba'i don du spyan drangs nas// gzugs
121a3(1): brnyan mchod rten dam pa la// byin gyis rlob cing gshegs su gsol// yid kyi mchod rten ting 'dzin sku// nam mkha'i dbyings dang rgya mtsho'i 'jing // byang chub sems kyi mchod rten gri// ma lus bzhugs
121a4(1): pa thams cad kyang // ting 'dzin gsal ba'i byin rlabs kyis// 'gro ba'i don la gshegs nas kyang // gzugs brnyan mchod rten dam pa la// byin gyis rlob cing gshegs su gsol// rigs kyi mchod rten
121a5(1): chen po lnga// rang byung rten pa'i gnas yin te// 'gro ba'i don du spyan drangs nas// gzugs brnyan mchod rten dam pa la// byin gyis rlob cing gshegs su gsol// yang dag don du dag mod kyang // 'gro ba
121a6(1): rnams kyi don slad du// phyag dang zhabs gnyis bsil nas kyang // rdo rje'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol// oM a ha ra a ha ra sarba bi ta ra su tsi te ga ga na sa ma ye swA ha/ d+hu pe puSh+pe A lo ke/ gan d+he/ de ltar
121b1(1): mchod dang bstod pa bya// sngags kyi rim pa bzla bar bya// phyag rgya yang ni de bzhin gshegs// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+ta las/ mchod pa'i rten spyan drangs pa'i le'u ste brgya dang so gsum
121b2(1): pa'o// // de nas gzungs sngags 'thon pa ste// na maHsa man+ta/ bud d+hA nA na/ gar+b+he d+ha ra ma d+hA tu swA hA/ sa gzhi chos kyi dbyings su byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags so// lag pa thal mo khong stong sbyar// sngags
121b3(1): pa'i phyag rgya de yis ni// byin gyis brlab par bya ba'o// lag pa thal mo khong stong sbyar// sor mo rnams ni phyir bkyed de// pad+ma'i phyag rgya 'dra bar bya// na maHsa man+ta shu n+yA ta dz+nyA na swA hA/ rmad khri byin gyis brlab
121b4(1): pa'o// lag pa thal mo sbyar ba phyir bkyed de// mthe'u chung gnyis ni nang du bkug/ mthe bong gnyis kyi rtse mo ru// mdzub mo gnyis ni bkug la sbyar// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+ha nA na ta thA ga ta smi ti swA hA/ hri ba a bud
121b5(1): ga ga na sa ma ya swA hA/ dran pa nyer bar gzhag pa'i phyag rgya yin// lag pa khong stong thal mo sbyar// mdzub mo gnyis bsgreng tshogs ni gsum pa dgug/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA na na/ a ti su ga ta sa man+ta pra ti bi shud+d+he
121b6(1): swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa so so yang dag pa rig pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya ste/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga'i rang bzhin no// bum rten stobs lnga dang / bum pa
122a1(1): byang chub yan lag bdun dang / 'khor lo de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i thun mong ma yin pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / de la sogs pa 'bras bu'i
122a2(1): chos nyid dbyings su byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya ni/ stobs bcu'i sngags dang phyag rgyar 'dus te/ lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar te/ mthe bong gnyis dang mthe chung gnyis nang du bcug la/
122a3(1): gcig dang sbrang la 'di ni stobs bcu'i phyag rgya ste/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA na na da sha pa la ka ta ra sa hUM sa dza swA hA/ tog dkar byin gyis brlab pa ni/ lag gnyis khu tshur bcangs pa la// gung mo gnyis bsgrengs te/
122a4(1): tshigs dbus mar dgug/ mthe bong gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis so sor bsgrengs te/ rdo rje rtse lnga par byas la/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA na d+harma ka ya swA hA/ dar dpyangs mnyam pa nyid du byin gyis brlab pa ni/ lag
122a5(1): gnyis thal mo khong stong sbyar// mdzub mo gnyis dgug mthe bong nang du bzung / srin lag gnyis kyang mthe bong bar du mdzub mo btegs pa'i bar du bzung / na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA na/ sarba d+harma sa man+ta pra ba ta thA
122a6(1): ga ta ma nu ga ta swA ha/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs par byed pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// de ltar gsal bar byas pa dang // dbang bskur spyan drangs zhal sro dang // lha yi spyan ni dbye bya'o// bskor ba
122b1(1): bya dang sgra snyan bsgrag/ dar gyi lda ldi phyang 'phrul gdags// zhes gsungs so// rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ sngags dang phyag rgya'i le'u ste brgya dang so bzhi pa'o// // de nas yang phyag na rdo rje rang gi stan
122b2(1): las langs te/ dbang chen 'dus pa'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// sems can tshe yi dus byas nas// ngan song gnas su 'khyam pa la// de la drang zabs ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad
122b3(1): du gsol// zhes gsol pas/ dbang chen kun 'dus bka' stsal pa// sems can las kyi 'khyams pa de// 'khor ba ngan song gnas nas drang ba ni// thabs dang shes rab ldan pas drangs// nyon cig rdo rje
122b4(1): sems dpa' che// sems can tshe yi dus byas te// ngan song 'khor ba'i gting na ni// rtog pa'i dra bas bcings nas 'khor ba'i snyi yis bzung // tshul bzhin chos nyid ngang du bsgral dgos pas// de nas sems
122b5(1): can byin brlab ste// gnyen po rang las byung ba yin// mig la yi ge raM dgod pas// ye shes me yi dkyil 'khor gyur// ye shes me dang byang chub sems kyis mes// sems can mtshan ma'i bag chags bsreg
122b6(1): par mdzad// sna[:]las rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyur// bdag gi ting 'dzin ye shes rlung // skye mched chos kyi rlung gis ni// 'gag med de dag stong par bsgom// lce stengs kha nas chu'i
123a1(1): dal byung // ting 'dzin ye shes chu bo dang // byang chub sems kyi chu bo yis// bag chags de dag bkrus par bsgom// de nas b+h+rUM zhes rab brjod pas// sems can phung po rin po che'i// gzhal
123a2(1): yas khang du gyur pa'o// gzhal yas khang ni de nang du// ting hUM zhes ni brjod pa yis// sems can ti yig dud kar 'dug/ thugs rje ti yig dud kas sbyangs// dud ka'i ti nyid yi ge hUM du gyur// de las dpa'
123a3(1): bopo 'bru lnga byung // spyi bo'i gtsug tu oM yin te// lce la yi ge aM gis mtshan// snying gar hUM ni dgod pa ste// lte bar yi ge swA yin no// rkang pa'i mthil du ha ljang bsgom// swA hAs bsdus pa yin pa'o// swA hUM hUM hUM
123a4(1): oM aM/ tshig bshad 'di yis bag chags sbyang // oM las ye shes nam mkhar gyur// khyod kyi bag chags des sbyang ngo // oM las ye shes chu sbyar bas// khyod kyi bag chags des bkru'o// hUM las ye shes sa byung
123a5(1): bas// khyod kyis lnga phung des brtan no// sna las ye shes me byung bas// khyod kyi bag chags des bsreg go/ ha las ye shes rlung byung bas// khyod kyi sgrib pa des bsal lo// rkang mthil yi ge ha bsgom
123a6(1): pas// don yod grub pa yab yum bskyed// phyag rgya chen po bzhi dang ldan// phyag rgya chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// phrag dog rigs kyi sgo bcad do// mi rnams kun gyi gnas stongs so// las kyi rigs kyi thugs
123b1(1): dam skong // don yod gnas su sba ra na phaT// lte bar yi ge sra bsgom pas// rin chen 'byung gnas yab yum bskyed// phyag rgya chen po bzhi dang ldan// phyag rgya chen po'i byin brlabs kyis// nga rgyal rigs kyis
123b2(1): sgo bcad pas// lha ma yin gyi gnas kyang stongs// rin chen rigs kyi thugs dam skong // 'byung ldan gnas su swa s+pha ra na phaT// snying gar yi ge hUM bsgom pas// rdo rje sems dpa' yab yum bskyed// phyag rgya
123b3(1): chen po bzhi dang ldan// phyag rgya chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// zhe sdang rigs kyi sgo bcad nas// dmyal ba rnams kyi gnas stongs so// rdo rje rigs kyi thugs dam skong // sems dpa'i gnas su s+pha ra na phaT// lce
123b4(1): steng yi ge oM bsgom pas// snang ba mtha' yas yab yum bskyed// phyag rgya chen po bzhi dang ldan// phyag rgya chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// 'dod chags rigs kyi sgo bcad pas// yi dwags rnams kyi gnas stongs
123b5(1): so// pad+ma rigs kyi thugs dam skong // mtha' yas gnas su s+pha ra na phaT/ spyi bor yi ge oM bsgom pas// rnam par snang mdzad yab yum bskyed// phyag rgya chen po bzhi dang ldan// phyag rgya chen po'i byin rlabs
123b6(1): kyis// gti mug rigs kyi sgo bcad pas// byol song rnams kyi gnas stongs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs dam skong // snang mdzad gnas su sgra ra na phaT// de skad brjod pa'i sgo nas ni// tshon gyi gru gu
124a1(1): bsgongs pa bzhin// chos kyi sku ru gyur pa'o// de nas phung po sbyang ba dang // rnam shes tshogs brgyad sbyang ba yi// don gyi 'di rnams brjod par gsungs// hUM sems can chen po khyod nyon
124a2(1): cig/ khyod kyi lnga phung yan lag ni// gzugs kyi phung po snang mdzad do// tshor ba rin chen 'byung ldan te// 'du shes snang ba mtha' yas yin// 'du byed don yod grub pa la// rnam shes rdo rje sems dpa'
124a3(1): yin// phung po lnga yang mngon sangs rgyas// snyigs ma lnga yang bde ldan gnas// shi ba bya ba ming yang med// mi 'gyur brtan nas gser bzhin no// sems can chen po khyod nyon cig/ khyod kyi gzugs kyi yan
124a4(1): lag la// 'byung ba chen po lnga gnas te// khyod kyi sha ni sa yin te// sa ni yum chen sangs rgyas spyan// khyod kyi drod ni me yin te// me ni yum chen gos dkar mo// khyod kyi khrag ni chu yin te// chu ni yum chen mA ma
124a5(1): ki/ khyod kyi dbugs ni rlung yin te// rlung ni yum chen dam tshig sgrol// khyod kyi sems ni nam mkha' yin// nam mkha' kun tu bzang mo yin// 'byung ba lnga yang mngon sangs rgyas// snyigs ma lnga yang bde ldan
124a6(1): gnas// shi ba bya ba'i ming yang med// mi 'gyur brtan pas gser bzhin no// sems can chen po khyod nyon cig/ khyod kyi rnam shes tshogs brgyad la// byang chub sems dpa' brgyad dgod do// rna ba phyag na rdo
124b1(1): rje la/ mig ni sa yi snying po yin// sna ni nam mkha'i snying po yin// lce ni spyan ras gzigs dbang ste// mgrin pa 'jam dpal gzhon nu yin// nyon mongs yid ni sgrib sel yin// rnam shes yid ni byams pa
124b2(1): yin// kun gzhi kun tu bzang po yin// de yi yul brgyad lha mo brgyad// rnam shes brgyad kyang mngon sangs rgyas// shi ba bya ba ming yang med// mi 'gyur brtan pas gser bzhin no// sems can chen po khyod
124b3(1): nyon cig/ khyod kyi yan lag sgo bzhi ni// khro bo chen po bzhi yin te// lag pa g.yas pa stobs po che// lag pa g.yon pa gshin rje gshed// rkang pa g.yas pa rta mchog dpal// rkang pa g.yon pa bdud rtsi
124b4(1): 'khyil// de yi yum bzhi khro mo bzhi// mi pham ma dang khro gnyer ma// ral gcig ma dang ro langs ma// yan lag bzhi yang mngon sangs rgyas// shi ba bya ba ming yang med// mi 'gyur brtan pas gser bzhin
124b5(1): no// de nas spyod pa'i skye 'gag dang // chos nyid rnam dag don gyi phyir// sems can thams cad bsad pa'i rgyu// ma skyes phyir yang bsad pa'o// sems can thams cad za ba'i rgyu// gdod nas snying po byang chub
124b6(1): lung // sems can thams cad gtub pa'i rgyu// skye med byang chub sems su bsdu// sems can thams cad bza' ba'i rgyu// gnyis med byang chub sems su bstim// tsit+ta sbubs nas rak+ta gzhibs// byang chub
125a1(1): sems kyi don dang ldan// rA ga chags pa'i rgyu ni khrag yin te// nyon mongs 'khor ba'i bag chags sbyang ba'o// ha ha zhes ni tsit+ta'i rak+ta gzhibs// ra ni me ste chags pa'i rgyu ni khrag yin
125a2(1): te// 'khor ba'i ra ba ma lus bsreg par bya'o// rak+ta chags pa'i rgyu ni khrag yin te// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho ma lus skem par bya'o// tsit+ta mthor to kha phye ste// snang gsal sdong bu gcig bsam mo// a dkar lta
125a3(1): bu'i byang chub sems// lus kyi sdong bur sems gnas te// dzaHhUM baM hoHthugs kar thim// rtse mo byung rgyal bde chen po// ljon shing dmar po thugs kar gnas// nyi ma stong zhes che snyam ste// de nas gzi mdangs
125a4(1): 'dus pa'i thig le che// rtag pa chen po dag la gang gnas pa// rtag pa chen po longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// thig le chen po kun nas thams cad gnas// mkhas pas btsal kyang rnyed par ga la gyur// mi 'gyur/
125a5(1): yum gyi gzhal yas su// skal ba ldan pa khyod nyid kyi// rgyal ba'i sras su bskyed par bya'o// pha ro la phyin pa bcu rdzogs shes rab dbyings kyi bzhu// dam tshig snying rjer 'brel ba'i shul phor zhing // dam
125a6(1): tshig rgyan gyi mchog la rin chen gser// ka la ping ka la yi rgyud phreng la// mtha' gnyis bral ba'i ye shes smyug ma la// thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba'i me la sros// nyon mongs dug gsum 'joms pa'i chu
125b1(1): phyung la// ye shes mkha' 'gro'i sgo bzhi de la bskyon// rno dpal ting 'dzin mde'u yin// sku gsung thugs kyi sprul pa yar gsum gyis// nga dang bdag tu 'dzin pa'i rtog pa bcom// sku las bskyed pa'i rgyal ba'i
125b2(1): sras su bsgom// mi 'gyur yum gyi mkha' dbyings rnam dag pas// rgyal ba'i sras su ma lus bskyed par bya'o// rgyal ba dgongs pa kun 'dus pa// dbang yang de nyid nyid du rdzogs// 'gro don thabs kyi bskul
125b3(1): ba'i mchog/ 'gro ba'i don la de bzhin gshegs// yang bzhu yang btul gser dpe bzhin// bzhu btul ting 'dzin rtsal yang sbyang // de la nyes pas gos mi 'gyur// chos nyid la yang chos nyid rol// dkyil

125b5(1): kun 'dus la// phyag na rdo rjes yang gsol pa// e ma ho dbang chen kun 'dus gtso// bdag la log par bdag tu 'dzin cing blta// de dag mnan nam dad gzhug na// las kyi rim pa ji ltar lags// kun
125b6(1): 'dus mchog gis bshad du gsol// zhes gsol to// dbang gi rgyal po des gsol ba'i don thugs su chud nas/ pad+ma'i rgyal po he ru kas/ gzigs thabs chen po nub tu mdzad// ye shes rgyu nyid dag pa
126a1(1): la// nga dang bdag tu rtog pa yis// khams gsum 'khor ba'i rgyu ru 'gyur// khams gsum 'di dag bsgral ba'i zhing // dbang du bsdu ba'i las mdzad do// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis
126a2(1): rlobs// khams gsum ma lus bsgral ba'i zhing // ta na chen po bya ba'i phyir// bde gshegs mang po kun 'dus shing // byams dang snying rje ldan pa yis// nyon mongs 'khor ba'i rgya dral te// bdud dang gshin rje

126a4(1): ba kun bsdu ba'o// oM ma hA de ba ma traM ka ru dra/ ang+gu sha dza/ de ltar bkug pas ma dad ste// dam bdar legs pa nyes pa brjod// thar pa'i lam 'byed dkyil 'khor 'dir// brod pa can rnams 'ong ba
126a5(1): ltar// skal dang ldan pa rigs kyi bu// deng 'dir 'ongs pa legs te 'ong // oM badz+ra g+hu h+ye tri sh+ya sa ma ya s+t+waM/ de yis phyag rgya brda' yang bstan// shar phyogs lam sgo'i 'jig rten na// yang dag thar lam spyod pa
126a6(1): yi// 'byung po gtum po nga rgyal can// khyod ni sgrub pa kun la sgrib// yang dag shes rab ye shes kyi// rtsa khungs rtag chad bdag las byung // bdag 'dzin bdag tu rtog pa ni// bdag med stong pa'i tho bas

126b2(1): ra a ko Ta ya hUM phaT/ sarba pA sa ga ra he ru ga pra be sha ma tra da ka ru dra hUM phaT/ a kaR+ka ru dra hUM phaT/ kha traM kha ru dra hUM phaT/ oM tra sa tri mu tsa la/ ts+tshin da ts+tshi na da hUM phaT/ sarba su ka sarba karma sarba kle sha ts+tshin da ts+tshin da

127a1(1): mchog/ srid gsum mthar byed rngam pa des// kha T+wAM zod dbyug mi bzad pa// gshin rje bcom nas gsad par bya// ro yang 'dzam bu'i gling du bor// sa gzhi dur khrod brgyad po yis// bdag po
127a2(1): dregs pa bsnol ba yi// ro yi nyal thabs gan rkyal te// mgo ni lho nub mtshams su bstan// rkang pa byang shar thug pa med// de yang mkhrig gnyis bsnol ba'o// sbyang ki dang ni kang ka byang // lag pa g.yon
