179b6(1): bu ste/ ji lta bu'i ngo bor yang gdags su med do// de ltar na don dam pa byang chub kyi sems de yang / chos thams cad las kyang 'das la/ sgra bsam las kyang 'das so// de ltar sku'i ngang du brjod du med pa de
180a1(1): la mnal bzhin du/ thams cad kyi yum gzi ldan pad+ma can kun tu bzang mo zhes bya ba des/ stong pa nyid kyi ngang las glu 'dis bskul// oM snang stong stong pa rdo rje chos kyi sku// sgra bsam las 'das
180a2(1): don dam byang chub sems// stong nyid ngang las mi 'da'i dam tshig gis// snying rje nam mkha'i ngo bo bstan du gsol// de skad ces ni bskul ba dang // rkyen du gyur pas thugs chud nas// stong pa nyid kyi ting
180a3(1): 'dzin las// rig pa'i ye shes nyi lta bu'i// snying rje kun tu khyab gdal te// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor khyab par mdzad// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na// snod dang bcud du gyur pa la// snying rje chen pos kun
180a4(1): khyab mdzad// ri nyil snying rje byang chub sems kyis kyang // stong pa nyid kyi ngang las kun tu khyab par gnas// de tshe dbang mchog dam pa sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid des// ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas
180a5(1): kyang // snying rje 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin de la rab tu zhugs te/ kun tu snang bas khyab par mdzad pa ni// ting nge 'dzin de rtse gcig mthu yin no// gzi ldan pad+ma can des kun tu bzang mo'i glu 'di blangs// ma
180a6(1): ltar byams pa'i thugs rje yongs la khyab// mkha' ltar go 'byed cho 'phrul gnas pa la// longs spyod rdzogs sku thugs rje sprul pa'i sku// 'bar ba'i sku mchog bdag la bstan du gsol// a la la ho// de skad
180b1(1): ces ni gsol btab pas// dbang cho ga dam pa rdo rje'i sku des ni// chos rnams byang chub sems la shar bar mkhyen// mi dmigs nam mkha'i dbyings nas rdo rje'i sku mngon phyung // dper na nyi ma mkha' la sprin
180b2(1): med shar ba 'dra// rdo rje'i sku las 'od zer rnam par 'phro ba ni// nyi ma stong gi 'od zer dus gcig shar lta bu'i// dbang mchog dam pa rdo rje'i sku des ni// ting 'dzin de las langs nas kyang // 'dod chags rdo/
180b3(1): rje rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs so// gzi ldan pad+ma can la gzigs te 'dzum par mdzad// gzi ldan pad+ma can gyi 'gying tshul gyis// spyan gyi gzigs thabs zim bag tshul du dgongs// lan
180b4(1): grangs brgya stong phyag kyang 'tshal// g.yel ba slong ba'i glu 'dis rnam par bskul// bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen rdzogs pa'i sku// rdo rje gar gyi tshul gyis rol pa mdzad// dga' mchog rdo rje byang chub sems chen des// 'dzum
180b5(1): zhing 'khyil la pad+ma'i gnas su phob// ho dkar la 'tsher ba'i byang chub sems sprin de// dmar po dbang gi rang bzhin du// gnyis mnyam 'phros pa'i byin rlabs las// ye shes lha tshogs sbrul sku bsam yas 'thon// ma rig mun pas
180b6(1): mdongs pa'i don gyi phyir// dgon dung gnas nas byang chub myu gu bskyed// zhi ba 'gog pa'i sa las rnam par slongs// de skad ces ni glu blangs pas// gnyis med rol cing rnam par rol// brjid dang bcas pas gar mdzad
181a1(1): dang // 'dzum pa mdzad dang 'dor ba dang // bskum dang bsgyings dang spyan mdzes blta// smin ring bskyed cing 'gyur ba dang // rdo rje phur pas g.yan pa slong // 'dor zhing bskum dang 'jo sgeg
181a2(1): dang // rnam par rol pa'i gar gyis kyang // nam mkha'i khams kun khyab mdzad do// rnam par rol pa nges 'byung bas// byang chub sems ni zhi zhing 'khyil// rol pa'i char ni mngon phab pas// 'jig rten drug
181a3(1): gi phyogs bcu na// snod kyi khams dang bcud khams ni// ma lus gyur pa thams cad na// byang chub sems kyi rol pa las// sgeg dang 'khyud dang sdom pa dang // sbyor dang bstim dang mnyes pa dang // kun du
181a4(1): rab tu rgyas par byas// yang dag bde la rab gnas so// de tshe thugs mchog rnam dag las// mkha' klong rnam par dag pa nas// rig pa'i byang chub sems chen po// 'od zer 'byams klas shar ba de// gsung
181a5(1): gi yi ge 'khor lo'i tshogs// rgyun mi 'chad par rab snang ngo // yig 'bru de nyid phyag mtshan te// thugs kyi mtshan ma dam tshig rgya// gyur pas 'phros shing 'dus pa'i tshul// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po
181a6(1): ni// rgyal ba yab yum sems dpa' dang // sems ma rnams su 'khod pa dang // thub pa rnams dang 'joms pa'i tshogs// sku ru gsal bar gyur pa ni// rang rang dam tshig phyag rgya byas// dbang chen la ni mdun
181b1(1): gyis bltas// rdo rje rol pa'i gral du 'khod// de dag re re la yang sangs rgyas 'khor// sangs rgyas zhabs 'bring dang bcas pa// 'byams klas nam mkha'i mtha' mnyam pa// lhun gyis grub pa rab snang
181b2(1): ngo // yang dag 'od zer re re las// he ru ka ni mang po'i tshogs// shar ro rab tu snang shar ro// he ru ka ni re re las// sangs rgyas 'bum phrag so so'i 'khor// zhabs 'bring dang bcas lhun gyis grub// he ru
181b3(1): ka yi tshogs dag las// rig pa'i nyi ma'i char babs te// mun nag klong kun gsal bar mdzad// chos kyi glu dang gar mdzad cing // chos kyi char 'bebs mchod pa che// mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che// chos
181b4(1): kyi mchod pa rmad du byung // 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na// rol pa'i cho 'phrul ling long phyed// de tshe sangs rgyas mang po'i tshogs// he ru ka yi 'od phreng des// bdud dang rU tra srin po dang // gnod sbyin dang
181b5(1): ni dbang phyug dang // dbang phyug nyi shu rtsa brgyad sogs// rang rang nga rgyal mthu ston pa// zhi zhing rab tu dul bar 'gyur// rang rang dag gi dbang phrogs nas// sangs rgyas bstan la dad gyur te// 'dus so kun
181b6(1): tu rab tu 'dus// de yi byang chub sems chen po'i// 'od zer kun tu khyab de la// 'du shes med dang 'gog gnas pa'i// mur stug sa bon mes tshig 'drar// dri ma med pa'i byang chub sems// rin chen chu des
182a1(1): dbang bskur bas// byang chub sems la dbang thob ste// 'gro ba'i don byed nus par gyur// sa dang sa yi khyad par gnas pa rnams// sa la skyo sems rab skyes pa// las kyi tshe bka' byang chub
182a2(1): sems// sangs rgyas bstan pa 'di nyid 'dod// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams// e ma'o ngo mtshar rab tu che// skrag cing rab tu dngangs gyur nas// shin tu skrag ste gsol btab pa// e ma'o e ma'o/
182a3(1): ya mtshan che// bcom ldan 'das pa ya mtshan che// gnyis med rol pa ya mtshan che// bdag cag 'khor tshogs 'dus pa rnams// dri med dag pa ya mtshan che// 'od zer 'phro 'du ya mtshan che// byang chub sprin
182a4(1): yang ya mtshan che/ bkag kyang // sangs rgyas 'byung ba ya mtshan che// sprul pa 'byung ba ya mtshan che// khro bo 'byung ba ya mtshan che// byin rlabs cho 'phrul ya mtshan che// dgon dung spangs pa ya mtshan che// 'gog pa
182a5(1): gso ba ya mtshan che// bdag cag 'khor tshogs 'dus pa rnams// dam tshig can du byin rlabs mdzod// bla 'og rim pa ji bzhin du// rdo rje rol pa'i tshig tu 'khod// de skad ces gsol ba btab pas// bcom
182a6(1): ldan 'das dbang mchog dam pa chags pa chen po rdo rje'i sku des/ sku gsung thugs gnyis su med pa'i sgo nas/ 'khor rnam par sbyong ba rdo rje'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin
182b1(1): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku mi zad brgyan gyi 'khor lo mthar phyin pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / gsung mi zad pa rgyan yi 'khor lo mthar phyin pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / thugs mi zad
182b2(1): pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo mthar phyin pa phyag na rdo rjes bskul ba rig nas/ btsun mo kun tu bzang mo gzi ldan pad+ma can dang sbyor zhing / tshig chad dam/ rang gi stan las rab tu langs te/ byang chub sems kyi mtshan ma
182b3(1): gnas lngar btags pas/ lce pad+ma'i steng du las kyi rdo rje bzhag ste/ brkyang phyag 'tshal nas/ seng ge'i lta stangs kyis ston pa'i zhal du bltas nas/ don bsdus par gsol ba btab pa/ rnal 'byor dbang phyug
182b4(1): chen po yab yum dgongs su gsol/ 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs ma lus dgongs su gsol// dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+ta 'di// chos kyi rgyal pos bshad du gsol// zhes gsol ba btab pas/ sku
182b5(1): gsung thugs kyi sangs rgyas de gsum/ sku rdo rje'i bka'/ gsung pad+ma'i bka'/ thugs rin po che'i bka'// kal par byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir/ thugs gsang ba'i mkha' la/ byang chub kyi sems spros pas/
182b6(1): 'khor lo dang / pad+ma dang / rdo rje lag tu lhan gyis bzhag ste/ dbang bskur bas ming yang 'gro ba kun gyi dpal du gyur pas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur par btags/ snying rje phyogs ris med pas/ spyan
183a1(1): ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug btags/ gsang sngags kyi mdzod du gyur pas/ gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjer btags te/ sku gsung thugs kyi dbang thob par 'gyur ro// smra ba'i seng ge'i sgra
183a2(1): ba'i seng ge zhes ming btags te/ chos kyi smra ba'i dbang thob bo// de nas las kyi 'khor lo bcu gnyis yod pas/ 'khor rnams snod du rung bar byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir// chos kyi 'khor lo bcu gnyis rab tu
183a3(1): bskor te/ cho 'phrul 'di dag rnam par bstan te/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ 'gul rab tu 'gul/ ldeg rab tu ldeg/ 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/ 'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur/
183a4(1): kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur/ chem chem rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem mo// de nas byang chub sems kyi mtshan ma yis// 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs gnas lngar reg par byas/ hUM badz+ra sa ma ya gu h+ya sa ma ya/
183a5(1): kro d+ha sa ma ya/ rdo rje rol pa bsdus pa yis// 'dus pa chen po'i 'khor tshogs rnams// gong 'og rim pa ji bzhin du// rdo rje gsang ba'i gral du gnos// skal bzang dam tshig chen po ste// de las 'das nas
183a6(1): brlag par 'gyur// de skad ces ni bka' bsgo bas// 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams sems rang byas// dam tshig thob nas gral 'khod do// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po ni// dbang thob las mdzod chen po
183b1(1): des// bcom ldan 'das la gtsug gi phyag/ rnal 'byor lugs su byas nas ni// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod// mnyes nas gsol ba rab tu btab// 'di ltar rmad byung ngo mtshar che// sangs rgyas
183b2(1): rnams kyi dbang phyug che// mngon spyod ya mtshan ston par spyod// bka' yi 'khor lo dam pa de// sgra brjod yul las rab 'das kyang // ngag gi lam nas rab 'don cing // dpes mtshon tshig gi lde mig
183b3(1): gis// yi ge ming dang tshig tshogs kyis// gsal bar mtshon te go bar mdzod// a la la ho go bar mdzod// ston pa dbang phyug dam pa des// gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas kyang // brjod du med pa'i ting
183b4(1): 'dzin la// snyoms par zhugs nas mi gsung bzhugs// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs kyis// smra ba'i seng ge chen po la// logs su btud nas phyag 'tshal nas// rmad byung mchod pa sna tshogs byas// gsol
183b5(1): btab smra ba'i seng ge khyod// bdag cag zhu'o gnang skabs phyes// smra ba'i seng ge gsang bdag gis// 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs khyod nyon cig/ bdag la zhus shig spobs par byos// 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs
183b6(1): rnams kyis kyang // smra ba'i seng ge gsang bdag khyod// sangs rgyas rnams kyi yab kyang lags// byang chub sems dpa'i rje btsan lags// chos rnams thams cad mdzod lags na// bcom ldan gsang mchog
184a1(1): dam pa des// gsang sngags lam rnams mi ston pa// rgyu dang rkyen ni gang lags pa// bdag cag rnams la bstan du gsol// legs par tshig tu bstan du gsol// smra ba'i seng ges bka' stsal
184a2(1): pa// oM AHhUM a la la ho// sangs rgyas rnams ni cang mi gsung // ma gsungs pa nyid rgya cher bshad// bshad du med pa'i don de ni// rgyal ba rnams kyis ma bshad de// da ltar ston pa rgyal mchog kyang // rnal
184a3(1): 'byor brjod par mi mdzad de// bka' mi stsal bar dgongs pa'o// 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams nyon cig/ byang chub dam pa'i snying po ni// smra bsam las 'das brjod med pas// tshig tu brjod pa legs
184a4(1): ma yin// tshig tu smra ba'i dus nyid ni// gol ba yin par bdag nyid ni// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshad// da ltar nyid kyang der dgongs pas// ma gsungs mi gsung gsung du med// de yang sems
184a5(1): dpa'i snying po ni// spros dang bral ba ma yin kyang // kun rdzob bden pa'i dbang tsam du// mtshan ma tshig gi rnal 'byor rnams// don dam rtogs dka' bkri ba'i phyir// rgyal bas tshig gi sgo gsungs
184a6(1): yin// 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs kyis zhus pa// smra ba'i seng ge de ltar na// bdag cag ma 'ongs rnal 'byor pa// tshig gi rjes 'breng don dang yang // gsang ba'i lam brjod gsal byed pa// smra ba'i seng ge chen
184b1(1): po khyod// dbang bskur bas na zhu bar spobs// bcom ldan dbang mchog dam pa la'ang // zhus shig smra ba'i seng ge khyod// smra ba'i seng ge gsang bdag gis// 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams rnam rtog mkhyen// bcom
184b2(1): ldan dbang mchog dam pa la// phyag 'tshal rmad byung mchod pas mchod// rdo rje'i tshig tu 'di skad gsol// e ma'o ston pa ngo mtshar khyod// phyogs bcu sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// byang chub sems kyi mtshan
184b3(1): nyid ni// tshig tu brjod pa ma lags kyang // mtshan ma'i rjes 'brang rnal 'byor pa// don la rtsing zhing tshig la zhib// tshig gis bsam pa rang bya'i phyir// snying po byang chub don 'di la// dpes mtshon tshig gi lde
184b4(1): mig gis// gsang ba'i de nyid bstan du gsol// gsol ba btab pas gsang bdag po'i// zhus mkhyen 'dus pa'i 'khor gyis ni// sems kyi rtog pa mkhyen pa yang // ma 'ongs rnal 'byor rjes 'brang
184b5(1): ba// tshig la dka' ba thugs chud nas// ye shes lnga dang ldan pa'i dbu// kun tu zhal du rab gzigs te// ye shes rdo rje rtse lnga pa// yang nas yang du gsor byed cing // thams cad pad+mar gyur pa yi// rmad byung
184b6(1): chos kyi sgra chen bsgrags// oM AHhUM swA hA/ b+ho d+hi tsit+ta gu h+ya sa ma ya a/ 'di ni gsungs ma thag tu yang // sangs rgyas grags pa chen po yang // rab tu dngangs shing brgyal bar gyur// thams cad ma lus smos ci/
185a1(1): dgos// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces// bka' stsal rigs kyi bu rnams nyon// tshig brjod thams cad kun rdzob bden pa yin// ji srid brjod du med pa'i chos gang ni// de ni don dam
185a2(1): bden pa'o// tshig dang yi ge la 'das pa ni chos sku'o// tshig dang yi ge brjod du rung ba ni gzugs kyi sku'o// sngags kyi lta ba spyod pa de nyid yin// chos kyi sku gang yin pa de// sngags kyi blta bar shes par
185a3(1): bya// de nyid sgyu ma'i tshul du gnas pa dang // 'bras bu'i tshul du kun rdzob bden pa dang // gzugs kyi skur snang me long lta bu'i tshul// ji ltar spyad dang spyod du rung ba ni// spyod pa rnal 'byor can gyi lta ba'o// de
185a4(1): skad ces ni bka' stsal nas// a la la yi sgra brjod do// smra ba'i seng ges dri ba dris// de ltar lags na bcom ldan 'das// sngags kyi lta bar blo gnas gang // spyod pa 'ba' zhig blo gnas gang // dbang
185a5(1): mchog dam pas bka' stsal pa// smra ba'i seng ge gsang bdag khyod// 'di don zhu bar spobs pa legs// sngags kyi lta ba sangs rgyas kyis// mnyam pa'i don rtogs spyod yul yin// ci phyir zhe na kun rdzob
185a6(1): bden pa yin// bden pa gnyis su dbyer med phyir// kun rdzob bden pa ga la yod// blta dang spyod la blo gnas shing // rnal 'byor sa thob sa gnyis yin// ci phyir zhe na rnal 'byor mnyam nyid de// bden pa
185b1(1): rnam gnyis tshul 'dod de// mi bskyed tshul du blor chud la// kun rdzob mtshan ma thabs kyis su// phyag rgya sgyu ma'i tshul du ni// med pa ma yin mtshan med pa'i// rnal 'byor gnyis dang ldan pa'i phyir// slob pa'i
185b2(1): rnal 'byor gnyis brten nas// lhun gyis grub pa'i sa goms pas// che chung gis ni grub pa yin// bstan pa bden pa gnyis la gnas// sgra yi rjes 'brang rnal 'byor ni// don la rang rgyud spyod la gnas// ci
185b3(1): phyir zhe na log pa yi// kun rdzob 'ba' zhig blo rtog gis// yang dag pa yi kun rdzob ni// lha yi dkyil 'khor mthong med phyir// smra ba'i seng ge de bas na// log pa'i kun rdzob so so'i skye bo yis// de lta bu yi/
185b4(1): chos la brten nas kyang // yang dag pa yi kun rdzob kyis// bden pa'i lha dang lha mo yi// chos rnams dkyil 'khor du shes bya'o// yang dag kun rdzob bden rtogs nas// don dam bden pa khong chud nas// de
185b5(1): ni rig pa'i skyes bur grags// smra ba'i seng ge de bas na// yang dag kun rdzob la brten nas// don dam bden pa rtogs par bya'o// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra
185b6(1): las// lha spyod rnam gnyis kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das snying po byang chub la dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// zhugs nas kyang
186a1(1): 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// chos rnams thams cad byang chub sems su 'dus// byang chub sems su snang bar shes par gyis// ci phyir zhe na chos rnams thams
186a2(1): cad ni// lus dang ngag dang sems su 'dus pas na// lus dang ngag dang sems nyid chos kyi rnam par snang // 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams kyis lus dang ngag dang sems dag ni bdag cag rnams kyi ci ltar
186a3(1): 'tshal bar bgyi// dbang mchog dam pas bka' stsal pa// lus dang ngag dang sems kyi mtshan nyid ni// sems kyang lus dang ngag gi rnam pa lta bu'o// ngag kyang lus dang sems kyi rnam pa lta bu'o// lus kyang
186a4(1): tshig brjod sems kyi rnam pa lta bu'o// rang rang lus dang ngag dang sems rtogs shig/ 'on tang byang chub sems yin bskyed par 'gyur// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la
186a5(1): snyoms par zhugs nas/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// e ma ho dngos po dang bral bas// phung po khams dang skye mched dang // gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spang // chos bdag med pa mnyam
186a6(1): nyid pas// rang sems gdod nas ma skyes pas// stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ye shes zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas//
186b1(1): byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// e ma'o ngo mtshar ya mtshan gyi// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba'i thugs// chos kun skye ba med pa la// skye ba 'di ni rab tu bsgrags// skye dang mi skye med pa ste// byang chub
186b2(1): tshul du bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang me long lta bur gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// e ma ho ngo mtshar ya mtshan gyi// sangs
186b3(1): rgyas kun gyi gsang ba'i thugs// chos kun 'gag pa med pa las// 'gag pa 'di ni rab tu bsgrags// 'gags dang mi 'gag med pa ste// byang chub la ni bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang chos
186b4(1): mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// e ma'o ngo mtshar ya mtshan gyi// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba'i thugs// chos kun gnas pa med pa
186b5(1): las// gnas pa 'di ni rab tu bsgrags// gnas dang mi gnas med pa ste// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang chos thams cad so sor kun tu rtog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
186b6(1): snyoms par zhugs nas/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// e ma'o ngo mtshar ya mtshan gyis// sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsang ba'i thugs// chos kun dmigs su med pa las// dmigs pa 'di ni rab tu
187a1(1): bsgrags// dmigs dang mi dmigs med pa ste// byang chub sems 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang chos thams cad bya ba nan tan du zhugs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
187a2(1): par zhugs nas/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// e ma'o ngo mtshar ya mtshan gyi// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba'i thugs// chos kun spros pa med pa las// spros dang bsdu bar rab tu bsgrags// spro bsdu
187a3(1): yod dang med pa ni// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas smra ba'i seng ge gsang ba'i bdag po des// a la la zhes sgra phyung ste// byang chub sems la bstod pa// e ma'o stong nyid byang chub
187a4(1): sems// e ma'o dag pa dri ma med// e ma'o mi sgrib gsal ba che// e ma'o mnyam nyid dbyer med chos// e ma'o so so rang rig sems// e ma'o byar med lhun gyis grub// byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal
187a5(1): lo// zhes bstod do// bcom ldan 'das kyang byang chub sems// byang chub nyid kyang thugs chud pa'o// bdag cag rig 'dzin tshogs pa rnams// byang chub sems la smon par 'tshal// 'jug dang ldang dang gnas
187a6(1): pa ste// rang rang sems ni g.yo bar bgyi// reg par bgyi zhing nye bar bgyi// nyams su myong bar 'tshal lags na// snying rje chen pos dgongs su gsol// bde bar gshegs pa dgongs su gsol// de skad
187b1(1): tshig tu gsol btab pas// bcom ldan snying pos 'di skad gsungs// e ma'o ye nas rnam dag chos// sna tshogs snang la rtog pa snang // ngo bo nyid ni brjod du med// snod ma yin la bstan par dka'o// e
187b2(1): ma'o// srid gsum ye nas rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin las// bdag tu rtogs pa'i srid rtse'i nyes dmigs kyis// yun ring dus nas 'khyams pa'i 'gro ba rnams// mi mthun bde sdug gnas rnams so sor
187b3(1): bzung // log rtog nor ba'i sems kyi kun rtog kyang // rang bzhin nyid las nyams pa rdul tsam med// ye nas don gyi sangs rgyas min mod kyang // rmongs pa'i dbang gis 'khor ba'i 'khor lor
187b4(1): 'khyams// log rtog nyid kyang dngos med byang chub sems// 'khrul 'khor nyid kyang mi zad rgyan du che// snyigs ma lnga nyid bde ldan gnas su gsal// phung po lnga nyid mngon par rdzogs pa'i sku// srid rtse'i nyes
187b5(1): dmigs byang chub snying por gsal// phyi nang snod bcud byang chub dang du gsal// zhes gsungs pas/ chos thams cad byang chub kyi ngang du gnas so// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po chen po dbang rgyas rta mchog
187b6(1): rol pa'i tan+ta las/ byang chub sems kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das snying po rdo rje rtse gcig pad+mar gnas pa des/ sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// dkyil 'khor 'byung bar
188a1(1): bzhad nas ni// shes rab thabs su rol pa mdzad// rdo rje rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// dkyil 'khor gyi ni don 'di gsungs// 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams nyon
188a2(1): cig/ gsang sngags byin rlabs bsam yas las// dkyil 'khor bsam yas brjod mi lang // mdor bsdus rnam pa gsum yin te// rang bzhin lhun grub dkyil 'khor dang // ting 'dzin gsal ba'i dkyil
188a3(1): 'khor dang // bkri drang rdul tshon dkyil 'khor dang // gsum po dag tu rgyal bas gsungs// zhes ched du gleng ngo // smra ba'i seng ge gsang bdag gis// bcom ldan 'das so bdag cag rnams// dkyil 'khor
188a4(1): gsum du mthong lags so// de nas 'di skad gsol ba btab// ye nas lhun gyis grub pa'i bdag/ dkyil 'khor kun gyi 'byung gnas gtso// rdo rje rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// chos kun ye nas sangs rgyas
188a5(1): pa'i// rang bzhin dag pa dri ma med// rang bzhin lhun grub bzang po'i don// bcom ldan snying pos bshad du gsol// a la la ho// pad+ma'i snying po bcom ldan 'das// rang bzhin don dam dkyil 'khor
188a6(1): ni// spros dang bral ba 'di gsungs so// e ma'o// sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub sems// bla na med pa rtogs gyur pa// rgyal bas gsungs pa'i ye shes gang // de ni dkyil 'khor snying po yin// zhes gsungs
188b1(1): so// yang ni 'di skad rab gsungs te// rang bzhin don dam dkyil 'khor 'di// lhun gyis grub pa bsdus te gsungs// sems can kun gyi sems chen po// rang bzhin dag pa dri ma med// phung po lnga don
188b2(1): sangs rgyas lnga// 'byung ba lnga don dbyings phyug yum// khams dang skye mched mang po kun// sems dpa' sems ma'i dkyil 'khor yin// de bas srid gsum dkyil 'khor che// rgyu dang 'bras bu'i gzugs
188b3(1): rnams kun// rnam par snang mdzad rang bzhin yin// tshor ba rin chen rang bzhin yin// 'du shes snang ba mtha' yas te// 'du byed don yod grub pa'o// rnam par shes pa rdo rje sems// sra bas sangs rgyas spyan
188b4(1): yin te// chu yi khams ni ma ma kI// me khams na bza' dkar mo ste// rlung khams dam tshig sgrol ma la// nam mkha' kun tu bzang mo'o// srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi// mig ni sa yi snying po la// rna ba
188b5(1): phyag na rdo rje'o// sna ni nam mkha'i snying po'o// lce ni spyan ras gzigs dbang yin// gzugs mdzes lA s+ye'i rang bzhin la// dri ru gyur pa mA lco'o// sgra yi tshogs ni nir ti'o// ro ru gyur pa gIrti yin// mig gi
188b6(1): dbang po gang yin pa// byams pa mai tri'i rang bzhin yin// rna ba'i dbang po sgrib pa sel// sna yi dbang po 'jam dpal nyid// lce yi dbang po kun tu bzang // rgyu dang 'bras bu rnam par dpyad// sngon 'das dus
189a1(1): su rnam par grags// sngon 'das dpyid ni spos me ma// da ltar dbyar ni me tog ma// 'byon ma rag ston A lo ke// ma 'ongs dgun ni gan+de yin// srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi// reg
189a2(1): shes gshin rje 'joms pa yin// reg bya rnam par rgyal ba ste// reg par byed pa rta mchog dpal// reg pa bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ste// gsum 'dus reg pa'i mtshan nyid yin// mi rtag pa dang stong pa
189a3(1): dang // gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam pa bzhi// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril// phyin ci ma log lha mo bzhi// bcom ldan snying pos rab tu gsungs// srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi// chos rnams kun
189a4(1): la nges rtogs pa// kun tu bzang po'i rang bzhin yin// 'dus byas ma byas chos rnams kun// yid kyi rnam shes yul yin pas// kun tu bzang mo yin par grags// de la sogs te mtha' yas mchog/ chos
189a5(1): dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha' dbyings kyi mtha' klas pas// ji snyed snang grag yod pa'i chos// kun kyang phyag rgya'i rang bzhin pas// rnam grangs yin par bde gshegs gsungs// zhes ched du
189a6(1): brjod pas ched du gleng ngo // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i snying pos/ rang bzhin kun rdzob kyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// kun nas mtshan ma'i gnas chen yang // 'og min bla med gnas mchog
189b1(1): gam// lcang lo can dang bde ba can// pad+ma can la sogs pa yi// rang bzhin lhun grub dkyil 'khor de// mtshan ma'i ngang rol rnal 'byor snang // de yang ji lta bu zhe na// mkha' 'am yid kyi nam mkha' la// bde
189b2(1): gshegs snying po hUM bsgoms te// 'byung chen brtsegs pa lhun gyis grub// dbus ni khams gsum dbang sdud pa'i// lhun gyis grub pa'i gzhal yas khang // thod rus par khyams nyi zlas brgyan// me ri'i bar
189b3(1): khyams byin rlabs che// sgo ni chu srin khar gyur pas// sgo gtan 'pho ba'i gzhal yas khang // rgyal chen ka bas rnam par mdzes// pho brang de yi rgyan mchog kyang // sgo bzhi sgo khyud rnams kyis brgyan// rta
189b4(1): babs brgyad dang yang dag ldan// dbus na rin chen khri rkang brgyan// de steng pad+ma mkha' stong ldan// lte bar bcas shing rtsibs bcu drug/ phyogs bcu 'od zer 'bar bas 'khrugs// nyi zla nor bu rin chen
189b5(1): 'bar// nor bu'i do shal rgyal mtshan dang // za ra tshags su rnam par gnas// bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' yas mchog/ ma btsal ye nas lhun gyis grub// rta babs rnams kyi tsong tsong la// gser gyi dril bu
189b6(1): 'bar ba dag/ dkon mchog gsum gyi mtshan yang brjod// rta mchog 'bar ba'i bsod nams kyis// rgyu las grub pa rgyal bas gsungs// gzhal yas de nang lhun grub pa'i// rin chen khri rkang phyogs bcur
190a1(1): 'od 'bar ba'i// brgyad du bstan pa he ru ka/ bsnyen bkur mchod phyir mnyes byed pa// gser gyi seng ge rgyan gsum pa// drug bzhi rtsa 'phags bzhi ste nyi shu brgyad// thugs rje che bas nyi shu
190a2(1): brgyad// 'jigs pa spangs pas seng ge nyi shu brgyad// sbrul sku mthon pas dbang mo nyi shu brgyad// kun tu 'od kyi sa la rab gnas pas// rin chen khri rkang 'degs pa'i stobs dang ldan// dgon gnas dben
190a3(1): gnas gzhan gyis mthong bar dka'// rang gab sbas pa chos nyid lung // lung gi sgra dbyangs thun mong ma yin pas// mngon du phyung ba'i thugs rje shar ba ni// khams gsum don mdzad ye shes rtsal dang
190a4(1): ldan// ma bdun tshogs pas nus mthur ldan// phrin las rnam thar brgyad kyi ka ba 'degs// rtsal gyi shugs dang rab ldan pas// rgya khyon kun shong yangs pa yin// rigs bzhi khrag 'thung he ru ka/ bzhugs
190a5(1): gnas mi 'gyur chos kyi sku// de ni kun tu 'od kyi lung // pad+ma le brgan phyogs bcur 'od// sangs rgyas thams cad skye bzhi'i tshul// chags par gyur pa med pas pad+ma ste// che ba'i yon tan ma lus lung du
190a6(1): ston// mkha' dbyings yang dag dri med pad+mar bstan// ma chags pad+ma can gyi lung // stong zhing gsal bas zhabs gang 'phags// nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor brtsegs pa ni// yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen
190b1(1): yang // thabs dang shes rab ye 'brel bas// spros med ngang gis zlum pa yin// ma skyes pa ni chos kyi lung // 'od chen gsal bar 'tsher bas na// yang gsang sbas pa ye shes lung // 'phro 'du khyad par gyur
190b2(1): pas sdug bsngal gsos su gyur// shes rab rigs kyi lha mo gsang ba'i yum du bstan// de steng rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po ni// yongs su mdzes pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan// rdo rje sems dpa' gnyen po rkyen dang
190b3(1): bral bas mi 'gyur chos kyi lung // gsang ba'i thugs kar sbas te bde chen dbyings nas rol pas bde ba longs spyod lung // dbu gsum zhabs gnyis brkyang bar mdzad pas thugs rje sprul pa'i lung // rigs
190b4(1): gnyis lung gi brgyud pas ting 'dzin rnam gnyis thabs kyi rgyud// de yang gtso dang gzungs su 'brel// sku mdog mthing ga rab tu bstan// mthing nag dkar dang dmar ba'i zhal// lha mchog de yi spyan snga
190b5(1): na// rnam par snang mdzad phyag rgya che// gser mdog lta bu rnam par dngas// rang rtags 'khor lo zur brgyad 'dzin// g.yas na rin chen 'byung ldan gtso// be DUr sngon po'i mdog 'dra la// rang rtags rin chen
190b6(1): zur brgyad 'dzin// rgyab phyogs snang ba mtha' yas gtso// pad+ma rA ga'i mdog 'dra la// rang rtags pad+ma 'dab brgyad 'dzin// g.yon du don yod grub pa ste// rin chen ma rgad mdog 'dra la// rang rtags ral
191a1(1): gri de bzhin no// kun kyang zhi ba'i cha lugs te// thor tshugs rigs lngas dbu la brgyan// rdzogs pa'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs// do shal dpung rgyan se mo de// phyag gdub snyan chas sku la
191a2(1): mdzes// mtshan dang dpe byad yang dag rdzogs// de dag gi ni g.yon phyogs na// kun tu bzang dang lo tsa na// mA ma gos dkar sgrol ma rnams// g.yas pa thabs kyi gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa rang rtags dril bu
191a3(1): 'dzin// cha lugs gzhan yang yang dang 'dra// phyi yi gong ra mdzes pa la// lag na rdo rje ldang skya rdo rje rtse gsum 'dzin// sa snying ldang sngon rin chen myu gu 'dzin// rgyab tu nam mkha'i snying po mthing nag ral gri
191a4(1): 'dzin// g.yon na spyan ras gzigs dbang dmar sku pad+ma 'dzin// thor tshugs ye shes sems dpas brgyan// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs// rgyan dang cha lugs kun gyis brgyan// de dag gi ni g.yon
191a5(1): la na// sgeg mo phreng dang dbyangs dang gar// g.yas pa thabs kyi gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa gar dang me long phreng // pi wang 'dzin cing cha lugs rgun// gtso bo nyid dang mthun pa'o// mdzes pa'i gru chad
191a6(1): rnams la ni// byams pa dkar po klu shing 'dzin// sgrib sel mthing nag 'khor lo 'dzin// 'jam dpal dmar skya ut+pal 'dzin// kun bzang ldang ser snye ma 'dzin// shar lho lho nub nub byang dang // byang shar
191b1(1): mtshams kyi gru chad la// 'khor bar 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis 'khod// de dag gi ni g.yon rol na// spos dang me tog mar me dri// g.yas pa thabs kyi gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa rang rtags 'dzin pa ste// cha
191b2(1): lugs gtso dang mthun par gnas// gshin rje mthing ga mi mgo gdengs// shar gyi sgor ni rnam par gnas// rnam rgyal ser nag rdo rje 'dzin// lho yi sgo ni rnam par gnas// rta mchog dmar nag thod sprul
191b3(1): bsnams// nub kyi sgor ni rnam par gnas// bdud rtsi ljang nag rgya gram 'dzin// byang gi sgor ni rnam par gnas// dur khrod rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// rnam par gtsigs pa 'jigs 'jigs lha// me dpung
191b4(1): 'bar ba'i klong dkyil du// hUM dang phaT kyi sgra cher sgrogs// 'joms ma bzhi yang sku la 'khril// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dang // dril bu thogs shing rab tu rngam// cha lugs 'joms pa dag dang
191b5(1): 'dra// sgo bzhi dag tu lhun gyis grub// zod rus par khyams mdzes pa la// sbrul sku thub pa chen po drug/ cis 'dul thabs kyi slar ston pas// cha lugs ma nges 'dul bar ston// mdzes pa'i bar khyams de
191b6(1): nyid la// mdud dang rgyab kyi phyogs rol du// byed pa po dang bya ba mo// ting nge 'dzin du ldan par gnas// de la sogs te mtha' yas mchog/ dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun gyis grub// lha yi tshogs mchog de
192a1(1): dag gi/ thugs kar ye shes sems dpa' gnas// tshon gang 'od dang bcas pa'o// ljags la rang rtags yi ge rnams// rang rtags phyag rgya'i steng du gsal// de lta'i sku mchog re re la// tshul
192a2(1): dgu dag tu ldan pa ste// mnyen dang lcug dang 'khril ba ste// ldem bag chags dang gzhon tshul dang // gsal dang 'tsher dang lhun sdug dang // gzi byin 'bar bar rab tu gnas// me ri bar khyams dmar nag
192a3(1): ni// lhun gyis grub pa'i phrin las mdzad// de lta'i rang bzhin dkyil 'khor la// phyi rabs sngags 'chang rnal 'byor pas// spyan drang mchod pa dbul bar bya// zhes gsungs pas/ chos thams cad rang bzhin
192a4(1): gyi dkyil 'khor du lhun gyis grub pa'o// lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rang rig pa'i yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / gsang sngags rgya mtsho thugs rje bsam gyis mi khyab
192a5(1): pa dang / sprul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na 'gro ba thams cad la chos ston pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang lhun gyis grub po// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog
192a6(1): rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ rang bzhin dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i snying por gnas pa des/ mi g.yo ba 'phro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ting nge 'dzin
192b1(1): gyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// chos rnams thams cad ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur ro// ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni ting nge 'dzin gyis ji ltar 'dod bzhin dbang bskur ro// gsang sngags rmad
192b2(1): byung rgyal po la// ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor bsam yas kyang // mdor bsdus rnam pa gsum yod de// bsgom pa ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor dang // bskyed dang lhag pa'i ting 'dzin no// thog mar rnal 'byor bdag
192b3(1): bsgoms te// dkyil 'khor yin par rgyal bas gsungs// de yang ji ltar bsgom zhe na// ting 'dzin la yang rnam pa gsum// de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin// stong pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin// gnyis pa kun snang
192b4(1): nam mkha' dang // snying rje'i yul gyis khyab pa'i phyir// mtshams sbyor chen po'i ting 'dzin bsgom// gsum pa rang gi sa bon te// rab tu drag po'i yi ge a// de las phra mo'i a 'phros 'dus// spros shing bsdus
192b5(1): kyang 'phel 'grib med// de las bdag nyid chen po ni// thams cad rdzogs par bskyed par bya'o// rgyas btab byin brlabs dbang bskur bas// rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor rab tu rdzogs// de bzhin nyid la gsal
192b6(1): bas na// bdag nyid chen po g.yon du ste// mkha' dbyings rdo rje pad+mar gnas// de ni bsgom pa'i dkyil 'khor yin// bskyed pa yi ni dkyil 'khor na// lha tshogs bdag gi sras su bskyed// de ni bskyed pa'i
193a1(1): dkyil 'khor yin// de bas ji ltar bskyed ce na// thog mar yab yum mkha' gsang gnyis// rdo rje pad+mar byin gyis brlabs// gnyis med 'khril bar dgyes pa las// b+ha ga'i dkyil du ling+ga
193a2(1): la// spros bsdus dbyings su 'khyil ba las// dbang chen sa bon 'bru lngar gyur// e yaM baM suM b+h+rUM/ e las nam mkha'/ yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor/ baM las rgya mtsho/ suM las gser gyi sa gzhi/ b+h+rUM las rin
193a3(1): po che'i gzhal yas khang / dbyibs dang kha dog bsam yas mchog/ 'khor lo gdan dang rol mo'i tshogs// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor dang 'dra ba'o// de ru lha tshogs bskyed pa ni// brtan 'byung nam mkha'i ye
193a4(1): shes a// 'phel med 'grub med gnas pa la// gnyis med dgyes pa'i 'phro 'du las// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'od du shar// ka kha ga g+ha nga / tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ ta tha da d+ha na/ Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la sha
193a5(1): Sha sa ha k+ShaH/ a i I/ u U/ e ai/ oM/ gsung gi dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis// spro bsdus gsal bar gyur pa las// thugs mtshan bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'bar// de las mngon rdzogs skur gsal ba// ta
193a6(1): la sogs pa'i yi ge lnga// phung po lnga yi sa bon yin// Tha la sogs pa 'byung ba lnga// bskyed pa'i sa bon yin par gsungs// ka sogs lnga ni rnam shes lnga// tsa sogs lnga ni dbang po lnga// pa sogs lnga ni skye mched
193b1(1): lnga// la sogs bzhi ni dus bzhir grags/ sha sogs bzhi ni 'joms ma bzhi// mi sogs drug ni thub pa drug/ k+Sha ni yid kyi rnam shes khams// a ni chos kyi khams su bshad// so so'i thugs mtshan gsal
193b2(1): bar las// sa bon rnams kyis mngon sum bskyed/ hUM badz+ra d+h+r-i kra/ oM dzi na dzi ka/ swa rat+na d+h+r-i kra/ AM A ro l-i ka/ ha pradz+nyA d+h+r-i kra/ mAM d+hA tI shwa ri/ lAM dwe Sha ra ti/ mAM mo ha ra ti/ pAM rA ga ra ti/ tAM badz+ra ra ti/ k+Shi hi ra dzA ya/
193b3(1): tAMtraM A gar+b+ha ya/ hrI pad+ma ba da ma/ dzi ku ru pA Na/ hUM la s+ye/ traM mA le/ hI gI ti/ aM nr-i ti/ me d+ha ra Ne swA hA/ b+hI nisma raM b+hA ya sA hA/ hUM sA rA dzA ya/ mAM shrI aM rA gA ya/ dzad+b+ha pa/ hUM puSh+pa/ baM di pa/ ho g+han+te/ hUM ya mAn ta
193b4(1): kr-ita phaT/ hUM pradz+nyA ta kr-ita phaT/ hUM pad+man+ta kr-ita phaT/ hUM big+h+nAM ta kr-ita phaT/ dza badz+ra kro d+hI/ hUM rat+na kro d+hi/ baM pad+ma kro d+hi/ ho karma kro d+hI/ hUM badz+ra tsit+ta/ a badz+ra tsit+ta/ mu ne kr-i/ mu ne truM/ mu ne sr-i/ mu ne sraM/ mu ne k+ShaM/ mu
193b5(1): ne ye/ de ltar so so'i snying po las// mngon rdzogs slar ni gsal ba dang / ye shes lnga yi dbang bskur te// sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlab// oM badz+ra ma hA shA n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM/ oM A daR+sha
193b6(1): dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM/ A~M sa man+ta dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+ha wa At+ma ko&haM/ oM mA ha pra ti pra t+ya be k+Sha Na dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM/ oM ma hA kri tu a nu ra dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+ha wa At+ma ko&haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya
194a1(1): badz+ra sa b+hA la any+dza kaH/ sarba ta thA ga tA la ka brda sa b+hA la/ ar+tha kaH/ sarba ta thA ga ta tsaHbadz+ra sa b+hA la sany+dza kaH/ ma sarba ta thA ga ta ya nu rA ga Na d+ha na brda prA b+hA la sad+g+ha kar+thaH/
194a2(1): sarba ta thA ta ga ta ma hA pU dza badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM// de ltar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// sku mdog phyag mtshan so so rnams// thor tshugs la sogs bzhugs tshul dang // rang bzhin kun rdzob bzhugs
194a3(1): tshul dang // bskyed pa'i dkyil 'khor ting 'dzin 'di// rnal 'byor rig pa'i rtsal yin te// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su bsam// yang na gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor la'o// lhag pa'i ting 'dzin dkyil
194a4(1): 'khor ni// yongs su bsgom par bya ba ni// de ltar gsal ba'i rnam pa kun// yum gyi mkha' la gsal bar bsgom// rnal 'byor rig pa'i khyad par yin// zhes gsungs pas// rol pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams
194a5(1): kyis/ chos thams cad ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur ba mthong ngo // rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor rim pa rnam par phye ba'i le'u ste lnga
194a6(1): pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i snying po des/ gzugs brnyan lta bu'i rnam par 'phro ba zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ las dang po'i rnal 'byor pa yid ches par bya ba'i phyir/
194b1(1): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rol pa 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams// chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bur shes// ci'i phyir zhe na de las ma 'das phyir// de bas gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor bshad par bya
194b2(1): yis nyon// 'di ni gzugs brnyan sgyu ma'i rnam grangs yin// ma rig rmongs pa'i 'gro rnams la// mtshon pas gsal ba'i don bstan phyir// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor bshad par bya// dar ram ras sam gro
194b3(1): ga la// kha dog lnga yi gzugs bris na// dngos grub rten du gyur bar bshad// ra'am ba so'i 'bur btod dang // rdo dang shing dang rtsig logs dang // gser dngul la sogs lugs blugs la// yan lag ma
194b4(1): nyams gzugs mdzes byas// dngos grub rten du gyur bar bshad// mnyen dang lcug dang smin pa dang // phyag rgya'i gzugs su legs byas na// de yang mtshan ma'i rten du 'gyur// sa stegs dkyil 'khor
194b5(1): dbyibs legs mdzes pa la// tshon rtsi lnga yis legs bris na// de yang dngos grub 'byung ba'i rten// re zhig las ni dang po pas// sa stegs dkyil 'khor bya bar shis// 'di ni gnas kyi mtshan nyid de// skyon
194b6(1): yon bye brag shes par bya// gangs ri brag dkar 'dab chen ni// zhi ba bsgrub pa'i gnas su shis// brag chen rdo rjes gtams pa ste// gcan gzan khro bo'i gnas skyi g.ya'// mngon spyod chen po bsgrub pa'i
195a1(1): gnas// dur khrod gnas dang ngam grog dang // sum mdo grong gling dbang sdud gnas// nags tshal mang po gtibs pa dang // shin tu btsan dang 'jigs pa'i dogs// 'dod pa bsgrub pa'i gnas
195a2(1): yin no// mtsho gling rgya mtsho ne'u seng can// las rnams kun la der shes so// gzhan yang spang bar bya ba ni// gshin rje'i mdung rtse srin mo ngus pa'i mchi ma dang // gnod sbyin sbar rjes 'byung po'i 'du sa
195a3(1): dang // gdug pa'i klu srin 'byung po rgyu ba'i lam// sbrul gdug 'ong sa kha na ma tho ba'i// nyen dang 'brel dang mdun sar mi 'gro'o// wa yi brtul zhugs chen po yis// lo yis bsring ste spang bar bya// de nas
195a4(1): bslang ba'i las rnams kyang // mngon dang mi mngon bdag po la// rtsod pa nye bar zhi ba'i phyir// ser sna spang ba'i las kyis ni// rin dang bden pas bsgos la bslang // de nas slob dpon bdag nyid
195a5(1): kyang // rdo rje dril bu rab ldan zhing // rtse gsum 'gros kyis kun tu bskor// khros pa'i hUM gis nga rgyal bya// dngos grub bar du gcod pa'i bgegs// dengs shig gces su bsgo nas kyang // khro bor byin brlab
195a6(1): gdab par bya// de nas dbang gyur lha mo ni// bskyed dang spyan drang gnyis med par// mchod bstod tshul bzhin byas nas ni// bdud btul mngon par rdzogs pa'i tshe// rA tra'i tshogs kyis rgol ba las// dge ba
195b1(1): las kyi 'go drangs te// spyan ldan de la dbang po bcol// mtshan mas mtshan ma gzhom pa'i phyir// sa yi ro lnga brtag par bya// dge ba'i rtags ni dngos grub myur// shis par ma gyur spo bar bya// yang na sbyin
195b2(1): sreg bya bar bstan// gnas der bsod nams gter ldan phyir// rin chen lnga dang sman lnga dang // spos lnga 'bru lnga snying po lnga// ga'u'i nang du blugs nas ni// sa gter sbas na bkra shis so// dag pa'i bdud rtsi
195b3(1): rnam lnga yis// rtsa brgyad stong la sbyar nas ni// gru bzhi dbyibs legs skyang nul bya// de nas dkyil 'khor lha tshogs kyi// sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyang bar bya// ting nge 'dzin gyis nges par sbyang // tshon thig rnam
195b4(1): pa lnga po la// sangs rgyas lnga yi byin rlabs te// sprul pa'i 'phro 'du rgyun mi gcad// spos sam lce bog nag po yi// dud pa rgyun mi 'chad par gtang // khros pas drag po'i sngags bzlas so// na mo big kra ma la
195b5(1): bi da ma la/ dza la dza la/ pra dza la pra dza la/ kI li kI li/ ha na ha na/ hUM phaT/ nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa yis// bde bar gshegs pa'i thugs dam bskul// skud pa gsar pa gtsang ma la// gsang ba'i lcang lor
195b6(1): 'khyil langs sam// rdo rje'i rgyun thag la sogs la// yum gyi grangs dang mthun par bsgril// rdo rje rtse lnga'i lu gu rgyud// byang chub sems su byin gyis brlab// thig g.yog las kyi sems ma ste// mtshan ldan
196a1(1): byin brlab phyag rgyar bcas// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor gnam thig gdab// sa thig gdab pa 'dul ba'i dbang // maN+Dal tshad ni nges pa med// de yi sngags ni 'di brjod do// oM dz+nyA na tsakra su tra
196a2(1): ma ti kra ma// tshon dbye ba ni 'di lta ste// dkar dang dmar dang ser dang ldang // tha ma lcags ri nag pos bskor// gtso bo gzugs su rdzogs par bri// 'khor rnams phyag rgya dag dang bri// rgyan rnams mang po bri
196a3(1): bar bya// dbyangs dang gar dang mchod pa che// rol mo'i yo byad ji snyed pa// mdzes pa'i dkyil 'khor rgyan du byas// gser dngul las byas bum pa la// ras dkri me tog 'bras bus brgyan// bdud rtsi lnga yis
196a4(1): dgang byas pa// sman dang rin chen 'bru sna lngas// gang ba brgyad dam bcu drug bzhag/ rnam rgyal bum pa de bzhin du// dkyil 'khor bdag pos sngags pa yi// dkyil 'khor dbus su gzhag par bya// rmad du
196a5(1): byung ba'i gtor ma dgram// 'di ni lus kyi 'phen sdud kyi// spyi ru bsdus te bshad pa'o// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba'i
196a6(1): le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das phra mo sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'di gsungs so// sngags pa ting 'dzin mnyam bzhag ste// ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor gsal
196b1(1): bar bsgom// gsal ba gnyis med dkyil 'khor du// rang bzhin kun rdzob spyan drang dang // dbab dang gzhug dang brtan pa dang // mi g.yo dam tshig zil gnan dang // phyag 'tshal mchod pa rdzogs pa
196b2(1): dang // gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor du// 'jug dang dngos grub gsal ba dang // dbang bskur ba yi las rnams bya// sangs rgyas nyid kyang 'thob 'gyur na// dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// de bas
196b3(1): snying po phra bar bsgom// pad+ma ye shes can dag gis// pad+ma snying gi dbus su bsgom// pad+ma snying ga'i dbus gnas pas// pad+ma'i sngags don bsgom par bya// 'khor lo ye shes can rnams kyis// 'khor lo snying gi
196b4(1): dbus su bsgom// 'khor lo snying ga dbus gnas pas// 'khor lo'i sngags don bsgom par bya// rdo rje ye shes spyan rnams kyis// rdo rje snying ga dbus su bsgom// rdo rje snying ga dbus gnas pas// rdo rje'i
196b5(1): sngags don bsgom par bya// rin chen ye shes can rnams kyis// rin chen snying ga'i dbus su bsgom// rin chen snying ga'i dbus gnas pas// rin chen sngags don bsgom par bya// rgya gram ye shes can rnams
196b6(1): kyis// rgya gram snying ga dbus su bsgom// rgya gram snying ga dbus gnas pas// rgya gram sngags don bsgom par bya// snying po ma nges 'phro 'du yis// sems can las las skye ba bzhin// dbyings las ye shes skye
197a1(1): bas na// mi rtog ye shes chos sku thob// chos can mtshan ma las skyes pa'i// chos nyid ngang las skye bas gnas/ rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ ting nge 'dzin
197a2(1): phra bar sbyong ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i snying po rdo rjer gnas pa des/ rgyal bar sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ sangs rgyas sems can
197a3(1): gnyis med pas// khams gsum sems can 'jigs tshogs kyi// snyoms par 'dzag mi'i srin bu yin// thig le chen po'i ngang 'dus pas// ma bgrod pa ru mtha' ru phyin// ma bsgrubs lhun gyis grub ste
197a4(1): mnyam// so so ma yin dbyer med pas// dbang bskur slob dpon gong na med// dbang nod slob ma 'og na med// thig le chen po gcig gi ngang // thams cad sangs rgyas lhun gyis grub// 'byung ba chen po
197a5(1): bcom ldan 'das// 'gro ba kun la rang bzhin gnas// chub par gnas pas bcom ldan 'das// 'di ni ye rgya spyi yi dbang // ma rig rmongs la zhen pa rnams// khyad par rim par bgrod pa'i lam// snying por
197a6(1): gnas pas byang chub ste// rgyu gcig pa dang yig 'bru'i tshul// sangs rgyas sems can rang bzhin gcig/ de yang 'di don 'di la dbang // sems thabs gang gis dbang ba dang // don ched ci la dbang ba
197b1(1): dang // dbang gi rnam grangs bstan pa dang // dbang rtags ci 'chang bstan pa dang // dbang yul ci la bsgyur ba dang // dbang gi dus tshod bstan pa dang // dbang gi tshad kyang bstan pa dang // dbang gi
197b2(1): skur thabs bstan pa dang // dbang gi khyad par bstan pa dang // dbang gi man ngag bstan pa dang // dbang gi drod tshad bstan pa dang // rnam pa bcu gcig bka' stsal to// de bas phyi nang gsang ba yi// dbang
197b3(1): gi rim pa shes par bya// gsang ba'i dbang gi mdor bstan pa// lha sbyin brda' spyod bum pa'i dbang // bag btsun skra bzang dbu rgyan dbang // pad+mar rdor bcug rdo rje'i dbang // rdo rje pad bskyod dril bu'i
197b4(1): dbang // pad+mar byang chub sems lces lon// 'di ni dam tshig gsum yin no// rdo rje'i lces len brtul zhugs mchog/ de yi 'bras bu de dag ni// dga' dang dga' med rab tu dga'// rab tu bsngags pas
197b5(1): yon tan thob// sems bskyed pa dang 'jigs pa med// rnam rtog spang dang ting 'dzin thob// shes bya kun la thogs med pa'i// tshad med bzhi la rab gnas na// 'di ni mi ltung sangs rgyas yin// sdug
197b6(1): bsngal thams cad byang bar 'gyur// de bas phyi nang gsang ba yi// mthar thug tshul du rim par bgrod// theg pa ji snyed gcig gsungs kyang // dbang bskur gnang ba ma thob na// shes bzhin dbang med rnal
198a1(1): 'byor rlom sems can// kha cig ya ma brla dang gsob 'dra la// don dang mthun pa'i skyes bu dbang chen la// rtags dang 'brel pas dbang bskur shin tu rigs// dbang med kha cig rang dbang
198a2(1): zos gyur na// zug thub khong langs shes thob tshod bzhag nas// che bzhi med bzhin yod pa'i las spyod pa// ngan song gsum gyi sa bon de yin pas// srid lam 'khyams shing chos lam ring bar snang // bka'
198a3(1): la brten nas dbang med bka' brkus pa// dbang lung tshad mar gyur pa'i skyes bu yis// bskur yang mi thob dbul mo'i gter dang 'dra// thob par mi 'gyur chags mi 'gyur// 'bras bu med cing brlag par
198a4(1): 'gyur// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+ta las/ khyad par dbang gi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i snying po rdo rje rtse gcig tu gnas pa des/ mi
198a5(1): 'da' ba rdo rje rgyan gyi ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'da' dka' thugs kyi dam tshig 'di gsungs so// bsdam par bya ba'i dam tshig ni// srog gi phyir yang mi gtang ngo // sna tshogs dngos por snang ba
198a6(1): yang // dngos po med pa'i skur gsal bas// rtogs pa'i don las mi 'da' 'o// sgra mtha' sna tshogs grags pa yang // smra ba med pa'i gsung yin pas// rig pa'i don las mi 'da' 'o// bstan du med pa'i
198b1(1): bsam pa ni// de ni thugs kyi rang bzhin te// de las 'da' bar mi bya'o// sku gsung thugs las ma g.yos kyang // che ba'i yon tan sna tshogs 'byung // 'on kyang zad med 'phel ba med// yon tan dam tshig
198b2(1): yin par grags// de las 'da' bar yang mi bya// rtsol ba med pa'i las gang yin// de ni thabs kyi spyod pa las// phrin las dam tshig 'da' dka' 'o// lnga po de la gang gnas pa// rnal 'byor skal ldan dam
198b3(1): pa'o// bsgrub pa'i dam tshig chen po ni// byang chub sems dang sha rnams dang // khrag dang dri chu dri chen po// dbang po lnga dang bcas pa ni// bde gshegs lnga yi thugs dam ni// bsgrub la gnas pas mi spang
198b4(1): ste// 'da' bar bya ba ma yin no// brtul zhugs dam tshig chen po ni// dka' thub sdom la gnas pa'i phyir// bdud rtsi dam tshig rkyen dang bcas// thogs pa med pa'i brtul zhugs kyis// spang len med par
198b5(1): rol par bya// bsten pa'i dam tshig chen po ni// lha dang rdzas dang tshe la sogs// snying po yig 'brur bcas pa rnams// gnyis su med par rtogs byas nas// mnyam pa chen po'i dbyings su gzhag/ spyad par bya
198b6(1): ba'i dam tshig ni// pad+ma can dang dung can dang // ban glang can dang ri mo can// bu mo mig ring la sogs kun// phrad par gyur pa sbyar ba yin// mthong ba tsam gyi dam tshig ste// dbang po yul dang shes mtshon
199a1(1): ldan// grub par bya ba'i dam tshig ni// nyon mongs lnga po gnas su dag/ sku dang ye shes ldan sbyor zhing // thams cad lha yi phyag rgyar gsal// shes par bya ba'i dam tshig ni// 'khor ba'i chos lnga
199a2(1): ma spangs shing // spyad pas grol te mya ngan 'das// phyi nang snod bcud ma lus kun// phyag rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor ro// dang du glang ba'i dam tshig ni// tan gaN la sogs spyad par yang // 'das pa'i sangs
199a3(1): rgyas rnams kyi bka'// ma byin par yang blang ba dang // mi tshangs pa yang spyad bya zhing // lha dang slob dpon mched la sogs// spangs shing nyams pa bsgral bar bya// de la rdzun gyi tshig smra zhing // brlang po'i ngag
199a4(1): gis gzhir btab po// glu bro gsang ba'i dam tshig ni// dbyings nyid gsang ba'i sa gzhi la// bud+d+ha khrag 'thung rol pa'i bro// gti mug gnas su 'joms pa ste// 'da' dka' sku yi dam tshig go/ me long gsal
199a5(1): bapaba'i sa gzhi la// rdo rje khrag 'thung rol pa'i bro// zhe sdang gnas su 'joms pa ste// 'da' dka' thugs kyi dam tshig go/ mnyam pa chen po'i sa gzhi la// rin chen khrag 'thung rol pa'i bro// nga rgyal gnas su
199a6(1): 'joms pa ste// yon tan lhun grub dam tshig go/ so sor rtog pa'i sa gzhi la// pad+ma khrag 'thung rol pa'i bro// 'dod chags gnas su 'joms pa ste// sgra mtha' chub pa'i dam tshig go/ nan tan chen po'i sa
199b1(1): gzhi la// karma khrag 'thung rol pa'i bro// phrag dog gnas su 'joms pa ste// phrin las dam tshig 'da' dka' 'o// stong nyid ye shes sa gzhi la// dbang chen khrag 'thung rol pa'i bro// dug lnga gnas su
199b2(1): 'joms pa ste// sku lnga lhun sbyor dam tshig go/ dbyings phyug lnga yi sa gzhi la// ye shes drug gi bro brdungs shing // dug lnga 'joms pa'i glu blangs pas// sdug bsngal chu bo'i gzhung bskams nas// 'khor ba'i rgya
199b3(1): mtsho gting bskams te// sku gsung thugs su rgyas btab nas// bde ba chen por rnam sbyar te// dmyal sogs me dpung gnas su bsad// 'di ni dpal yi bro bo che// zos pa tsam gyis rtogs pa dang // brdungs
199b4(1): pa tsam gyi thugs dam skong // 'di ni glu bro'i dam tshig ste// thams cad chos sku brdal ba che// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ 'da' dka' dam tshig gi le'u ste dgu
199b5(1): pa'o// // de nas bcom lda 'das rdo rje rtse gcig pad+mar gnas pa des/ de bzhin nyid la dmigs nas/ cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so// de'i tshe rigs lnga rgya mtsho bde gshegs 'khor rnams
199b6(1): kyis// 'dul thabs sna tshogs 'gro ba 'dul bar 'gyur// sku yi don mdzad sdig spong so sor 'dul ba ni// dmyal ba'i gshed po'i gzugs la yi dwags kha 'bar gzugs// byol song seng ge mi yi 'jig rten/
200a1(1): du// 'khor los sgyur rgyal lha yi gzugs su bstan// lha min thags bzang lha la brgya byin no// tshangs ris tshangs chen chags bral dgra bcom mo// rang rgyal bse ru sa bcu'i byang chub sems
200a2(1): dpa' la// rnam snang tshul dang ji ltar 'dul 'dul bstan// mthun byas sna tshogs 'gro ba ji ltar 'dul ba bzhi// chos kyi 'khor lo sna tshogs rab tu bskor ba ni// sde snod gsum dang la lar gsung rab bcu
200a3(1): gnyis bskor// la lar brgyad khri bzhi stong bskor// gti mug rmongs pa'i sems can la// sangs rgyas 'khor los 'khor lo bskor// zhe sdang can la rdo rje ste// nga rgyal can la rin po che// 'khor lo bla na med pa
200a4(1): bskor// 'dod pas 'chel la pad+ma yis// phrag dog can la las sna tshogs// 'khor lo bla na med pa bskor// 'gro drug so so'i skad rnams ji tsam par// de snyed sgra skad tha dad ston par mdzad// gsung gcig

200a6(1): byang chub sems bskyed bdud bzhi btul dang rdo rje'i gdan la gshegs// la lar byang chub shing drung bzhugs dang la lar bskul ba'i sa la gshegs// la lar rnam pa bcu gnyis lan gsum dag tu 'khor lo/
200b1(1): bskor// la lar cho 'phrul ston dang mya ngan 'das dang sku gdung ring bsrel ston// la lar glegs bam ston dang phyi rol 'byung dang chos mthun sgra skad 'byung // la lar mu stegs tshul dang bsam gtan bsgom
200b2(1): dang sa bcu rim gyis la lar 'byung // la lar spyan lnga rnam dag la lar mngon shes pha rol phyin// khyab 'jug dbang phyug che dang la lar 'jig rten skyong ba'i tshul// 'gro rnams ji ltar 'dul zhing byin rlabs cho
200b3(1): 'phrul de ltar ston// de tshe 'gro ba thams cad las kyi stobs kyi dbang gyur pa// log lha'i shugs bsnyems ma gtogs gzhan rnams sangs rgyas bstan la dad par 'gyur// byang chub spyod sgo ji snyed de snyed
