237a4(1): 'phro 'du las// khro bo dud kha sprin ltar gtibs// khro chung tshon gang skar ltar 'khrugs// pad+ma 'khyil pa'i phyag rgyar gsal// chu bdag bsgral ba'i rnam shes la/ ta kr-ita chen po dog la gshegs// rA tra thal bar
237a5(1): rnyog pa'i tha// bdud ni bye mar 'thag pa'i tho// rus pa thal chen brdal ba las// rlung nag 'chubs ma phrogs bcur 'khrigs// 'od chen rdo rje'i bu phrag 'chubs// Ta dang ki le 'phro 'dra las// khro bo dmar \u0f7f
237a6(1): sprin ltar gtibs// khro chung tshon gang skar ltar 'khrugs// Ta ki rA dza'i phyag rgyar gsal// rlung lha bsgral ba'i rnam shes la// ta kr-ita chen po dog la gshegs// rA tra thal bar rlog pa'i bro// bdud ni phye mar
237b1(1): 'thag pa'i bro// rus pa thal chen brdal ba la// rlung nag 'tshubs ma phyogs bcur 'khrigs// 'od chen rdo rje'i bu yug 'tshubs// a dang mri yi 'phro 'du las// khro bo ljang nag sprin ltar gtibs// khro chung tshon
237b2(1): gang skar ltar 'khrugs// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i phyag rgyar gsal// gnod sbyin bsgral ba'i rnam shes la// ta kr-ita chen po dog la gshegs// rU tra thal bar rlog pa'i bro// bdud ni phye mar 'thag pa'i bro// rus
237b3(1): pa thal chen brdal ba la// rlung nag 'tshubs ma phyogs bcur 'khrigs// 'od chen rdo rje'i bu yug 'tshubs// ma dang hA yi 'phro 'du las// khro bo ser nag sprin ltar gtibs// khro chung tshon gang skar ltar
237b4(1): 'khrugs// ma hA ba la'i phyag rgyar gsal// bgegs chen bsgral ba'i rnam shes la// ta kr-ita chen po dog la gshegs// rA tra thal bar rlog pa'i bro// rus pa thal chen brdal ba las// rlung nag 'tshubs ma
237b5(1): phyogs bcur 'khrigs// 'od chen rdo rje'i bu yug 'tshubs// ha na ha na rgyob/ gardza gardza sgrogs/ da ha da ha sregs/ pa tsa pa tsa chos/ b+han+na b+han+ma chings/ hu lu hu lu zhugs/ b+hin d+ha b+hin d+ha phug/ tshin+da tshin+ta chod/
237b6(1): tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha gnas/ sgo Ta sgo Ta spor/ zhes gsungs shing drag por rol lo/ rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ ta kr-ita brgyad kyi bro'i le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o// // de nas bcom
238a1(1): ldan 'das kyis/ bsgral ba'i zhing bcu'i phung po dang / khams dang skye mched kyi don la rol cing sbyang ba'i phyir/ zhabs kyi chas brgyad bro brdungs te/ hUM srin po rA tra bsgral ba'i phung khams skye
238a2(1): mched la// lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams te// mi gnas ye shes thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// lha chen mgo bcad dur khrod brgyad du sprul// zhe sdang gdug pa'i tshogs brgyad gnas su bsgral// phyogs bzhi
238a3(1): mtshams brgyad dregs pa 'dul ba'i phyir// zhabs kyi chas brgyad rnam shes brgyad du sprul// byang chub sems dpa' brgyad kyi 'phro 'du dang // phra men mu kha brgyad kyi 'jo tshul dang // ta kr-ita brgyad kyi thugs
238a4(1): dam bskang ba'i phyir// gar dang brda yis mtshon nas spyan 'dren na// dam tshig gsang ba'i bro la gshegs su gsol// dpa' bo ting 'dzin stag gi chas mchog gis// dregs pa'i mgo bcad b+han+da gsang ba'i
238a5(1): bro// gnod gdug zlog byed rgya bye'u'i chas mchog gis// rtog 'joms spyod pa brtul zhugs chen po'i bro// shes rab ting 'dzin rdo rje'i chas mchog gis// mi 'gyur g.yung drung skyid rtags dpal gyi bro// dbang
238a6(1): gi bse khrab gzi 'bar chas mchog gis// khams gsum dbang sdud ra ka ta chags pa'i bro// dpa' brjid mnyen lcug sbrul nag chas mchog gis// mkha' dbyings rnam dag gsang ba yum gyi bro// dbang phyug
238b1(1): dmar gsal mche ba'i chas mchog gis// sdug bsngal nad sel zug rngu gcod pa'i bro// shu ken smad g.yogs dar gyi chas mchog gis// dur khrod gnas su ma mo mnyes pa'i bro// gcan gzan rgyal po gzig
238b2(1): gi chas mchog gis// 'dul sbyor drag po las kyi tshar gcod bro// 'dul byed zhabs kyis thams cad zil gyis gnon// dzaHhUM baM hoHspyan 'dren gshegs su gsol// ngag gi dbang phyug thugs dam bskang ba'i
238b3(1): phyir// dbang chen sum lngar bskyed pa'i sa gzhi la// nga rgyal dbang du sdud pa'i bro gra btsugs// dregs pa gzhom phyir gzir gnon stobs kyi tshul// srid gsum ma lus dbyings su bsgral ba dang // lha chen khyab
238b4(1): 'jug zil gyis mnan pa dang // gsang ba'i rA tra thal bar rlog pa'i phyir// phung po khams dang skye mched don la gshegs su gsol// rak+ka rA tra ma hA tsit+ta dza dza/ ces drag tu bskor ro// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal
238b5(1): po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ phung po khams dang skye mched la zhabs kyi chas brgyad kyi bro'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gcig pa'o// // de ma thag tu lha mo za byed bzhis// yan lag bzhi la bro brdungs
238b6(1): pa// hUM srin po rU tra bsgral ba'i yan lag la// lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams nas// thogs med las kyis dbang sdud a mo de// yan lag chen po gser gyi sa gzhi la// lcags kyu dmar pos 'khor ba'i nad khrag
239a1(1): 'byin// a mo de ba 'dir gshegs aM ku sha/ yon tan lhun grub cir yang sprul pa'i sku// dur khrod gsang ba'i ma mo glog 'gyu ma// rdo rje zhags pas khams gsum cig car bcings// lha mo glog
239a2(1): 'gyu 'dir gshegs pA sha hUM// gsung gis thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i yum// rdo rje'i dra ba bka' yi rjes gcod ma// lcags sgrog dmar pos rgyud drug cig car bsdam// rdo rje dra ba 'dir gshegs sgo
239a3(1): Ta baM// sku mchog mi bzad 'bar ba'i sku gcig ma// rdo rje sder mo ral pa'i cod pan can// rdo rje dril bus ma lus dgyes pa bskyed// dur khrod sgra yi tshogs 'gyur g+haN+De hoH// zhes gsungs te drag por rol
239a4(1): lo// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ yan lag bzhi la lha mo za byed bzhi'i bro brdungs pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gnyis pa'o// // de ma thag tu nang khrol la/
239a5(1): ngan song gnas su spong ba'i phyir bro gra btsugs pa la/ hUM srin po rU tra bsgral ba'i nang khrol la// lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams nas// sdug bsngal yongs sgrol mdzad pa'i phrin las kyis// ngan song gting nas sbyong
239a6(1): ba'i bro brdung 'tshal// mkha' lding shugs kyis bsgral ba'i brtson 'grus dang / phra men mgo brnyan tshogs kyi rkan sgra yis// khams gsum 'khor ba sngangs pa'i glu blangs te// lhag phud med pa'i nang khrol spungs
239b1(1): pa la// bya rog 'ug pa bzhad dang khwa la sogs// stag dang seng ki spyang gi 'jigs pa'i gdong rnams ni// la la lding zhing la la 'bab// la la 'joms shing la la 'thog/ ha ha ru lu'i sgra sgrogs pa// zhing bcu
239b2(1): gnas nas sbyang phyir gshegs su gsol// dzaHdzaHzhes gsungs pas/ phra men ma rnams kyis nang khrol kha phye nas/ sdang mig tu blta zhing gtum bag gis drag tu bskor ro// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas
239b3(1): rta mchog rol pa'i tan+ta las/ nang khrol ngan song gnas kyi bro'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gsum pa'o// / de ma thag tu g.yang gzhi la// ma mo 'khrugs pa'i bro brdungs pas// hUM srin po rU tra
239b4(1): bsgral ba'i phung po la// lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams nas// sha khrag dmar la dgyes pa'i ma mo mkha' 'gro'i tshogs// gsad pa'i go bsrung gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor skyong // ma bdun las la 'khrugs pa'i
239b5(1): dkyil 'khor du// 'khor ba'i gting skems zhing bcu'i nang khrol la// dug gsum gdug pa'i shugs kyis 'dir gshegs shig/ gsang ba'i shun chen brdal ba'i sa gzhi la// phyogs skyong rgyal mo las la
239b6(1): 'khrugs pa'i bro// srin mo spug nag thugs rje chags pa'i bro// gling bzhi kun 'byams rab tu rngams pa'i bro// brtan ma bcu gnyis ma chen 'khrugs pa'i bro// gsang ba shun gyi bro gra 'dir gshegs la// khyi
240a1(1): phag bya dang rdo rje rta'i brtul zhugs kyis// nga dang bdag tu blta ba'i mun khang shig/ rA tra'i gnas bcom sha za'i maN+Dal la// sha zan stong gi chun lag dengs se deng // rak+ta dmar gyi rba klong
240a2(1): 'khyil ba la// khrag 'thung stong gi rkan sgra tshil li li// rus pa tshogs kyi mkhar du gtams pa la// mche ba dung gi so sgra thibs se thib// g.yang gzhi sprin gyi ba dan lhubs se lhub// 'di 'dra'i dur khrod gsang
240a3(1): ba'i sa gzhi la// dbang chen 'khrugs pa'i bro sgra dir ri ri// skyes bu ging chen 'dus pa'i sa gzhi la// ma mo las la 'khrugs pa'i bro brdungs pas// bdud dang srin po'i mig 'bras thang la lhung // gti mug klu
240a4(1): dbang snying khrag khong nas skyug/ lang ka gdon gyi kha so sil bur rlogs// rak+Sha rU tra ha ha ru lu ru lu hUM phaT/ ces gsungs te drag tu bskor ro// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra
240a5(1): las/ g.yang gzhi la ma mo 'khrugs pa'i bro brdungs pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu bzhi pa'o// / de ma thag tu rkang bzhi la// khro bo gzir gnon bro brdungs te// hUM srin po ru tra bsgral ba'i phung po
240a6(1): la// lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams nas/ rkang lag rdo rje phur pa'i bro// ya ga can gyi snying la brdung // khro bo rdo rje'i thugs ka nas// khro mo 'bar ba'i thugs ka ru// sum b+ha ni yi sgra bsgrags pas// sngags dang
240b1(1): phyag rgya rol pa'i bro// zhe sdang can gyi snying la brdung // bskal pa'i mthar ni mi ldang phyir// brjid pa'i stabs dang sngags kyis 'tsham// oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM phaT/ g+h+r-i h+na g+h+r-i h+Na hUM/ g+h+r-i h+NA pa ya g+h+r-i h+NA pa ya hUM/ A na ya
240b2(1): ho/ b+ha ga wAn/ bid+yA rA dza nan/ zhes gsungs te mnan no// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+ta las/ khro bo gzir gnon gyi bro'i le'u ste bzhi bcu lnga pa'o// //
240b3(1): de nas yang ngo mtshar skyes nas kyang // spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gis// gar dbang che la zhu ba zhus// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na// bdud rtsi'i char dbab ci ltar 'bebs// de nas thal ba'i
240b4(1): sa bon mchog/ de yi 'phrod du gang dang gang // de skad ces ni zhus pa dang // 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu ru// thams cad rol par byin gyis brlab// dug lnga 'joms pa'i bdud rtsi
240b5(1): mchog/ ye shes chen por byin gyis brlab// thal ba'i sa bon 'phrod du ni// 'brug rus byi la ban glang dang // rnga mo mkha' lding la sogs pa'i// 'bras bu lnga po gsar rnying dang // mar la sogs pa byug la
240b6(1): stsal// de nas bsgrub pa bya ba ni// dngos med bsreg dang bdud rtsir bsgrub/ 'di mtshams dpe 'khrugs shig yod 'dra yang bsngar gzhi ma rnyed/ ces gsungs pas/ gzi ldan pad ma can gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol
241a1(1): to// bka' gsang rmad byung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// gar dbang lha mchog pad+ma he ru ka/ srid gsum 'joms mdzad bskal pa'i me dpung ni// sdigs mdzub rtse la bskal pa'i me stag
241a2(1): 'phro// khams gsum dbang sdud khrag gi rgya mtsho ni// he brdal gru gsum zhal nas 'bab cing 'khyil// che ba rmad byung sku gsum lhun gyis grub// gdug pa'i tshogs 'joms me dpung spu gri'i so// sha chen tshogs
241a3(1): la rol cing bzhugs su gsol// pU tsa me g+ha sa ma ya hUM/ zhes gsungs nas gar gyi dbang phyug gis/ khams gsum dbang sdud khrag gi rgya mtsho nas rnam par rtog pa mkhyen pas yum gzi ldan pad+ma can dang /
241a4(1): gsung gi sgras spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/ che btsan 'gran gyi zla med gar gyi dbang phyug ces bya ba la mchod pa phul ba na/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas mnyes par 'gyur ro// me'i lha'i rgyal
241a5(1): po yang mnyes par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad tshim par 'gyur ro// zhes gsungs pa la/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ the tshom skyes nas/ mkhyen bzhin du phyi rabs rnal 'byor pa'i rtog pa bsal
241a6(1): paba'i phyir/ gar gyi dbang phyug ci'i phyir zhes zhus pas/ nyon cig spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ sdigs mdzub rtse la bskal pa'i me stag 'phro ba ma mthong ngam/ lhun grub sangs rgyas phrin las ma mthong ngam// de
241b1(1): skad gsungs pa'i byin rlabs kyis// mthong bar gyur nas 'di skad smras// e ma'o// lhun grub sangs rgyas rnams// sangs rgyas phrin las ya mtshan che// khro bo sdigs mdzub ya mtshan che// bskal pa'i me chen ya
241b2(1): mtshan che// zhes gsol pas/ gar gyi dbang phyug chen po yis// de bas spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang // phyi ma'i rnal 'byor rnams kyis kyang // lhun grub sangs rgyas grub 'dod pas// mtshan dang ldan pa'i shes
241b3(1): rab bstan// 'gro na stabs sdug 'dug tshul shis// bsten na lta nyer gyur pa yi// gzungs ma'i mtshan yang brtag par bya// pad+ma ni dang hasti ni// shang+ga nI dang tsi tra ni// de yang pad+ma can dang dung can dang // ban
241b4(1): glang can dang ri mo can// de lta'i bu mo bsten par bya// bsnyen pa bzhi khri bton nas kyang // mtshan dang ldan pa'i shes rab can// mchod cing bstan pa'i las bya'i phyir// ting 'dzin mchod pas tshims byas
241b5(1): nas// de nas rdzas kyi mchod pas mchod// ces gsungs pas/ rol pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams rang rang ngo mtshar du gyur nas kun tu bzang mo gzi ldan pad+ma can gyis mchod par yongs su rol par bya ba'i phyir/
241b6(1): lang ka srin po la sogs pa'i 'khor bsgral ba'i zhing bcu'i tsit+ta blangs te/ tsit+ta dpal be'u thugs kyi rang bzhin 'di/ chos nyid lta bu'i rang bzhin la// ye shes sgyu ma lta bur rol pa'i phyir// gar gyi dbang phyug
242a1(1): yum dang bcas pa la// bla na med pa'i dam rdzas mchod par 'bral// zhes bskul lo// mtshan dang rus pa blangs te phul ba ni// da bzhin rin chen lta bu char gyi rgyun// pho brang med 'ong 'bar
242a2(1): ba'i dur khrod na// phyin ci log bzhi 'joms pa'i dbang phyug la// sku gsum che bar brjid pa'i rdzas mchog 'di// dpal chen 'bar ba'i sku la mchod pa 'bul// rna ba mchod par 'bul ba ni// gsung gi rang
242a3(1): bzhin ma 'gags so sor gsan// sna tshogs sgra ltar snang ba brjod du med// stong nyid stong la rol pas stong pa'i dbyings// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i dngos dang dngos med pa'i// cir yang thabs kyis 'dul la
242a4(1): mchod pa 'bul// de la bskul ma btab pa ni// glog 'gru'i sprul pas dgyes pa'i phyir// nyon mongs sdug bsngal chu bo'i rgyun gcod dang // rdul phran rdul gyi mi gos chags pa'i mchog/ bdag rtog las la
242a5(1): dbang bskur sprul pa'i sku// srin po'i tshogs la rol mdzad sdig pa'i tshul// za byed gsod la dgyes pa'i pho nya ste// mi gnas don gyi lha mo glog 'gyu ma// mig gi dbang po mchod pa 'bul ba ni// thams cad
242a6(1): skye med yum gyi rang bzhin la// me long lta bur gsal cing dbyer med pa'i// yon tan lhun grub 'byung gnas chen po'i sku// gnyis med rtog bral yid kyi mchod pa 'bul// smra byed lce yi mchod pa 'bul ba
242b1(1): ni// sna tshogs ro ltar gzung ba'i dkyil 'khor du// 'jig rten bsreg phyir thugs rje'i me sbar te// rgyud drug 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gting sbyong ba// gar dbang lha mchog rta yi rgyal po'i sku// dbang po ro la
242b2(1): sbyor ba'i mchod pa 'bul// snom byed sna yi mchod pa 'bul ba ni/ 'di nas tshig chad dang go rim 'khrugs pa zhig yod 'dra// gab pa sbas pa yum mchog gzi dang ldan// khro rgyal kun gyi rang bzhin thugs la gnas// mtshan dang
242b3(1): dpe byad rgyan gyis rab tu bsgyings// mkha' dbyings pad+ma dmar la mtshar ba'i klong // rdo rje dmar po'i 'phro 'du char bzhin 'bebs// yang gsang rmad 'byung sku la mchod pa 'bul// rak+ta khrag gi mchod pa
242b4(1): 'bul ba ni// gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya dgyes te rmad// rdo rje sgeg mo phrin las rdzogs pa'i sku// ye shes sku 'chang sder mos log rtog 'joms// chags med yid kyis sbyor la rab brtson zhing // ma bkag
242b5(1): cir yang sa ler mkhyen pa'i spyan// log rtog phyin ci log gi rgyu sbyong ba// bde chen dpal gnas pa'i dra ba can// khro gtum gdug pa gzhan lta ma yin te// ma chags mi gnas dur khrod 'bar ba'i sgra// gu h+ya
242b6(1): gsang ba'i lha mo ut+pal mdog/ dug gsum ma spangs sku gsum lhun grub pa'i// khro gtum nga rgyal sku la mchod pa 'bul// rkang dang skra dang tshil dang sha// ba su ta yi rdzas mchog ni// gcig tu bcas nas
243a1(1): dpral bar bya// khro rgyal ba spu pho nya'i lung // khams gsum dbang sdud khrag gi lan phran can// dug gsum zil gnon mgyogs pa'i bka' sdod ma// ta kr-ita khro bo brgyad la sbyor bar
243a2(1): brtson// thun mong gnyen po'i rkyen dang bral// srid gsum 'joms pa a mo de wa dang // dug gsum ye shes chen po'i rang bzhin la// gnyis med sbyor ba'i mchod pa bzhes su gsol// pho nya mchod pa'i sbyin
243a3(1): bsreg ni// gtor ma'i mchod pa kun tu thim// khro bo mgo dgu brtsegs pa rkang gcig po// zhal nas bskal pa'i me 'bar stong gsum bsreg/ shangs nas rdo rje rtse lnga'i 'thor rlung bskyil// spyan mig gru gsum
243a4(1): dmyal tshogs gting nas sbyong // skye ba rnam bzhi 'gro ba rigs drug kun// khro rgyal khyod kyi dbang du mi 'du med// rA tra bshas bcom dmar chen khrag dang bcas// ta kr-ita rgyal po 'dod pa'i longs spyod
243a5(1): ldan// khro rgyal khyed kyi dbang du mi 'du med// nan tan mchod pa bzhes shing rol du gsol// gtun khung chen po rngam pa la// de nas bgegs chen 'dul ba'i phyir// rtse 'jo'i bro glu 'di skad len// rtse
243a6(1): 'jo thabs kyi bro brdungs pas// khrag 'thung 'bar ba gshegs su gsol// phrin las gsang ba'i bro gar 'di// gad rgyangs dur khrod sgra yi bro// dgyes pa chen po'i tshogs la brdung // bro dang glu yi brdas mtshon
243b1(1): te// 'bras bu byang chub sems kyi glu// phra men longs spyod chen po la// rtse 'jo'i thabs kyis rol cing gshegs su gsol// gar dbang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// srid gsum 'joms pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal
243b2(1): lo// mi skye mi 'gag mkha' dbyings rnam dag na// pad+ma khrag 'thung rol pa'i rta bro brdung // ha na da ha pa tsa hUM phaT/ de skad ces bskor nas/ dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir 'di gsungs so// dgod dang gshed dang
243b3(1): 'jigs pa'i zhal gdangs shing // tsit+ta ye shes dbus su hUM gi gnas// kun tu bzang mo yum gyi mkha' la bsdu// mi gnas ye shes thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// 'jig tshogs yongs sgrol tsit+ta rdza ltar
243b4(1): lhags// srid gsum dbang sdud khrag gi rgya mtsho la// dug gsum nad kyi rba rlabs drag po 'khrugs// nyon mongs sbyang phyir thugs rje'i dbyings nas 'phro// zhe sdang chen po 'dir gshegs aM ku sha/ yon tan
243b5(1): lhun grub dga' ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// re ba kun skong yid bzhin 'bar ba'i sku// gser mdog sdug la mdzes pa'i cha lugs can// drag shul spyod pas dgyes par rol pa'i tshogs// zhing bcu gtan nas
243b6(1): bsgral phyir snyems pa'i mchog/ nga rgyal log rtog 'joms pa 'dir gshegs pa sha hUM// dbang chen zla gam dkar dmar 'phro ba'i gnas// me ri tug chom sgra skad bsam mi khyab// nyid kyi sku la longs spyod
244a1(1): rdzogs mnga' ba// gzhan gyi sdug bsngal sel mdzad pad+ma'i sgra// sgra bsam brjod med gser gyi sa gzhi la// zhi bas dbang sdud pad+ma he ru ka/ 'gro drug sgrol bar mdzad la phyag 'tshal
244a2(1): lo// thugs rje chen pos ngan 'gro sgrol la mkhas// 'dod chags chen po 'dir gshegs sgo Ta baM// drag po 'dul bar 'dul ba'i cha lugs 'chang // sku mdog in+d+ra nI la brjid pa'i dbu// 'jigs pa'i
244a3(1): mtshon thogs rgyu 'phreng khrag rngams dang // zhing lpags g.yang gzhi 'jigs pa'i sham thabs can// phrag dog rgyal po 'dir gshegs g+haN+De hoH// sprul pa'i tshogs gyur 'di dag ni// dbang drag 'joms pa'i phrin
244a4(1): las cir yang mdzad// khro gtum rngams pa gzhan ltar ma yin te// srid pa yang bsgral thal ba'i tshom bu 'di// gti mug chen po'i sku la rgyan du snang // zhing bcu 'dul phyir ma lus rol cing bzhes// rak+ta pA tsa
244a5(1): s+pha ra Na hUM dzaHdzaHzhes gsungs shing bskul lo// de nas spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gis// gar dbang che la zhu ba zhus// bdud rtsi bab pa'i snod ni gang // thal ba blugs pa'i thabs ni gang // thugs dam
244a6(1): bskul ba'i thabs ni gang // phrin las mdzad pa'i thabs ni gang // thabs dang shes rab rol pa gang // dngos grub blang ba'i thabs ni gang // dngos grub dbye ba'i thabs ni gang // nyung na spogs pa'i thabs ni/
244b1(1): gang // gang bar gyur na yon tan gang // zhes zhus pas/ dbang chen nyid kyis bka' stsal pa// pa tra can gyi snod gang du// rus pa btags pa'i phye blugs nas// thugs dam bskul phyir 'di skad do// skye med
244b2(1): dur khrod 'bar ba'i gzhal yas su// 'bras bu ma nor byang chub sems kyi dbyings// keng thod sna tshogs bsags pa'i ri rab la// 'khor ba rgyud sbyangs ye shes me sbar te// rus pa thal chen tshom bu skar
244b3(1): ltar 'khrugs// rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i thugs dam bskang ba'i phyir// gu h+ya gsang ba'i phyag rgyas blangs nas kyang // skye shi ye nas med pa'i rtags su grub// de ni snod dang sgrub pa'i thabs// thugs dam gzhung bzhin
244b4(1): bskul ba ni// bde gshegs bskul ba'i sa gnas pas// bkur sti bskyed phyir 'di skad bskul// rnam dag pad+ma'i lte ba zlum po la// dug lnga ye shes lnga nyid sbyor ba yis// nga rgyal btsan thabs dbang chen
244b5(1): brjid pa'i sku// drag shul rngams pas bskal pa'i 'brug chen can// che bas che la gnas shing cher bsnyems pa'i// khro bo'i rgyal po 'jigs byed zhabs kyis gnon// thugs rje thabs kyis gdug pa tshar gcod
244b6(1): phyir// dbu mang phyag cha 'jigs pa'i kha TAM gis// log 'dren phyin ci log gi dngos po 'joms// rus pa thal chen 'phro 'du'i dkyil 'khor du// khrag dang zhag gi rba rlabs ci li li// ting 'dzin mche ba rno
245a1(1): dpal zang yag gis// nga dang bdag tu lta ba'i dngos po gcod// dbang gi zla gam mtsho ltar 'khyil ba la// 'gyur med keng rus dkar po rdza ltar lhags// gnam lcags thog thog 'bar ba'i
245a2(1): 'brug 'khrugs pas// dus gsum rgyal ba'i thugs dam bskang ba dang // rnal 'byor dngos grub dam pa blang ba'i phyir// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med sbyor ba las// mkha' la byang chub sems sprin bsnol ba
245a3(1): dang // zla gam ljags kyi gzi byin bskyed pa dang // rus pa rtags kyi thal ba bsgrub pa'i phyir// gnyis med sbyor ba'i phrin las mdzad du gsol// thal ba blugs nas snod bzhag pa// rab dgyes mkha' la sbyor
245a4(1): ba'i dur khrod na// dbang bdag rgyal po sku mdog le brgan zhal// dbu mang phyag cha 'jigs pa'i mtshon thogs shing // nga rgyal dregs pa 'dud kyi dpung 'joms pa// dbang chen 'bar ba'i sku la phyag 'tshal
245a5(1): lo// gnyis med thugs kyi ga'u kha 'byed cing // gsung rab rgya mtsho lta bu'i sgra sgrogs pas// rdo rje gzi ldan bka' yi dbyings phyug dang // gnyis med sbyor ba'i mkha' dbyings dag pa 'dir// 'du 'bral med
245a6(1): cing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// bde gshegs phrin las bskul ba ni// rnam dag pad+ma 'khyil ba'i gzhal yas su// 'bras bu sku gsung thugs su sbyor ba'i phyir// ma chags yum gyi mkha' dbyings yangs pa
245b1(1): na// rus pa tshogs kyi thal chen ri ltar spungs// byin gyis brlab cing brtan par bzhugs nas kyang // thal ba bdud rtsir sbyor ba'i phrin las mdzod// thabs dang shes rab rol pa ni// yang gsang thugs kyi
245b2(1): dkyil 'khor chen po ni// mi g.yo rta mchog rol pa'i dbu rgyan can// srid gsum sgrol mdzad ma rig mtsho skems pa// dbang phyug yang cher dpal gyi mchod pa 'bul// in+d+ra ni la'i mdog 'dra 'bar
245b3(1): ba'i spyan// sdug bsngal gcod snying zug rngu'i shing bsreg pa/ rdzu 'phrul myur mgyogs dur khrod glog 'gru ma/ shes rab pha rol phyin ma'i b+ha ga la// gsang ba'i ling+ga thogs med bskyod pa yis// tshim gyur mchod
245b4(1): sprin char gyi rgyun bzhin 'bebs// de nyid byang chub sems dpa' dbang chen gtso// shes dang shes bya'i bag chags sbyang ba dang // rnal 'byor dam can tha tshig bsgo ba'i phyir// gnyis med rak+ta chags pa mkha'
245b5(1): la gdab// chags pas sgrol byed pad+ma rgyal po dang // myur byed rdzu 'phrul mnga' bdag gshog pa mo// 'du 'bral med pa'i mkha' dbyings gzhal yas 'dir// byang chub dkar dmar 'du 'phro sna tshogs
245b6(1): kyis// stug po bkod pa'i sangs rgyas man chad dang // na rag 'khor ba'i dmyal khams yan chod du// dug gsum bsgral nas sku gsum lhun sbyor ba'i// byang chub sems ni dbyings ltar mdzes pa'i sku// spros
246a1(1): pas rgyud bskul gzi mdangs bskyed// gshog pa mo dang rol pa yin// dra ba mo dang rol pa ni// dbyings su 'gro ba ma lus bsgral ba ni// gar dbang lha mchog pad+ma dbang gi sku// khros pa'i zhal
246a2(1): dang 'jigs pa'i sdang mig can// bcu drug phyag gi phra men tshogs dang sbyor// dra ba mo dang gnyis med sbyor ba yis// rgyal ba 'khor bcas thugs dam bskang ba dang // srid pa rgya mtsho dbyings nas spyod pa
246a3(1): dang // ma srin rgya mtsho dam la gdags pa'i phyir// byang chub sems sprin mkha' la dbab tu gsol// sder mo can dang rol pa ni// bkra shis gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// zla gam dbang gi 'phro 'du
246a4(1): dang // rak+ta 'bar ba'i klong yangs nas// rdzu 'phrul mnga' mdzad pad+ma he ru ka/ sbas pa'i lha mo gsang ba'i sder mo can// dbang mo gcig la sbyor ba'i b+ha ga la// byang chub sems ni bai DUr+ya yi mdog/ keng rus
246a5(1): sar rnying ri ltar spungs pa la// khro bo me ri 'bar 'phro klong du 'khyil// gdug pa'i tshogs bcom nga rgyal ri rab la// rak+ta dmar gyi chu bo gzhung bzhin 'phyo// gtsug tor chen po'i 'thor rlung 'tshub mar
246a6(1): 'khrugs// nga rgyal gdug pa'i tshogs bcom nga rgyal ri rab la// ma rig mdongs pa'i mun nag rab tu gtibs// phrag dog bsgral ba'i 'thor rlung shugs kyis 'gro// rus pa thal chen byin gyis brlab pa
246b1(1): dang // bsgrub pa chen po'i dngos grub 'dir stsol cig/ snying po rgyun mi gcad par bzlas// oM hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ e A ra li hri dza/ de nas dngos grub blang ba ni/ dur khrod gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor
246b2(1): du// rus pa thal chen mtshan ma bsgrub pa dang // lhag pa rtags kyi dbang bskur dang // gsang ba'i mchod pa dbyings su bstim pa dang // tsit+ta thugs kyi dngos grub blang ba dang // de phyir mtshan ldan gsang ba'i
246b3(1): rgyud ldan gyis// 'khor tshogs chen por zil gyis mnan pa'i phyir// log 'dul thabs kyis nyon mongs sbyang ba dang // don dam klong du 'gro drug bsgral ba'i phyir// dung khang dkar po rgyal ba'i pho brang
246b4(1): na// dung dang rus pa'i 'phro 'du sprin ltar gtibs// ye shes lnga dang bdud rtsi rab sbyor bas// dpal gyi pho brang rgya mdud phyag rgya dgrol// dngos grub dbye ba'i thabs kyang yin// snum la 'phel 'gyur sgrub
246b5(1): pa'i rdzas// nyung la spogs shing ting 'dzin bsgyur// grub nas ro la mtshan mas gdab// mtshan ldan lag mthil a bsams te// bros bskor dbang bskur byin brlabs pa// gsang chen thugs la rol pa'i
246b6(1): dkyil 'khor du// snyoms pa'i thugs rje bsgral ba'i me lta bus// 'khrul dang rtog pa dbyings su bsregs nas kyang // rus pa thal chen brdal ba'i dkyil 'khor du// sdug bsngal gtan nas sel ba'i bro stong
247a1(1): ldir// pad+ma khrag 'thung dgyes shing rol du gsol// dur khrod rab tu 'bar ba'i klong yangs su// lhag pa'i thal chen mtshan ma 'di btab pas// rab dgyes he ru ka yi gnas bcu dang // zab
247a2(1): sbyor dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad dang // dbang mchog pad+ma thabs kyis bsdus pa dang // bdag nyid chen po rab tu sbyor ba yin// 'di ni sngon gyi thugs dam zab mo yin// 'di yang rtags kyi phyag rgya dam pa
247a3(1): yin// sa ma ya/ pad+ma d+ha ra pA tsa mi/ de skad ces ni gsungs nas kyang // dngos grub bgo phyir bdud rtsi'i don// so sor thob par ma gyur par// chad na bar chad chen por 'gyur// snga rabs 'das dang da lta
247a4(1): ru// bzhugs pa'i rdo rje slob dpon dang // yi dam lha ste bka' drin can// mi g.yo ri rab lhun po'i tshul// rgyun dang rgyun med rtag par ni// sman ni lus la bsrel bar bya// gnyis su med pa'i thugs rje mthu
247a5(1): stobs kyis// bskal pa du mar mi zad gter gyi mchog/ lhag pa'i thal chen mtshan ma 'di dbul na// thugs rjes bzhes la 'khor la byin gyis rlobs// bde gshegs rigs gnyis lung gi rgyud// yab yum
247a6(1): sbyor ba'i byin rlabs rmad po che// rdo rje slob dpon gzungs mar bcas pa yi// phrin las rnam par dag pa'i bka' drin dang // mched dang lcam dral lhag pa'i brtul zhugs kyis// 'bar ba'i sku bskyed mtshan
247b1(1): ma'i rtags btab pas// dus gsum rgyal sras chu bo'i rgyun bzhin skyong // lhag pa'i rtags kyi mchod pa 'di byas pas// rgyal ba'i gdung 'tsho ba bka' drin rjes bzung phyir// g.yel ba med par rtag tu lus la
247b2(1): bcangs// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub 'thob// lus kyang dar la bab cing sra// longs spyod ldan zhing bde skyid 'gyur// de ni grub pa'i yon tan yin// phyi rabs rnal 'byor rnams kyis kyang // sman rnams
247b3(1): yongs su bsgrub par bya// yal bar mi gtang ma mo brten// sman rnams grub na dngos grub thob// de nas lhag ma'i gtor ma gtang // bsgrub pa chen po byed pa'i tshe// srog la bab pa'i nyen yod kyang // dam
247b4(1): bcas de las ma byung tshe// mi dang 'phrad par mi bya ste// gtam dang kha rlangs 'dres na bsgyur// de las byung nas zhag gsum du// bdag gi phyag kyang phar mi btsal// mkha' 'gro ma rnams rngam pa yi// khrag nad
247b5(1): dag gis 'chi bar 'gyur// las su sgrub rdzas bsag par bya// grangs kyi tshad kyang 'di ltar ro// zhing sar po rdza brlag pa 'dra// b+han+da bcu gsum lcang lo can// brgyad las nyung na 'gal bar 'gyur// g.yang
247b6(1): gzhi gar gos med pa la// kha dog tshon gyis mdog bsgyur la// yang na lnga'am drug gtso la// bcu gcig phyogs skyong grangs dang mthun// mchog phur grangs kyang de bzhin no// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor bri
248a1(1): ba ni// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la// dbus ni zla gam e yi dkyil// bcu drug 'khor los mtha' bskor te// hrIHlas pad+ma nyi shu bzhi// mtshams bzhir rin chen khri rkang la// sprin med ci
248a2(1): ma bdun gyis brgyan// bar khyams gnyis dang sgo bzhir ldan// de lta bu yi gnas khang du// rtse 'jo mang po lung bzhin bya// zhes gsungs pas/ spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor
248a3(1): rol pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams kyis/ a la la zhes zer zhing / spyi gtsug gi gar gyi dbang phyug la phyag byas te/ 'og min gyi gnas ri rab kyi rtse mo la bdud rtsi chen po'i don la snyoms par zhugs
248a4(1): so// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+ta las/ thal chen bsgrub cing gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu lnga pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gar
248a5(1): dbang lha mchog pad+ma he ru kas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad/ 'og min gyi gzhal yas khang du byin gyis brlabs te/ phyi rabs rnal 'byor mtha' dag gis// lhun gyis grub pa'i gzhal yas
248a6(1): khang // mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo yi// sku yi sras gyur 'jam dpal khyod// lhun gyis grub pa nga la nyon// blta ba 'di la gang gnas pa'i// rnal 'byor 'di ni skal ba bzang // yang dag ma bgrod phyin pa'i
248b1(1): gnas// kun tu 'od kyi sa las 'das nas ni// pad+ma can du gyur pa yin// yang dag ma bgrod phyin pa'i sa// rang la gnas pa dngos grub yin// klong du gyur pas sgrub thabs so// yang dag ma bsgrubs dngos
248b2(1): grub yin// bla med theg par rab gnas nges// nyon mongs 'dod lnga kun spyad kyang // pad+ma la ni 'dam bzhin no// 'di ni tshul khrims phun sum tshogs// klong du gyur pa'i sgrub thabs so// yang dag gnyis
248b3(1): med spyod pa yin// gti mug zhe sdang nga rgyal dang // 'dod chags phrag dog chen po ni// bde gshegs lnga yi rang bzhin las// bsrung du med pa dam pa can// yang dag dam tshig bsrung du med// mi len byang
248b4(1): chub spyod pa la// byed pa med pa las yin te// de ni mi rtsol brtson 'grus so// yang dag 'bad med brtson 'grus yin// 'byung ba yum gyi gzhal yas na// snang srid phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gsal// bri bar bya/
248b5(1): ba'i ming yang med// bdag nyid chen po'i don rtogs ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid can// bsgoms pas gzhan nas mi rnyed do// sangs rgyas gzhan nas ma tshol cig/ yang dag bsgom du med pa'i
248b6(1): lha'o// dbyings dang ye shes don rtogs na// thabs dang shes rab dbang chen yin// rdo rje dril bu'i rig pa bzung // yang dag bskur du med pa'i dbang // khams gsum yum gyi b+ha ga la// gang ltar song yang
249a1(1): gnas kyi mchog/ yang dag ma song phyin pa'i gnas// mtshan ma ming du btags pa yang // mtshan ma med pa'i chos yin pas// tshig tu brjod pa'i tha snyad bral// yang dag brjod med tshig yin
249a2(1): no// de bas 'jam dpal ye shes sku// phyi ma'i rnal 'byor dbang phyug gis// de ltar rtogs nas yid ches na// bud d+ha tsit+ta dza la yin// dz+nyA na tsit+ta dza la yin// b+ho d+hi tsit+ta dza la yin// de ltar yid ches ma gyur
249a3(1): na// don de gtan la mi pheb zer// sgro 'dogs skur pa 'debs pa dang // rtogs pa klong du ma gyur na// karma tsit+ta dza la yin// rak+Sha tsit+ta dza la yin// nA ga tsit+ta dza la yin// zhes gsungs so// rgyud thams cad
249a4(1): kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ yang dag don gyi le'u ste zhe drug pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gar gyi dbang phyug pad+ma he ru kas/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la
249a5(1): bka' stsal ma thag tu/ thod rgal gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// hUM ye shes khrag 'thung rnam rtog mi mnga' yang // sa ler mkhyen pa'i sku gsung thugs// thugs rje che bas
249a6(1): rmad du byung // 'di ni gsal ba thugs rje'i 'od// 'bar bas ye shes mun pa sel// 'od kyis dmyal ba'i nyes skyon sbyang // rmad byung rin chen khri yi lung // bag chags sbyangs pas rnam rtog phyir sangs
249b1(1): pa'i// ye shes khrag 'thung tshogs la phyag 'tshal bstod// gser mdog bde chen ye shes phra men ma// nyi zla 'bum du 'char ba'i 'od// ye shes chen po brtsegs la phyag 'tshal bstod// yi dwags rnams kyi
249b2(1): bkres skoms 'joms// bde ba chen po thugs rje'i lung // phra men rngam thabs zhes kyang bya// ma chen dbang phyug sing ha dzaM b+ha la// don dam gsang sbas che ba'i dpal ldan ma// gcig tu bde ba chen po thugs
249b3(1): rje'i 'od zer can// 'jig rten 'das pa'i 'od kyis de bsregs nas// thugs rje'i dkyil na nyi ma'i 'od ltar 'byung // srid gsum bsreg par mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// de la nyi ma bdun gyis rab bskor
249b4(1): ba// srid gsum ma lus bsreg pa'i dbang dang ldan// sprin med gsal ba'i 'od zer 'bar ba 'phro// de steng pad+ma kha stong ldan pa las// rdo rje rtse gcig pad+ma'i snying por gnas// rnam dag pad+ma'i lte ba zlum po
249b5(1): la// ye shes rgya mtsho'i klong du 'khyil ba ni// thig le chen po gsang ba yum gyi mkha'// rdo rje rtse gcig che bas de la bstod// ma chags pad+ma'i rang bzhin mnyes pa'i yum// dga' ldan kun tu bzang la phyag
249b6(1): 'tshal bstod// 'di ni dri med pad+ma'i lung // de dbus hUM las byol song skye gnas 'joms// bden gnyis thugs las rol pa'i nyi ma la// 'od zer 'bum gyis bskor ba yum chen mo// shes rab nyi ma'i 'od
250a1(1): la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'di ni gsal byed nyi zla 'od kyi lung // chags med skyon bral nyi zla'i 'od du snang // thugs rje khyab pas 'gro ba'i don byed pa// nyi zla thabs dang shes rab tshul du
250a2(1): gnas// 'od zer thugs rje byang chub sems su snang // yum chen mA ma kI la phyag 'tshal bstod// pad+ma'i lte bar gnas pa rdo rje'i dkyil// hUM las 'od 'phros mi rnams bag chags sbyang // hUM las 'khor lo
250a3(1): rtsibs stong ldan par grags// de steng hUM las yid bzhin gzhal yas khang // rgyal chen phyogs skyong ma lus ka dang gdung // mi ro zod rlon sbrul nag la sogs brgyan// ta kr-ita rgyal po khro bo de na
250a4(1): bzhugs// gdan khri drug ldan ye shes bzhi yi dang // khro chen khros pa'i mtshan nyid gdan du bting // ta kr-ita rgyal po khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// de dbus rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgyar gsal// 'di ni rdo rje
250a5(1): sems dpa'i lung du grags// rdo rje lta bur mi g.yo 'dzin pa med// chos sku dag pa lta bu'i tshul du snang // mi mnyam mnyam pa'i lha mchog dam pa la// sems dpa' la sogs 'khor gyis bskor ba
250a6(1): dang // thugs rje'i dbyings su snang bas mngon pa med// rdo rje sems dpa' che la phyag 'tshal bstod// zhe sdang rdo rje sems dpa'i sku mngon nas// shangs nas khro bo hUM drug sgra bton nas// rgyud drug gnas
250b1(1): pa'i 'khor ba rtsad bcad de// de nas rim bzhin gnas nas thim// khro bor gyur pa hUM gi lung zhes bya// zhal ni kun tu gzigs pa'i dbu// b+h+rUM las gzhal yas khang pa lnga// lhun grub sangs rgyas rab tu
250b2(1): rdzogs// yab yum gnyis med byang chub sems// ngag gi dbang phyug lhun grub pas// dbang gi mdog dmar bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar// rngam chen thugs kyi sprul pa phyogs bcur gzigs// dbu lnga ljang gu rta
250b3(1): gdong 'od kyis brgyan// rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas 'bar ba'i dbu la gdangs// sbrul nag stong gis rgyan du mdzes// thod pa tshar gsum brjid par ldan// zhing lpags stod la g.yang gzhi'i sham thabs can// phyi
250b4(1): nang gshog pa nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// gsang ba'i lha mo rdo rje dra ba mo// 'gro ba ma lus dbang du sdud pa'i yum// bcu drug phyag na ye shes mtshon char bsnams// shar du gzigs pa'i phyag bzhi'i phyag
250b5(1): mtshan ni// rdo rje lcags kyu sbrul gyi zhags pa dang // rdo rje kha T+wAM ga dang zod rlon khrag gis bkang // lho ru gzigs pa'i phyag bzhi'i phyag mtshan ni// rdo rje lcags kyu sdigs mdzub lu gu rgyud// zod pa zhal du stob
250b6(1): dang khro brgyad snying 'dzin cing // nub tu gzigs pa'i phyag bzhi'i phyag mtshan ni// me yi zhags pa dang ni khyung gi khra// sdigs mdzub rtse la bskal pa'i me chen 'bar// rdo rje kha T+wAM dag ni rab tu 'khrol// byang du
251a1(1): gzigs pa'i phyag bzhi'i phyag mtshan ni// rdo rje rtse dgu dang ni rtse lnga dang // rtse gsum rtse gcig 'bar ba gsor zhing brdeg/ zhe sdang gdug pa'i dgra bgegs mang po 'dul// zhabs kyi chas
251a2(1): brgyad khro bo brgyad du sbyor// dpa' bo la sogs ting 'dzin brgyad dang ldan// 'khor ba'i me dpung dmar po la sogs ni// rang gi snying pos phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad thim// ye shes 'bar ba'i klong chen
251a3(1): na// thugs rje chags pas dug gsum rtsad nas gcod// ye shes dpal gyi sku ste bdag nyid ma// phyag gnyis phyag rgya me dang sbrul bsnams te// spyan mig gnam lcags thog thog a la la// dpal chen zhal du
251a4(1): stob cing mchod pa'i bdag/ me 'brug dmar po che la phyag 'tshal bstod// rlung 'brug sngon mo rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bskyed// bden gnyis lhun gyis grub pa'i yum chen mo// 'khor ba mi spong mya ngan mi 'da'
251a5(1): zhing // thod rlon drag po'i shugs kyis 'gro ba ste// mi mnyam pa yi klu tshogs dbang du sdud// nam mkhar mnyam pa'i sku lus tshad mnga' ba// rlung 'brug sngon mo nyid la phyag 'tshal lo// long ba rgyab sbrel mang
251a6(1): po gnas pa yang // yang sbrul bye ba 'bum dang bcas pa ste// phyogs bzhi nas ni rnam par 'khrugs pa'o// shar phyogs long ba rgyab sbrel te// 'brug chen sngon mo chibs su bcibs// 'khor ba ma spangs mya ngan
251b1(1): 'das// mig kyang med de cang mi smra// mdun dang rgyab med gcig gi ngang // skye ba med pa'i dbyings su bstan// long ba rgyab sbrel che la phyag 'tshal lo// lho phyogs long ba rgyab sbrel ni// me ri sngon dmar chibs
251b2(1): su chibs// skye med dbyings nas cho 'phrul bstan// 'od zer mthing ga 'phro ba yis// 'o dod drag po phyogs bcur 'bod// nub phyogs long ba rgyab sbrel ni// 'brug chen gshibs pa'i gdan la
251b3(1): bzhugs// zag med shes rab pha rol phyin// skye ba med pa'i cho 'phrul ston// byang phyogs long ba rgyab sbrel ni// rlung nag 'tshubs mchibs su chibs// skye ba med pa'i cho 'phrul ston// 'od zer dmar nag
251b4(1): 'bar ba 'phro// de dag rnams kyi sku mdog kyang // gnag dang dmar la rab tu 'tsher// phyi rim dmus long 'khor ba can// shwa ri kha yis sku bsgrubs pas// mtha' dbus med par khyab par gnas// shar
251b5(1): phyogs dmus long 'khor ba can// lus ni mi mngon dbyings na bzhugs// yan lag med cing nyung dkar 'dra// 'od zer chen po phyogs bcur 'gyed// g.yo ba med par dbang du bsdu// lho phyogs dmus long
251b6(1): 'khor ba can// mig ni ye nas med pa la// spyan ni me ri sngon dmar can// zhabs kyang med la nyung dkar 'dra// khyod ni gdung rgyud dang po ste// lan 'ga' drag tu mngags pa'i tshe// 'od zer chen po phyogs
252a1(1): bcur 'gyed// nub phyogs dmus long 'khor ba can// bdud kyi sha khrag rlan pa za// yan lag med cing dbang po med// lus kyang tsa ru mi mngon pa'o// chos kyi dbyings su rol pa mdzad/
252a2(1): bgyi zhes dang chas te gnas// byang phyogs dmus long 'khor ba can// mgo yang med cing lag kyang med// rkan gyi sgra yis stong gsum bkang // dung gi tshul du gnas pa la// khrag gi mi la khrag sha za// mig
252a3(1): dang rna ba sna yang med// 'od zer drag po phyogs bcur 'gyed// kham rgya chen mo drug rnams ni// dkyil 'khor grwa yi phyogs su gnas// phyag rgya chen po las la g.yos// gnas pa byang chub sems la rtag gnas
252a4(1): pa// 'jug dang smon lam dang ldan pas// 'gro don ma lus mdzad slad du// kham rgya chen mo drug gi sku// ye shes dpal gyi khyi brgyad ni// phyogs bzhi dang ni dbus nas dgye// ma lus dgra bgegs mche bas
252a5(1): gcod// phyi rim lcags kyi sbrang mo brgyad// dgra bo rnams la rbad par bya// de ltar phyag rgya rdzogs nas kyang // sku nyid 'khor la sbas te bzhugs// phyogs bzhi dbus dang lnga ru sbas// de yang chos dbyings che
252a6(1): ba'i rtags// zhes gsungs so// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+ta las/ thod rgal 'jigs pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu bdun pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gar gyi dbang
252b1(1): mchog gis/ seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas spyan ras gzigs dbang pos// gar dbang che la zhu ba zhus// phyogs bcu 'jig rten drug gyur pa'i// chu
252b2(1): klung rgya mtsho ji snyed dang // me tog 'bras bu ya la ga'i tshogs// snang dang mi snang la sogs dang // 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po 'di// klu rgyal rdzu 'phrul yin pa'i phyir// klu rgyal zil gyis gnon par
252b3(1): mdzod// dbang phyug chen po longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// dug gsum dbang sdud sku gsum thugs su sbyor// nga rgyal khro gtum dbang gi rta mgo can// che la brjid pas che ba'i ye shes dang // rno la 'bigs
252b4(1): pas thugs rje'i lcags kyu yis// mtha' yas dung skyong la sogs klu yi 'khor// dbang du bsdus nas mngon du bsgral ba dang // phyag mtshan rtags su bsnams la phyag 'tshal lo// de skad ces ni bskul nas
252b5(1): kyang // bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad gsungs// khams gsum khrag tu dmigs pa'i sa gzhi la// 'dod chags rtsad gcod khrag gi rgya mtsho 'khrugs// rgyal rigs yongs bsgral dur khrod rgyan du sprul// gti
252b6(1): mug mtha' yas nA ga pra be sha/ dug lnga phung po bshig pa'i sa gzhi la// zhe sdang rtsad gcod keng rus ri rab 'khrugs// dmangs rigs yongs bsgral dur khrod brgyad du sprul// gti mug dung skyong nA ga pra be
253a1(1): sha/ rgyud drug gcig char bsgral ba'i sa gzhi la// nga rgyal rtsad gcod khrag gi me 'tshubs 'khrugs// rje rigs yongs bsgral dur khrod brgyad du sbrul// gti mug 'jog po na ga pra be sha/ sa gsum
253a2(1): lhun gyis grub pa'i sa gzhi la// phrag dog rtsad gcod rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'khrugs// rigs ngan klu tshogs dbang du bsdus nas kyang // dbang gi mthu bskyed dur khrod brgyad du sprul// gti mug nor rgyas na ga
253a3(1): pra be sha/ dur khrod me ri 'bar ba'i sa gzhi la// las bdag phra men 'bum gyi nga ro 'khrugs// dbang chen lhun gyis grub pa'i sku la brgyan// dur khrod bdag po gsang ba'i rgyan du sbrul// gti mug ma dros nA ga
253a4(1): pra be sha/ tshogs chen 'dus par bsdus pa'i sa gzhi la// 'khor ba rgyun gcod zhe sdang mtshon cha 'khrugs// nga rgyal dregs pa klu dbang yongs bsgral nas// g.yang gzhi 'bar bas sa gsum zil gyis
253a5(1): gnon// gti mug sog ma med kyang nA ga pra be sha/ gtum chen rol pas dgyes pa'i sa gzhi la// ma chen dbang phyug gad rgyangs sgra chen 'khrugs// phyag rgya rtags kyis klu dbang yongs bsgral te// dur khrod
253a6(1): bdag po gsang ba'i rgyan du sprul// gti mug gzi chen nA ga pra be sha/ khro bo'i gshag tu gtams pa'i sa gzhi la// dzaHhUM baM hoHsa bsgral ba'i phyag rgya 'khrugs// cho 'phrul chen pos bdud kyi dpung bshig
253b1(1): ste// dbang chen yum dang bcas pa'i rgyan du sprul// gti mug rigs ldan nA ga pra be sha/ phra men skar ltar 'khrugs pa'i sa gzhi la// glog stong 'bar ba'i phrin las chen po 'khrugs// zhe sdang me ltar 'bar ba'i
253b2(1): 'brug sgra yis// bram ze klu yi rgyal po 'khor los gtubs// dur khrod dpal gyi phyag rgya chen por sprul// gti mug ba ru Na yang nA ga pra be sha/ phrin las rnam bzhi rdzogs pa'i sa gzhi la// bka' nyan mgyogs
253b3(1): ma stong gi pho nya 'khrugs// dur khrod brgyad kyi rgyan du sbrul// gti mug kar ko Ta ste pra be sha/ dbang du bsdus pa'i sa gzhi la// ging chen bco brgyad rol pa'i phyag rgya 'khrugs// tshangs pa stobs kyi klu dbang
253b4(1): yongs bsgral nas// phyag rgya 'jigs shing rngam pa'i se ral kha// gti mug nor bu 'dzin pa pra be sha/ zhing chen gcal du bkram pa'i sa gzhi la// phra men go'u ri 'dus pa'i sgra skad 'khrugs// kha dog sna tshogs
253b5(1): cir yang snang ba'i sku// drag shul klu rgyal rngam pa'i shugs kyis bsgral// gsang ba'i yum chen sprul pa'i rgyan du sbrul// gti mug blta na sdug kyang pra be sha/ ta kr-ita rgyal po bsnol ba'i sa gzhi la// ra ro khrag
253b6(1): 'thung ma chen las la 'khrugs// myur la mgyogs pa'i thabs kyis klu dbang bsgral// dur khrod rgyal po dbang gi thugs dam bskul// gti mug stobs bzang nA ga pra be sha/ zla gam skar ltar 'khrugs pa'i
254a1(1): dkyil 'khor la// ci bgyis bka' sdod mang po'i tshogs ni 'khrugs// kha dog sna tshogs cir yang sprul pa'i sku// klu chen yongs bsgral gsang ba'i rgyan du bklubs// gti mug zla ba can yang pra
254a2(1): be sha/ khro bo ya mAn ta ka'i thugs ka nas// 'dul sbyong las kyi pho nya mngag gzhug gzhan yang 'khrugs// ha ha rngam pa'i phyag rgyas klu brgyad 'dul// bstim pa'i stobs kyi gad mor g.yab mos 'debs// gti
254a3(1): mug dung skyong nA ga pra be sha/ hUM dang phaT kyis gsang ba'i thugs dam bskul// phyag mtshan phyag na klu chen 'bum bsnams pa// gsang ba'i g.yung drung rgyal sa rtag tu 'dzin// nA ga oM nA ga hUM/ de gnas gsang
254a4(1): ba'i mchod 'bul ba// bsnyen pa'i sngags ni 'dis 'bul lo// oM pad+ma shrI he ru ka/ e ka ta/ ma hA su kha hUM/ sa ma ya ho/ nA ga pra be sha dza/ rdzu 'phrul dbrog dang phyag rgya dang // drag po'i phrin las nyi tshe
254a5(1): 'o/ de skad ces bka' stsal pas/ la la 'dod chags kyis 'gro ba sgrol// la la zhe sdang gi gdug sems las 'phro byed/ la la nga rgyal gyi dbang gis che bar bsnyems shing 'gro ba'i rgyud spong / la la gti
254a6(1): mug dbang gis ngo bo nyid kyi rgyud bsreg/ la la phrag dog dbang gis nga dang bdag tu bzung nas lus sems la nyon mongs lnga smin par byed cing / gdug pa'i shas dang ma bral ba las/ klu'i cho 'phrul bsam
254b1(1): gyis mi khyab par gnas pa la/ dbang chen gyis gdug pa can du ma gcig tu dbang du bsdus nas/ nyon mongs pa lnga'i bag chags gdar sha bcad nas/ mgrin sngon la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin
254b2(1): yang gser bzhus pa'i kha dog lta bur gyur te/ yum gzi ldan pad+ma can gyi thugs gsang ba'i b+ha ga la bslab pa'i dkyil 'khor la/ glog stong 'bar ba'i phrin las chen por 'khrugs// zhe sdang me ltar 'bar ba'i
254b3(1): 'brug sgra yis// bram ze klu yi rgyal po 'khor los gtubs// dur khrod dpal gyi phyag rgya chen por 'khrugs// de ring sa ru klu yi rdzu 'phrul ming yang med// rigs rnams so so'i gnas rnams bsrungs shing
254b4(1): bzhugs pa las// bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la rin po che'i gshog pa nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i bar bar nas/ gser gyi me stag ni me chen 'bum du 'phro zhing / lha mo glog 'gyu mas sprul pa btang ba
254b5(1): las/ klu mgrin sngon gyi lus la phogs pas lus tshig go/ sems la phogs pas dran pa brlag go/ ngag la phogs pas smra ba'i dbang po dang bral/ yan lag nying lag la phogs pas zha bo grum por gyur te/ bye
254b6(1): tshan dang khyung gi 'jigs zhes de la bya'o// de bas na phyi ma'i dus kyi rnal 'byor pas/ dngos grub thob par 'dod na/ klu'i rdzu 'phrul dbrog par bya'o// lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor la gnas par bya'o// de
255a1(1): cis mngon zhe na klu'i gzhal yas khang / sbrul nag kun gyi kha nas kyang dngos grub kyi char 'bab ste/ la la'i kha nas me tog ut+pal la/ la la'i kha nas pad+ma dmar po/ la la'i kha nas u dum pa
255a2(1): ra'i char du 'bab ste/ yid bzhin nor bu'i gtun khung du 'khyil pas/ klad pa'i rgyas su phyung ste/ mngon par shes pa drug gi dbang thob par gyur to// za ma tog char du babs pas sku'i dbyings su 'khyil
255a3(1): te/ thugs kyi gnas su thim pas/ mkhyen rab 'jam dpal gyi dngos grub thob par gyur to// ut+pal sngon po char du phab pas/ phyag gi gnas su thim ste/ phyag na rdo rje'i dngos grub thob par gyur to// pad+ma
255a4(1): dmar po'i char du phab pas/ zhabs kyi g.yas su 'khyil te/ rkang gi sbubs su thim pas/ sgrib pa rnam par sel ba'i sgo nas dngos grub thob ste/ lus mi snang bar sbed cing // thogs pa med par rgyug nus par
255a5(1): gyur/ u dum bA ra char bzhin du babs pas/ yum gyi mkha' gsang la 'khyil te/ b+ha ga'i dbyings su thim ste/ sman ras gzigs kyi dngos grub dang dbang thob ste/ sprul pa mang po 'gyed nus par gyur
255a6(1): to// zhes gsungs pas/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sogs pa thams cad rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rjes su yang ched du brjod do// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra
255b1(1): las/ klu rgyal rdzu 'phrul gyi le'u ste bzhi bcu brgyad pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gar gyi dbang phyug des/ thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/
255b2(1): rol pa'i 'khor thams cad la 'di skad ces gsungs so// khams gsum dbang du sdud pa'i gzhal yas khang // nam mkha'i mtha' mnyam cho 'phrul cir ston pa// skye med byang chub sems las ma g.yos phyir// gsang ba
255b3(1): yum gyi b+ha gar mya ngan 'das// 'gyur med 'jigs spangs seng ge'i khri gcal ni// dbang phyug mngar bsdus cho 'phrul cir ston kyang // skye med byang chub sems las ma g.yos phyir// gsang ba yum gyi b+ha gar mya ngan 'das// rin
255b4(1): chen 'bar ba'i khri rkang bzhir snang bas// rigs bzhi'i khrag 'thung cho 'phrul cir ston kyang // skye med byang chub sems las ma g.yos phyir// gsang ba yum gyi b+ha gar mya ngan 'das// pad+ma le brgan kha dog 'bar ba la// kun tu bzang
255b5(1): mo'i cho 'phrul cir ston kyang // skye med byang chub sems las ma g.yos phyir// gsang ba yum gyi b+ha gar mya ngan 'das// sbrul sku nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba yang // thabs dang shes rab cho 'phrul cir snang yang // skye med byang chub
255b6(1): mas las ma g.yos phyir// gsang ba yum gyi b+ha gar mya ngan 'das// rang sems yi ge hUM gi byin rlabs las// ye shes sems dpa'i cho 'phrul cir snang yang // ske med byang chub sems las ma g.yos phyir//
256a1(1): gsang ba yum gyi b+ha gar mya ngan 'das// yi ge hUM drug cho 'phrul chen po las// gar dbang lha yi cho 'phrul cir snang yang // skye med byang chub sems las ma g.yos phyir// gsang ba yum gyi b+ha gar
256a2(1): mya ngan 'das// brjid pa'i dbu rgyan rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor nas// rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor cir ston kyang // skye med byang chub sems las ma g.yos phyir// gsang ba yum gyi b+ha gar mya ngan
256a3(1): 'das// srin po 'dul byed rta mgo ljang gu ni// rdzu 'phrul myur mgyogs cho 'phrul cir ston kyang // skye med byang chub sems las ma g.yos phyir// gsang ba yum gyi b+ha gar mya ngan 'das// gsang ba thugs kyi
256a4(1): dpal be'u sgrom bu nas// ye shes sems dpa'i cho 'phrul cir ston kyang // skye med byang chub sems las ma g.yos phyir// gsang ba yum gyi b+ha gar mya ngan 'das// rdzu 'phrul chen po gshog pa'i gzhal yas
256a5(1): nas// khams gsum rnam rgyal cho 'phrul cir ston kyang // skye mched byang chub sems las ma g.yos phyir// gsang ba yum gyi b+ha gar mya ngan 'das// gnod mdzes zhabs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las// 'jigs
256a6(1): byed khro bo'i cho 'phrul cir snang yang // skye med byang chub sems las ma g.yos phyir// gsang ba yum gyi b+ha gar mya ngan 'das// sku yi rgyan cha dpal gyi cha lugs dang // thugs kyi gsang yum sku la 'khril ba
256b1(1): yi// bka' sdod pho nya'i tshogs su bstan pa bsrung // gdul bya'i cho 'phrul khro bo so sor cir snang yang // skye med byang chub sems las ma g.yos phyir// gsang ba yum gyi b+ha gar mya ngan 'das// de skad ces
256b2(1): gsungs nas/ mi gnas pa lhun gyis grub par bzhugs so// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+ta las/ gsang ba mya ngan las 'das pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu dgu pa'o// // de'i tshe
256b3(1): 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpas gar gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa ci'i phyir/ gsang bar gyur pa ci'i phyir// zab mo'i don du gyur pa rnams// bdag cag rnams la
256b4(1): bshad du gsol// zhes zhus pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' nyon// khams gsum 'khor ba'i sems can rnams// nye lam byang chub bstan pa'i phyir// phun
256b5(1): sum tshogs pa lnga ldan pa// de yang gsang bar shes par bya// nye lam zhes kyang de la brjod// de ltar gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor du// dbang chen rgyal po'i sku rdzogs pa// gdan lnga rim gyis rdzogs pa
256b6(1): dang // rdzogs pa chen po yin pa'i phyir// gzhal yas gdal ba chos kyi dbyings// nam mkha' lta bus khyab pa dang // zab mo'i don du shes par byos// de dbus gar gyi dbang phyug dang // gnyis su med pa gzi
257a1(1): ldan ma// zab mo zhes kyang de la brjod// dra ba can la sogs pa bzhi// gsang ba'i yum bzhi yin pas na// zab mo zhes ni rgyal bas gsungs// dkyil 'khor chen po yin pa'i phyir// sgo srung khro
257a2(1): bopo mgo dgu brtsegs// theg chen dgu yi rim pa bzhin// de nyid gsang bar shes par bya// de ltar dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa yang // rgyal po 'khor dang ldan pa bzhin// phyi rol long ba rgyab sbrel yang // chos sku
257a3(1): gcig pas tha dad min// de phyir dmus long 'khor ba rnams// mi 'gyur dbyings las mya ngan 'das// 'khor ba ma spangs mya ngan 'das// de phyir dmus long 'khor ba can// de phyir kham rgya chen mo bcu drug
257a4(1): gi/ gzi ldan sprul par grags pas na// nyung dkar tshul bzhin zlum por bzhugs// 'khor ba dbyings su bzlum pa'i phyir// de phyir spyang mo brgyad po yang // zhabs kyi sprul pa yin pas na// pho nya bzang zhing
257a5(1): mngags par mgyogs// de yang chos nyid yin pa'i phyir// zab mo'i don du shes par bya// khyi brgyad dgye zhing mngag pa yang // gsang ba'i sprul pa yin pa'i phyir// phra men sprul par shes par bya// sprul pa me
257a6(1): 'brug dmar po rnams// yab yum 'du 'bral med pa yi// sprul pa yin par bstan pa yang // yang na srid pa'i rgyal mor dmigs// rtsa ba dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa yin// phung po lnga nyid gzhal yas khang // tsit+ta
257b1(1): dpal be'u sems kyi rten// dbang chen yab yum phyag rgyar gsal// ma bzhi bu brgyad dbyings phyug ma// de yang mtshan ma spros dang bral// rnam shes brgyad po gnas su dag/ long ba rgyab sbrel ye nas
257b2(1): dag/ shes pa yul brgyad gnas su dag/ dmus long 'khor bar ye nas gnas// zhabs kyi chas brgyad gnas su dag/ lcags kyi spyang mor ye nas gnas// khyi brgyad spyang mo brgyad dang bcas// zhabs kyi sprul
257b3(1): par rab tu grags// de rnams rtsa bar bsdus pa'i phyir// zab mo'i bsgrub pa shes par bya// dbyings su ye nas bsgrub pa'i phyir// ye shes dbyings la zhugs pa la// rtag tu gzi ldan thugs kar sbas// zab mo
257b4(1): zhes kyang de la bsngags// long ba rgyab sbrel ye shes 'khor// mgo dgu brtsegs pa yan chad kun// 'khor ni chos kyi dbyings su dmigs// gtso bo yab yum ye shes te// ye shes dbyings las sbyor ba'i
257b5(1): phyir// rtogs pa chen por rab rtogs na// zab mo zhes kyang de la brjod// de ltar dbyings las ma g.yos kyang // mtshan ma'i dngos po bshig pa dang // log par blta ba gzhom pa'i phyir// pho nya rnams su
257b6(1): bshad par bya// bdag nyid chen po rab rtogs te// rtsa ba med pa'i dbyings gcig na// pho nya zhes kyang de la bya// bya dang byed pa mi dmigs shing // 'phro 'du la sogs mi rtsol na// 'gyed pa zhes kyang de la
258a1(1): bya// pho nya'i don drug bshad pa ni// rgyu dang rngam dang ye shes dang // sgrub dang sprul pa'i yig 'bru'o// yang na pho nya gsum du bshad// don dang las dang rig la sogs// pho nya rnams ni dgye bar
258a2(1): bya// zhes bshad do// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ nye lam byang chub sems kyi le'u ste lnga bcu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das pad+ma gar dbang gis/ phyogs
258a3(1): bcu dus drug gi 'jig rten thams cad gzhal yas khang du byin gyis brlab pa dang / phyi rabs kyi rnal 'byor pa'i bar chod du gyur pa bsgral ba'i zhing bcu zhe gcad pa'i phyir/ gsang ba'i bdag po la sogs pa
258a4(1): rol pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams nyon// dben nam rang gi gnas khang du// rang gi dri chen maN+Dal bya// rang gi gur gum chag chag gdab// spos dang du ru a ka ru// li shi dang ni ga bur dang // dzA ti pha la mchog tu
258a5(1): bsngags// me tog phreng bas kun tu brgyan// de lta bu yi gnas mchog tu// gzhan zhig nges par bsgral na ni// rdo rje srin po'i ting 'dzin bsgom// rak+Sha'i mig gis blta bar bya// kha nas sngags kyi tshig zlos
258a6(1): shing // pha rol rnam shes hUM gis drangs// snying gar mngon sum dmigs byas na// pha rol mngon sum 'chi bar 'gyur// mgo dang snying dang rkang lag rnams// ya mAn ta ka'i 'khor la dbul// gzhan yang lhag
258b1(1): ma ci yod pa// he ru ka la yon du 'bul// gnas lung 'phrul gyi dgongs pa'o// de lta bu yi dus dag tu// lag cha phur pa mchog yin te// zhi ba'i sor bdun zlum por bya// rgyas pa'i sor brgyad zur yang
258b2(1): brgyad// dbang la zla gam nges par bzang // drag po'i sor drug zur gsum po// kun gyi rtse mor hUM bzhag ste// ngos su ha ha ru lu bsgom// de lta bu yi dus dag tu// sems kyi phur pa rang byung ba// 'du byed lag
258b3(1): gis bral bas thebs// de bas pho nya mngag par bya// pho nya 'od zer dud kha 'phro// hUM dang phaT kyi sgra sgrogs shing // bskal pa'i 'brug sgra chen po bzhin// kun kyang mgyogs pa'i rlung dang mtshungs// shar gyi
258b4(1): phyogs nas mngag pa ni// mgo dgu po la rkang gcig po// lus nag po la 'od phung gnag/ ral pa gnag cing mche ba gnag/ mig kyang nag cing lag nag po// mgyogs kyang rlung gis bskyod du med// 'di
258b5(1): dag dpal gyi pho nya ste// zhums pa med cing stobs chen 'joms// g.yas pa gsum ni sta re 'phyar// g.yon pa gsum ni lcags kyu 'dzin// yan lag sbrul nag mchog gis brgyan// g.yon gyi lcags kyus snying
258b6(1): nas 'dren// g.yas kyi sta res nges par 'joms// 'di ni sgo srung mchog yin te// pho nya'i rgyud du mngag par bya// bgegs rnams nges par phung bar byed// rkang gcig de yi pho nya ni// kha dog 'bar ba ci 'dra
259a1(1): na// gcig la gcig ni rab tu 'khril// yang na lag pa sbrel te 'gro// mig kyang med de cang mi smra// long ba kun gyi mchog yin te// rta babs kun gyi sgor bsgoms te// lan 'ga' drag tu
259a2(1): mngag pa'i tshe// gnyis ka song nas der phyin nas// gang la dmigs pa len par byed// sus kyang bzlog par mi byed do// lho yi phyogs nas dgye ba ni// mgo brgyad po la lag brgyad pa// rkang pa brgyad la
259a3(1): mig kyang brgyad// g.yas pa bzhi ni rdo rje 'dzin// g.yon pa bzhi ni phur bu 'dzin// ha ha ru lu'i skra sgrogs shing // gang la dmigs pa len par byed// gshin rje'i gnas rnams nges par 'joms// rkang brgyad
259a4(1): de yi pho nya ni// hUM dang phaT kyi sgra sgrogs shing // bskal pa'i 'brug sgra chen po bzhin// kun kyang mgyogs pa rlung dang mtshungs// ha ha ru lu'i sgra sgrogs shing // gang la dmigs pa len par byed// nub kyi phyogs
259a5(1): nas dgye ba ni// mgo drug lag drug rkang drug po// g.yas pa gsum ni phur pa 'dril// g.yon pa gsum ni gtor ma gtong // mgyogs pa rlung gis bskyod du med// 'di ni dpal gyi pho nya yin// ha ha ru lu'i
259a6(1): sgra sgrogs shing // rang gi rlung phyogs song ba'i tshe// khro bo kun kyang nges ngas par 'chi// rkang drug de yi pho nya ni// lcags kyi sbrang mo rkang gsum ma// gang nas gang du 'gro ba'i tshe// gzugs la rdog pas brdeg
259b1(1): cing 'gro// rang gi rkang pa phur pa yin// lcags kyi phur pa rab tu drag/ 'od zer dud khas reg pas ni// tshangs pa'i gnas kyang 'jigs byed na// gzugs can dgra bor smos ci dgos// byang gi phyogs nas
259b2(1): dgye pa ni// mgo gsum lag drug rkang gsum po// lag pa drug ni rgyud drug gcod// mAM sa za zhing bdud rnams sgrol// gnod sbyin gnas rnams nges par 'joms// rkang gsum de yi pho nya ni// byang gi phyogs
259b3(1): nas rgyug pa mo// lcags kyi khyi ste rkang gsum la// lcags kyi lus la nyi ma'i mig/ spu ni lcags kyu sgril ba bzhin// bang ni glog gis bskyed du med// skad ni gnam gyi 'brug pas che// rab tu mi srun 'di dag
259b4(1): ni// phyag na rdo rje'i mthu yang 'phrog/ rkang gcig gyen du bsgreng ba ni// ya bdud chen po'i snying nas 'dren// seng ge dril chen dmyal thag gcod// rkang gcig thur du phyung bas ni// ma bdud chen po'i snying nas
259b5(1): 'dren// dmyal tshogs me dpung rtsad nas 'byin// rkang gcig zad kar phyung ba yis// dgra bo ma lus snying nas 'dren// 'byung po ma lus dmyal zag gcod// sku ni lcags zag sgril ma 'dra// tshems ni spu gri
259b6(1): gshibs pa 'dra// mAM sa za zhing ri klung rgyug/ gnod sbyin rnams kyi skal ba gcod// 'di ni dpal gyi pho nya ste// 'jig rten khams kun za ba mo// gnod sbyin kun gyi steng na rgyug/ glo snying nang khrol 'byin cing
260a1(1): za// bar snang khams su khros pa'i tshe// nyi zla kun kyang zang la rlog/ gza' skar kun kyang dum bur gcod// shin tu 'khrugs nas bskul ba'i tshe// bdud kyi snying khrag dron mo 'thung // bar snang
260a2(1): khams nas gnod byed kun// rdul cha tsam yang med par mdzod// na mo bi tsa ra b+h+yo/ ha ha ru lu b+ho/ ku ku ra tsa kha long khA hi zhes rbad cing brjod do// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i
260a3(1): tan+t+ra las/ gnas bstan pa dang phur bus gdab pa bstan pa dang / sgo bzhi'i pho nya mngag pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis dmar po tsit+ta dbyung ba'i phyir// 'di
260a4(1): skad gsungs so// gang la bya ba'i sems can de// spyi bo dzaHlas lcags kyu yis// dbyings las ye shes 'jug tshul du// du mar brjod cing drang bar bya// hom lnga sbrel ba'i gzhal yas kyang // ri las 'od kyi
260a5(1): 'phro 'du 'byung // dzaHyi lcags kyus drangs pa yang // rdo la lcags ni 'ju tshul du// du mar brjod cing drang bar bya// snying gar yi ge 'od 'phros 'dus// rlung gi dkyil 'khor zur drug pa// 'khor los rab tu
260a6(1): gcod tshul dang // pha rol snying rtsa gcod pa'i phyir// du mar brjod cing drang bar bya// bdag nyid gar dbang chen po yis// 'dren cing sgrol ba'i pho nya ni// gang yang rung ba'i zhing bcu de'i// lus ngag yid la
260b1(1): rbad par bya// rta mchog rol pa'i shangs las kyang // rlung gi mi la spyang ki'i gdong // mche bas bdud kyi snying rtsa gcod// rna ba sbrul gyi 'dzul khung nas// sbrul gyi mi la spyang ki'i gdong // kha rlangs sprin gyi
260b2(1): dkyil 'khor nas// 'od kyi mi la 'ja' 'tshon gdong // ral pa khrag gi zar bu las// khrag gi mi la sbyang ki'i gdong // spyan mig gru gsum 'bar ba las// zangs kyi mi la sbyang ki'i gdong // kha la ro shal
260b3(1): rbad/ gum tri dun dun rbad/ de las bang chen btang ba ni// 'dren cing sgrol ba'i pho nya ni// gshog pa rdo rje gdengs pa la// pho nya yid mgyogs rlung bas myur// lcags kyi mi la kha gshog can// phyag rgya bcu drug
260b4(1): 'bar ba las// lcags kyi spyang mo brgyad sprul pa// lcags gshog khyung gi 'dab ma can// sku gsung thugs las sprul pa ni// la la byan lag mgo bo la// lus ni lcags kyi spyang mor sprul// la la khyung gi mgo
260b5(1): bo la// lus ni zangs kyi wa mor sbrul// la la khra yi mgo bo la// lus ni dril nag rkang gsum po// la la khra yi mgo bo la// lus ni sdig pa rkang gcig pa'o// la la chun yag mgo bo la// lus ni dung gi spyang
260b6(1): mor sprul// la la chu bya'i mgo bo la// lus ni bcu drug tshang mar sprul// la la bzhad kyi mgo bo la// lus ni byu ru'i seng ger sbrul// la la kang ka'i mgo bo la// lus ni lcags dril rkang gsum pa'o// la la
261a1(1): 'ug pa'i mgo bo la// lus ni dung phag dkar mor sbrul// la la pu shud mgo bo la// lus ni lcags kyi sdig par sprul// la la mthing ril mgo bo la// lus ni dril nag rkang gsum po// la la
261a2(1): sbyin gyi mgo bo la// lus ni phyi la rtsal po che// la la bya rgod mgo bo la// lus ni gser stag ser por sprul// gang la bya ba'i sems can dang // rgyud drug 'khor ba'i sems can rnams// dmyal khams bcu
261a3(1): drug kha brims te// thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs kyis// 'di la byin gyis brlabs nas kyang // dmar po 'byin pa'i pho nya 'gyed// dus las ma g.yel phrin las mdzod// na maHsarba ta thA ga ta kA ya wAk+ka/
261a4(1): tsit+ta badz+ra nan/ oM g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+TAn kI li ki la ya/ sarba pA paM/ badz+ra d+ha ra A dz+nyA pa ya ti kI li kI la ya hUM phaT/ de bas phyi ma'i rnal 'byor gyis// gcod dang sbyin sngags 'bum du bzlas// las
261a5(1): grub pa la the tshom med// ces gsungs so// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+ta las/ tsit+ta dmar 'byin gyi le'u ste lnga bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas bang chen btang ba
261a6(1): ni// yang gcig cho 'phrul mdzad pa las// 'byung po dgra bgegs 'dul ba'i phyir// bskul pa'i las dag rbad par bya// gdug byed zhabs kyi 'od zer 'phros pa ni// dpal mchog drag shul stag gi chas// khro
261b1(1): bopo yab yum sbyor ba'i byin rlabs las// zhabs las byung ba'i pho nya ni// stag mgo dmar po dbu lnga me ltar 'bar// stag lag khro mo zhe sdang glog stong 'gyu// rkang gcig mgyogs ma shin tu mi bzad de// shar
261b2(1): phyogs khyab par rgyug cing dpal gyi bka' nyan ma// dri za dbang sdus gdon bgegs thal bar rlog/ gdug byed zhabs kyi 'od zer 'phros pa ni// gnod gdug zlog byed rgya bye'u lcags kyi chas// khro bo yab
261b3(1): yum sbyor ba'i byin rlabs las// zhabs las sprul pa'i pho nya ni// lcags mgo sngon po dbu lnga me ltar 'bar// lcags lag khra bo zhe sdang glog stong 'khyug/ rkang gcig mgyogs ma shin tu mi bzad de// shar lho
261b4(1): khyab par rgyug cing dpal gyi bka' nyan ma// drang srong dbang sdus gdon bgegs thal bar rlogs// gdug byed zhabs kyi 'od zer 'phros pa ni// shes rab ting 'dzin mchod khrab dbang gi chas// khro bo yab
261b5(1): yum sbyor ba'i byin rlabs las// zhabs las sprul pa'i pho nya ni// rdo rje dmar mo dbu lnga me ltar 'bar// rdo rje zhe sdang lag pa glog stong 'khyug/ rkang gcig mgyogs ma shin tu mi bzad de// lho phyogs khyab par
261b6(1): rgyug cing dpal gyi bka' nyan ma// gshin rje dbang sdus gdon bgegs thal bar rlogs// gdug byed zhabs kyi 'od zer 'phros pas ni// dpa' brjid mnyen lcug sbrul nag 'khril ba'i chas// khro bo yab
262a1(1): yum sbyor ba'i byin rlabs las// zhabs las sprul pa'i pho nya ni// sbrul mgo nag po dbu lnga me ltar 'bar// sbrul lag phra mo zhe sdang glog stong 'khrug/ rkang gcig mgyogs ma shin tu mi bzad
262a2(1): de// lho nub khyab par rgyug cig dpal gyi bka' nyan ma// srin po dbang sdus gdon bgegs thal bar rlogs// gdug byed zhabs kyi 'od zer 'phros pa ni// dbang gi bse khrab gzi 'bar bgrad pa'i
262a3(1): chas// khro bo yab yum sbyor ba'i byin rlabs las// zhabs las sprul pa'i pho nya ni// za byed mche ba'i dbu lnga me ltar 'bar// mche ba'i lag pa zhe sdang glog stong 'gyu// rkang gcig mgyogs ma shin tu mi bzad
262a4(1): de// nub phyogs khyab par rgyug cing dpal gyi bka' nyan mo// rlung lha dbang sdus gdon bgegs thal bar rlogs// gdug byed zhabs kyi 'od zer 'phros pas ni// shu ken smad g.yogs chu ris dar gyi
262a5(1): chas// khro bo yab yum sbyor ba'i byin rlabs las// zhabs las sprul pa'i pho nya ni// dar mgo dmar po dbu lnga me ltar 'bar// dar lag khra bo zhe sdang glog stong 'gyu// rkang gcig mgyogs ma shin tu mi bzad
262a6(1): de// byang phyogs khyab par rgyug cing dpal gyi bka' nyan ma// gnod sbyin dbang sdus gdon bgegs thal bar rlogs// gdug byed zhabs kyi 'od zer 'phros pas ni// gcan gzan rgyal po gdug byed gzig
262b1(1): gi chas// khro bo yab yum sbyor ba'i byin rlabs las// zhabs las sprul pa'i pho nya ni// gzig mgo dmar po dbu lnga me ltar 'bar// gzig lag khra mo zhe sdang glog stong 'gyu// rkang gcig mgyogs ma shin tu mi
262b2(1): bzad de// byang shar khyab par rgyug cing dpal gyi bka' nyan ma// dbang ldan dbang sdus gdon bgegs thal bar rlogs// phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad dregs pa'i dpung 'joms ma// za byed mche bas bdud
262b3(1): kyi dpung yang 'joms// nga rgyal bsnyems pas pha rol zil gyis gnon// dug bcom 'brug sgras srid pa'i thod rus 'joms// dzaHhUM baM hoHsa srin po dbang du bsdus// hUM dang phaT kyis srid gsum 'khor ba
262b4(1): 'jig/ phrin las bcol thabs yin pa'i phyir// ma ma bgyis pas ma mo bskul// dzaHdzaHbgyis pas mkha' 'gro rbad// he he bgyis pas phra men dgye// hrIHhrIHbgyis pas rta mgrin mngags// b+h+yo b+h+yo bgyis pas
262b5(1): dbang phyug bod// dbyangs su tshangs pa'i glu drug blang // las su dgra bgegs ma lus sgrol// rtags su gsang ba'i rde'u chung brdung // dpal gyi phrin las dus la bab// de skad ces gsungs so// rgyud thams
262b6(1): cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+ta las/ glo rdeg chas kyi pho nya mngags pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu gsum pa'o// // gar dbang chen po'i cho 'phrul ni// de nas bang chen btang ba ni// yang gcig
263a1(1): sprul pa'i pho nya ni// dbus nas sprul pa'i las bdag mo// rta mchog rol pa'i khri la bzhugs// g.yu yi spyang mo dgu 'bum gyis// kha rlangs par snang char du 'bebs// khrag 'thung rta yi dbu lnga
263a2(1): las// dung gi ser phreng lnga lnga 'dril// rgyud lngar gnas pa'i 'gro ba rnams// 'bar ba'i zhal du bsdus nas kyang // bskal pa bye ba grangs pa yi// sdug bsngal zug rngu sbrang du gsol// dbang po rdul du rlog tu
263a3(1): gsol// dur khrod spyang mos las mdzod cig/ spyan gyi sdang mig 'bar ba nas// sprul pa'i phra men rab 'bar snang // thabs la mkhas pas srid gsum dbang du sdud// tshangs pa'i gnas kyang 'jigs byed
263a4(1): na// bar gcod dgra bgegs smos ci dgos// dur khrod sbyang mos las mdzod la// dbang ldan phyogs kyang rdzogs par g.yengs// gdug pa'i dur khrod brgyad la rol// bgegs kun thal bar brlag par
263a5(1): mdzod// shangs kyi rlung sgrom 'tshubs ma las// sprul pa'i pho nya rab 'bar ma// rlung nag rdo rje'i ma mo la// rlung gi 'tshubs ma 'bum yang 'khyil// rlung 'brug sngon mo'i khri la bzhugs// rlung gi g.yang gzhi lus
263a6(1): la gyon// kha nas rlung gi bskal pa gtong // yang sbrul lcags kyi spyang mo 'bum// kha nas ro yi khog stod bshal// dri la gnas pa'i dgra bgegs kun// thal ba bzhin du brlag par mdzod// bskal pa me yi mi
263b1(1): mo la// ye shes dbu lnga'i 'od zer 'phro// zhal gyi hom las rgyud lnga sgrol// me yi bskal pas khams gsum sreg/ me 'brug dmar mo chibs su bcibs// me sbrul dmar mo'i sked chings can// mu men phra chas
263b2(1): si li li// na bza' sbrul gyi g.yang gzhi gsol// 'o dod 'bod cing g.yab nag 'dor// me yi ral pa dmar po la// gza' chen mig dmar tshom bur gsal// zhal nas hUM gi sgra bsgrags pas/ dug dang me yi/
263b3(1): skyugs pa 'byin// mche ba rgya zor bkug pa 'dra// rgyu skar 'bum gyi tshom bur bcas// sngags pas gdung nas bos pa'i tshe// mchi ma khrag gi gru char 'bebs// ro la gnas pa'i dgra bgegs rnams// thal ba
263b4(1): bzhin du brlag par mdzod// rdo rje phra men gtum mo yum// sbrul nag stong gis lus brgyan cing // dkar khras se ral mdzad pas rgyal rigs dbang du sdus// dmar khras dpung rgyan mdzad pas bram ze dbang du
263b5(1): sdud// ser khras phyag gdub mdzad pas rje'u rigs dbang du sdud// sbrul nag zhabs gdub mdzad pas gdug pa 'dul ba'i mchog/ lus la gnas pa'i dgra bgegs rnams// thal ba bzhin du brlag par
263b6(1): mdzod// sprul pa'i pho nya phra mo ni// zhe sdang khrag gi len phran can// skad ni dung skad sgrog pa la// kha rlangs sprin dmar glog stong 'gyu// shangs nas dud thul g.yab mo 'dor// rkang lag sder mo phur pa
264a1(1): las// sta re lcags kyi tsha tsha 'khrugs// dgra la brdeg cing dgra snying 'byin// dur khrod spyang mos las mdzod cig/ rngams byed 'bar ba'i gshog pa las// g.yas pa rdo rje'i gshog pa la// nag
264a2(1): mo sbrul 'dab chen mo sbrul// me yi ral pas stong gsum khebs// me khrag spyang mo ro khyer bas// rU tra'i mig 'bras thang la lhung // dgra bgegs ma lus rdul du rlogs// dur khrod sbrang mos las mdzod
264a3(1): cig/ g.yon pa rin chen gshog pa la// rdo rje rlung 'degs chen mor sbrul// rlung gi ba dan rtse dgu 'phyar// bskal pa'i 'tshubs mas srid pa g.yo// ba dan lce la me 'bar bas// 'byung po'i kha so sil bur
264a4(1): rlogs// de yi thugs las sprul pa ni// lcags kyi spyang mo mgo dgu la// kha nas ro bshal dgra bgegs 'dul// lcags kyi mche ba zang yag la// rdo rje ngar sgong gser phran 'dril// bdud kyi dpung la sa ma
264a5(1): ya// drag shul stag las sprul pa ste// phra men stag gi mgo bo la// zhing gi g.yang gzhi lus la gyon// mche ba rdo rje rtse gsum la// gnam lcags thog gi skar mda' 'phen// dur khrod sbrang mos las mdzod
264a6(1): cig/ lcags kyi spyang mo mgo dgu la// sa le dung gi mche ba can// hasta g.yas pa lag na thogs// kha mig sna yi bu ga nas// 'dod chags khrag gi rgya mtsho 'khrugs// dus la bab po sa ma ya// dur khrod spyang
264b1(1): mos las mdzod cig/ shel gyi sbrang mo gdong brgya la// rdo rje rtse lnga'i mgo bo can// lan 'ga' drag tu rbad pa dang // dbang gi sngags pas bskul ba'i tshe// me lha'i gnas su gnas bcas te// gshin rje'i
264b2(1): khams kun rdul du rlogs// rdo rje rtse lnga'i 'phro 'du las// lcags kyi mi la spyang ki'i gdong // kha nas ro bshal stong gsum khyab// mgyogs pa rlung gis bskyod du med// mche ba zangs kyi kha T+wAM ga/ rdo rje'i zil
264b3(1): gyis gnan par mdzod// dus la bab po sa ma ya// dur khrod spyang mos las mdzod cig/ bse yi spyang mo gdong brgyad ma// chu srin 'bum gyi gdengs ka can// g.yu 'brug khros pa'i gdan la bzhugs// nub kyi
264b4(1): phyogs su gcig mi gtong // klu yi rigs la dbang bsgyur zhing // lus la mdzes pa'i le'u gsol// lag na lcags kyi tsha tsha 'khrugs// kha nas khro chu khol ma 'dzag/ khro chu'i rba rlabs 'khrugs pa las// lcags
264b5(1): kyi mi mo dgu khri 'byung // kha nas ro bshal ri lung g.yengs// dur khrod bdag po ma traM 'joms// srin po 'khor bcas dbang du sdud// dur khrod spyang mos las mdzod cig/ sbrul gyi mi mo brgyad khri la// gtum
264b6(1): chen dom gyi mgo can zhon// lag na sbrul gyi zhags pa thogs// 'gal byed ma lus 'ching zhing sdom// rab tu khros pa'i thugs ka nas// zangs kyi spyang mo wa mgo can// kha nas ro bshal ri lung
265a1(1): 'phyag/ mgyogs pa'i tshad ni rlung dang 'dra// ngal ba med par las la brtson// gtsang ma'i rigs drug lha rnams dbang du sdud// dur khrod sbyang mos las mdzod sa ma ya// lus ni cir yang mi
265a2(1): mngon te// chos kyi dbyings la rol pa mdzad// sprul pa spyang mo brgyad khri 'gyed// kha nas ro bshal nga ro sgrogs// 'bar ba'i kha T+wAM khus 'debs ma// stong gsum gang ma'i rde'u chung brdung // dbu stod ral pa
265a3(1): si li li// rdo rje 'brug gi spyang mo grol// de la zas kyi skal phob la// srid pa'i lha bran zas su za// nam mkha'i rtsa bo skom du 'thung // phrin las chen po'i dus la bab// dur khrod sbyang mos las mdzod
265a4(1): cig/ shel gyi sbrang mo gdong brgya ma// lag na chu srin 'khor lo thogs// spyan mig g.yas kyi dkyil 'khor nas// gdung ba'i mchi ma khrag tu 'dzag/ dam las 'das pa'i snying zan ma// dam la gnas pa'i tshe
265a5(1): 'dzin ma// yang sbrul g.yu yi sbrang mo la// mche ba zang yag gtams pa la// byu ru'i spyang mo dgu 'bum 'phro// kha nas ro bshal za zhing stod// ma thob bar du dud mos 'debs// sngags pas lan 'ga' zad pa
265a6(1): dang // 'khor ba'i sa nas zhu bzlog med par 'gro// gso blag med par dmyal zag gcod// dur khrod spyang mos las mdzod cig/ me za khrag 'thung sbrang mo la// rba rlabs mdzes par sba bas bskor// ral pa
265b1(1): kham nag 'jigs pa la// gdug pa'i 'od zer 'bum 'bum 'phro// rak+Sha srin po sgrol la brtson// khros pas bskul nas mngag pa'i tshe// shangs kyi rlung sgrom g.yas g.yon nas// pha wang lus la spyang mo'i
265b2(1): gdong // kha nas ro bshal cho nges 'debs// khams gsum khrag tu dmigs te rol// spyang mo ro bshal dus la bab// drag po las kyi pho nya mo// seng ge gtams pa'i rngams khri la// mi mo seng ge'i gzugs
265b3(1): can zhon// sgra yang seng ge'i lan phran can// ral pa nyag ma re re la// gza' chen sgra gcan char du 'bebs// seng ge'i kha nas ro bshal bas// srid pa las kyi dgra bgegs 'dul// ma lus dbang du sdud la
265b4(1): brtson// phrin las dus la bab pa'i tshe// zas su snying gi phyer tshal la// skom du glo ba'i khrag mtsho 'thung // mi sha za zhing bdud khyim 'joms// dus la bab po sa ma ya// rin chen 'bar ba'i mi mo la// chu dri
265b5(1): gtams pa'i mgo bo can// khros nas gnyen pos rbad pa na// 'ja' tshon sna lnga'i sbrang mo la// za ba'i phyir yang sbyang mo la// kha nas ro bshal 'dur kham can// dus la bab po sa ma ya// dus gnyis las kyi pho
265b6(1): nya mo// sngags pas lan gcig rbad pa'i tshe// lcags kyi spyang mo mgo dgu la// mche ba ro bshal stobs chen 'joms// lag pa gza' skar tshog por 'phen// dus la bab po sa ma ya// lcags kyi spyang mo chen mo
266a1(1): la// gdan khri pad+ma'i cho 'phrul ni// chu srin dmar po'i mche ba can// mche ba gtsigs pa'i bar bar nas// dung gi spyang mo mgo gsum sbrul// spyan gsum dur khrod brgyad la gzigs// sdang mig zhe
266a2(1): la gnon pa'i tshe// bdud kyi bshan pa gdug pa'i tshogs// kha nas ro khyer dur khrod 'joms// keng rus dkar po zas su za// rak+ta dmar po skom du 'thung // thal ba'i mtshan mas lus la brgyan// ngo la khrag
266a3(1): gis byugs nas kyang // sbrang mo'i ngur skad zengs gsum gyis// dgra bo ma lus rdul phran bzhin// dbang chen gar gyi zhabs drung du// las la bab po spyang mo'i tshogs// shwa na mu kha kha long kha/ kha long kha/ ha na
266a4(1): ha na/ phye ma phye ma/ rdul phran rdul phran/ thal pa thal pa/ zhes gsungs so// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+ta las/ spyang mo ro bshal gyi le'u ste lnga bcu bzhi pa'o// // yang
266a5(1): gcig cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// 'byung po'i dgra bgegs tshar gcad phyir// khrag 'thung 'bar ba'i thugs ka nas// las dang shugs las sprul pa yi// ye shes gsang bar bsdus pa las// rdo rje thugs kyi go ma
266a6(1): la// rdo rje khrag 'thung gzungs ma ste// 'du 'bral med pa'i ngang nyid kyis// gang la bya ba'i gnas dag tu// khams gsum sgrol ba'i las mdzod cig/ khrag 'thung 'bar ba'i dbu gtsug nas// rdo rje 'di rnams la
266b1(1): golas yang 'dug/ sku yi go ma la// de bzhin khrag 'thung gzungs ma ste// 'du 'bral med pa'i ngang nyid kyis// gang la bya ba'i gnas dag tu// khams gsum sgrol ba'i las mdzod cig/ khrag 'thung 'bar ba'i
266b2(1): ljags dag las// rdo rje gsung gi go ma la// pad+ma khrag 'thung gzungs ma ste// 'du 'bral med pa'i ngang nyid kyis// gang la bya ba'i gnas dag tu// khams gsum sgrol ba'i las mdzod cig/ khrag 'thung 'bar
266b3(1): baba'i lte ba las// yon tan rdo rje go ma la// rin chen khrag 'thung gzungs ma ste// 'du 'bral med pa'i ngang nyid kyis// gang la bya ba'i gnas dag tu// khams gsum sgrol ba'i las mdzod cig/ khrag 'thung
266b4(1): 'bar ba'i zhabs dag las// rdo rje las kyi go ma la// las rab khrag 'thung gzungs ma ste// 'du 'bral med pa'i ngang nyid kyis// gang la bya ba'i gnas dag tu// khams gsum sgrol ba'i las mdzod
266b5(1): cig/ khrag 'thung 'bar ba'i 'od zer las// rdo rje las kyi go ma la// dpal gyi kham rgya'i tshogs su sbyor// gnyis su med pa'i 'od zer ni// mi yi lus la dred mo'i mgo// phra men nyid pas las la
266b6(1): brtson// mngag pa'i las la ma g.yel cig/ khrag 'thung sku yi me lce las// phra men las kyi go ma la// dpal dang khyi mo'i tshogs su sbyor// gnyis su med pa'i 'od zer ni// mi yi lus la khyi yi gdong // phra men
267a1(1): nyid pas las la brtson// mngag pa'i las la ma g.yel cig/ khrag 'thung 'bar ba'i ba sgra las// phra men las kyi go ma la// dpal dang long ba'i tshogs su sbyor// gnyis su med pa'i 'od zer
267a2(1): ni// mi yi lus la long ba'i mgo/ phra men nyid pas las la brtson// mngag pa'i las la ma g.yel cig/ dbang chen pad+ma he ru ka'i// dbu yi dkyil 'khor man chad nas// zhabs kyi gdan khri yan chad
267a3(1): du// thugs dang las las sprul pa yi// rdo rje las kyi go ma la// mngags pa tsam gyis las mdzod cig/ ma ma dza dza b+h+yo b+h+yo las la b+h+yo/ zhes gsungs so// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol
267a4(1): pa'i tan+t+ra las/ go ma la mngag pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu lnga pa'o// // de nas gar dbang lha mchog gis// cho 'phrul lhun grub bsdu ba'i phyir// rol pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams la ni// brjid pa'i gar gyis bka'
267a5(1): stsal pa// zhing bcu'i tshogs rnams rol nas kyang // dbang chen tshe yi dngos grub thob// tshe dbang lhun gyis grub par bya// au hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ e A ra li hUM hri dza/ yig 'bru bcu bzhi'i 'phro 'du
267a6(1): yis// gsang chen thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// nr-i las hUM du gyur nas kyang // hUM las ye shes sems dpa'i sku// sran 'bru tsam gyi zla dkyil du// nyung 'bru tsam gyi phyag rgyar gsal// yid bzhin rin chen za ma
267b1(1): tog/ mi 'dzin 'dzin pa'i tshul du gnas// mi gnas gnas pa'i sba thabs ni// skye med dbyings nas gsang ba'i mkha'// rang rig ye shes dbyings la sba// de gsum gdeng du lon nas ni// 'du 'bral med de
267b2(1): lhun gyis grub// de bas 'di rnams bstan pa'i phyir// sgrub pa'i cho ga rdzogs pa'i tshe// bar snang rdo rje sems dpa' yis// lus ni ci 'dra 'khor dang bcas// sems kyis mnyam gzhag dgod par bya// bdag/
267b3(1): nyid phra men 'khor mang dang // gnod sbyin 'khor mang rol par 'dod// des ni dbang chen ting 'dzin zhugs// glu dang bros kyang brtan par bya// bdag nyid 'khor mnyam 'dug dus na// de tshe sku mdog dmar
267b4(1): por bsgyur// lam du zhugs nas 'gro dus ni// ljang gur bsgyur te he he zhes// dgod cing 'gro bar bya ba yin// gang du phyin pa'i gnas khang du// hUM zhes byas la der 'dug go/ 'on tang ma mo thams cad
267b5(1): dbang du bsdu// nyal ba'i tshe yang a zhes bya// tsog tsog yud tsam gnas par bya// bdag nyid gser btso bzhin bsgyur te// kun tu bzang mo nam mkha' dag la 'ong // mngon sum 'dzum mdzad snyan sgra
267b6(1): dang // 'dod sbyor rtsed mo byed par bsam// de ltar bsam pa'i yon tan ni// sa yi 'og tu mda' 'phangs pas// gnam gyi steng gi lha bran 'chi// spyod lam grub pa 'di lta bu// mtshon thogs kun gyi rgyal po
268a1(1): ste// ral gri 'dzin pa chen por 'gyur// 'jam dpal 'khor gyi phyag bya'o// de lta bu yi dus dag tu// gnod sbyin phra men 'khor rnams kyis// bdag la rab tu gtses gyur na// phag gi brtul
268a2(1): zhugs chen po yis// sa yi 'og tu mngon sum bya// ngag gis hUM zhes cung zad bzlas// mAM sa dag kyang mang du bza'// nam mkha' la ni sems dpa' bsam// bgrang phreng klad la lan gsum bskor// de ltar
268a3(1): byas nas bdag rgyal zhing // nang gtong ma ni 'chi bar 'gyur// nyin dang mtshan du zug phrad du// rigs ma 'chol bar sbyor bar bya// skye bos mthong na dam tshig nyams// sus ma mthong na dngos grub
268a4(1): yin// sbyor ba'i byang sems lce la gzhag/ rang gi dben ris gang yin par// skye bo 'du 'dzi thag bsrings te// dgug pa'i brtul zhugs chen po yis// dbyangs kyang drag tu blang bar bya// dzadz+wa la dza la kha khA ti//
268a5(1): ru lu ru lu kha long kha/ ku ku ra tsa kha long kha/ rak+Sha g+h+r-i h+na g+h+r-i h+na la/ bya yi brtul zhugs chen po yis// khams gsum sbrum bur btu bar bya// phag gi brtul zhugs chen po yis// srid gsum khron du brko bar
268a6(1): bya// khyi yi brtul zhugs chen po yis// dmyal khams zas su za bar bya// dka' thub smyon pa'i bro brdungs nas// ru lu'i brten pa 'bum bzlas na// bdag gi dbang du 'du bar 'gyur// glu dbyangs khyi skad
