268b1(1): byang du zug/ khyi yi dka' thub smyon pa yis// rta skad nub kyi phyogs su 'tsher// rta yi dka' thub smyon pa yis// bya skad nub kyi phyogs su cong // khyi yi dka' thub smyon pa yis// phag skad byang gi phyogs su
268b2(1): ngudungur// phag gi dka' thub chen po yis// de ltar byas na brtul zhugs kun// hUM zhes bya ba'i dbyangs blangs nas// bdag gi lus la gzhug par bya// dus la bab par bro mchod la// rde'u chung lan gsum brdung
268b3(1): bar bya// de nas dgra bgegs 'dul ba'i phyir// brtul zhugs ting 'dzin zhugs nas kyang // glu bro dam tshig bzhin du blang // bsgrub pa chen po'i bar gcod pa// brtul zhugs chen pos bsgral nas
268b4(1): kyang // dus gsum rgyal ba'i sras su bskyed// dka' thub chen po yin pa'i phyir// su dang gtam yang bsre mi bya// smyon pa'i tshul du mchongs pa yis// gnod sbyin phra men rnams kyang brgya la// rnams kyang bdag
268b5(1): gi dbang du 'gyur// nyan thos dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir// sngags kyi dka' thub chen po yis// bdud rtsi lnga yi longs spyod bya// ma spangs pa ni dbang du bsdu// nan dbang drag shul skyon zabs su// su dang 'phrad
268b6(1): pa bsgral zhing sbyar// 'di ni dpal gyi thugs dam ste// rgyun mi 'chad par spyad na ni// bdag gis ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin/ dka' thub bsrungs pas dngos grub thob// rol pa'i 'khor tshogs mang po
269a1(1): kun// 'di la som nyi rtsi ste za// de skad ces ni gsungs nas kyang // lung du bstan pa chen po yin// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ che lhun gyis grub par bya
269a2(1): ba dang / bar gcod med pa'i gzungs bstan pa dang / brtul zhugs chen po mdzad pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa drug pa'o// // de ma thag tu lhun grub pa'i// pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gis// rol pa'i gsung ni
269a3(1): 'di skad du// de lta bu yi dus dag tu// gnod sbyin rnams ni 'khol 'dod na// dur khrod chen por song nas ni// de yi gzugs ni khrag gis bri// snying gar phur bus mnan nas ni// dgug pa'i brtul zhugs hUM
269a4(1): zhes bzlas// ma 'ongs par du bsdad nas ni// zhag bdun gyis ni khugs par 'gyur// gnod sbyin rnams la ci dgar spyod// rnal 'byor pa yi bran du gyur// phra men rnams ni 'khol 'dod na// ras sam grog
269a5(1): shing shun la// phra men gzugs ni khrag gis bris// yan lag phur bus mnan nas ni// snying gar rdog pas mnan byas te// dgug pa'i brtul zhugs hUM zhes bzlas// zhag bdun gyis ni nges par 'ong // pra
269a6(1): men rnams ni ci dgar rol// khong gis lan na khong dag 'chi// bdag gis lan na bdag nyid nyams// rkang gnyis las la 'khol 'dod na// de yi gzugs ni khrag gis bris// phur bu snying dang kha
269b1(1): gdab// khros te rab tu mnan nas su// dgug pa'i brtul zhugs hUM zhes bzlas// zhag bdun gyis ni dbang du 'du// phyag na rdo rje dga' bar 'gyur// ma mo las la 'khol 'dod na// bud med bongs tshad
269b2(1): khrag gis bris// snying kar rdog pas mnan nas ni// phur bus 'dril cing bsgom par bya// zhag bdun gyis ni nges pa ru// ci bgyi gsung zhes zer te 'ong // de nas bdag gis spyad par bya// bud med rnams ni
269b3(1): ci dgar 'khod// bgegs rnams kun ni 'khol 'dod na// so so'i gzugs dgra khrag gis bris// phur bu'i rtse mor ming bri zhing // gong du hUM gcig bzhag nas ni// tshon skud sna lnga'i skud pas gdags// lan
269b4(1): gsum bskor te gdab byas na// bdag gi dbang du 'dus nas ni// ji ltar bsgo ba nyan par byed// 'gro nyal 'dug sdod ci byed kyang // 'khor dang bcas pa'i bsnyen pa bzlas// nang par mal nas langs nas
269b5(1): kyang // yi dam gnas pa'i sa phyogs su// gom gsum sbags nas dran par bya// gshang gci byed pa'i sa phyogs su// dri chen lag tu blangs nas su// phyogs bcu kun la kha bltas te// sus ma mthong bar kham
269b6(1): gsum bza'// dri chu khyor gang blugs nas ni// sus ma mthong bar khyer gsum btung // shin tu dben pa'i sa phyogs su// dri chen bdun du bzhag nas ni// yan lag bzhi ni sa la gzug/ rta skad thengs gsum
270a1(1): 'tsher bar bya// ru lu ru lu tshal pa bzlas// byang gi phyogs su kha bltas te// gnod sbyin dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir// dri chu mdun du bzhag nas ni// khyi skad thengs gsum dus nas kyang // ru lu ru
270a2(1): lu kha long kha// ku ku ra tsa kha long kha// nyin dang mtshan du thug phrad du// rigs ma 'chol bar sbyor ba bya// skye bos mthong na dam tshig nyams// sus kyang ma mthong dngos grub yin// byang chub sems ni lce la
270a3(1): gzhag/ dus dang rnam pa med pa yin// sbyor ba kho na las su bzang // skabs la bab pa'i dus dus su// dur khrod gnas su byug par bya// zhing dang b+han+na mang du bsags// rang gi dben pa gang yin par// skye
270a4(1): bopo rnams las thag bsrings la// sku drug ye shes drug tu shes shing rtogs par bya// srod dang tho rangs nam gyi gung // dro dang nyin phyed dgong kha'i dus// dbyangs su skad drug shes par bya// dus drug kun tu rde'u
270a5(1): chung brdung // srod la 'khor gsum bro brdungs te// nub kyi phyogs su kha bltas nas// rta skad 'tsher ba'i glu skad blang // ru lu'i bsnyen pa 'bum bzlas shing // snum chen gsur gyi spos me gtang // nam gyi gung
270a6(1): la mi nyal bar// phrin las gong ma bzhin du bya// dus la bab pa'i bro mchod la// phyi nang drag tu mtshams kyang gcad// rde'u chung dir dir lan gsum brdung // sha khrag gtor ma rgyun mi gcod// glu bro shar gyi
270b1(1): phyogs su dbul// mi yi bu mo 'khor dang bcas// grul bum bu mo 'khor dang bcas// gnod sbyin srin po'i bu mo 'khor bcas kyis// thabs dang shes rab so sor 'khyud// phar yang zur 'gros byed pa
270b2(1): la// zur 'gros byed cing 'ong ba la// tha tshig glu dang dam tshig bro// klu yi bu mo bsten pa'i bro// thabs dang shes rab so sor 'khyud// lag pa g.yon pa bstan byas te// byang gi phyogs su kha bltas te// tha tshig
270b3(1): glu dang dam tshig bro// gnod sbyin bu mo bsten pa'i bro// thabs kyi rkang pa brkyang nas su// yum gyi rkang pa'i bar du bcug/ de nas bskor ba byed pa ni// tha tshig glu la dam tshig bro// thabs dang shes rab so sor
270b4(1): 'khyud// 'bru tshugs blta zhing khros par bsgom// sha khrag gtor ma bdud rtsir bcas// de la bskor ba byed pa ni// lho nub mtshams su kha bltas pas// srin po'i bu mo bsten pa'i bro// thabs dang shes rab so/
270b5(1): sor 'khyud// lag pa g.yon pa bzung nas ni// 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta ba dang // rtags su byang chub sems bcas pa// mi yi bu mo bsten pa'i bro// mna' dang dam tshig bsgrag par bya// nyi ma phyed kyi
270b6(1): dus su ni// lho yi phyogs su kha bltas te// grul bum skad du ku co bya// phrin las dgongs pa gong ma bzhin// dgong mchod dus la bab pa'i tshe// grib so bzlog pa'i cho ga bya// ha cang skad ni mi che bar// de
271a1(1): yang rde'u chung dir dir brdung // dbyangs ni yid tsam gdung bar blang // de yang dus drug kun tu yang // gsang ba'i mchod pa rgyun mi gcad// mi yi bu mo bsten par bya// lan 'ga' de dang ma ldan
271a2(1): na// ku ku ra dang ra la sogs// ba dang bud med gang yang rung // shin tu dkon nas med pa'i tshe// byes dang mgron po byed pa na// lus las sprul pa'i lha mo yis// sbyor ba'i dam tshig mi bcag go/ de ltar
271a3(1): byas na dngos grub thob// rgyun dang rgyun min rtag par ni// sman ni lus la bsrel bar byed// ces gsungs so// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ phrin las mthar phyin
271a4(1): cing thams cad dbang du bsdu ba'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// // de ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das// gar dbang lha mchog chen po yis// rol pa'i tshogs la bka' stsal pa// spyan ras gzigs dbang
271a5(1): lhun grub pa// maN+Dal tshad dang ldan par bya// thig bzhi gdab pa'i ling tshe dgu// dbus su gru gsum bskor bar bya// gting khung gru gang kha khyer la// mkhyud gang kha dog mdzes par bri// le'u tshe brgyad la tshon
271a6(1): rtsi lnga// dbus su mthing ga le'u tsher bcas// rgyan dang gdugs la sogs pa dang // mtshan dang ldan pa'i yam shing la// dpal dang ldan pa'i b+han d+ha rnams// e yi dbus su rdzas dgram pa// 'di rnams bsgrub
271b1(1): pa'i rgyu ru gsungs// de ma thag tu spyan ras gzigs// the tshom skyes nas zhus pa'i tshig/ gar dbang lha mchog rol pa'i tshogs// mchod sbyin bsreg pa'i las tshul gang // rdzas rnams dgod pa'i rim pa
271b2(1): gang // bsnyen bsgrub mthar phyin phrin las gang // gar dbang lha yis bka' stsal pa// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams na// chags par gyur pa'i sems can la// dbang du bya ba sbyar bar gsungs// zla
271b3(1): mtshan can nam chu gling du// sdong gcig ma yi gzungs ma gzung // pad+ma dbang chen skur bsgoms te// zla gam dmar po'i dkyil 'khor la// 'od zer 'phros pa'i mda' gzhus brgyan// dmar smug khros pa'i lha
271b4(1): mchog rnams// rdo rje dbyug pas rab drangs te// dga' chags yid kyis mchod sbyin bya// gar gyi dbang phyug chen po la// byang chub sems kyi mchod pa yis// mchod cing bsreg pa'i las bya'o// hUM/ skye med blo
271b5(1): ldan byang chub sems kyi rdzas// me long ye shes dag par rab sbyangs te// dus gsum rgyal ba'i sku la mchod pa 'bul// hUM/ skye med blo ldan dri med gsang ba'i chu// mnyam nyid ye shes gsal bar rab sbyangs
271b6(1): te// dus gsum rgyal ba'i sku la mchod pa 'bul// hUM/ skye med blo ldan rak+ta gsang ba'i rdzas// rtogs pa'i ye shes chen por rab sbyangs te// dus gsum rgyal ba'i gsung la mchod pa 'bul// hUM/ skye med blo
272a1(1): ldan mAM sa rin po che// 'gro ba kun gyi re 'dod skong ba ste// chos dbyings ye shes dag pas rab sbyangs te// dus gsum rgyal ba'i sku la mchod pa 'bul// hUM/ skye med blo ldan skye med zag pa'i
272a2(1): chu// skye shi 'du 'bral med par grogs kyis bzung // nan tan ye shes dag par rab sbyangs te// phrin las rlabs kyi 'gro drug sgrol bar mdzad// gdug pa'i tshogs kun 'joms la mchod pa 'bul// de nas
272a3(1): rdzas mchog bsten pa'i phyir// rdo rje chu ni gzi ldan no// zil mngar lho yi phyogs su ste// sha chen nub kyi phyogs su dbul// dri la sogs pa byang du dgod// sha khrag gtor ma la sogs kun// pho nya rim pa bzhin
272a4(1): du dgod// skad cig ma yi ting 'dzin gyis// bsgom dang bsnyen dang bsgrub pa dang // 'dzab la sogs pa ma rdzogs tshe// bcu gcig phrin las gzhung bzhin mdzad// bsnyen pa bzhi khri rdzogs pa dang // dpal
272a5(1): dang ma mo mchod pa'i phyir// sbyin sreg gzhung bzhin brtson par bya// dbang du bsdus nas dbyings su rol// zhes gsungs so// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+ta las/ sbyin sreg gi
272a6(1): le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// // de ma thag tu gar dbang lhun mchog gis// thugs rje'i stobs kyi phrin las 'di gsungs so// thugs rje'i phrin las rmad po che// sngon gyi las dbang drag po dang // gzung
272b1(1): dang 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog gis// lan cig ldang ba'i bag chags mnan// oM nA ga stAstA ni/ na sha stAm+b+ha ni/ yak+Sha suM b+ha/ yak+Sha ni suM b+ha hAM/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ gr-ih+NA pa ya/ gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM/ yA na ya ho/ b+ha ga wAn biR+Ya rA
272b2(1): dza hUM phaT/ mtshungs med che ba'i khyad par rab ston phyir// nga rgyal mthu bsnyems bdud kyi dpung bcom nas// 'jig rten 'das pa'i de ba chen po brgyad// che ba'i rtags dang ldan pa dbang phyug yang che
272b3(1): gnon// zhabs brgyad ting 'dzin brgyad kyi chas ldan pas// bka' dang dam tshig gnas par bya ba'i phyir// snying gar mkhrig ma nub cing sgal tshigs 'joms// nyon mongs nyam thag 'bod sgrog di ri ri// hUM
272b4(1): kAr pra be sha ya phaT nan/ nI la daN+Da pra be sha ya phaT nan/ ya mAn+ta ka pra be sha phaT nan/ Ar+ya a tsa la pra be sha phaT nan/ Tak+ki rA dza pra be sha phaT nan/ a mr-ita kuN+Da li pra be sha phaT nan/ ma hA ba la pra be sha phaT/
272b5(1): nan/ pad+ma kun+da li pra be sha phaT nan/ phyag rgya chen po'i skur bsgoms nas// gzir gnon drag po'i las byas pas// sdug bsngal chu bo'i rgyun bskams pas// sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams kyi bkas// zhi bas thams
272b6(1): cad tshim par mdzad// rgyas pas ma lus mngon sangs rgyas// dbang gis dbang du ma 'dus med// mngon spyod byin rlabs rmad po che// gsad cing gnan dang sbar bar mdzod// ces gsungs so// rgyud thams
273a1(1): cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ gzir gnon drag po'i mdzad pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa dgu pa'o// // spyan ras gzigs kyis de ltar mnan cing gzir bas/ don na
273a2(1): dbyings dang ye shes te// rtags ni thabs dang shes rab bo// mi dmigs ngang du thim pas na// de bas nga sngon sangs rgyas// da ltar rgyud 'di bshad dus// tshig tu brjod pa med do// phyi ma'i rnal 'byor rnams
273a3(1): la'ang // lhun gyis grub par sangs rgyas// de don snang bar gyis shig/ 'di lha'i rgyud 'di gtad kyis// phyag rgya chen po'i byin rlobs// spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug/ gsung du yongs su sgrogs shig/ de
273a4(1): skad ces bka' stsal pas// pad+ma dbang chen gar gyi dbang phyug lha/ gsang sngags 'di'i mtshan gyi khyad par gang lags/ ci ltar bsgrag par bgyi zhes gsol pa dang / gar dbang lha mchog gis bka' stsal pa/
273a5(1): rgyud 'di'i ming ni/ dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ gsung rab rgya mtsho'i bcud kyi nying khu zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ don dam gsang sbas dbang phyug rgyal ba'i bka' zhes bya bar zung
273a6(1): zhig/ de skad ces gsungs so// de nas rol pa'i 'khor tshogs dang / ma 'ongs pa rnams kyi lam chen por gyur to// bskyed pa'i yum du gyur to// bzhugs pa'i gzhal yas khang du gyur to// pad+ma gar gyi dbang
273b1(1): phyug chen po ci yang mi gsung bar gyur to// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta mchog rol pa'i tan+t+ra las/ yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste drug cu tham pa'o// // rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po dbang rgyas rta
273b2(1): mchog rol pa'i tan+ta chen po rdzogs so// // oM rgyan gyi slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas dang bod kyi lots+tsha ba gnyigs dz+nyA na ku mA ras bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o// /
273b3(1): rgya gar skad du/ shrI pad+ma ma he shwa ra duSh+Ta rak+Shi ta ni rA kr-i taM gu Na tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa srung bzlog yon tan gyi rgyud ces bya ba/ lhun gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas dkyil
273b4(1): 'khor chen po dgu'i lha tshogs rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid yon tan phrin
273b5(1): las ma lus pa'i bdag po de ni/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la dus gsum 'du 'bral med pa chen por bzhugs so// de nyid las brjod kyis mi lang ba'i 'khor gyi
273b6(1): grangs dang bcas nas bzhugs pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ bde gshegs kham rgya mo dang / rdo rje'i kham rgya mo dang / rin po che'i kham rgya mo dang / pad+ma'i kham rgya mo dang / las kyi kham rgya mo dang / sna tshogs kham rgya mo dang /
274a1(1): kham rgya mo mkha' 'gro ma chen mo drug dang / gzhan yang long ba rgyab sbrel chen po brgyad dang bcas pa ni 'di lta ste/ mi bskyod long ba rgyab sbrel dang / rdo rje long ba rgyab sbrel dang / dkon mchog
274a2(1): dpal 'dzin long ba rgyab sbrel dang / rin chen long ba rgyab sbrel dang / tshe mtha' yas pa'i long ba rgyab sbrel dang / pad+ma'i long ba rgyab sbrel dang / grub par gdon mi za ba'i long ba rgyab sbrel dang / lam gyi long
274a3(1): ba rgyab sbrel dang / rigs bzhi'i rgyal ba las long ba rgyab sbrel gnyis gnyis su sprul pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dpa' bo'i cha lugs kyis 'gro ba 'dul ba dang / gzhan yang dmus long 'khor ba drug cu
274a4(1): dang bcas pa ni 'di lta ste/ bde gshegs rdo rje'i rigs kyi dmus long bcwa lnga dang / bde gshegs rin chen rigs kyi dmus long bcwa lnga dang / bde gshegs pad+ma'i rigs kyi dmus long bcwa lnga dang // bde
274a5(1): gshegs las kyi rigs kyi dmus long bcwa lnga ste/ rigs bzhi'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dpa' bo'i skur sprul nas sems can gyi don mdzad pa dang / gzhan yang za byed dpal gyi khyi brgyad la ye shes sprul
274a6(1): pa'i khyi bcus bskor ba rnams dang / gzhan yang sgo ba chen po bzhi rnams ni 'di lta ste/ theg chen dgu dang ldan pa'i phyir na mgo dgu brtsegs pa'i rkang gcig pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang ldan pa'i phyir
274b1(1): na mgo brgyad lag brgyad rkang brgyad pa dang / ye shes drug dang ldan pa'i phyir na mgo drug lag drug rkang drug pa dang / sku gsung thugs dang ldan pa'i phyir na mgo gsum lag gsum rkang gsum pa dang / gzhan
274b2(1): yang sprul pa'i me 'brug dang / rlung 'brug dang / yang sprul ba se'i byan lag dmar po dang bcas pa rnams ni/ rje btsun ma pad+ma gzi ldan ma'i mkha' bde ba chen po las 'gro ba'i don du sprul nas bzhugs
274b3(1): so// de nas yum pad+ma gzi ldan mas rdo rje'i glu 'dis rnam par bskul to// don dam chos nyid spros pa med pa las// rig dang ma rig sgyu ma'i khyad par gyis// rol pa'i 'byung gnas 'khor ba mya ngan
274b4(1): 'das// las kyi dbang gi dregs pa khams gsum gnas// dbang chen che mchog khyad par bstan pa'i phyir// dregs pa thams cad dbang du bsdu nas ni// sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba'i dus la bab// mi rtog
274b5(1): chos kyi sku las phyag rgyar bzhes// zhes bskul lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das pad+ma dbang chen nyid sku skye ba med pa nam mkha' lta bu'i ngang nas/ gzugs sku ye shes sgyu ma'i skur bzhengs te/ sngags kyi rgyal po
274b6(1): 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // oM pad+ma ma hA shrI he ru ka sarba duSh+TAn ta ga ha na da ha pa tsa hUM phaT/ sku'i gsang sngags so// oM pad+ma shrI he ru ka hrIHha ha hUM phaT/ gsung gi sngags so// oM hu lu hu lu
275a1(1): hUM phaT/ e A ra li hr-i dzaH/ thugs kyi sngags so// oM pad+mAn+ta kr-ita shrI he ru ka he he ru ru kaM kaM pad+ma DA ki ni dza la shaM b+ha ra ba sha ni hUM/ yon tan gyi sngags so// mau tri tha pad+mAn+ta kr-i ta di ma da ri hrIHha ya
275a2(1): gri wa e ka dza TI hu lu hu lu hUM hrIHdza dzaHphrin las kyi sngags so// gsang sngags rnam pa lnga brjod pas/ 'jig rten khams rnams g.yo 'gul ldeg/ dregs pa can rnams snying 'dzag pas// dbang chen po la
275a3(1): skyabs su dang // rang rang srog rnams nye bar dbul// a ya ma la du ru tsa sha na la/ phul nas bran du khas blangs te// sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba yi// bka' yi srung mar dam bcas so// de nas 'khor la
275a4(1): rab gzigs nas// lta ba dang ni spyod pa dang // dbang gi dkyil 'khor dam tshig dang // sgrub dang phrin las rab bshad bya// snod kyi 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings// 'gyur ba med pas chos kyi
275a5(1): dbyings// thugs rje rgyun chad med pas dbyings// nyes pa'i skyon rnams bral bas dbyings// phrin las thogs pa med pas dbyings// chos rnams 'byung khungs gyur pas dbyings// bcud kyi sems can ye shes
275a6(1): sku// kun gzhi 'gyur med chos kyi sku// yid ni rang byung ye shes sku// nyon mongs lnga rnams longs spyod rdzogs// sgo lnga cir snang sprul pa'i sku// tshogs brgyad sku gsum lhun gyis grub// zhe sdang dmyal ba'i 'jig
275b1(1): rten 'di// 'gyur med rdo rje me long gsal// ser snas chags pa yi dwags gnas// mnyam nyid ye shes rin chen 'byung // gti mug byol song lam gnas pa// chos dbyings rtag pa rnam snang mdzad// 'dod
275b2(1): chags mi ste bde bar spyod// so sor kun rtog snang mtha' yas// nga rgyal lha dang lha ma yin// bya ba nan tan don yod grub// rigs lngar rtogs pa 'di kun kyang // 'gro ba drug la rang bzhin gnas// 'gro drug
275b3(1): gzugs su snang ba kun// pad+ma dbang chen nga yi sku// lha yi srog ni a dkar po// ri rab rtse gnas rol mo spyod// lha min su ser srog ldan pa// ri rab khong seng gnas nas 'khrugs// gling bzhir mi gnas
275b4(1): ljang gu nr-i// phyi nang 'dod yon las la chags// byol song dud kha du yi tshogs// phyi yi rgya mtsho'i nang na gnas// yi dwags phred mar bkres shing skom// grong khyer seng skya'i gnas na spyod// dmyal ba'i tri nag tsha
275b5(1): grang can// rdo rje gdan 'og gnas pa yang // 'gro drug srog las gsung du 'byung // de yang dbang chen nga yi gsung // rig drug sems kyi snang ba yang // pad+ma dbang chen nga yi thugs// gzugs khams tshangs
275b6(1): 'i gnas bzhi rnams// bsam gtan mu bzhi oM du gnas// gzugs med skye mched mu bzhi AH/ khams gsum lus dang ngag yid rnams// dbang chen sku gsung thugs su gnas// rnal 'byor sgrub pa'i blo can
276a1(1): gyis// gnyis su med par blta bya'o// dpal pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa srung bzlog gi rgyud las gleng gzhi dang gleng bslang ba dang / dregs pa dbang du bsdus shing gsang ba'i sngags dang chos nyid
276a2(1): yang dag pa'i lha dgongs bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das pad+ma dbang chen 'khor 'das kyi bdag po chen po de la dor ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs
276a3(1): so// rnal 'byor bla ma bstan pa'i tshe// brtson 'grus chen po'i spyod pas spyad// 'dod pa'i longs spyod lnga rnams kyang // chags med gus pa'i spyod pa yis// bla ma mnyes par bya phyir dbul// srog lus srog dang
276a4(1): chung ma dang // bu dang bu mo ma la sogs// rdo rje slob dpon bla ma la// lus ngag yid gsum mnyes yon 'bul// chags med bung pa'i spyod pa spyad// rnal 'byor sde snod mnyan bsam tshe// lkog nyal pha ma'i spyod
276a5(1): pa spyad// kha sbub skyon spangs mnyan par brtson// gzhog ra la skyon dor bsam pas 'bad// zhabs rdol bkag la yang yang bsam// dug can bcud ni za mi btub// dug med zas skom lus kyi bcud// gsang
276a6(1): zhing snod ldan rnams la spel// dgos 'dod 'byung ba'i nor bu'am// dpag bsam shing dang bum pa bzang // 'dod pa thams cad 'byung ba yang // klu dang lha dbang gnod sbyin ltar// rnal 'byor spyod pa spyad
276b1(1): par bya'o// rnal 'byor dgongs bsgrub byed pa'i tshe// drang srong dka' thub brtul zhugs som// mu stegs brtul zhugs spyod pa ltar// lus ngag yid gsum 'bad byas nas// 'dod pa ma 'grub bar du
276b2(1): bsgrub// bsam gtan mnyam par 'jog pa'i tshe// til bum sgron ma lta bur spyad// rjes gcod rnam bzhi mdzad pa'i dus// rgyun chad med par chu bo bzhin// gzhung bzhin mthun pa'i spyod pas spyad// lus dang
276b3(1): grib ma mi 'bral ltar// sems nyid lha dang bral ba mi bya// rnal 'byor gsang sngags zlos pa'i dus// bul ba ma yin myur ba min// che chung sgra yi skyon spangs nas// bung ba rdza mar bcug pa bzhin// stong gsum
276b4(1): gang ba'i 'od zer gyis// mchod pa 'bul zhing dngos grub len// mtsho nang char pa babs pa ltar// dngos grub rlabs chen 'khrigs sprin 'thibs// mgal me'i 'khor lo'i spyod pa bya// rnal 'byor dam tshig
276b5(1): nyams pa dang // nam yang 'grogs par mi bya ste// lhan cig mi gnas mtshon pa'i dpe// sgron me dang ni mun pa dang // dug dang sman dang chu dang me// sha ba khyi dang dgra zun bzhin// dam tshig nyams dang
276b6(1): 'grogs mi bya// wa yi brtul zhugs spyod pa yis// grib can nam lus dor bar spyad// spyod pa 'di ni gsang sngags la// mchog tu gces par rab tu bshad// mu stegs lta bu'i spyod pa yis// zhing bcu ma lus
277a1(1): #sgrol bar bya// ma hA daM ba'i spyod pa yis// gzungs ma mtshan ldan la sbyar ba// kr-iSh+Nas ra'i sbyor ba yis// 'gro drug snying rjes bsrung bar bya// gar mkhan lta bu'i spyod pa yis// 'gro ba so sar
277a2(1): mthun par gdul// ming sring lta bu'i spyod pa yis// rdo rje'i mched lcam bskyang bar bya// dpa' bo lta bu'i spyod pa yis// bar chad dgra bgegs gzhom par bya// btson rdzi lta bu'i spyod pa yis// rtsa ba yan lag
277a3(1): dam tshig bsrung // byan mo mdzangs pa'i spyod pa yis// dam rdzas ma lus tshang bar bsags// rtag par bsam sbyor spyod pa dang // mgon po kun tu rku ba dang // spyod pa ma lus thams cad kun// shes bzhin
277a4(1): rnam par spyad par bya'o// zhes gsungs so// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa srung bzlog gi rgyud las/ lus ngag yid gsum gyi spyod pa bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rim
277a5(1): ra bgrod pa 'di rnal 'byor pa'i ched du gsungs so// sems can ma lus thams cad la// lus la dbang bzhi rdzogs pas na// dbang bzhi yang dag sbyin par bya// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang // de kho na yi
277a6(1): dbang du gsungs// brgyud rnams kun gyi don bsdus so// sems can khams ni ma lus pa'i// lus la rtsa yi dkyil 'khor gnas// bum pa'i dbang yang bskur ba ni// bum pa mi bskyod chu yi dbang // lus kyi
277b1(1): bag chags dag par byed// cod pan rin chen 'byung gnas dbang // bdud bzhi'i tshogs las rgyal bar byed// rdo rje snang ba mtha' yas dbang // ltag khung 'chi bdag bdud kyang 'joms// dril bu don yod
277b2(1): grub pa'i dbang // chos rnams sgra yang sgrogs par mdzad// gzugs phung rnam par snang mdzad nyid// de la rdo rje'i ming yang btags// dur khrod chas brgyad dbang bskur bas// dur khrod bdag por yang dag
277b3(1): grub// kha T+wAM ga ni lha yi sku// shes rab DA ma ru yi sgras// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med par// ma dang mkha' 'gro dbang du sdud// de sogs mtha' yas dbang rnams kun// mdor bsdus rig pa'i dbang
277b4(1): lngar gnas// de thob lus kyi sgrib pa dag/ bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom par dbang // nang gi dbang bskur bshad pa na// bla ma bde ba 'byongs pa ni// rlung gis thig le 'dren par nus// sems can thams cad
277b5(1): ma lus kyi// lus la yi ge gnas pas na// yi ge rab tu sbyor ba yis// rtsa gsum bde ba'i khu ba sbyang // gzungs ma mtshan dang ldan pa la// lus kyi sbyor bas dal bus bsrub// ting 'dzin brtan pas nang du
277b6(1): gzud// byang sems thig le mkhar 'bebs nas// rab ni ba dang be'u 'dra// 'bring ni bung ba me tog bzhin// tha mas bya dang bye'u ltar blangs// hUM las lhar gsal lus la thim// de dag gis ni dri ma
278a1(1): dag/ bzlas pa'i gsang sngags bgrang bar nus// gsang ba'i dbang yang rab brjod bya// srid gsum sems can ma lus la// lus khams bdud rtsi gnas pa yang // khams dgu 'dus pa'i
278a2(1): drangs ma ni// bdud rtsi lnga ni rigs lnga yab// 'byung ba bzhi ni yum du gnas// bsnyen pas gzungs ma btsal bar bya// nye ba'i bsnyen pas yum de yi// gzugs sgra dri la brtag bya zhing // de ba bsgom par byas
278a3(1): nas ni// bsgrub pas b+ha gar ling+ga bzhag/ rjes su dran pas bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas mnyes par mchod pa dang // sems can bde bas khyab par bya// bsgrub chen rdo rje pad+ma bsrub// thig le dbab cing
278a4(1): gzung bar bya// bde ba dang ni mchog tu bde// rnam par rtog bral bde ba dang // lhan cig skyes bde ye shes bzung // dbang de gang thob par gyur pas// yid kyi dri ma dag pa yin// de kho na yi dbang bshad
278a5(1): na// srid gsum khams kyi sems can rnams// lus la srog dang rtsol ba gnas// srog gi rlung ni sems nyid yin// rtsol ba phyi nang rgyu ba las// bzung nas bde ba gyen du bzlog/ mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su
278a6(1): nub// lte ba rgya phor bzhin du mkhregs// ro stod seng ge'i khog pa 'dra// lce yis zhal gyi gdong yang khebs// smin mtshams mdzod spu bsgrub pa dang // dbu yi gtsug gtor brtan pa'i dus// thig le g.yas
278b1(1): 'khyil dung gi gzugs// rang lus rgyal ba'i zhing khams na// 'khor 'das thams cad so sor gsal// ma 'dres nam mkha'i 'ja' lta bu// dbyer med bde ba chen por thim// sangs rgyas kun gyi bstan pa
278b2(1): rnams// dus 'dir rang la nyams su myong // de nyid pad+ma dbang chen yin// dbang ni thob par gyur pa na// lus dang ngag dang yid gsum gyi// dri ma ma lus dag pa yin// thams cad dag ces bya ba
278b3(1): yang // dngos po gsal dag ma yin te// rgyud nas dag par byed pa yang // dper na sa bon btab pa la// dus su mang por gyur pa ltar// dbang gi sa bon btab pa yis// rnal 'byor lus la lo tog
278b4(1): smin// zhes gsungs so// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa srung bzlog gi rgyud las/ dbang bskur ba'i le'u rtse gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// dkyil 'khor
278b5(1): rab tu gang shes 'dod// snying po chos sku dri med dkyil// longs spyod rgyal ba rigs lnga 'khor// rang bzhin mthar phyin 'bras bu yin// snod kyi 'jig rten gzhal yas khang // bcud kyi sems can ltar gnas
278b6(1): par// rnal 'byor gang gis rtogs pa de// rang bzhin nyid kyi dkyil 'khor yin// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor chen po de// rtogs par mi ldan gang zag la// mtshon phyir gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor
279a1(1): bstan// lugs ma bris sku 'bur dang zags// mkhas pas byas na sangs rgyas mthong // bde gshegs sku bzhengs byin rlabs che// 'byor pa mi ldan gang zag la// rdul tshon dkyil 'khor chen po
279a2(1): bstan// rab tu zlum po'i lte ba la// pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug che// 'khor lo drug dang gru chad ldan// rtsibs drug khams rgya chen po drug/ bar khyams gnyis dang sgo bzhir bcas// dang po long ba dmus long
279a3(1): la// gnyis par dpal gyi khri brgyad dang // ye shes sprul pa'i khyi bcur gnas// sgo bzhir sgo srung bzhi rnams ni// mkhas pas bkod nas bri bar bya// rta babs dur khrod rdo ra dang // me dpung 'bar bas rab
279a4(1): tu 'khrigs// yang na thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ni// dbus su pad+ma gsang ba'i sku// hrIHni pad+ma nyi shu bzhi// zur bzhi rin chen khri rkang ni// gru chad bzhi ru rnam par gnas// bar khyams dang po thod rus
279a5(1): la// 'khor gyi long pa brgyad po dang // dmus long drug cu dgod pa yong // phyogs rer bco lnga bco lnga gnas// gnyis par me dpung khyi sbyang la// sgo bzhi sgo ba rta babs dang // dur khrod me dpung 'bar bas
279a6(1): 'khrigs// dkyil 'khor 'di ni gzi brjid can// nyi zla bzhin du gzi mdangs che// rnal 'byor spros pa smyung nas gnas// ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor rab tu bsgom// pad+ma dbang ngam rta mgrin dbang // gang la
279b1(1): mos pa rab tu bsam// bsdus la dga' ba'i rnal 'byor pas// pad+ma dbang chen sku gcig pa// dbu lnga phyag ni bcu drug pa// zhabs brgyad pa ni bsgom par bya// yang na blo chung mos pa can// rta mgrin g.yas
279b2(1): dkar g.yon sngo ba// dbus ma pad+ma rA ga'i sku// rdo rje kha T+wAM sbrul zhags g.yas// dril bu dung dmar lcags sgrogs g.yon// pad+ma ral gri yum la 'khril// 'di ltar bsgom par byed pa de// sangs rgyas thob par
279b3(1): gdon mi za// rnam par smin pa'i rig 'dzin ni// rang sems lha skur nang du smin// bag chags lus ni phyi na gsal// brkos phor nang gi sAts+tsha 'dra// yul ni sangs rgyas gdul zhing ste// bla ma dam pas 'dul
279b4(1): bar mdzad// tshe la dbang ba'i rig 'dzin ni// rang don lo ni stong dang ni// drug brgyar rang gi don du bzhugs// gzhan gyi don du bzhugs 'dod na// byis pa lo brgyad lon tsam du// brgya brgya dag tu bskur
279b5(1): zhing gnas// pad+ma dag la brdzus nas skye// lha mi'i lus ni khyad par can// skye ba bzhes nas 'gro don mdzad// sprul pa sku yi bla ma la// zhing khams kun tu dam chos nyan// phyag rgya chen po'i rig 'dzin ni// rang
279b6(1): lus sangs rgyas bsgom 'dzin pa// longs spyod rdzogs sku rigs lnga'i 'khor// rgyal ba rnams las chos kyang nyan// shar na mngon par dga' ba'i zhing // rdo rje sems dpa'i sras su 'khrungs// lho na dpal dang
280a1(1): ldan pa ste// rin chen 'byung ldan 'khor na gnas// nub na bde ba chen po na// snang mtha' yas la chos kyang nyan// byang na rnam dag bkod pa ru// don yod grub pa'i rigs su skye// dbus phyogs
280a2(1): byang chub snying po ru// rnam par snang mdzad zhal mthong nas// phyag rgya chen po'i rig 'dzin nyid// rang lus lha skur smin pa'o// lhun gyis grub pa'i rig 'dzin ni// mnyam par gzhag tshe chos kyi sku// langs tshe
280a3(1): longs spyod rdzogs lus thob// zhing khams nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// rgyan dang gdan dang 'od zer sogs// sangs rgyas che ba'i yon tan thob// ces gsungs so// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa srung bzlog gi
280a4(1): rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dam tshig 'di dag gsungs so// shel sgong dkar po dri med 'di// 'dam du nam yang bying mi bya// yid bzhin nor bu re
280a5(1): skoslong ba// ma rnyed bar du btsal bar bya// chu bo rab med sgrol mkhan la// drin ni nams kyang bkur bar bya// rin chen gser gyi sgrom bu la// zhabs su bug pa brtol mi bya// lha yi dbang po'i lcags chen
280a6(1): po// 'khyogs kyang bsrang bar mi bya'o// me tog u dum wa ra la// lag gis brtse bar mi bya'o// tsan+dan smug po'i sdong po la// bud shing bya ba'i sems mi gtong // lcags kyi thu lum 'bar ba la// lag pas
280b1(1): gzung bar mi bya'o// gser gyi ri la 'bab pa'i chu// nams kyang btung bar mi bya'o// seng ge dkar mo'i nyal shul du// mal ni bca' bar mi bya'o// rgya mtsho chen po'i 'dzing chu la// gru ni sad par mi
280b2(1): bya'o// rin po che yi za ma tog/ dug gis sbyang bar mi bya'o// khyad par dam tshig bcu gnyis 'di// rnal 'byor dam la gnas pa yis// rang gi srog bzhin rtag tu bsrung // ma bsrungs nyams pa'i chad pas
280b3(1): 'phog/ rdo rje dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur// bsrungs na yon tan bsam mi khyab// mchog dang thun mong dngos grub 'thob// ces gsungs so// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa srung bzlog gi rgyud las/ sa gzhi rin po
280b4(1): che lta bu'i dam tshig bstan pa'i le'u lnga pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsgrub pa rnam par bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di gsungs so// bsgrub pa'i don yang gnyis
280b5(1): yod de// mchog gi bsgrub pa bya ba dang // thun mong dngos grub bsgrub pa'o// mchog gi bsgrub pa rnam pa gnyis// bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom pa dang // rdzogs pa'i rim pa bzang po bsgom// bskyed pa'i rim pa
280b6(1): bsgom bya ba// sku gsung thugs rje'i 'byung tshul gyis// ting 'dzin rnam gsum bsgom par bya// yul nyid sangs rgyas zhing khams yin// 'byung ba rim brtsegs steng du ni// dbang chen gzhal yas
281a1(1): khang yang bsgom// rin chen khri rkang seng ge dang // pad+ma nyi zla'i gdan steng du// gar gyi dbang phyug chen po bsam// dbu lnga dmar po gshog pa bzhi// phyag ni bcu drug zhabs brgyad dang // sku la
281a2(1): bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor dgu// 'khor ni kham rgya chen mo drug/ long ba brgyad dang de yi 'khor// dmus long drug cu lcags spyang brgyad// ye shes sprul pa'i khyi bcu dang // sgo ba bzhi dang me rlung 'brug/ yang sprul
281a3(1): bse yi byan lag rnams// rim par bskyed nas brtan par dmigs// de nas spyan drangs bzhugs su gsol// phyag dang mchod pas mnyes par bya// des nas bzlas brjod bsnyen pa dbul// bstod cing
281a4(1): bshags nas phrin las bcol// dam tshig bsdus la ye shes gshegs// spyod lam kun tu lha nyid bsam// phyi rabs sngags 'chang sgrub pa la// ngas ni khyod la gsal bar bshad// rdzogs rim bsgom pa'i rnal
281a5(1): 'byor pas// gang zag gzer dang sgom thabs dang // 'bras bu bzhi ni dpa' bos bshad// brtson 'grus can dang le lo can// brtson 'grus can gyi gang zag ni// tshe 'dir mngon par 'tshang rgya bar// yan
281a6(1): lag rnam pa brgyad ldan dgos// rgyu la nus pa thogs med pas// sngon nas bsod nams bsags pa dang // rigs kyang khyad par can du 'khrungs// longs spyod 'byor ba che ba dang // gtong phod tshe dang tshe ring
281b1(1): ba// brtson 'grus che zhing dad pa che// de brgyad ldan pa'i gang zag la// brtson 'grus can gyi gang zag ste// bskur ba bdun gyi sangs rgyas te// sngags kyis skur yang bsgyur ba dang // rang lus byin gyis
281b2(1): rlobs pa dang // ngag kyang byin gyis rlobs pa dang // sems nyid byin gyis rlobs pa dang // kun rdzob bde chen byin gyis rlobs// 'od gsal bar ni byin gyis rlobs// zung du 'jug par byin rlobs so// le
281b3(1): lo can gyi gang zag de// srid pa bar dor 'tshang rgya bas// yan lag bdun dang man ngag gnyis// yan lag bdun dang ldan par bya// gnas pa dmigs pa 'od gsal gsum// zung 'jug rigs drug grong khyer
281b4(1): dgab// rdo rje sems dpar bsgom pa gsum// 'od gsal zung 'jug rtse brag bsgom// man ngag gnyis bsgom par do la// bsgyur ba rnam pa gnyis bya ste// ye shes lha skur bsgyur ba dang // zung 'jug sku ru
281b5(1): bsgyur ba'o// gzer ni rnam pa gnyis gdab ste// tshe 'di'i gzer dang bar do'i gzer// tshe 'di'i gzer gnyis gdab pa ni// blta ba bsgom du med pa dang // spyod pa yongs su med pa gnyis// rnal 'byor
281b6(1): brtson 'grus can gyi gzer// bar do'i dus su gzer gsum ni// rigs drug grong khyer gcad pa dang // bar do'i lus ni yi dam bsgom// 'od gsal zung 'jug rtse bral bsgom// gang zag le lo can gyi
282a1(1): ni// gzer 'di bar ma do ru gdab// sgom thabs rnam pa gnyis yod de// rnal 'byor chen po'i sgom thabs dang // srid pa bar do'i sgom thabs so// rnal 'byor chen po'i sgom thabs gsum// lta
282a2(1): ba spyod pa ting nge 'dzin// lta ba'i mthar zug rnam pa gnyis// brdar btags pa yi lta ba ni// theg pa so so'i blta ba nyid// brdar ma btags pa'i lta ba ni// rnal 'byor chen po'i blta ba yin// kho na nyid kyi
282a3(1): ting 'dzin dang // de dang rjes mthun spyod pa dang // 'od gsal zung 'jug ming can rnams// ming can gcig tu gyur pa ni// rnal 'byor pa yis yongs shes bya// spyod pa'i mtha' ru thug pa ni// 'od gsal ba
282a4(1): dang zung 'jug yin// ting nge 'dzin la rnam pa brgyad// gsol gdab sems don rlung dang ni// ril po rjes gzhig snang ba dang // mtshan bcas mtshan ma med pa'o// bla ma la ni gsol ba gdab// byin rlabs
282a5(1): 'byung ba'i gzhi ma yin// sha dang rus pa khrag rnams kyang // khong stong khyed kyi sku la med// nam mkha' la ni 'ja' tshon ltar// khyod kyi sku ni ston par mdzad// sems don shes par ma byas na// rnal 'byor lam
282a6(1): du ji ltar bya// sems kyi ngo bo chos skur gcig/ sgo ni dbang po rnam lngar 'byung // spyod yul snang ba rnam pa gnyis// snang ba gnyis dang mi snang gnyis// 'khrul par 'byung ba'i snang ba ni// khams gsum grong
282b1(1): khyer gsum du snang // ma 'khrul pa yi snang ba ni// sems nyid 'od gsal rang bzhin nyid// mi snang ba la gnyis yod de// 'khrul pa dag gis mi snang ba// ri bong ra dang mo gsham bu// nam mkha'i me tog rus
282b2(1): sbal spu// seng ge'i kha chu la sogs pa// mi srid pa yi chos rnams yin// ma 'khrul ba yi snang ba ni// 'dus ma byas pa'i chos nyid ni// nam mkhar 'dzin pa dang bral ba// chos sku dri ma med pa'o// sems can
282b3(1): rnams kyi srog gyur pa// rlung zhes bya bas las kun byed// 'di ni rnam shes bzhon rta ste// lnga yi bdag nyid bcu ming can// rang bzhin phra ba brgya dang ni// drug cu them pa 'di dag ni// rlung gi bzhon pa'i rgyu
282b4(1): yin te// nyin dang mtshan du rgyu ba yi// de yang ji ltar rab rgyu ba// srog 'dzin rlung ni srog gyur pas// sems dang tha dad med par gcig/ rtogs dang ma rtogs khyad par gyis// 'khor 'das kun gyi las byed
282b5(1): de// rlung rnams kun gzhi nyon mongs dang // yid dang sgo lnga snang ba ni// rlung rnams phra ba'i gzugs kyis ni// shes dang yang dag 'dres gyur nas// dbang po'i lam las byung nas ni// yul rnams kun la
282b6(1): 'jug par 'gyur// rtsa ba'i phung po'i rlung lnga ni// srog 'dzin me mnyam khyab par byed// gyen dang thur du rgyu bar 'dod// yan lag dbang po'i rlung lnga ni// mig la me yi rlung rgyu bas// gzugs rnams thams
283a1(1): cad mthong bar byed// rna bar rlung gi rlung rgyu bas// sgra rnams thams cad zos par byed// sna la sa yi rlung rgyu bas// dri rnams ma lus tshor bar byed// lce la chu yi rlung rgyu bas// ro rnams thams
283a2(1): cad myong bar byed// lus la nam mkha'i rlung rgyu pas// reg bya ma lus nyams su myong // phyi dang nang gi rtog pa rnams// rtsa la rlung zhon rgyu bar byed// rang bzhin rtog bcas brgyad cu nyid// rlung gi bzhon rtas
283a3(1): nyin mtshan rgyu// de phyir rlung zin bsgom par 'gyur// ril por 'dzin pa'i rnam pa ni// mgo bo nas ni rkang pa'i bar// ji srid snying gar phyin gyi bar// rnal 'byor yang dag mtha' la 'jug/ ril por 'dzin pa
283a4(1): zhes bshad do// de bzhin rjes su gzhig pa ni// ji ltar dbugs kyi me long la// mtha' nas rim gyi dbus khyim ltar// rnal 'byor yang dag mtha' la 'jug/ rjes su gzhig pa zhes bshad do// sems de kun
283a5(1): tu snang ba ni// sgo lngas yul la so sor spyod// rang bzhin kun tu snang ba ni// yid kyi rnam shes ma g.yos pa'o// mtshan bcas bsgom pa 'di ltar bya// mtshan bcas nyid du bsgom pa dang // mtshan bcas mtshan
283a6(1): ma med par bsgyur// mtshan bcas 'byung ba'i cho ga dang // byung nas brtan par bya ba'o// mtshan bcas 'byung ba'i cho ga ni// bltas pas spang bar bya ba dang // ma bslad pa yi gang zag la// sems gzung la
283b1(1): sogs bltas pas 'ong // bsgom pas spang bar bya ba yang // ma bslad gang zag bsgom dgos pas// glo bur sku la blta zhing bsgom// bshur bas 'ong bar bya ba ni// ji ltar sprin ni sna tshogs pa// mdog dang
283b2(1): dbyibs ni tha dad pas// nam mkha'i ngang las byung nas ni// de nyid du ni thim par 'gyur// de bzhin rang bzhin thams cad kun// don ni brgyad cu de la yang // 'dod chags rtogs pa bzhi bcu dang // zhe sdang
283b3(1): sum cu rtsa gsum dang // gti mug rtog pa bdun sogs pa// snang ba gsum gyi rgyu can te// ma lus yul la gzhug nas ni// 'od gsal bar ni 'jug par 'gyur// de 'dra'i rang bzhin ma shes pas// mi shes
283b4(1): mun pas khebs nas ni// dge dang mi dge'i las byas nas// 'gro ba lngar ni 'khor bar 'gyur// thabs chen rgyud dang ldan pa la// nyon mongs byang chub yan lag bshad// log gnon dgos na bya bar
283b5(1): bshad// snang ba sku la blta bar bya// mi snang rang gi lus la bya// dbugs la skyon de ma byung na// de la log gnon bya ba ni// mi de dpyad dgos gos kyis zhag gsum gril// sems ni mi 'phro btub tshad
283b6(1): dgug/ de nas sku brtan bar 'di nas chad skyon zhig byung ngam/ de yis 'od// mtshan ma can gyi man ngag ni// dang po sku la blta bar bya// bltas pas goms pa thob gyur nas// bdag nyid sku ru bsgom par
284a1(1): bya// bdag nyid sgra la goms gyur nas// de nas dkyil 'khor gzhug par bya// rnam par smin pa'i lam pa de// dkyil 'khor bcug la dbang bskur ba// thun mong dbang dang thun min
284a2(1): dbang // rig pa'i dbang lnga sku gsung thugs// mtshan ma can gyi man ngag yin// de ltar thob pa'i rting la ni// de ltar brtan pa'i cho ga bya// dgun gyi nyi ma sum cha bya// dbyar gyi nyi ma cha bzhi bya// lugs sku
284a3(1): kun la glo glor lta// mang por bsgom dang chen por bsgom// rang nyid lha yi skur bsgom mo// de ltar thob pa'i rting la ni// mtshan bcas mtshan med bsgyur ba ni// mtshan ma can la brten na ni// mtshan ma med
284a4(1): par rab tu skye// myur bar 'dod na spyod pa bya// sku de myur bar mtshan med 'dod// brtan pa'i cho ga ma byas par// sku yi snang ba bya ba dang // mi snang nam mkha' bshur spyod bya// des ni myur bar mtshan med
284a5(1): gro/ zla ba tsam mam lo phyed 'dod// brtan pa byas kyang bshur ba yis// spyod pa la ni nan tan bya// des ni mtshan ma nub nas ni// gang du zhen med mtshan ma med// lo gcig tsam nas mtshan med
284a6(1): 'ong // mtshan med rang la gtad cing bsgom// mtshan ma rang bzhin nyid kyis 'gag/ mtshan med mi rtog par ni spyod// spyod pa bya dang bshur ba dang // gtad nas bsgom pa gsum po nges// mtshan bcas thun
284b1(1): mong dngos grub thob// 'jig rten dregs pa'i nus mthu dang // mtshan ma lha sku la dga' na// brtan pa'i cho ga byas la ni// mdo tsam bsgom dang res mi bsgom// mi gsal na yang de ltar bsgom// sems ni
284b2(1): 'phro ba dgag par bya// gnyis su med pa'i spyod pa bya// spros bcas dang ni spros med dang // shin tu spros med spyod pa bya// mtshan ma la ni nan tan brtag/ de la mtshan med shugs kyis 'char// rnam par grol
284b3(1): ba'i lam de ni// de kho na nyid man ngag dang // de dang rjes mthun spyod pa'o// mtshan ma med la man ngag gnyis// bar chad dgra bsal lam nyid bsgom// de la bar chod dgrar yang bzhi// dgra 'dul ba yi
284b4(1): man ngag dang // dgra de brtson du bzung ba dang // dgra ni tshar yang gcad pa dang // dgra la dgrar mi 'dzin pa yin// dgra 'dul ba ni bshur ba gnyis// phyi bshur ba dang nang bshur ro// phyi yi bshur la rnam
284b5(1): gnyis te// mngon sum bshur bar bya ba ni// dbang po rlung la 'chor nyan yod// lkog tu gyur pa'i bshur ba ni// yul gzhan lkog tu gyur pa'o// nang gi bshur ba gnyis yod de// gzugs can dag la bshur ba
284b6(1): ni// rtog pa rags pa gzugs can byung // rnal 'byor pa yis ma thub na// shar ba dang ni nan tan bya// spros bral dag la bshur ba ni// rtog pa byung na sna la gtad// yang yang bshur te bshig par bya// rtog pa
285a1(1): byung tshor man ngag go/ dgra bo btson bzung spyod pa gnyis// phyi dang nang gi spyod pa'o// phyi'i spyod sgo lnga'i rnam shes ni// yul la mi gtang rang lugs 'jug/ nang gi spyod pa sems mi 'phro// dgra
285a2(1): de tshar yang gcod par bya// mi dmigs pa yis dus dang ni// 'od gsal dus su byung bas so// dgra la dgrar mi 'dzin pa ni// gzugs sogs rnam par rtog pa ni// byung yang dgrar mi 'dzin pa ste// zung du
285a3(1): 'jug pa'i dus na'o// 'dul dang btson du bzung ba gnyis// mnyam par ma bzhag dus su'o// tshar gcod dgrar mi 'dzin pa gnyis// mnyam par gzhag pa'i dus na'o// lam nyid bsgom pa'i mtshan med
285a4(1): bzhi// gnas pa dang ni mi dmigs pa// 'od gsal zung du 'jug pa'o// gnas pa sems ni bshur bar bya// bshur ba tshad du phyin tsam na// sems ni rang log nyid du gyur// bshur ba tshad du phyin pa
285a5(1): yin// la la tshad du phyin pas 'thob// la la bden pa'i sgo nas 'thob// la la shes pa 'tshams pas 'thob// la la kha bo dag gis thob// la lar spros pa bcad pas thob// de dang rjes mthun spyod pa
285a6(1): gsum// spros bcas spyod pa mtshan mar spyod// spros med spyod pa gsang spyod de// shin tu spros med spyod pa yin// bus pa rnams la ma bstan te// nus pa med pas spyod mi nus// rgad po rnams la ma bstan
285b1(1): te/ rgas pa'i phyir na nus pa shor// rnal 'byor min la mi bstan te// le lo can gyi spyod yul min// shin tu spros med ma yengs pa// rnal 'byor pa la bstan pa yin// bsgom pa thams cad de las byung // lta ba
285b2(1): bsgom du med pa ni// spyod pa yengs su med pa yin// mtshan ma med pa'i man ngag yin// de na gnyis med bsgom par bya// gnyis med bsgom pa'i rting la ni// dang por sems ni gnas pa skye// de nas sems
285b3(1): ni dmigs pa skye// dmigs pa skyes pa'i rting la ni// rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal skye// 'od gsal skyes pa'i rting la ni// zung 'jug bsgom pa skye bar 'gyur// mtshan med pa yi man ngag yin// le lo can gyi
285b4(1): rnal 'byor pa// bar dor 'tshang rgya'i 'ching ba gnyis// rim gyis 'ching dang cig car 'ching // shi ba don dam bden pa yin// skye ba ma lus kun rdzob yin// skyes pa zung 'jug dbyer med do// de la rim gyis
285b5(1): 'chi ba yang // phung po khams dang skye mched rnams// 'byung ba chen po bzhi la thim// 'byung ba chen po bzhi po yang // sa ni chu la thim par 'gyur// chu ni me la thim par 'gyur// me ni rlung la thim par
285b6(1): 'gyur// rlung ni rnam par shes la thim// rnam shes snang ba de la thim// snang ba snang ba mched la thim// snang mched snang ba thob la thim// snang ba thob pa bya ba ni// thams cad stong pa nyid la thim// der ni
286a1(1): yongs rdzogs rnal 'byor gyis// gsol ba'i don ni bshad bya ste// stong pa gsum po rnam dag gang // 'od gsal ba ni 'di bshad do// bsam gtan 'di ni bsam gtan min// 'dis ni
286a2(1): mthar thug mi thob ste// nam mkha' lta bur phyogs gyur pas// 'od gsal ba ni 'di dmigs shing // 'od gsal ba ni gnas thob pas// rab dga' gzugs su skye bar 'gyur// de tshe rab dga' rdo rje'i
286a3(1): sku// kun gyi dbang phyug thob par 'gyur// 'das pa dang ni ma 'ongs pa// da lta byung ba'i srid pa gsum// 'od gsal ba ni rnam dag pas// skad cig gcig la ma lus mthong // thams cad stong pa 'od gsal
286a4(1): ba// shi ba shes rab pha rol phyin// bde bar gshegs pa'i snying po yin// rnal 'byor pa yi grogs yin no// de las chos sku 'byung ba ni// bar ma do yi sku yin te// ji ltar chu rlung drangs pa las// nya dag myur du
286a5(1): 'phar ba ltar// de bzhin thams cad stong gsal las// rgyu 'dra ba ni 'byung bar bshad// sngon 'byung srid pa'i sha gzugs can// dbang po kun tshang thogs med ldan// rigs mthun lha mig dag pas
286a6(1): mthong // bar ma do yi sku de yin// 'gro ba rigs drug grong khyer te// gnyis su med pa'i spyod pas bcad// spros pa'i rnam pa chod gyur nas// bar ma do yi sku de ni// rdo rje sems dpa'i sku ru bsgom// tshe 'di
286b1(1): nyid kyis thams cad mkhyen// sangs rgyas zhing nas mi ldog pas// bar ma do ru mngon 'tshang rgya// 'od gsal ba ni bsgom par bya// zung 'jug sku yang 'byung bar 'gyur// kun rdzob dang ni don dam dag/ so
286b2(1): so'i cha yis phye gyur na// yang dag nyid du 'dres gyur pas// zung du 'jug par de bshad do// zung du 'jug pa gnyis yod de// slob bzhin pa dang mi slob pa// mi slob pa ru gyur tsam na// bar ma do ru mngon
286b3(1): sangs rgyas// snang ba tsam dang gsal ba tsam// snang la rang bzhin med pa gnyis// sangs rgyas zhing nas mi ldog pas// bar ma do ru mngon sangs rgya// 'bras bu sku gsum thob 'gyur ba// chos sku dri ma med pa
286b4(1): dang // longs sku rgyal ba rigs lnga dang // sbrul sku mdzad pa mthar phyin skus// bdag gzhan ma lus bsrung ba dang // bgegs dang bar chad bzlog pas na// bdag don dregs pa srung bzlog yin// zhes
286b5(1): gsungs so// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa srung bzlog gi rgyud las/ mchog gi dngos grub bsgrub pa ste le'u drug pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal pad+ma dbang chen gyis thun mong gi dngos grub
286b6(1): bdag gzhan gyi bar chod srung bzlog 'di gsungs so// gti mug klu gnyan sa bdag dang // 'dod chags ma mo bdud mo dang // zhe sdang gshin rje la sogs pa'i// rang gi bar chod srung ba dang // phas kyi sbyor
287a1(1): ba bzlog par gsungs// oM sngags mar bzhag a kr-i te ka ya man+ta ka e sa ra hUM phaT/ e te pro te ya sa nan sra trod ka rak+Sha rak+Sha/ pho rgyud thams cad srung ba'i sngags so// oM a ne be sha traM be sha ru ba
287a2(1): shaM be shaM ru be shaM ka bruM b+h+yo// ta pa yi mu li du ru ru hUM phaT/ karma tsan+da mu ti du ru hUM phaT/ rak+ka mu te ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ e ga dza Ti tsa ra li pa la mi sha dgra bo la phaT/ nag mo re ma ti pad+ma mi ta ru ti ru ti re ma ti
287a3(1): ha rbad b+h+yo// mo rgyud thams cad srung ba'i sngags so// oM ga ru Da tsa le tsa le/ ta ki tsa ra bi tsa te hu ya hu ya/ hu lu hu lu/ su ru te su ru te/ rak+Sha rak+Sha/ klu gnyan sa bdag thams cad srung ba'i sngags so// e ka
287a4(1): du na bzlog/ suM tri rA dza ya bzlog/ a kro te ka shri many+dzu ya ma rA dza bzlog/ yaM te rgyur thag khrol ba ling du bzlog/ sa ma ya su ma tri bzlog/ pho rgyud thams cad bzlog pa'i sngags so// oM tsa dur ma ma snying na
287a5(1): bzlog/ ma mo tsa ra ya bzlog/ k+Sha na trag rag mo zlog/ rak+Sha re ma ti sha na mu ru b+h+yo// rag mo klad khri sa la tsa ya zlog/ mo rgyud thams cad bzlog pa'i sngags so// oM ga ru Ta tsa le tsa le sa nA ga du na zlog ta ki
287a6(1): tsa te bai te su me ra tsa bzlog hu ya hu ya sa khrag ra tsa ya zlog/ hu lu hu lu nA ga ra tsa ya zlog/ su ru te su ru te sa nA ga rA tsa ya bzlog/ klu thams cad dril te bzlog pa'i sngags so// de nas rang gshed dbab pa
287b1(1): ni// gshin rje skyes pa'i lto bar bri// rabs chad thod pa'i nang du stsal// seng ldeng phur pas gzir ba'i sngags// ya ma trig nan/ yA hur thums dza/ mA ra ya rbad/ ma mo zhing gi pags pa la// bud med lto bar
287b2(1): 'khor lo bri// snrel gri'i thod pa'i nang du stsal// seng ldeng phur pas gdab pa'i sngags/ ma ma ru lu trig nan/ ma hur thums dza/ mA ra ya rbad/ mu stegs bon po'i lto bar bri// mon thod nang du dug chus
287b3(1): brdeg/ tir ti ka trig nan/ tha hur thums dza/ mA ra ya rbad// lha ni pi wang khog pa'am// shing sdong nang du bri bar bya// mi dkar lto bar bris nas ni// mdzo rtol thod pa'i nang du gzhug/ gtor mas brdeg par
287b4(1): byas nas ni// shing gi phur pas gdab par bya// de pa trig nan/ a hur thums dza/ mA ra ya rbad// ra dkar lto bar bri ba yang // srin po srin mo'i gzugs bris nas// rabs chad thod par lcags phyes
287b5(1): brab// gri lcags phur pas brdeg pa'i sngags// ra ga ta trig nan/ ra hu ra thums dza/ mA ra ya rbad/ rag mo trig nan/ rA hur zums dza/ mA ra ya rbad/ bdud po rta nag lto bar bris// g.yag rur gu gul dud
287b6(1): pas bdug/ skyer phur thogs la sngags 'dis gzir/ ru tra treg nan/ du hur thums dza/ mA ra ya rbad/ bdud mo 'bri yi lto bar bris// dre'u thod yung kar dud pas bdug/ lcags phur thogs la sngags 'dis
288a1(1): gzir/ dun ting trig nan/ du hur thums dza/ mA ra ya rbad// gnod sbyin pho mo gzir ba ni// kha nas me 'bar lto bar bri// mi tshil dud pas rta zod bdug/ mchog phur sngags 'dis gzir bar
288a2(1): bya// yak+ka trig nan/ k+Sha hur thums dza/ mA ra ya rbad/ yag mo trig nan/ k+Sha hur thums dza/ mA ra ya rbad/ btsan ni sha ba'i lto bar bris// mu zi'i dud pas 'khor lor bdug/ sha ru'i nang du lcags phur gzir//
288a3(1): yaM tri trig nan/ tsa hur thums dza/ mA ra ya rbad/ rgyal po ra dkar g.yang gzhir bris// byi ba'i thod par yungs kar thun// lcags phur gzir ba'i sngags 'di'o// rA tsa trig nan/ tsa hur thums dza/ mA ra ya rbad/
288a4(1): dmu ni phug ron lto bar bri// rta nag thod par zangs phye'i thun// bdug nas bri zhing brab pa'i sngags// mun mun trig nan/ sa hur thums dza/ mA ra ya rbad/ rdo rje legs pa ra kham ltor// khyi nag thod par yungs
288a5(1): kar bdug/ seng ldeng phur par sngags 'dis gzir/ badz+ra swa d+hu trig nan/ tri hur thums dza/ mA ra ya rbad// rigs ngan ban de'i lto bar bris/ mdzo thod gtor zor ral gris brdeg/ ru tra trig nan/ nr-i
288a6(1): hur thums dza/ mA ra ya rbad/ yul bdag lug nag lto bar bri// rabs chad thod par mtshon sna tshogs// skye tshe thun brab sngags 'dis gzir/ ro li trig nan/ tri hur thums dza/ mA ra ya rbad/ 'gong po bus pa'i
288b1(1): lto bar bri// phong bu'i thod par sre long thun/ haM shaM trig nan/ tri hur thums dza/ mA ra ya rbad/ dam sri khyi dmar lto bar bri// khyi thod nang du mchog phur gzer// khyi dmar brun gyi zum gyis brab/ ru tri trig nan//
288b2(1): tri hur thums dza/ mA ra ya rbad/ klu ni tshangs pa'i lto bar bri// glang dmar rA na gla rtsis byugs// rta rmig thun gyis brdeg par bya// nA ga trig nan/ phu hur thums dza/ mA ra ya rbad/ gnyan ni sdig pa'i lto bar
288b3(1): bri// spre'u'i thod pa raM sna tshogs thun// gar+b+ha trig nan/ sa hur thums dza/ mA ra ya rbad// sa bdag sbas pa'i lto bar bri// phag thod nang du khyi nag brun// dug sna tshogs kyis brab par bya/ sa ga trig nan/ su
288b4(1): hur thums dza/ mA ra ya rbad/ dregs pa spyi la gzir ba ni// rA hu la yi lto bar bri// ra rog thod par sbyang lag brab// ra mchin dkar gsum mngar gyis brab// badz+ra sarba duSh+TAn trig nan/ e hur thums dza/ mA
288b5(1): ra ya rbad// gal te rdzas rnams ma tshogs na// gzugs rnams gang byed bris nas ni// kham sa rdza yi gru gsum gzhug/ zhag grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig tu// phur pas gzir nas rang gshed 'bebs// kun la me chu
288b6(1): 'gal ba stsogs// sarba duSh+TAn tsit+ta rbad na/ sarba tsi na tsit+ta rbad nan/ sha truM mA ra ya rbad nan/ de nas rang rangs gnas su mnan// thog dang ser ba dbab pa ni// rA hu la yi lto bar gzir/ badz+ra sarba duSh+TAn/
289a1(1): tsit+ta zad nan/ phrom phrom dril dril shar shar kru kruM phob/ drag pos gzir ba'o// badz+ra sarba duSh+TAn trig nan/ phrom phrom dril dril shar shar sru phob// rang bzhin gyis gzir ba'o// badz+ra sarba duSh+Than/
289a2(1): tsit+ta rbad nan/ sarba bi na tsit+ta rbad nan/ phrom phrom hril hril shar shar suM phob/ btsan thabs su gzir ba'o// sarba bi na tsit+ta rbad nan/ sarba duSh+TAn tsit+ta rbad nan/ phrom phrom hril hril shar shar suM phob/ spogs
289a3(1): pas gzir ba'o// ltas ngan sna tshogs gtong ba ni/ thod par ltas ngan sna tshogs gzugs/ a ya ma du ru tsa sha na la/ e tsa thun phob/ trig nan e dza thun phob/ hur thums dza/ mA ra ya rbad// ces gsungs
289a4(1): so// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa srung bzlog gi rgyud las/ thun mong gi bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phrin las 'di dag yongs su gsungs so// gti mug can gyi
289a5(1): sems can la// zhi ba'i las kyis gdul ba bya// chu rlung rgyu ba'i dus dag tu// yA yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor bya// nga rgyal can la rgyas pa'i las// sa rlung rgyu ba'i dus su ni// ma yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor
289a6(1): du// tshe dang bsod nams dbang zang spel// 'dod chags can la dbang gi las// me rlung rgyu ba'i dus su bya// baM gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// yul khams bud med rgyal po bsdu// zhe sdang can la drag po'i
289b1(1): las// rlung gi rlung rgyus g.yeng zhing 'thor// e yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// dgra bgegs ma lus bsgral bar bya// phrin las bzhi yi dus dag tu// bdag nyid phyag rgya bzhi ldan bsgom// gtso bo phyag rgya chen
289b2(1): po ste// lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// yul na dam tshig phyag rgya ste// yab ni don las mi 'da' bsgom/ 'phro 'du las kyi phyag rgya ste// mchod 'bul sgrib sbyang dngos grub blang // de dag ma lus cir
289b3(1): snang yang // chos nyid ngang las ma g.yos kyang // zhi ba chos nyid phyag rgya yin// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa'i chos// phyag rgya bzhi la 'phros shing 'dus// e waM ma yA'i yi ge bzhis// gsang sngags rgyud rnams
289b4(1): spros shing rgyas// bsdus nas phyag rgya bzhi ru gsal// e ni drag po'i tshar yang gcod// waM ni ma lus dbang du sdud// ma yis rjes bzung rgyas par mdzod// yA ni thams cad zhi bar gnas// chos rnams skye ba
289b5(1): med pa na// phrin las rnam bzhi'i chos rnams rtog/ zhes gsungs so// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa bsrung bzlog gi rgyud las/ phrin las kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas 'khor rnams dgyes nas/ ston
289b6(1): pas sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang chen po lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor la/ me tog man+da ra ba dang man+da rab chen po/ ku mu dA dang / nor bu rin po che mthon ka dang mthon ka chen po dang / rin po che sna tshogs pa
290a1(1): dang / bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga dang / sha rnam pa lngas mchod nas/ thams cad rjes su yi rang bar gyur to// ston pa sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bo nyid de ni chos kyi sku dri ma med pa'i ngang du bzhugs
290a2(1): so// 'khor rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung bar mdzad do// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa srung bzlog gi rgyud las// rjes su yi rang ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa srung bzlog
290a3(1): gi rgyud rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi paN+Di pad+ma sap+ta ba dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba kha che A nan tas bskur ba'o// / @#// rgya gar skad du/ shrI pad+ma ma hA ba sha/ pad+ma nr-i te shwa ra duSh+Ta khA da nany+dza be sha
290a4(1): na karma tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal pad+ma dbang chen pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gis dregs pa can gzan la 'bebs pa'i phrin las kyi rgud ces bya ba/ dpal rdo rje dbang chen po lhun gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas
290a5(1): la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das khams gsum gyi bdag po chen po ni/ chos nyid rnam par dag pa'i gzhal yas khang na/ 'khor dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas
290a6(1): rnams dang dbye ba med par bzhugs so// de'i tshe de'i dus/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi snang bas gzigs pa ni/ shes bya ji lta bar mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
290b1(1): khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa rnams kyi sems nyid ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang chen po'i thugs dbyer med cing tha mi dad de so so ma yin la/ mi gnyis par gcig tu mkhyen to// shes
290b2(1): bya ji snyed mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis ni phyi snod la gzigs pas sa mi 'gyur ba chos kyi dbyings las sangs rgyas spyan ma dang / chu rgyun chad pa med pa chos kyi dbyings mA ma ki dang / mnyes pa'i skyon dang bral ba
290b3(1): las gos dkar mo dang / rlung thogs pa med pa las dam tshig sgrol ma dang / nam mkha' yangs shing go 'byed pa las kun tu bzang mor gzigs so// gzugs kyi phung po sa las rnam par snang mdzad dang / rnam
290b4(1): par shes pa'i phung po nam mkha' las ni mi bskyod pa dang / tshor ba'i phung po chu las rin chen 'byung ldan dang / 'du shes kyi phung po me las tshe dpag med pa dang / 'du byed kyi phung po rlung las don yod grub pa
290b5(1): gdon mi za ba dang / phung po lnga yang rigs lngar gzigs so// mig la me rlung rgyu bas gzugs kyi mchod pa dang / rna bar rlung gi rlung rgyu bas sgra'i mchod pa dang / sna la sa'i rlung rgyu bas dri'i mchod pa dang / lce
290b6(1): la chu'i rlung rgyu bas ro'i mchod pa dang / lus la nam mkha'i rlung rgyu bas reg pa'i mchod par yang gzigs shing mkhyen to// de ltar mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams gsum gzigs nas/ 'khor ba'i dregs pa
291a1(1): can rnams la gzigs pa ni/ gti mug las klu'i ngan gtad gtong bar mkhyen to// zhe sdang las srog mthu byung bar gzigs so// nga rgyal las thog dang ser ba byung bar mkhyen to// 'dod chags
291a2(1): las dbang sdud por bsgrub byung bar gzigs so// phrag dog las sngags pa stobs 'joms sa phyir bzlog byung bar gzigs shing mkhyen to// de nas 'gro ba rigs drug gi las la gzigs pa ni/ tshad med pa
291a3(1): bzhis tshangs pa la sogs pa'i gzugs khams kyi gnas su gzigs so// blta dgongs ma rtogs pa'i bsam gtan gyis gzugs med mu bzhir gzigs so// dge ba bcus 'dod khams mtho ris thob par
291a4(1): gzigs so// mi dge ba bcus 'dod khams ngan song gnas gsum thob par gzigs so// de ltar ma 'dres par mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'khor 'das kyi bye brag bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams mkhyen pa ni/ dper na
291a5(1): sman pa mkhas pas lag mthil du skyu ru ra rlon pa bzhag pa bzhin du gzigs shing mkhyen to// shes bya ji lta ba dang ji snyed pa dbyer med par mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis ni 'khor bar snang ba nyid mya ngan las
291a6(1): 'das pa nyid las ma g.yos shing / mya ngan las 'das par snang ba nyid las gzhan med de/ dper na chab rom du snang ba'i dus nyid na chur gnas pa kho nar gzigs so// gzigs su yang med/ gzigs pa
291b1(1): yang mi 'gag/ gzigs thabs bsam gyi mi khyab/ gzigs bya dang gzigs byed las grol na yang / sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul chen pos khams gsum gyi gdul bya dregs pa can 'dul par gzigs so// de nas yum
291b2(1): pad+ma gzi ldan pad+ma can gyis glu 'dis bskul lo// e ma ho// thabs ni snying rje chen po nyid// shes rab stong pa nyid kyi ngang // stong nyid snying rje chen po can// thabs dang shes rab 'gro don mdzod// e ma
291b3(1): ho// shes rab yum gyi b+ha ga ru// thabs mchog yab kyi ling+ga yis// b+ha gar ling+ga mnyam bzhag nas// sprul pa'i sras kyi phrin las mdzod// e ma ho// snod kyi 'jig rten shes rab ste// mi dmigs chos
291b4(1): dbyings stong pa'i mdzod// bcud kyi sems can thabs yin te// ma 'gags sems kyi cho 'phrul snang // snod bcud gnyis med 'brel ba yi// blo dang gnyis po rnam par bsres// blo dngos bsres pa'i lta/
291b5(1): dgongs kyis// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das par spyod// shes rab kun gzhis stong pa nas// thabs kyi sems nyid 'gag pa med// rnam shes tshogs brgyad kun ldan pa// tshogs brgyad ye shes rnam lngar sbyor// e
291b6(1): ma ho// ma rig 'khor ba'i 'gro drug rnams// bde chen yab kyi sku la sbyor// nga rgyal dregs pa'i lha srin rnams// sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung bar mdzod// e ma ho// dus 'dir phun sum tshogs ldan
292a1(1): zhing // 'brel dang ma tshang med pa'i phyir// pad+ma dbang chen he ru ka'i// rgyud chen bshad pa'i dus la babs// e ma ho// dgongs dang dgongs min bdag gab sbas// de min bzung bar bde ba
292a2(1): yi// lung chen rgya mtsho lta bu las// dus 'dir lung chen bshad du gsol// e ma ho// kun bzang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// zab mor gnas pa brdas mtshon nas// bdag gi rna ba'i dbang por blug/ mi
292a3(1): bslu'i nges don man ngag shod// e ma ho// rgyud dang lung dang man ngag gsum// dmangs dang rje dang rgyal po'i tshul// gcig la gcig dgos rgyan du che// rgyud lung man ngag bshad du gsol// zhes zhus
292a4(1): so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal pad+ma he ru ka nyid/ chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' lta bu'i ngang nas/ nyi zla lta bu'i sku bzhengs nas// dbu lngas rta gdangs kyis skad phyung nas/ phyag drug gi 'jigs pa'i mtshon
292a5(1): cha sna tshogs pa gsor zhing / zhabs brgyad kyis 'jig rten las 'das pa'i khro bo brgyad mnan nas/ rdo rje 'degs gshog gis lta ba'i dgongs pa 'phang sa bcad/ rin chen 'dzum gshog gis sems can la
292a6(1): sbyin pa yid bzhin nor bu rin po che ltar char bzhin phab nas/ gsung du med pa'i brjod pa 'di mdzad do// e ma ho// thabs ni 'gag pa med pa'i ye shes yin// sangs rgyas kun la mkhyen pa'i ye shes
292b1(1): mnga'// ye shes mkhyen las ma gtogs thabs gzhan med// thabs de mthong na thabs gzhan sgyu ma 'dra// shes rab 'gyur ba med pa'i chos nyid yin// sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs rung ma gsungs
292b2(1): rung // sems can rnams kyis rtogs rung ma rtogs rung // chos nyid 'gyur ba med par ye nas gnas// thabs dang shes rab de nyid rtogs gyur na// gang gis rtogs pa'i 'khor ba'i sems can rnams// bde
292b3(1): chen chos sku dri ma med pa yin// de ltar rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor sgrub po rnams// dregs pa ma lus 'khor zhing bstan pa bsrung // de phyir dregs pa gzan 'bebs rgyud bshad kyis// phyi rabs ma 'ongs don du
292b4(1): legs par nyon// zhes gsungs so// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa gzan la 'bebs pa'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi dang gleng bslang ba'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyud lung man ngag
292b5(1): gsum gcig tu 'brel pa'i e waM ma yA 'di gsungs so// rgyud 'di dmangs dang 'dra ste bya ba mang // las rnams ma lus rgyud kyis 'grub par byed// lung 'di rje dang 'dra ste gzung bar bde// 'bangs rnams
292b6(1): ji ltar 'dod pa'i dgos dgu 'byung // man ngag ma dang 'dra ste mi bslu nges// rgyal po lta bur rang sa 'dzin pa'o// rje yis rang sa 'dzin par ma gyur na// rje yis 'bangs kyi chos kyang mi byed
293a1(1): la// 'bangs rnams las la gang gis bkol mi nus// de phyir rgyud dang lung dang man ngag gis// e waM ma yA rab tu bshad kyis nyon// rgyud rnams kun la phun sum tshogs pa lnga// 'di ni nye bar
293a2(1): mtshon pa e ru gnas// chos dbyings 'og min btsun mo'i b+ha ga dang // 'dzam gling la sogs stong gsum gnas su 'dong // skad ni gsal byed las ni waM gyis mtshon// stong pa gsal byed sku gsum la sogs
293a3(1): te// rang bzhin chos sku longs spyod rdzogs mdzad pa// sbrul skus chos kyi don rnams ma lus gsungs// bdag ni ma ste 'khor dang sdud pa'o// nyid las mi gzhan 'khor ni bde bar gshegs// sras tshogs
293a4(1): sems dpa' sems ma yab yum dang // gdug pa 'dul byed khro bo mang po'i tshogs// bstan pa srung byed phyi nang lha srin rnams// dad pas gtam nyan rig 'dzin pho mo rnams// thos pas yA ste bstan pas rang
293a5(1): rgyud 'dul// nyon mongs gdul bya stong phrag brgyad cu bzhi// de snyed chos rnams bshad pas nyon mongs zhi// rmad byung chos kyi 'khor lo ma lus gsungs// phun sum mchod rten rgyud don tshang ba ni// lha spyod
293a6(1): dkyil 'khor dbang dang dam tshig dang // phrin sgrub mchod sngags ting 'dzin phyag rgya sogs// thabs dang sman sbyor chu bo'i dpe yis mtshon// mi nub rgyas phyir gtad nas rjes yi rang // bdag rkyen mdzad pa'i
293b1(1): bka' rnams sgra yis bshad// lung rnams 'dod spyod bdun du kun gnas kyang // bzung bde lung dang mtshungs pa lung du grags// rang bzhin dkyis 'khor bskyed dang ye shes bsgrub// rdzogs pa'i rim pa
293b2(1): bzang por bsgom pa'o// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor gnas dang bdag po yin// e ni nam mkha' gru gsum chos kyi dbyings// baM ni khrag mtsho bdud rtsi'i bum pas mtshan// ma ni rgyas byed sha chen ri rab
293b3(1): bcas// yA ni rlung nag rdo rje rgya gram gtams// dbang chen 'byung ba e baM ma yAr gnas// e ni gru gsum dkyil 'khor pho brang mchog/ baM ni khams gsum dbang sdud zla gam mdzes// ma ni rgyas byed gru bzhi
293b4(1): sgo khyud bcas// yA ni spros bral zlum po 'khor yug bcas// e ni drag po dregs pa pho mo rnams// baM ni de yi yum chen bud med dbang // ma ni chags med rgyas pa'i pad+ma'i gdan// yA ni nyi zla'i gdan gyis
293b5(1): yongs su mdzes// gnas dang gdan bcas e baM ma yA las// grub pa'i phyir na rgyud 'dir gsal bar bshad// gnas kyi bdag po bskyed par bya ba yang // e ni rnam thar sgo gsum sku gsum mtshon// sku
293b6(1): gsum rang bzhin dbang chen yab kyi sku// dkyil 'khor dgu ldan lhan gyis grub pa'i sku// baM ni dbang sdud gzi ldan pad+ma can// bde ba bzhi yi bdag nyid tshe gnas gsum// ma ni yid skyob b+ha ga ling+gar
294a1(1): 'brel// thugs ka ye shes sems dpa'i sku la 'khril// gzi ldan pad+ma sbyor ba'i byang chub sems// mkha' gsang sbyor ba gsang ba'i sna rtse la// thugs kar gnas pas nang gi sna rtse nyid// byang
294a2(1): chub sems ni rlung gis bskul ba las// shangs kyi bu gar de nyid thon gyur pa// de ni phyi yi sna rtser rgyal bas gsungs// yA ni 'khor gyi tshogs rnams rgyas par bskyed// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan phrin las
294a3(1): lnga// spyir bsdus pa ste kham rgya chen po drug/ chos nyid chos sgyu ma mthong long ba brgyad// longs su sbrul sku ma mthong dmus long brgyad// sems can rnams la brda' ru bstan pa'i 'khor// za byed khri brgyad
294a4(1): shes khyi bcu rnams// phrin las 'gro ba ma lus bsrungs shing skyong // sgo bzhi sgo skyong sangs rgyas lam du 'dren// theg chen dgu dang rnam par thar pa brgyad// ye shes drug dang sku gsung thugs rnams
294a5(1): kyis// thams cad gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nang du 'dren// e ni rigs lnga'i rgyal ba la sogs rnams// rdo rje slob dpon lta bur nam mkhar byon// baM ni rigs kyi yum rnams bum pa thogs// las kyi slob ma
294a6(1): lta bus chu rgyun 'bebs// ma ni dbu la dbang rtags rigs lngar bzhugs// yas ni sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams la// gsang ba shes rab ye shes bde chen gyis// byin gyis brlabs pas sku gsung thugs
294b1(1): rnams ni// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lor gyur pa nyid// dbang dang byin rlabs don du bshad pa yin// ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan yang drangs nas 'grub// e ni e h+ye hi zhes brda' mtshon sgras// dbyings nas ye
294b2(1): shes mdun du spyan yang drangs// baM ni sgra yi rnam par mtshon nas ni// sa ma ya ni pa ti nan zhes pa// phab nas gnyis su med par bstim par bya// ma zhes ma hen dra yi sgras mtshon nas// phyi dang nang dang gsang
294b3(1): ba de kho na// phyag mchod ma lus pa yis mnyes par bya// bzlas pas bskul bas thugs mnyes thugs dam bskul// ya ni ya hi gats+tsha brjod par byas pa yis// dam tshig dkyil 'khor sgrub pa bdag la
294b4(1): bsdus// spyan drangs rnams ni rang rang gnas su gshegs// rdzogs pa'i rim pa bzang po gang bsgom pa// e ni lte ba chos 'byung gru gsum nyid// sa rlung rang gi gnas nas thams cad bskyed// ma lte bu lter
294b5(1): 'brel nas sbrul sku 'byin// baM ni snying gar gnas pas srog rtsar gyis// chu rlung rang gnas lus kyi khrag rnams rgyas// srog rtsa rtsa bo che las smad khrag rgyas// srog rtsa las gyes rtse'u chung stod khrag rgyas// ma ni
294b6(1): mgrin par gnas pas gsung dbyangs rgyas// zas dang sgom rnams spyad pas lus zungs rgyas// me rlung rang gnas mgrin par thams cad smin// smin pa'i drangs mas lus khams bdud rtsi rgyas// yA ni spyi bor
295a1(1): gnas pas rlung gi rlung // rlung gi las kyis 'byed cing phrin las byed// tha ma skal tshigs rta las byang chub sems// thur du drangs nas sa bon 'jig pa dang // 'khor ba'i sems can skye ba'i rgyu
295a2(1): yang byed// rigs ldan rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po rnams// spyi gtsug tshangs pa'i bu ga kha bye nas// 'og min mkha' spyod gnas su sems nyid 'gro// lung rnams gzung bde lag len bskyed rdzogs
295a3(1): yin// man ngag skyes bu'i thugs la gang gab pa// e ni gru gsum phyi dbyibs snying du gnas// nang du kun gzhi ma bcos byang chub sems// dkar nag las rnams gsog pa'i snod yin yang // chos kyi dbyings
295a4(1): su shes pas gos pa med// baM ni mi shigs thig le rnam shes yid// phyi nang kun la dbang bskur gang snang 'char// me long ye shes dri med chos kyi sku// kun tu bzang po chos sku dri ma med// ma ni nyon mongs yid
295a5(1): de nyon mongs lnga// rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang dug lnga yin// me long lto rgyab log pa lta bur gnas// dug lnga rigs lnga dbyer med rtogs par bya// ma rtogs rigs drug 'gro ba dug lnga yin// rigs
295a6(1): drug rigs lngar shes pas 'khor ba stongs// yA ni sgo lnga'i rnam par shes par gnas// sgo lnga'i rnam shes 'dod yon lnga la spyod// mig gzugs rna ba sgra ste sna la dri// lce la ro ste lus la reg byar gnas// 'di
295b1(1): lnga mchod pa'i lha mor shes par bya// de las ma rtogs mchod pa'i lha mo med// ces gsungs so// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa gzan la 'bebs pa'i rgyud las/ rgyud lung man ngag mi shes pa'i dregs pa gzan la
295b2(1): 'bebs pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang chen sku gsung thugs bsgom pa 'di gsungs so// sku bzhi gcig tu bsgom pa'i kun tu zhal// zhal bzhi sku mdog pad+ma rA
295b3(1): ga'i mdog/ g.yas kyi phyag brgyad rdo rje lcags kyu dang // sbrul gyi zhags pa mu stegs mgo bo dang // tri shUl rtse gsum rdo rje rtse dgu dang // rtse lnga re gsum rtse gcig 'bar ba bsnams// g.yon gyi phyag brgyad
295b4(1): rdo rje lcags kyu dang // lcags sgrog sdigs mdzub chang bar snying yang bcug/ thod pa rlon pa khrag gis bkang ba dang // khro chen snying dang kha T+wAM rtse gsum dang // gshin rje'i dbyug pa be con chen po dang // kha T+wAM Da
295b5(1): ma ru ni lhan cig bsdams// bde gshegs sku yi kham rgya mo// bdud kyi dred mo rkang gsum zhon// 'khor lo thod pa lag na thogs// skrag nag gti mug can rnams 'dul// pad+ma gsung gi kham rgya mo// lcags
295b6(1): kyi spyang mo mgo dgu zhon// phyag na pad+ma thod pa bsnams// dmar po 'dod chags dbang du sdud// rdo rje thugs kyi kham rgya mo// zangs kyi 'phar mo mgo brgyad zhon// dkar dmar zangs mdog zhe
296a1(1): sdang 'joms// rdo rje rtse lnga b+han d+ha bsdams// rin chen yon tan kham rgya mo// g.yu yi sbrang mo rkang gsum zhon// mthing ga rin chen thod pa bsdams// nga rgyal can rnams dbang du sdud// phrin las
296a2(1): pho nya kham rgya mo// gser gyi seng ge rngam pa la// ljang ser ma mo rgya gram 'dzin// rlon pa'i b+han d+ha phrag dog 'joms// khyab pa'i ye shes kham rgya mo// dkar mo stag mo chibs su chibs// gri gug b+han d+ha phyag na
296a3(1): bsnams// kun la thogs pa med par rgyug/ shar phyogs long ba rgyab 'brel ni// 'brug chen sngon po chibs su chibs// na bza' le brgan dpung zlum can// ye shes sgron ma rdo rje thogs// 'khor gyi dmus long

296a5(1): gsol// dmus long bco lnga 'khor blang bcas// phyag na rin chen sgron me sbar// nyung dkar bgegs la mda' ru 'phen// nub phyogs long ba rgyab 'brel ni// ban glang dkar po chibs su zhon// na bza' klu

296b1(1): srin dmar po chibs su chibs// na bza' ser gyi dpung blug can// phyag na zhing dbyug sgron me 'bar// 'khor gyi dmus long bco lnga ni// me sgron bsnams nas sha khrag za// za byed dpal gyi khyi brgyad

296b4(1): gug thod pa ser// byang na lcags khyi mgo brgyad la// dpa' bo gri gug thod pa ljang // byang shar lcags khyi mgo brgyad la// mkha' 'gro gri gug thod pa ser// ye shes sprul pa khyi bcur bcas// shar na mgo

297a1(1): pad+ma shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TA na/ ha na ta ka pa tsa hUM phaT/ sku'i sngags so// oM pad+ma bi ta si ta ha he tsakra b+h+yo b+h+yo hUM hUM phaT/ gsung gi sngags so// oM hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ e A ra li hUM

297b1(1): tan phrin las dngos grub thob// khong nas rlung las ye shes lngas// dngos grub rang la thob pa'o// 'byung 'jug gnas pa bco lnga las// de phyir dmus long bco lnga'i 'khor// thabs mchog dmangs la rgya che

298b1(1): dgra bzhi ste// dgra 'dul pa yi man ngag dang // dgra ni btson tu gzung ba dang // dgra rnams tshar yang gcad pa dang // dgra la dgrar mi 'dzin pa bzhi// mtshan med bsgom pa'i man ngag brgyad// lho phyogs sgo

300a1(1): pas// skad cig gcig la ma lus mthong // zhi bar zung du 'jug pa ni// kun rdzob dang ni don dam dag/ so so'i cha yis phye gyur na// yang dag nyid du 'dres gyur pas// zung du 'jug par de

302a1(1): ste lnga pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud nag po 'dzum med kyi ser ba dbab pa'i man ngag 'di gsungs so// dam tshig ldan pa'i dben gnas su// gru gsum dkyil 'khor khru
302a2(1): gang ste// shar du 'bru nag gta' gtor la// lho ru smyung mda' dar nag rten// nub tu chang phud gser skyems bsham// byang du rgyun gtor sha khrag bsham// za 'ug ha thabs steng nas gur// khyi nag ra rog glang
302a3(1): nag dang // phag rog khrag dang khyi klad rnams// bag phyer sbrus la ril bu bya// ling+gar dril la khyi thod gzhug/ sngags 'di zla ba gsum du bsnyen/ prad nya A sa ta b+h+yo/ b+ha ga ha ta ya b+h+yo/ ma ma rak+Sha ni b+h+yo/ se la mu
302a4(1): ta bab/ bdud san ta ha ra ya bab/ ba la ni la bab phob b+h+yo/ ru ru hril hril phob ya/ ri la ra rog ru col gzhug/ la chas kha bcad 'od dkyil sba// gta' lkugs thun gtor bsnyen pa'o// de nas bsgrub
