308b4(1): bzhi// rgyas par bshad pa'i mtha' yang drug/ bshad pa'i tshul ni rnam pa bzhi// dbye ba'i bshad pa rim pa gnyis// snod kyi gang zag rnam pa lnga// bden pa gnyis kyi rnam par nges// spyir bsdus nyi shu rtsa brgyad
308b5(1): kyis// gsang sngags rgyud kyi rnam bshad bya// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// gleng bslang ba yi grangs lnga ni// rgyud kyi ming ni gang btags mtshan// 'khor ba'i sems can don du gsungs// ston pa gzugs sku rnam pa
308b6(1): gnyis// ldang tshad cho ga le'u dum bu rim// dgos ched thun mong mchog tu bsgrub pa'o// sangs rgyas pa yi tshul bzhi ni// rgyud dang gling bzhi nges tshig rgyu// de yang 'dod chags spang ma spangs// 'dod chags
309a1(1): bcas nas sangs rgyas bzhi// rgyud ni lha lus rigs lnga bsgom// gling bzhi rigs lnga gcig gyur pa// nges tshig rdo rje la sogs gsungs// rgyu ni sgeg pa la sogs spyod// 'dod chags spangs pa'i
309a2(1): tshul yang bzhi// rgyud ni mi lus skye ba la// gleng gzhi rab tu byung ba nyid// nges tshig 'dul ba'i sdom pa blangs// rgyu ni 'bras bus sangs rgyas 'dod// rgyas par bshad pa'i mtha' drug ni// drang don dang ni nges
309a3(1): don gnyis// dgongs bshad dgongs pa ma yin bshad// ji bzhin sgra dang ji bzhin min// drang ba'i don ni bshad pa ni// skal ngan sbas bshad drang don du// thun mong dngos grub 'dod rnams la// mtshan
309a4(1): bcas bskyed pa'i rim pa bstan// nges pa'i don du bshad pa ni// yang dag don ston nges pa'i don// nye lam dga' mchog 'dod pa la// de la rdzogs pa'i rim pa bstan// bskyed rim rdzogs rim 'di gnyis
309a5(1): ni// don gyi mtha' la brten pa'o// de yang ji ltar yin zhe na// ting 'dzin gsum las gzhal yas gdan// sku bskyod spyan drang mchod phul bsgrub// ro langs rkang mgyogs mig sman sogs// skyes bu'i sems
309a6(1): la ci 'dod rnams// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa bsgom pas bsgrub// sdug bsngal nyid kyang byang chub la// 'khor ba nyid kyang mya ngan 'das// sgrib pa gnyis na mngon sangs rgyas// nges don de la 'dud par
309b1(1): byos// dgongs pas bshad par bya ba ni// dbang po rnon po'i rigs la ni// rig pa'i rjes su 'brang ba yis// shes rab can gyi gang zag rnams// nga rgyal bcag par bya ba'i phyir// dbang po rnon po la dgongs
309b2(1): nas// 'gal ba'i tshig gis don ston bshad// rgyal ba rnams kyis de ltar dgongs// dgongs pa ma yin bshad pa ni// dbang po dman pa'i gang zag la// gsal bar ston pa dgongs min tshig/ dngos bral
309b3(1): 'od gsal zung du 'jug/ dbang po rno brtul dgongs pa ni// 'di gnyis tshig gi mtha' la brten// de yang ji ltar brten zhe na// pha dang khu bo mes po dang // bu dang spun dang mdza' bo rnams// zhe sdang sems
309b4(1): kyis bsad byas na// rdo rje rigs kyi zhing du 'gyur// chos rnams kun gyi de kho na// rang bzhin gyi ni 'od gsal te// bden gnyis yang dag zung du 'jug/ dngos po thams cad dang bral ba'o// sgra ni ji bzhin
309b5(1): bshad pa ni// rang gi sgra yis ston pa yang // dkyil 'khor mchod bstod dam tshig spyod// sgra ni ji bzhin ston pa'o// ji bzhin ma yin bshad pa ni// sgra gzhan dag gis rab ston te// 'jig rten bstan bcos
309b6(1): dag la med// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa yin// ji bzhin yin dang ma yin sgra// don tshig gnyis ka'i mtha' la brten// de yang ji ltar bstan ce na// dkyil 'khor dag tu gzhug par bya// dbang blang
310a1(1): dam tshig mi nyams bsrung // mchod pa gtor mas lha mnyes bya// yi dam zhal phyag gsal ba yis// mnyam gzhag rjes la spyod pas kyang // kro ta ya dang sha ka ya// k+Sha ta ya gi sa bon can// lus
310a2(1): la rlung lngar rab tu gnas// bshad pa'i tshul bzhi bstan pa yang // tshig gi don du bshad pa ni// chos kun mkhas pas sgra tsam la// mkhas pa tshig gi don yin te// yi ge 'bru gnyer gsal sbyar na// tshig la ma
310a3(1): rmongs tshig mtha' yas// de dang nas ni 'byed pa'i tshig/ sa dang can gyi ldan pa'i tshig/ yang dang kyang ni brnan pa'i tshig/ ste ni lhag ma can gyi tshig/ 'di ni nye bar mtshon pa la// la ni bgar nas ston pa
310a4(1): sogs// phyi yi don du bshad pa ni// mdo la bzhugs nas 'gyod pa bzlog/ sngags la bzhugs na bskyed rim bsgom// sbas te bshad par bya ba ni// tshogs par mi dbyung phyir sbas gsum// 'dod chags dag
310a5(1): gi chos sbas pa// de ni gsang dbang snying po yin// kun rdzob chos kyi sbas pa yang // shes bya nang gyur snying po yin// ye shes sbas pas snying po yin// ye shes kun brtags ma yin pas// rnam par brtags pa'i
310a6(1): snying po yod// mthar thug don du bshad pa yin// 'od gsal gzugs sku rnam pa gnyis// zung 'jug sku ru chos kyi gnas// nyan bshad dbye ba rnam pa gnyis// tshogs pa rnams la bshad pa ni// ji bzhin sgra
310b1(1): dang dgongs min dang // drang don spyi don yi ge'i don// slob ma rnams la bshad pa ni// sgra ni ji bzhin ma yin dang // nges don dgongs te bshad pa dang // sbas bshad mthar thug don rnams bshad// snod kyi
310b2(1): gang zag rnam lnga ni// ut+pal lta bu'i gang zag ni// sbrang rtsi mang ltar chos mang thos// sbrang rtsi 'dzin ltar 'dzin pa mkhas// sbrang rtsi yal sbyin brjed nas 'gro// pad dkar lta bu'i gang zag ni// sbrang mas chos
310b3(1): mang zos pa yang // sbrang rtsi 'dzin ltar ston mi nus// sbrang mas sbrang rtsi blang dka' ltar// bum nang ras bal lta bu'o// pad+ma dmar po lta bu ni// yid du 'ong ltar dad par ldan// pad+ma kha dog dmar ba ltar// snying
310b4(1): rje dang ni shes rab che// pad+ma nyin mo kha 'byed ltar// thos nas blo kha bye ba dang // sbrang rtsi mi thub 'dzags pa ltar// tshig don mi 'dzin brjed nas 'gro// tsan dan lta bu'i gang zag ni// sdong po chung ltar thos pa
310b5(1): nyung // dri dang ldan pas nga rgyal che// rtsa phra yal ga lo 'dab rgyas// rtsa ba med par mang du smra// dug sbrul 'khril pas blang mi nus// rjes su gzung bar mi nus so// 'gyod shing can gyi tsan dan yin// rin chen
310b6(1): lta bu'i gang zag ni// nor bu rang bzhin dag pa ltar// dam tshig tshul khrims dag pa dang // gzhan don byed cing gzhan mi gnod// de bzhin 'dzin la mkhas pa dang // ci 'dod 'byung ltar shes rab ldan// nor
311a1(1): bus 'gro don byed pa ltar// rgyud gcig thos nas legs par ston// bden pa'i dgongs pa gnyis pa ni// bskyed rim sgra lus kun rdzob bden// 'od gsal don dam bden pa'o// rnal 'byor
311a2(1): rgyud rnams mdzes pa yi// rgyan bdun gsal ba'i lde mig ni// rgyud rnams 'byed cing 'grol bar byed// ces gsungs so// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa gnad la 'bebs pa'i rgyud las/ rgyun gyi bshad tshul
311a3(1): gnad 'bebs kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas 'khor gyi tshogs rnams kyis// 'di skad gsol ba rab tu btab// rgyud dang lung dang man ngag rnams// bshad pa'i tshul ni de ltar na// rnal 'byor
311a4(1): dbang phyug chen po rnams// bskyed rdzogs nyams su ji ltar blang // bdag cag rnams la gsang sgo phye// 'gro ba'i don du legs par gsungs// zhes zhus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dbang po
311a5(1): yang rab rnal 'byor la bskyed pa'i dus nas rdzogs pa ste/ rtag pa'i mtha' las rab grol nas// bsod nams tshogs kyang rdzogs pa yin// gzugs kyi sku yang 'thob par byed// rdzogs pa'i dus nas bskyed
311a6(1): pa ste// chad pa'i mtha' las grol byas nas// ye shes tshogs kyang rdzogs par byed// chos sku dri ma med par 'thob// dbang po 'bring dang tha ma la// lus kyi sgrib pa byang ba'i phyir// bskyed pa'i rim pa brtan
311b1(1): par bsgom// ngag gi bsags pa sbyong ba ni// bzlas pa'i grangs kyang rgyun mi gcad// yid kyi dran pa spang ba'i phyir// rdzogs pa'i rim pa bzang po bsgom// bskyed pa'i rim pa gnyis yod de// zhi bar bsgom
311b2(1): dang khro bor bsgyur// rigs gnyis lung gis brgyud pas na// rdo rje'i rigs dang pad+ma bsgom// bcom ldan dpal mchog rdo rje sems// sku gsum lhun grub dbu gsum ni// mthing ga dkar gsal pad+ma
311b3(1): dmar// rgyud drug rtsad gcod ye shes drug/ rdo rje 'khor lo pad+ma g.yas// dril bu rin chen ral gri g.yon// rnam pa thams cad mchog rab ldan// thams cad rgyan ni ma lus rdzogs// pad+ma rin chen gar gyi
311b4(1): dbang // zhal gsum phyag drug dga' mdangs brjid// dbus kyi sku mdog dkar dmar mdangs// g.yas sngo g.yon ser brjid pa'i zhal// pad+ma rdo rje rtse gsum mda' ni g.yas// bum pa dpal be'u gzhu ni
311b5(1): g.yon// rin chen sna tshogs na bza' mdzes// yum ni pad dril dmar po'i khril// khro bor gyur pa rigs lnga dbang chen sku// sku yi dbang chen dmar po dbu lnga pa// rta mgo lnga dang gshog bzhi zhabs brgyad
311b6(1): pa// shar du rol pa'i phyag bzhi ni// khro chen snying 'byin kha T+wAM ga/ rdo rje lcags kyu sbrul gyi zhags// lho ru rol pa'i phyag bzhi ni// thod khrag rdo rje lu gu rgyud// gshin rje'i bo con rde'u chung g.yon// nub tu rol
312a1(1): pa'i phyag bzhi ni// me yi zhags pa khyung gi khwa// sdigs mdzub me chen kha T+wAM ga/ byang du rol pa'i phyag bzhi ni// rdo rje rtse dgu rtse lnga dang // rtse gsum dang ni rtse gcig 'bar// gsung gi dbang chen
312a2(1): dbu lnga dmar// rta gdong lnga ldan gshog pa bzhi/ bcu drug phyag na bsnams pa ni// rdo rje kha T+wAM dril bur bcas// lcags kyu sbrul dang zhags pa dang // 'khor lo rin chen zur brgyad dang // ral gri rdo rje lu gu
312a3(1): rgyud// g.yas kyi phyag na bsnams pa ni/ pad+ma yu 'dzin thod khrag bkang // khro snying gshin rje'i dbyug pa thog/ rgya gram rdo rje be con dang / me long tri shUl khyung gi khra/ g.yon gyi phyag na bsnams pa'o// zhabs
312a4(1): brgyad khro bo 'das pa mnan// thugs kyi dbang chen dbu lnga pa// dmar po rta mgo ljang gu lnga// g.yas kyi phyag brgyad phyag mtshan ni// rdo rje lcags kyu sbrul zhags dang // cang te'u kha T+wAM thod rlon khrag/ rdo rje rtse
312a5(1): dgu rtse lnga dang // rtse gsum dang ni rtse gcig bsnams// g.yon gyi phyag brgyad bsnams pa ni// rdo rje lcags kyu lu gu rgyud// thon rlon khro bo brgyad kyi snying // me yi zhags pa khyung gi khra// sdigs mdzub rtse la me
312a6(1): chen 'bar// cang te'u kha T+wAM lcags kyu bsnams// gshog bzhi zhabs brgyad khro bo mnan// pad+ma gsang ba zhes bya ba// rnal 'byor kun gyi bsgom par bya// yon tan dbang chen dbu lnga pa// dmar po rta mgo ldang
312b1(1): zhur lnga// gshog bzhi zhags brgyad bcu drug phyag/ g.yas kyi phyag na bsnams pa ni// go rI'i phyag na rdo rje lcags kyu bsnams// gnyis pa tsau rI sbrul gyi zhags pa bsnams// gsum pa pra mo ha ni rde'u chung
312b2(1): bsnams// bzhi pa bet+tA lI ni b+han+d+ha bsnams// lnga pa puk+ka rdo rje rtse dgu bsnams// drug pa tsan+d+ra rdo rje rtse lnga bsnams// bdun pa sma sha rdo rje rtse gsum bsnams// brgyad pa g+hasma rdo rje rtse gcig bsnams// g.yon gyi
312b3(1): phyag na bsnams pa ni// sing ha mu kha rdo rje lcags kyu bsnams// gcig pa bya g+h+ri phyag na me dpung bsnams// gsum pa shra na mu kha lcags sgrogs bsnams// bzhi pa sr-i ga la ni thod khrag bsnams// lnga pa gr-i zla
312b4(1): snying chen bsnams// drug pa kang ka kha T+wAM bsnams// bdun pa ka ka cang te'u bsnams// brgyad pa u lU lcags kyu bsnams// gshog bzhi zhabs brgyad khro bo gdan// phrin las dbang chen dbu lnga dmar// rta
312b5(1): mgo ljang gu lnga dang ldan// gshog bzhi phyag ni bcu drug na// rdo rje lcags kyu sbrul zhags dang // mu stegs mgo dang kha T+wAM ga/ rdo rje rtse dgu rtse lnga dang // rtse gsum rtse gcig g.yas na bsnams// rdo rje lcags kyu
312b6(1): sdigs mdzub me// thod khrag lha chen brgyad kyi snying // gshin rje'i dbyug pa lcags kyu dang // rje'u chung yu ba kha T+wAM ga/ g.yon gyi phyag na rnam par bsnams// bzlas pa'i sngags ni rab gsungs pa// oM pad+ma ma hA
313a1(1): shrI he ru ka ma hA tsan d+ha sarba duSh+TAn/ ta ka ha na pa tsa hUM hUM phaT/ sku'i sngags so// oM pad+ma si ta si ta ha he tsakra b+h+yo b+h+yo hUM hUM phaT/ gsung gi sngags so// oM hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ oM a ra li hUM
313a2(1): hrIHdza/ thugs kyi sngags so// oM hri ha ha hUM hUM phaT/ yon tan gyi sngags so// hrI di ma da ri h+ya g+h+ri ba e ka dza Ti hu lu hu lu hrIHdzaHdzaH/ phrin las rta mgrin gyi sngags so// na maHsa man+ta kA ya wA ka tsit+ta badz+ra nan/ oM
313a3(1): hUM hUM hAM/ ta ru la bi ru la/ sarba bi Sha g+ha ta ka dza li ta bi sA ling+ga aT+Ta ra D+ha ra hA sa na da sa hi ta/ ka pa ri sa hau ba taM ad de ba badz+ra khu ra g+ha ta na/ tsa ta ba su d+ha tA la ni/ shA sa ma ru tA ud+hiSha p+ta d+ha ra ni d+ha ra/ bi Sha
313a4(1): na a D+ha hA sa/ a pa ra mi tA/ ba la ba rA kra ma/ Ar+ya ga Na b+hi ta/ bud+d+ha gu Na bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ ha ya grI ba kha da kha da pa ra man+ta nAM/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da sid ti mi ri sha/ a be sha ya sarba dza ra/ bi sha tsi naM/ sarba gra he ShA pra ti ha to
313a5(1): b+ha ba ba gi nan/ badz+ra daMSh+Ti giny+tsi mA ya si/ i daM duSh+Ta gra ha Na duSh+Ta sarba b+ha d+hu na d+hu na/ mA tha mA tha/ ma rda ma rda/ ba ta ba ta/ ba ta ya ba ta ya/ b+han d+ha b+han d+ha/ bud+d+ha d+harma/ sang+ga a nu dz+nyA na/ ka gu ru/ shri gra na ha ya g+hI
313a6(1): bA phaT/ badz+ra ya phaT/ badz+ra ga rA ya phaT/ badz+ra na tre ya phaT/ badz+ra daM shA ya phaT/ badz+ra khu rA ya phaT/ badz+ra khu ra nir+b+ba ta nA ya phaT/ ba ra man tra bi nA shA ya phaT/ trai lo kya b+ha yaM sha ra ya phaT/ sarba karme shwa rA pa ti ha
313b1(1): tA ya phaT/ badz+ra ku la san tra sa nA ya phaT/ hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT swA hA/ khro bo rta'i rgyal po thams cad kyi phrin las dpal gyi phreng sngags so// dpal pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa gnad 'bebs kyi rgyud las/ sku
313b2(1): dang sngags kyis log 'dren can thams cad gnad la 'bebs pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sems nyid rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor 'di sku dang gsung dang thugs dang yon
313b3(1): tan dang phrin las rdo rje las phyung ngo // sra bas sa yi khams yin te// khu bas chu yi khams su 'dod// dro bas me yi khams yin te// rgyu bas rlung du rab tu grags// mi shigs thig ler gsung pa ste// de bas
313b4(1): nam mkha'i khams yin no// reg pa las ni lha mo spyan// dro bas gos dkar mo zhes bya// chu ni mA la ki zhes bya// 'gro bas rlung du rab tu grags// bde bas rdo rje dbyings phyug ma// thig le kun snang bde skyong
313b5(1): ma// bde chen bde ba chen po ni// skad cig tsam du nyams myong bas// 'phral du yid ches byed pa ste// log rtog ma lus mthong 'gog pa'o// dngos dang dngos po log rtog dag/ bkag nas rnam par mi rtog
313b6(1): pas// bskal pa stong phrag du mar yang // gnas nas ye shes sbyor bar byed// cung zad cung zad bsgom byas pas// gong nas gong du khyad par 'gro// mthar ni mi rtog ting 'dzin dag/ lhun gyis grub pa thob
314a1(1): par 'gyur// ma rtog ting 'dzin la gnas nas// dpa' bo dang ni dpa' mo rnams// ring na bzhugs kyang gzigs 'gyur te// don kun 'grub par byed pa'o// dga' dang dga' bral dag gi
314a2(1): dbus// mtshan nyid dmigs la bstan byas pas// thun nam zla byed zla ba lo// bskal par ye shes che la sbyor// mi rtog pa yi ting 'dzin gyis// sgrib pa lnga spangs lhun grub pa'i// bde ba chen po mngon byas
314a3(1): sa// stobs sogs yon tan rnams kyis brgyan// 'di ni sems can ma lus la// skyi pa'i don du bshad pa'o// ston ka'i dri med nam mkha' la// zla ba 'od zer kun snang ltar// gzung 'dzin spang ba'i ye shes
314a4(1): ni// bdag gzhan snang gsal byed pa'o// ston ka'i sprin med nam mkha' la// nyi ma'i 'od zer shar ba ltar// thabs kyi ye shes gnyis pa'o// don dang sems can bcas snang byed// spros med mkha' dang mun
314a5(1): lta bu// snang byed ye shes bsgoms byas pas// rang rig tsam las grub pa yi// sgyu ma'i lus 'di len par byed// rang bzhin tsam du 'od gsal ba'i// rlung dang ldan pa'i rnam shes kyis// chu zla 'dra ba'i
314a6(1): gzugs med pa'i// chags med lus ni 'grub par 'gyur// yid kyi lus dang ldan pa yi// rnal 'byor pa yis khams gsum du// bdag dang gzhan gyi don byas nas// mthar ni rang gnas bde bar 'gro// sku
314b1(1): ma'i lus la ltos byas nas// ril por 'dzin dang rjes gzhig gis// dngos po thams cad bshigs nas ni// de nas snang ba med par 'gro// thogs pa med par thabs kyi ye shes kyis// snang ba thams cad
314b2(1): nub byas nas// rang snang tsam la'ang chags med pa'i// snang ba med pa'i dbyings su 'gro// bdag dang gzhan du rtog pa yi// rnam rtog dra ba bsal ba ni// mtha' med dmigs pa med pa ru// snang ba med pa'i
314b3(1): tshul du 'gro// snang ba med pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// snang ba tsam yang 'dzin spangs te// yang dang yang du don dam pa'i// bden pa mngon du byas pas 'gro// sgyu ma lta bu'i lus kyi 'bad med par// 'dod pa chags
314b4(1): bcad nam mkha' las// 'bad pa med par rnyed 'gyur te// bdag dang gzhan rnams bde bar 'tsho// yid kyi lus tshad bzung nas ni// bdag dang gzhan gyi don 'grub cing // dmigs pa thams cad zad byed
314b5(1): par// 'gro med gnas su nam zhig 'gro// 'dis ni 'gro ba sangs rgyas par// drang phyir sbas pa'i don du bshad// dang po sa ni chu la thim// chu yang me la thim par 'gyur// me yang rlung la thim par
314b6(1): 'gyur// rlung yang rnam par shes la 'jug/ rnam shes gzung ba de dag ni// 'od gsal bar ni 'jug par 'gyur// stobs chen po la sogs pa yi// che ba'i yon tan rnam brgyan pa// bden gnyis sbyor ba zung
315a1(1): 'jug sku// bde ba chen po de thob 'gyur// mkha' 'dra'i chos sku stong pa la// rtog med ye shes mkha' 'dra ba// tshogs dang smon lam stobs dag gis// 'bad pa med par lhun gyis grub// zung du
315a2(1): 'jug pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// nyon mongs pa yi sgrib pa dag/ bsags pa'i sgrib pa rnams spangs shing // phun sum tshogs pa thob 'gyur te// gang du rnam par thar pa yi// 'dod pa tsam gyi 'gro 'ong
315a3(1): lding // 'ja' 'dra'i longs spyod rdzogs sku las// 'bad pa med par sprul pa'i sku// mtha' yas rdul bral ji bzhin par// sems can don kun 'grub par mdzad// gang dang gang gis 'dul gyur pa// de de
315a4(1): bzhin du so sor snang // mos pa'i snang ba tha dad par// sems can rnams ni 'dul bar 'gyur// lhun grub bde ba chen po'i sku// rang snang rig mas nyar brgyan pa// 'og min gnas su dus rtag tu// mtshan
315a5(1): dang dpe byad brgyan pas bzhugs// yid bzhin nor ltar bsams tsam gyis// 'bad med bdag dang gzhan gyi don// che ba'i yon tan rnam brgyan sku// bde ba che las 'byung bar 'gyur// rang snang rlung dang
315a6(1): ldan pa'i lus// 'ja' tshon bzhin du mtha' med pa// stong pa gsum la goms dbang gis// thogs pa med par 'byung bar 'gyur// 'di ni 'gro rnams sangs rgyas phyir// mthar thug pa yi don du bshad// ces
315b1(1): gsungs so// dpal pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa gnad 'bebs kyi rgyud las/ phyi spyi'i don dang nang sbas pa'i don dang gsang ba mthar thug don du bshad pa sems rdzogs pa'i rim par gtan la 'bebs pa'i
315b2(1): gnad 'bebs pa ste le'u bzhi pa'o// // de nas pad+ma he ru kas he ru ka'i gnas bcu la gzigs pa 'di gsungs so// gnas dang nye ba'i gnas dang gnyis// yul dang nye ba'i yul dang gnyis// zhing
315b3(1): dang nye ba'i zhing dang gnyis// dur khrod nye ba'i dur khrod gnyis// tshan+do nye ba'i tshan+da gnyis// phyogs bcu rnams su gzigs par gyur// de nas pad+ma he ru kas// dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad du gzigs pa
315b4(1): 'di gsungs so// shar na dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal// shar lhor dur khrod lhun gyis grub// lho na dur khrod sku la rdzogs// lho nub dur khrod gsang chen rol// nub na dur khrod pad+ma brtsegs// nub byang dur khrod
315b5(1): he chen rol// dur khrod khu byug klong dgu byang // byang shar dur khrod 'jig rten skyong // de nas pad+ma he ru kas// khro bo gar dgus 'dul mdzad de// lha chen gzhon nu gdong drug gis// lha min ba su ka ra
315b6(1): bsad// de la dpa' bor mtshan btags pas// de bcom dpa' bo he ru ka/ dbang phyug chen po 'khyud nyams sgeg/ de bcom sku la yum 'khril sgeg/ khyab 'jug phag seng 'jigs gzugs nyams// de bcom
316a1(1): he ru ka 'jigs rung // skra yi gar gsum bstan pa ni// sku la tshor ba bde sdug nub// tshangs pa'i gsung dbyangs rta skad rgod// de bcom rtags su zhal g.yas bzhad// tshogs kyi bdag po glang
316a2(1): sna gshe// de bcom zhal g.yon khro bar bshad// sgra gcan nyi zla khar mid rngam// de bcom dbus kyi zhal dmar rngam// gsung gi gar gsum bstan pa ni// gsung la tshor ba bde sdug nub// brgya byin lag na rdo
316a3(1): rje thogs// lha rnams snying rje'i sems kyi skyong // de bcom pas ni snying rje mdzad// klu chen se sha tsa ra yis// 'gre ldog byas pas sa 'gul byung // de bcom klu brgyan ngo mtshar che// me lhas stong gsum me yis
316a4(1): bshig/ de bcom me dpung dbus na bzhugs// thugs kyi gar gsum bstan pa ni// thugs la tshor ba bde sdug nub// de nas pad+ma he ru kas dpal gyi rta skad kyis phyogs bcu'i dregs pa can btul
316a5(1): lo// dngas ma'i bdud rtsi khyab 'jug gza' yis 'thungs// phyag rdor 'khor los lus kyang dum bu brgyad// snyigs ma dug tu gyur te gnod sel phyir// spyan ras sku khros mgur du thim pa ni// khro bo mdog sngon
316a6(1): gdug pa ma lus 'dul// lo rgyus don gyis phyi rabs yin ches bshad// snod kyi 'jig rten lcags ri nag po'i nang // phyi yi rgya mtsho zho las dkrug pa'i mar// ri rab srub shing klu sbrul srub thag bcas// rgyal
316b1(1): chen sde bzhis rab tu dkrugs pa las// tshangs pa'i gsung gis chos 'khor bskul ma 'debs// de 'dul gsung dbyangs drug cu tshangs pa'i skad// 'jig rten 'khor bar yun ring gnas nas kyang // rta mchog
316b2(1): rin chen yid bsring 'gro don mdzad// cang shes rta yis myur du bgrod pa ltar// 'gro drug 'khor ba'i gnas nas 'dren par mdzad// de ni 'gro ba lam 'dir gzhug pa'i phyir// gdul byar bshad pas 'gro ba
316b3(1): 'dul bar byed// gti mug can dang nga rgyal can// 'dod chags can dang phrag dog can// zhi ba'i las dang rgyas pa'i las// dbang dang drag pos 'dul bar ston// ljang gu drag po dmar po dbang // ser po
316b4(1): rgyas pa dkar po zhi// rta gdong phrin las bzhi mdzad pas// rta mgo la yang rigs bzhi'i mdog/ gdul bya ma lus thams cad kun// 'dul phyir phrin las dag tu bshad// zhal nas rta skad sgra sgrogs pas// pho
316b5(1): paM hri sogs gsang sngags 'dren// rta yi skad ces bya ba yang // rta zhal gsung du sgrogs pa'o// brda' dang rta skad 'gying skad gsum// rnal 'byor dgongs pas ma shes sgron// thugs dam mi 'khrul dbang mi
316b6(1): 'dus// dgra bgegs mi thul skyon du 'gyur// rnal 'byor gang gis rta skad kyi// dgod pa don ldan shes pa ni// thugs rjes bzhengs dang khas blangs dran// phrin las skad cig yud la 'grub// de phyir rta skad
317a1(1): dgongs pa zab// lus ngag yid gsum sku gsum nyid// dug lnga ye shes lngar sgrol nas// gang gis gdeng gyur rnal 'byor rab// mi zhes byas kyang sangs rgyas yin// snod kyi 'jig rten gzhal
317a2(1): yas dbyings// bcud kyi sems can ye shes lha// 'brel pas bde chen sras su rigs// rnal 'byor 'bring gi dgongs pa'o// lus nyid lha la ngag nyid sngags// sems nyid chos nyid tha ma'o// mya ngan 'das
317a3(1): pa'i chos rnams kun// rten du gyur pas chos kyi sku// rang bzhin skye med brda' sprod go/ de nyid chos sku'i gsung yin no// longs sku dgongs pa brda' yi gsungs// me long nang gi byad lta bu// gtso bo'i sku la
317a4(1): bltas pa yis// rang gi shes bya'i sgrib pa dag/ de nas chos sku'i sa ru 'gro// byang chub sems dpa' mngon sangs rgyas// sku gsung thugs ni rnam pa gsum// gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab cing // thams cad
317a5(1): sa ru gnas pas na// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo che// oM ni rnam par brjid pa'i sku// AHni sgra brjod 'byung bas gsung // hUM ni 'dod dgur mkhyen pas thugs// rgyal ba'i zhing khams 'di yis skyong // tshangs
317a6(1): pa'i lha yi gsung bzhin du// srin po 'dul yang skyon ma gos// dper na me tog pad+ma skyes// 'dam gyi skyon gyis ga la gos// de nyid grogs su gyur pa ste// 'dam med pad+ma gang las skye// ri rab rtse ni lha gnas
317b1(1): te// ri rab khong seng lha min yul// gling bzhir mi gnas mtho ris gsum// phyi yi rgya mtsho dud 'gro la// grong khyer ser skya yi dwags nyid// rdo rje gdan 'og dmyal ba'i gnas// kun gyi skad du chos ston
317b2(1): pas// thugs rje'i rta skad rigs drug 'dul// lus ngag yid kyi brda' sprad na// pho mo mthun pa'i dpe bzhin shes// dper na khwa tas gzan mthong ltar// ma dang mkha' 'gro 'grub nas byon// ma mo mkha'
317b3(1): 'gro la sogs la// mthun pa'i sha khrag gtor ma 'bul// las bzhi'i phrin las bcol bar bya// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// ngo bo nges tshig dbye ba dang // skyon dang yon tan rang bzhin bshad// rta
317b4(1): yi 'gros dgu bstan pa yang // dpung lag sgrog 'gros lha dang mi// gdol pa lcags bcug nyan thos 'dra// pho nya srun 'gros rang sangs rgyas// 'jab tshe gzengs ni mdo sde nyid// gom bu myol 'gros kri ya
317b5(1): ba// sbrang mo mdul 'gros yo ga nyid// rol mo'i stabs pa ma hA yin// mjal mo dkyus 'gro a nu ste// dkyus su tshar 'gros a ti la// rta yi 'gros ni dgur bstan pas// pad+ma dbang chen rta gdong zhal// rta
317b6(1): skad dgongs par 'dus pas gsungs// khams gsum dbang du sdud par byed// 'khor 'das dbang gi skur rdzogs la// theg pa'i rim pa rtogs pas na// dpe dang don du bshad pa'o// zhes gsungs
318a1(1): so// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa gnad 'bebs kyi rgyud las/ rta skad kyi dgongs pa he ru ka'i gnas bcu dang / dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad na gnas pa rnams/ he ru ka'i gnas bcu na gar
318a2(1): dgu mdzad de/ 'jig rten dregs pa can rnams 'dul bar gnad la phab pa ste le'u lnga pa'o// // de nas dregs pa can ma lus pa'i srog gnad la 'bebs pa rnams gsungs so// 'di ni lho phyogs pa
318a3(1): rol gyi// dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong 'das// sprin dang na bun tshu rol na// 'jig rten 'das dang ma 'das kyi// sa mtshams lho phyogs gyad kyi yul// bla mtsho nag po'i nang shed na// nyin bzhin bskal pa'i
318a4(1): rlung nag 'tshubs// mtshan bzhin 'jig dus me ltar 'bar// thod pa lcags kyi grong khyer na// gson gshin gnyis kyi zam kha na// gson po skos la 'debs par byed// shi ba rnams kyi gshin rje byed// dge
318a5(1): byed rnams kyi stong 'dzin cing // sdig pa can gyi chad pa mkhan// dam nyams khram la 'debs byed cing // dam tshig can gyi grogs la brtson// chos rgyal gshin rje zhes bya ba// mngon shes rdzu 'phrul byin rlabs
318a6(1): can// ag tse'i phyogs na gnas bcas pa// nag po seng dgong ral pa can// srog pa rtsa la 'khor lo bskor// rmyangs pa dkar la rta dkar rgyug/ rak+ta dmar la rab tu 'jib// rnam par shes pa hub gyis
318b1(1): 'debs// skye 'gro'i dbugs la sbar zin byed// 'chi bdag be b+ha swa ta'i 'khor// gshin rje'i bye ba sa ma ya// snying dang klad pa rtsa la rgyug/ srog gi dbang po'i bdag po byed// 'chi ba'i bdag pos gsad
318b2(1): pa'i thabs// sngags pa gshin rje'i chas su zhugs// rabs chad ag tse nag po la// 'chi bdag gzugs bris dgra dang sbyar// brag phug lhor blta'i nang gnas la// skye tshe skye ba zi ra dang // tsha dang thal chen
318b3(1): nyung dkar dug/ phyi ma'i sbyor bas klad khug brab// dgra bo'i steng du babs pa dang // de ma thag tu 'chi bar nges// oM ya ma rA tsa nr-i sha ku ru rbad/ thum ril rbad/ mA ra ya che ge mo snying phyung zad phaT/ rngubs hril
318b4(1): rbad sod/ rbad che ge mo mA ra ya rbad// 'chi bdag rgyal po'i mod mo'i sngags// rnal 'byor man ngag gdeng ldan pas// zhag bdun mi smra sgra bcad bzlas// sha za khrag 'thung nges par rgyug/ khrag zad sogs
318b5(1): kyis mnar gyur nas// dbugs kyis bor nas 'pho bar 'gyur// 'chi bdag gshin rje b+ha swa ta'i dmod mos gsad pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// dus gsum bde gshegs kun gyi yum// srid pa'i dam can kun gyi
318b6(1): ma// lha srin sde brgyad rje mo ste// mkha' la srog gi mnga' mdzad ma// srid pa'i dbang chen ma yis mdzad// lha dang bdud dang gnod sbyin te// mi srun pa rnams ma mos bskyed// de phyir srid pa'i khams 'dir
319a1(1): ni// skye 'gro'i srog la dbang chen ma// ma mo rnams kyi rgyal mo ni// e ka dza ti gsang ba'i yum// dbu gcig phyag gnyis zhabs gnyis bgrad// smug nag ral bas sa gzhi khebs// ral pa
319a2(1): sbusprugs pa'i skra gseb nas// pho nya drug cu rtsa brgyad 'gyed// nam mkha'i klong nas ma mo ni// las byed stong dang rtsa brgyad 'gyed// mche ba'i bar na za byed dang // sgrol byed mu kha brgyad rnams 'gyed// smin ma
319a3(1): g.yas g.yon dkyil 'khor nas// gza' bdud brgyad rnams las la 'gyed// rdzi ma 'grugs pa'i byin rlabs las// rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad 'gyed// spyan mig g.yas dang g.yon pa na// nyi ma zla ba'i cho 'phrul
319a4(1): gtong // shangs kyi rlung sgrom 'bar ba las// bskal pa'i rlung nag 'tshubs mar 'khyil// zhal gdangs kha rlangs nag po las// 'ja' tshon sprin phung 'khrigs pa las// nad rigs rnam lnga'i char pa
319a5(1): 'bebs// srid pa'i ma mos stong gsum bkang // kha nas ma mo'i dmod sngags bzlos// de yi dbang chen ma tshogs kyis// dam las 'das pa gsang ba'i thabs// dur khrod chen po'i gnas dag tu// ma mo'i
319a6(1): chas su zhugs nas su// mnol gri'i khrag la dmod sngags bzlas// gzugs brnyan steng du drag tu skyom// ma ma sa ya hir hir khrag tu ti bab ti babs che ge mo'i srog 'dril bla 'dril/ i ba thum ma hA pra 'du pra
319b1(1): 'du/ smrig smig ma tsa ru ti hib hi ba b+h+yo b+h+yo/ zhag bdun bsgrub pa byas nas ni// ma mo'i drag sngags dmod pa 'di// khrag thun dgra bo'i rjes la brdeg/ mod la khrag skyug 'chi bar nges// ma mo'i rdeg sngags de
319b2(1): mod pas// dgra bgegs bsgral ba'i ting 'dzin to// smug nag 'bar ba'i mkhar nang nas// srog bdag bdud pho mi zan te// phag mo zhon nas stong gsum rgyug/ gcer bu ral pa mun ltar gtibs// shin tu
319b3(1): 'bar ba khrag gi mig/ sna nas mu lung 'tshubs nag 'khyil// za byed chen po'i zhal gdangs nas// glog ltar myur ba'i ljags 'dril zhing // dung gi mche bas mna' zan sgrol// skye 'gro kun gyi dbugs len
319b4(1): byed// zhal nas bdud kyi dmod sngags zlos// bskal pa gsum gyi pha rol na// 'jig rten mun ltar gtibs nas rgyug/ srid pa gsum gyi yang rtse nas// drag po'i thog ltar 'dril zhing mchod// 'gro ba mi la
319b5(1): gnya' zungs byed// dud 'gro phyugs la sbar thebs byed// lcags kyi sbar mos hab thob byed// zangs kyi sen mos glo snying 'bregs// skye 'gro kun gyi srog gcod po// bdud kyi rgyal po'i drag sngags
319b6(1): ni// sngags pa bdud kyi chas su zhugs// bdud rtsi rak+ta sman sbyar te// snang srid srog la bdud dbang bskur// dgra gzugs dug gi lo mar bris// brag nag rtsa ru gtum pos 'dug/ nyung dkar nyung nag thal
320a1(1): chen dang // mngal khrag khyi khrag gzugs la sgrom// zhag bdun mi bar mi gcad par// bdud kyi drag sngags rab tu zlos// ru tra ru tra/ su ru su ru/ ti sta ti sta/ ti ro ti ri/ 'ub 'ub dzA dza/ bdud
320a2(1): nag po tsag gru kA la ru tra mA ra ya/ rtse ram dgra bo'i snying la shog/ lhung ma dgra'i snying la shog/ trag phrom dgra bo'i snying la shog/ zhag bdun dgra bo'i tshe srog 'bral// gal te 'gor nas rtags med
320a3(1): na// bdud kyis snying phyung zos bsam nas// dgra bo'i khyim du gtor byas na// de ma thag tu myags kyis 'gro// bdud kyi drag sngags dmod mos dgra bgegs gdug pa can bsgral ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//
320a4(1): brang yid 'ong rgya mtsho'i chu// ngo mtshar chu bo bzhi 'babs sa// 'dam bu me tog tshal gyi gling // dug gi na bun sprin 'khrigs nas// dug sbrul ra ba bdun gyis bskor// rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas
320a5(1): nang // pad+ma brtsegs pa'i dkyil steng na// chu srin 'bum gyi khri steng na// gdug pa klu yi rgyal po ni// sbrul mgo dgu yi gdengs ka can// dgu ka rin chen 'bar bas brgyan// ral pa sprugs pa'i skra gseb
320a6(1): nas// sdom dang sdig pa char du 'bebs// khro gnyer mgo la sbrul nag 'phro// mthing ga'i 'od zer phyogs bcur 'gyed// sbrul nag 'bum gyi dkyil na bzhugs// nag po'i klu rigs grangs med 'khol// ro
320b1(1): nye'i kha nas dmod sngags bzlos// gdug pa'i mdze nad bco brgyad gtong // klu yis dgra bo bsgral ba'i thabs// rgya mtsho'i 'gram du zhag bdun 'dug/ sngags pa klu yi chas su zhugs// kha ra sbrang ma tsan+dan
320b2(1): dang // sha ru la nya ru la khrag rul dang // sbrang rtsi bu ram sgo nga dang // skye tshe sgog pa phye mar btag/ ril bu byas pa brgya rtsa brgyad// ril bu re re'i dkyil du ni// dgrar ming gro gar bris la gzhug/ ril bu re la
320b3(1): drag sngags ni// brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas par bya// na ga ra tsa sa ma ya dzaH/ nag mo tsit+ta ma rA ya dzaH/ nA ga b+ha ling dung bA dzaH/ na ga su pra ti sa ma yA dzaH/ nA ga tsiN+Da khrag ti mA ra ya rbad/ che ge mo'i tsiny+tsa rtsi tsa
320b4(1): la mA ra ya dzaH/ nA ga shig yaM yaM dza dzaH/ zhag bdun klu yi dmod sngags bzlas// the tshom med par dgra snying bsgral// klu yi drag sngags dmod pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// dmu bdud chen po ha la ka/ bar snang khams
320b5(1): su rgyug byed cing // skar chen 'bar ba'i zod chen bcings// sngon du su 'phrad khrur mid byed// lha chen brgyad kyi dbang po bral// klu chen brgyad kyi don snying 'byin// rgyu skar rnams kyi gral yang dkrug/ bar snang
320b6(1): dgu tshigs dum bur gtub// srid pa'i ri rab tsog por 'phang // rgya mtsho chen po zho ltar dkrug/ nyi ma zla ba klad la bskor/ 'jig rten rgyang mar 'phen pa yi// gnod sbyin chen po'i drag sngags ni// 'gro ba
321a1(1): rnams la brgyab pa na// de ma thag tu rengs par 'gyur// zhags bdun shing gcig rtsa ru 'dug/ sngags pa dmu yi chas su zhugs// yungs kar thal chen skye ba dang // gu gul nag po rta nag
321a2(1): khrag/ zer mo'i spu dang dgra bo'i rjes// khyim bya'i sgong skogs snod nang du// gu gul nag por dam spos spos kyang la// zhag bdun mi bar mi gcad par// dmu bdud chen po'i drag sngags bzlas// tsi bar tsi
321a3(1): bar ra tsa si ti sa ma ya thibs dza/ zhung zhung ra dza A ho b+h+yAM rbad/ kril kril sha ma ru tri ma ho dzaH/ rmugs rmugs rak+ka rA tsa dum bu shig/ krugs kyugs tsit+ta zung song ma le thun thun ma le ra tsi thun
321a4(1): b+h+yo// thums thums rA tsa sa ta mi tsakra ba mo la// che ge mo sprad sprad/ dmu bdud chen po'i dmod sngags bzlas// gang la brgyab pa shing bzhin rengs// gal te sngags pa grong khyer zhugs// chom rkun dag gis
321a5(1): 'tshe byed dam// yang na dur khrod dgon par gnas// seng ge stag dang sbrang ki sogs// gcan zan khro bo 'byung gyur na// sngags 'di bzlas la mgul khugs bcangs// tse bar zhung zhung / kril kril rmugs
321a6(1): rmugs kyugs krugs thums thums rgud rgud/ mgul khug rdzas kyis de la rgyob// rengs par 'gyur ro de ltar gyis// rang gi 'jigs med gnas slebs tshe// de'i tshe drag sngags mgo zhabs bzlog/ de yis
321b1(1): gnod pa grol bar 'gyur// dmu yi drag sngags dmod mo'i ting nge 'dzin to// bde gshegs bka' yi bstan pa yis// 'jig rten dregs pa dmod pa'i sngags// gad mos twa la mgo bcad bzhin// dregs pa
321b2(1): btsan gyi rgyal po ni// shu bo rdo rje srog len te// dmar po skye 'gro'i srog kyang gcod// brag btsan rgyal pos ltas ngan 'gyed// de yi drag sngags dbab pa'i thabs// brag dmar chol bzang rtsar song
321b3(1): la// sngags pa btsan gyi chas su zhugs// gser mig can gyi thod pa ru// gang la bya ba'i gzugs bcug la// thog gis bsad pa'i mchog phur la// khrag dang dug gis ngar blud ste// btsan gyi drag sngags
321b4(1): bzlas la brdeg/ sa ma ya tri shi rbad b+h+yo/ oM skor sod chum zlog dri la/ non yaM yaM/ sbugs sngams/ myag myag dun dun thum ri li li/ btsan sha long la btsan gyis khrag 'thung / ro khur sme sme/ ke ke rim rim zer
321b5(1): sad bstan pa 'jig pa'i srog chod dbugs long / snying la zum snying la thum/ trag sha trag sha dgra bo'i snying la shog/ sra brtan brag gi mnga' bdag dus la bab/ dam nyams dgra la bdud du phob// btsan gyi
321b6(1): shod mas thog btsan gyi se long gis mngag pa'i las la khyod ma yel b+h+yo/ rnal 'byor pa yis zhag brgyad du// gnyid kyi bar chod rab spangs la// btsan gyi drag sngags par med zlos// dgra bo'i lus sems
322a1(1): 'bral bar nges// btsan gyi drag sngags dmod mo'i ting nge 'dzin to// gza' bdud chen po rA hu la// sgra gcan 'dzin gyi drag sngags 'di// gza' bdud gdug pa'i las yin te// ki kang dbab
322a2(1): dang gshed bzhi'i las// 'jig rten khams ni kun khyab ste// khyab 'jug chen po rA hu la// thog dang chu 'khyags ser ba 'bebs// srid pas ma srid mgar gyis ni// ma brdungs ye srid byung ba ni// byang chub
322a3(1): sems kyi ngar dbang can// rlung gis ma blud bshad pa dang // ye blud mtshon dpal ngar can de// 'byung ba gzhan gyis mi tshugs cing // nyid kyis gang la thogs med 'joms// drag po'i gnam lcags thog
322a4(1): mtshon ni// de dang chu 'khyags myur dbab thabs// ri gsum rtse la gcer bur gnas// sngags pa gza' bdud chas su zhugs// thog grir shi ba'i thod pa'i nang // gser dang zangs lcags 'khar ba
322a5(1): dngul// thod pa kha sbyor rgyu mas bcing // nang du thog gi 'khor lo la// gza' bdud sngags rnams spel la bri// thog gi steng du 'ong bar bya// rA hu la trag sha tsa pa ni ya/ pa sha mi ki ru ru ma ki dza la ti/ ya ma
322a6(1): snying ya ma khrag rA hu la hril hril phrom phrom shar shar b+h+yo b+h+yo phaT/ ba tha ra A be sha phrom hril shar phob/ zhag bdun kha rlangs ma shor bar// nyung dkar sngags nas gtar bcug na// thog dang ser bas yul
322b1(1): mkhar 'joms// gza' bdud rgyu ba'i dus dang bstun// gza' bdud rA hu la'i drag sngags dmod pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa gnang 'bebs kyi rgyud las// dregs pa bdun gyi drag sngags
322b2(1): gnad la 'bebs pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sde brgyad gnad 'bebs 'di gsungs so// sde brgyad rol pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// bka' thob bsnyen pa thob pa
322b3(1): yis// brtags pa'i sa ru dkyil 'khor bya// dbus su 'brub khung drag po ru// dur khrod zhing gi ras chen la// khrag chen rtsibs la sde brgyad 'god// lha rgyal ma hA de ba dang // bdud rgyal ha nu pag sha
322b4(1): dang // btsan rgyal shu bo srog len dang // gnod sbyin rag sha mgo dgu dang // klu rgyal sog ma med dang ni// gshin rje bye ba gung ring dang // srin mo me dpal nag mo dang // bgegs chen bi nA ya ga
322b5(1): rnams// rang rang cha lugs mthun par bris// de la ting 'dzin bstan pa ni// yul gsum gsal bar gyur pa na// sde brgyad rten du byin gyis rlabs// dmigs gsum gsal bar gyur pa na// yid kyi 'gying
322b6(1): phur thebs pa ste// sde brgyad dngos su snang bar 'char// mkhas pas bdag nyid dbang chen bsgom// srid pa'i lha srin khams gsum bkang // rnam shes rlung 'dra ba kug la bstim// lha srin mtshon cha srog
323a1(1): sngags brdeg/ ma hA de ba ti dza ti dza/ la sra pa na la gar sha ka ra ka la ya/ hUM de ba ra tsa ma hA nr-i dza hUM/ nr-i zum zum rbad/ shag se sen dza dza hUM hAM/ ma hA de ba ka la ka ti dza re sa ri na/ e ni hri se ba
323a2(1): na dza/ nA ga ru ru he sa gan/ bu se na tA se/ u ge na se se tse da tse/ bu ye na de ba na mA ra ya/ tsa tu ra mu kha rag sha pra ma na/ ma hA de ba che ge mo'i srog la li pra ma ni/ dam nyams dgra'i snying la dzaHdzaH/ na ga ru ru
323a3(1): ha se/ srog mA ra ya/ hri dam srog ri rtse thal ma ni dam/ kro ti kro ti kro la ya/ mA ra ya dam/ srog kaM ti kaM mA ra ya dam/ srog gaM shaM tri mA ra ya dam/ srog mu tri tru'u tri mA ra ya dam dzaHdzaH/ lha chen po'i srog gi chan
323a4(1): pa'o// ru tra bdud tri ni ra pra na/ tri ya ma tra tri ya b+h+yo/ khaM khaM baM baM rbad/ che ge mo'i srog rtsa thun nr-i dzaHdzaH/ ya bdud kyi srog gi chan pa'o// s+phu tri tsa na d+ha dum dum buM baM/ kha la rag sha thum ri li li/ kha ba sha baM
323a5(1): rag thum thum ri li/ che ge mo ma ra Na nr-i dzaHdzaH/ dmu bdud srog gi chan pa'o/ hri dkar po tri dul dul snying khrag ri la ri la chom chom/ rtsa thun shig che ge mo ma ra Na dzaHdzaH/ gnod sbyin srog gi chan pa'o// nA ga tsa
323a6(1): tsa na ni e nan ta/ nA ga badz+ra la na ti san d+ha rak+Sha na/ che ge mo tsit+ta b+hasmi ku ru dzaHdzaH/ klu'i drag sngags dmod pa'i chan pa'o// ya ma tshan d+ha hri dza la/ tse tra da ra na sha pa/ che ge mo nr-i mA ra la sod/ chom chom shig
323b1(1): dzaHdzaH/ gshin rje'i drag sngags chan pa'o// ma hA tsan d+ha rak+Sha hri tha ni ya ma tha ru ru tra mA ra ya/ che ge mo'i rna bye b+h+yo dzaHdzaH/ srin po'i srog gi chan pa'o/ ma hA ba du pra tra/ b+hI mu tsan d+ha tu si ni/ byi nA ya ga/ che ge
323b2(1): mo'i tsit+ta la b+hu dza ta khA hi/ he ka li ma hA tsan d+ha/ mA ra ya nr-i khug dzaHdzaH/ bgegs kyi srog gi chan pa'o// lha ma srin ni de rnams kyi// rang rang dag gi srog snying la// lcags kyi sdig pa kha brgyad pas// shin tu
323b3(1): mtshan nas gnas pa yin// rang dbang med par snying khrag drang // de ma thag tu srog dang bral// lha srin 'dus pa'i chan pa'o// dam nyams kun gyi srog gcod po// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa gnad 'bebs kyi
323b4(1): rgyud las/ lha ma srin sde brgyad gnad la 'bebs pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten du thog ser dbab pa 'di gsungs so// dben pa'i gnas su dam ldan
323b5(1): 'dug/ grir shi mi yi snying dang khrag/ rgya po khyi yi snying dang khrag/ ra yang rgya bo'i snying dang khrag/ dong bur blugs la sngags bzla'o// zla ba gcig gam gnyis su bsnyen// trag mu tra kha mu tra b+h+yo/ ra ra ya ya rbad rbad
323b6(1): dus la bab bo// sa ma ya b+h+yo/ sa ma ya rak+Sha b+h+yo/ ku ru ku ru rag sha b+h+yo/ ha he ha he rak+Sha b+h+yo/ pad+ma rak+ta a mr-i ta/ bre gu gser thig dag dang gsum// rgyun gtor byas la gta' ru gzung // sku ni bcu gnyis las
324a1(1): mi nyung // rang gi g.yas su gzhag par bya// sgrub pa dkyil 'khor gru gsum ste// mi rkang skyed po bzhi btsugs la// rabs chad thod pa'i nang du yang // ra khyi rgya bo mi khrag dang // chu mig chu sbyar
324a2(1): blugs pa ste// glang ma'i byang bur skul tshig bris// zhing lpags kha bcad steng du gzhag/ kham kong zur gsum bdun nang du// thun bdun legs par bsham par bya// dang por nyung dkar ra khrag blug/ trag ni
324a3(1): ru ma sha swA hA/ gnyis par dre'u thod rus khrag brdzis// ma ma du yang phaT/ gsum par thod par yungs nag la// oM dub nur dub swA ha/ bzhi par mi khrag nyung dkar ro// oM ya tsi la 'du lu tshal pa tshal hUM hUM
324a4(1): phaT phaT swA hA/ lnga par khyi khrag 'o ma la// oM ha ba ha ba rub rub hUM phaT swA hA/ drug par sngo sna 'o ma mar/ oM dud shing mA ra ya pa ta na phaT/ bdun par sha ru tshil chen yin// oM pra shed ra na hUM phaT/ zhag bdun
324a5(1): dgu bcu rtsa gcig bzlas// ma mo bskul par bya ba ni// g.ya' shing dud pa'i dbang mo che// sku ni mthing nag chen mo la// phyag na thog gi bu yug bsnams// srid bdag chen mo srid pa'i dpal// srid bdag
324a6(1): chen mo kun gyi rje// khros pas klu 'brug bran du 'khol// ma mo chen mo gshegs su gsol// dam nyams yul du thog ser phob// dkon mchog gsum gyi bstan pa srungs// de nas las la sbyor ba ni// thog ser
324b1(1): 'bebs na thun bdun po// yul lha klu dang btsan gnyen la// zab kyi sbyin sreg bya ba yi// ser ba mu khrid 'bebs pa na// b+han+da glang ru gtar gzhug ste// glang ru'i phye ma skyi 'bru dang // lan tshwa yungs kar brdos
324b2(1): pa la// ldong ros dang ni thal chen dang // bud med lo ni bcu bdun pa'i// mngal khrag bsres la blug par bya// glang ru zhing gi dbus su sba// thod pa zhing gi mtha' bskor nas// zhing gi mu ma dag la sba// rta kyi
324b3(1): dza ho// khri tsho klu ba yang hUM ya/ ru lu ru lu swA hA/ brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas par bya'o// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa gnad 'bebs kyi rgyud las/ ma mo gnad 'bebs ser ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas
324b4(1): bcom ldan 'das kyis e ka dza ti'i rigs sngags kyis zhing bcu bsgral ba 'di gsungs so// ral gcig ro langs gsang bsgrub ni// dgra la khrag nad gtong ba'i thabs// drag sngags bya ba 'di gsungs
324b5(1): so// byi tri pu tra lo bdun pa// man chad lon pa'i sha tshil la// dang po gtor ma gcig bya ste// drag sngags 'dis ni bod par bya// skra dngos byung na dngos grub ster// dri'u dri'u tri du/ ma ma sha sha dza dza b+ho b+h+yo/
324b6(1): gsang sngags yi ge bcu gsum 'dis// nyi shu rtsa gcig bsgrub pa na// rab ni zla ba gcig na yang // mngon gsum dag tu sgrol bar 'gyur// trag rag sha ma ma dza dza/ sa ma ya snying la rbud rgyud/ tsit+ta rak+ta thun dza
325a1(1): b+h+r-i/ ma ma srog sham sham khyer b+h+yo/ thag rag mo oM ka dza ti nga/ ma ma snying mu rag ti sha la rbad/ ma ma tsa pa laM mu rba/ khrag snying mi rbud/ ling+ga la nyung dkar brdeg/ tsaH mngon du 'ong bar
325a2(1): 'gyur// ral gcig ro langs gsang bsgrub yin// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa gnad 'bebs kyi rgyud las/ e ga dza ti'i gnad 'bebs kyi le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu la
325a3(1): gtad pa 'di gsungs so// gdug pa klu la gtad bya na// ling+ga mdze khrag bri bar bya// mtha' ma sngags kyis bskor bar bya// mdze thod nang bzhugs gru gsum gzhug/ bdag nyid dbang chen gsal ba
325a4(1): yis// bsnyen pa zhag ni bdun du bzlas// ni na gas zung zung ni/ na gas rgud rgud/ ni na gas hring hring / dgra bo'i tsit+ta gyur ling nan/ thibs thibs khyer khyer/ rlag shing ltar che ge mo mA ra ya rbud/ stag dang
325a5(1): dom dred seng ge rnams// rtags su 'khol na bzang ba yin// nA ga rA tsa a mr-i te g+ha tsa ga kha khA hi/ nA ga du ma tha le nA ga rA tsa a nan te swA hA/ dkar gsum mngar gsum mchod sngags so// bsgrub pa zhag
325a6(1): gsum thun brab pa// nyung dkar nyung nag thun du brab// nA ga hu ya b+ha ling dung sa che ge mo thun sod/ zung nA gshig shig/ ro la thibs thibs/ mA ra ya sod/ sha tra pa tra tsit+ta gu la nan/ mA ra ya rbud/ ling+ga la

325b2(1): lci// dmangs rigs me 'dra shin tu drag/ de la gtad na myur ba yin// sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung bar nus// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa gnad 'bebs kyi rgyud las/ klu'i dregs pa gnad la phab nas zhing bcu
325b3(1): pha tshan ma lus par bsgral ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de nas 'khor gyi tshogs ma lus pa thams cad las/ ye shes 'khor rnams ni 'og min gyi gnas na dgongs pa la spyod cing rjes su yi rang bar gyur

325b5(1): nga du/ chos spu dri ma med par bzhugs so// mkha' 'gro'i tshogs kyis rgyud 'di yi ger bris nas/ phyi rabs kyi gang zag chos kyi spyan lam sla spro bar gyur to// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa gnad 'bebs kyi rgyud
325b6(1): las/ rjes su yi rang zhing / rgyud gtad pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa gnad 'bebs kyi rgyud rdzogs so// paN+Di ta pad+ma sa ma b+ha wa dang / lots+tsha ba kha che A nan tas
326a1(1): bskur ba'o// // rgyud 'di dpe gcig las bsngar sa ma 'byor/ @#// rgya gar skad du/ shrI pad+ma ma hA ba sha saM b+hA ta tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal pad+ma dbang chen
326a2(1): dregs pa dbang sdud kyi rgyud ces bya ba/ lhun gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid de ni//
326a3(1): pad+ma can nam bde ba can zhes bya ba'i gnas btsun mo'i b+ha ga las bzhengs te/ 'di ltar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs pa ni/ sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la gzigs nas
326a4(1): shes bya'i sgrib pa cha phra ba rnams sbyangs par mdzad do// rang sangs rgyas rnams la gzigs nas rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams rnam par dag par ston par mdzad do// nyan thos rnams la gzigs nas
326a5(1): 'gog pa las bslangs shing sbyangs par mdzad do// bya ba las kyi rgyud kri ya ba la gzigs nas rigs gsum gyi don rnam par dag par mdzad do// cha mthun spyod pa'i rgyud u pa ya la gzigs nas rigs
326a6(1): bzhi'i gdung rnam par dag par mdzad do// rnam grol rig pa'i rgyud rnal 'byor theg pa la gzigs nas sum cu rtsa gnyis rnam par dag pa mdzad do// rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i rgyud bskyed rdzogs rnam pa gsum
326b1(1): gyi blta spyod kyis dregs pa thams cad dbang du sdud par mdzad par yang gzigs so// de nas 'gro ba'i rigs bsam yas pa la gzigs nas/ sems nyid sangs rgyas pa yin pa las/ snang ba snod dang bcud
326b2(1): du snang ba 'di thams cad ni/ sems nyid chos sku las snang ba chos sku'i 'od gsal du gtan la 'bebs pa'i phyir/ nyid sku zhal gsum phyag drug par bstan pa ni de lta ste/ dbus kyi sku mdog dkar dmar pad+ma
326b3(1): rA ga'i mdangs su gnas/ g.yas thugs kyi zhal sngo ba/ g.yon yon tan gyi zhal ser ba/ g.yas dang po la pad+ma'i sdong bu/ bar ma na rdo rje rtse gsum/ tha ma na mda' 'dzin pa/ g.yon dang po na bum pa/ bar pa
326b4(1): na dpal be'u/ tha ma na gzhu 'dzin pa/ rgyan rin chen sna tshogs pa'i na bzas mdzes pa/ yum phyag rgya ma dang bcas pa/ dmar po rdo rje dril bus 'khyud pa/ rin chen seng ge nyi zla pad+ma'i khri la/ ye shes 'od
326b5(1): 'khyil gong bu'i nang na bzhugs pa/ zhal nas gsang ba'i sngags brjod pa ni// oM A ro li ka/ bI rA gar ti s+t+waM swA hA/ zhes brjod pas 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mthong bar gyur te/ de nas
326b6(1): 'khor rnams kyis bstod pa 'di mdzad nas bstod do// hUM dri med rnam dag zhi ba las// spros pa thams cad rab zhi ba'i// ye shes tshogs mchog mnga' brnyes pa// rang bzhin dag pa chos kyi sku// thugs rjes
327a1(1): sdug bsngal sel mdzad pa// bsod nams tshogs rdzogs gzugs kyi sku// las dang nyon mongs shes bya yi// dri ma spangs pa'i skur grub pa// gsung mchog sku gsung dang pa dang // lus ngag
327a2(1): sems kyis phyag 'tshal bstod// thugs rje chen pos gzung ba dang // ye shes snang ba gsal bar mdzod// dus kyis mnar ba'i skye bo rnams// 'dul phyir khro bo bzhengs su gsol// rtag chad mtha' la zhen pa
327a3(1): yi// gdug pa can rnams dbang du sdus// zhes bstod do// de nas gar dbang bde ba chen po'i sku des/ hUM drug rol pa'i cho 'phrul bstan nas// oM ma hA pad+ma shrI he ru ka pad+ma kro tI shwa rI hUM/ ma hA tsan+da sarba duSh+TA na
327a4(1): hUM phaT/ ces brjod pas/ nyid kyi sku khro bor chen po dbu lnga phyag bcu drug par gyur te/ sku mdog dmar po dbu lnga pa/ dbu lnga'i nang na rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du gsal ba/ lhag pa na rta mgo lnga'i rtsa
327a5(1): mgrin dbang gi dkyil 'khor du gsal ba/ gshog pa khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba dang // thugs ka ye shes sems dpa' dang / gzi ldan yum gyi dkyil 'khor dang / phyag g.yas pa brgyad na rdo rje dang / kha
327a6(1): TaMTi dril bur bcas pa dang / rdo rje lcags kyu dang / sbrul gyi zhags pa dang / 'khor lo dang / rin po che zur 'phyang brgyad pa dang / ral gri dang / rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi phreng ba'o// phyag g.yon pa brgyad na/ pad+ma'i yu
327b1(1): ba nas 'dzin pa/ thod khrag snod bkang ba dang / khro bo chen po'i snying 'byin po dang / gshin rje'i dbyug pa thogs pa dang / rdo rje rgya gram dang / rdo rje be con dang / me 'od kyi phreng ba dang / tri shUl dang / khyung gi khra
327b2(1): bsnams pa/ zhabs khro bo brgyad kyi gdan la bzhugs par gyur te/ zhal nas nyid kyi snying po yi ge bcu bdun pa 'dzin pa 'di brjod do// oM pad+ma sid+d+ha sid+d+ho ha he tsakra b+h+yo/ b+h+yo hUM hUM phaT/ ces brjod cing gdug pa
327b3(1): can 'dul ba'o// de nas nyid kyi 'khor ni/ sku yi kham rgya dkar mo 'khor lo dang / gsung gi kham rgya dmar mo pad+ma dang / thugs kyi kham rgya nag mo rdo rje dang / yon tan kham rgya ser mo dril bu dang / las kyi
327b4(1): kham rgya ljang gu ral gri dang / gsang ba'i kham rgya sna tshogs mdog can khA T+wAM bsnams pa/ kham rgya mo drug po kun kyang g.yon na bdun rtsi'i thod pa bsnams pa/ zhal nas rang sngags brjod pa/ bud+d+ha badz+ra oM/ satwa
327b5(1): badz+ra hUM/ rat+na badz+ra tAM/ d+harmA badz+ra hrIH/ karma badz+ra hA/ gu h+ya badz+ra phaT/ ces brjod cing 'khor lo 'bar ba'i rtse mo drug la bzhugs so// long ba chen po brgyad ni/ shar rdo rje'i long ba dkar po dang / lho rin chen
327b6(1): long ba ser po dang / nub pad+ma'i long ba dmar po dang / byang las kyi long ba ljang gu dang / mtshams kyi long ba phyed gzugs kyi mdog can dang / phyag bzhi na g.yas pa zangs gri dang thod pa/ g.yon rgyu phreng dang
328a1(1): snying bsnams pa/ rang gi zhal nas rang sngags brjod pa ni// oM shwa ri khA hi hAM/ oM shwa ri khA hi tra/ oM shwa ri khA hi sriH/ oM shwa ri khA hi hA/ zhes brjod cing zod rus kyi bar khyams dang po la/ sku gcer

328a3(1): pa'o// zhal nas rang sngags brjod pa ni// oM shrI raM khA hi hUM/ oM shrI raM khA hi tAM/ oM shrI raM khA hi hrIH/ oM shrI raM khA hi hA/ zhes brjod cing bar khyams dang po la gnas so// za byed dpal gyi khyi brgyad ni/ sku mdog
328a4(1): mthing nag sbyang ki'i mgo can/ g.yas gri gug/ g.yon thod pa 'dzin pa/ rang gi sprul pa ce spyang brgyad dang / ye shes kyi sprul pa khyi bcu yang / zhal nas rang sngags brjod pa ni// oM dIp+ta tsakra shwa na mu kha kha long
328a5(1): kha hUM phaT/ ku ru ku ru yak+Sha hUM phaT/ ces brjod cing bar khyams gnyis pa me ri dmar po la bzhugs so// 'khor gyi sgo ba bzhi ni/ mgo dgu po la rkang gcig po/ mdog dkar lag na lcags kyu bsnams pa/
328a6(1): zhal nas hUM hUM phaT/ ces brjod cing shar sgor bzhugs so// 'od gshog mgo brgyad rkang brgyad po ser po lag na zhags pa thogs shing // hUM trAM trAM phaT/ ces brjod cing lho sgor bzhugs so// ye shes mgo drug
328b1(1): lag drug rkang drug po dmar po phyag na lcags sgrog bsnams shing / zhal nas hrI hrIHhrIHphaT/ zhes brjod cing / nub sgor bzhugs so// gsang ba mgo gsum lag gsum rkang gsum po ljang gu ni/ phyag na dril bu
328b2(1): bsnams shing / zhal nas hUM hUM hA hA phaT/ ces brjod cing byang sgor bzhugs so// sgo ba de kun gyi phyag g.yon na/ thod khrag nyid kyis longs spyod mdzad pa// me 'brug dmar po b+h+rUM de gi ri ti dang / rlung 'brug
328b3(1): sngon po ka la sha ni/ oM dzi na laM te tse ri/ yak+ka ku b+hany+dza hUM phaT/ ces brjod cing steng 'og phyogs mtshams kun tu khyab bo// yang sbrul pho nya ni/ dur bya dang / khrung khrung dang / ba se'i byan glag dang / khyi sbyang ma
328b4(1): rnams dang gdong dgu grangs med pa yang / oM ha ha ru lu ma hA tsan+de shwa rI na ye a hUM hUM hUM phaT/ ces brjod par byed cing / phyi rol sgo nas ra ba'i mtshams kyi bar du gnas so// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa dbang
328b5(1): sdud kyi rgyud las nyid kyi sku mngon par bstan pa rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang sngags kyi las yongs su rdzogs pa 'di gsungs so// gsang sngags
328b6(1): kun gyi ngo bo ni// spyi dang bye brag rnam pa gnyis// spyir ni sngags kyi ngo bo ni// thabs dang shes rab rnam pa gnyis// de la thabs zhes brjod pa ni// kun rdzob sgyu ma tsam du snang // shes rab zhes ni gang brjod
329a1(1): pa// don dam skye ba med pa'o// stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no// khyad par sngags kyi ngo bo ni// khyed la ngas ni rab bshad na// sngags kyi ngo bo lha yi sku// drang srong mthu las khyad par
329a2(1): 'phags// nges tshig spyi dang khyad par gnyis// spyi yi nges pa'i tshig bshad pa// skyobs pa'i phyir na sngags yin te// yid bskyab pa yi don yin no// khyad par sngags kyi nges tshig ni// shes skyob yon tan ldan pa
329a3(1): yin// sngags kyi dbye ba rnam pa gnyis// spyi dang bye brag gnyis su bshad// spyi yi dbye ba rnam gnyis te// kun rdzob kyi ni sngags zhes bya// lha yi dkyil 'khor yid la byed// don dam pa yis sngags zhes
329a4(1): pas// gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin te// stong pa chen po ye shes dang // de yul byed pa'i ye shes te// yul dang yul can ye shes te// rtogs pa 'khor ba bdag la skyob// bye brag sngags kyi dbye ba
329a5(1): gsum// gsang sngags rigs sngags gsang sngags yin// gsang sngags don ni rnam pa bzhi// bzod pa thob pa'i rgyur 'gyur gzungs// gsang sngags gzungs dang chos kyi gzungs// don gyi gzungs zhes bya
329a6(1): bar 'dod// bzod pa thob pa'i rgyur 'gyur pas// bskyed rim mthar phyin rnal 'byor ram// mtshan bcas rdzogs rim rnal 'byor ram// mtshan med rnal 'byor a dang hUM// de dag brjod bya thob byed
329b1(1): rnams// rang bzhin med par sems pa ni// de ltar yul dang yul can de// rang bzhin med par rtogs pa ni// dga' ba mchog tu dga' chen skyes// de la gzungs thob ces bya'o// dran dang shes rab gcig tu
329b2(1): byas// bzod pa 'dzin par byed pas gzungs// gzungs thob pa des de ma thag/ phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes skye// mthun pa'i bzod pa chen po ste// don dam chos rnams bzod pa ni// de skyes ring po mi thogs
329b3(1): par// phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes thob// gsang sngags kyi ni gzungs shes pa// de yang phyag rgya chen po ni// thob pa yan chad gang zag des// rang gi ting nge 'dzin dang ni// sngon gyi smon lam stobs bskyed
329b4(1): pas// gsang sngags tshig ni 'di dag gis// sems can rnams kyi nad sogs pa// med par gyur cig ces brjod cing // ting 'dzin dbang gi stobs kyis ni// sems can rnams kyi yams nad sogs// med
329b5(1): cing byin brlabs lhar 'grub 'gyur// des na ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang // de ltar gyur pas gsang sngags rnams// 'dzin par byed pas gsang sngags gzungs// chos kyi gzungs zhes bya ba yang // phyag rgya chen
329b6(1): po'i thob pa'am// ston pa mkha' 'gro'am bla ma yis// sngon chad ma thob ma shes pa'i// bdag nyid gsang ba'i chos bshad pa// thos pa tsam gyis mi brjed 'dzin// dran pa shes rab chos kyi gzungs// don gyi
330a1(1): gzungs ni de bzhin du// gsungs pa'i chos rnams de dag ni// don rnams mi brjed 'dzin pa ni// dran pa shes rab don gyi gzungs// de la rig sngags zhes bya ba// stong pa chen po'i ye shes
330a2(1): de// ye shes yul du byas rtogs pas// ma rig spangs shing rig pa skyed// de phyir rig sngags zhes bya ba'o// gsang sngags mtshan rgyud sngags dang don// 'di zhes nges par shes par bya// mtshan ni gsang sngags
330a3(1): zhes bya ste// snod ma yin la gsang ba dang // blo chung theg pa dman la gsang // gsang thub dngos grub mi yal phyir// sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsang bar bsngags// de phyir gsang sngags nges pa'i mtshan// rgyud
330a4(1): ni 'brel phyir rgyud ces bya// gzhi thabs 'bras bu'i 'brel ba'i phyir// gzhi ni bden gnyis rang bzhin gnas// thabs ni bsgrub pa'i rang bzhin gnas// 'bras bu chos sku gzugs skur gnas// sngags ni
330a5(1): nus pa'i mthu chen de// bsgom pa'i gsang sngags bskyed rdzogs gnyis// spyod pa'i gsang sngags sbyor sgrol gnyis// bzlas pa'i gsang sngags ye shes nyid// bza' ba'i gsang sngags bdud rtsi lnga// don ni kun
330a6(1): rdzob don dam gnyis// don dam yul dang yul can nyid// yul ni stong pa'i ye shes nyid// yul can zhes su bya ba yang // mi rtog ye shes yul byas shing // de rtogs gzungs su gyur pa yis// gnod pa'i 'tshe/
330b1(1): ba nub par byed// kun rdzob sngags de thob pa'i thabs// sngags kyi gzungs dang sngags kyi ming // brda' dang tshig sogs thams cad yin// zhes gsungs so// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa dbang sdud kyi rgyud las//
330b2(1): gsang sngags thams cad dbang du sdud par/ sngags kyi ngo bo nges tshig dbye ba ste le'u gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang sngags kyi lam rnam par bkod pas sngags thams cad dbang du
330b3(1): bsdu ba 'di gsungs so// 'bras bu'i theg chen gsang sngags 'di// khyad par gyur phyir khyad par che// thabs mang dka' ba med pa dang // dbang po rnon po'i dbang gyur dang // don gcig phyir na'ang ma slongs
330b4(1): pas// sngags kyi theg pa khyad par 'phags// 'bras bu nyid du lam shes pas// tshe lus gcig la rdzogs sangs rgyas// de la gsang sngags slob ma ni// snod dang ldan pa gces pa ste// de phyir dam tshig srog
330b5(1): ldan gzhug/ dam tshig mi ldan spang bar bya// dam tshig dang ldan bzlog pa ni// mkha' 'gro ma yi 'tshe ba dang // dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang // shi nas dmyal bar 'gro ba'o// dam tshig mi ldan bcug pa
330b6(1): yang // tshul de nyid du shes par la// theg chen sngags kyi spyod pa la// skyon 'dogs smod par byed pa ni// mkha' 'gro ma yis myur du gsod// de nas dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur// des na zab mo'i spyod pa la//
331a1(1): skyon 'dogs smod pa spang bya'o// skal dang ldan pa'i gang zag de// bla ma dam par gyur pa ni// theg pa mtha' dag ma lus pa'i// grub pa'i mtha' la ma rmongs shing // rgyud kyi dgongs pa shes pa
331a2(1): dang // dkyil 'khor la sogs kun mkhas shing // snying rje chen po dang ldan pa// bla ma'i bka' ni thob pa la// tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i dga' ston bya// yon dbul dbang bskur gsol ba btab// de ltar gsol
331a3(1): ba btab pa dang // bla mas kyang ni bsnyen pa dang // sa cho ga lhag gnas cho ga dang // dkyil 'khor cho ga rgyas pa dang // 'jug pa dbang bskur yon blang bya// de ltar slob mas bla ma la// sems bskyed sdom blang
331a4(1): dbang mnos nas// de nas slob ma dam pa yis// dbang sems de nyid dam tshig bsrung // de bas bsrung la 'bad par bya// dam tshig bsrungs pa'i yon tan yang // mchog dang thun mong dngos grub 'grub// ma
331a5(1): bsrungs pa yi skyon rnams kyang // rdo rje dmyal bar nges par ltung // de yi sdug bsngal bzod par dka'// mtshan nyid shes par bya ba yang // de ltar snod du rung ba dang // rang gi bla ma dam pa la// theg chen
331a6(1): sngags kyi rgyud mnyan nas// sngags song mtshan nyid shes par bya// de nas rang sems sbyang bar bya// sems sbyang don ni rnam par drug/ skyon yon yul dang rgyud la bskyed// spang bya spong thabs 'bras bu
331b1(1): yin// rnal 'byor rang sems ma sbyangs par// rdzogs pa'i byang chub mi 'grub la// de ma grub par gyur pas ni// gzhan gyi don rnams mi 'grub pas// de phyir sems ni spyad par bya'o// sems sbyang yon tan
331b2(1): bsam mi khyab// dpag tu med pa'i dngos grub thob// yul ni rnam pa gnyis yin te// 'jug pa'i yul ni sngon byung gi/ ston pa'i spyod pa bzhin du 'jug/ dmigs pa'i yul yang rnam pa gnyis// mtshan bcas
331b3(1): mtshan ma med pa ste// ye shes thig le phyag mtshan sku// de sogs mtshan ma can du 'dod// stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la// dmigs pa med pa'i tshul gyis dmigs// lam gyis rgyud la skyed pa yang // nye grogs
331b4(1): lam dngos de grogs gsum// nye ba'i grogs kyang rnam pa lnga// bsgrub pa'i gnas dang shis pa'i dus// mtshan ldan grogs dang mthun pa'i rdzas// shes pa'i ston pa phun sum tshogs// lam dngos 'di ltar
331b5(1): 'jug par bya// phyi lam dngos mchog rim pa rnams// rnal 'byor bsgom pas bslab par bya// bya spyod rnal 'byor rgyud gsum ni// mtshan ma dang bcas bsgrub thabs ni// mtshan ma med pa'i bsgrub par
331b6(1): 'dod// rnal 'byor rgyud lung man ngag gsum// bskyed rim rdzogs rim rnam pa gnyis// rdzogs chen lam ni rang sems nyid// sangs rgyas rang sar grol ba'o// lam de cho ga'i rim pa dang // don rim dgos
332a1(1): pa'i rim pa bshad// cho ga'i rim pa bya ba ni// rgyas pa dpe byas bsdus pa yin// rgyas par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor ni// bsgrub pa rten gyi gang zag gis// dang po bla ma dam pa las// dam tshig
332a2(1): dbang thob bsrung la 'bad// gdams ngag mnos nas nyams su blangs// gnas gzhi yid du 'ong ba ru// grogs ni chos dang mthun pa'am// bdag nyid gcig pu sgrub pa pos// dus tshig bzang po dag la
332a3(1): 'jug/ gtor ma gtang zhing sAts+tsha gdab// sbyin sreg yi dam bzlas pa bya// khrus byas maN+Dal me tog bkram// srung ba'i 'khor lo bsgom par bya// sems can sdug bsngal bral bar 'dod// de nas byams pa
332a4(1): bsgom par bya// sems can bde dang ldan par 'dod// de nas dga' ba bsgom par bya// bdag gis byang chub thob par bya// sems can don bya spro bar bya// de nas btang snyoms bsgom par bya// de gsum mi
332a5(1): dmigs par yang bsgom// de nas lha dang bla ma sprul// phyag 'tshal mchod dang sdig bshags sogs// bdun po rnam dag bsod nams tshogs// de nas ting 'dzin rnam pa gsum// ye shes tshogs las rang nyid
332a6(1): lha// bya spyod rnal 'byor rgyud rnams ni// stong pa nyid kyi sngags brjod nas// bdag nyid dam tshig sems dpar bskyed// mdun du ye shes sems dpar sprul// bla med rnal 'byor bskyed rdzogs dang // dbang
332b1(1): bskur sku gsung thugs byin brlab// spyan drangs bzhugs mchod bstod par bya// yi ge phyag mtshan thig le sku// phra mo spro bsdu 'bar 'dzag la// dmigs nas rdzogs rim bsgom par bya// skyo bar gyur na ngag
332b2(1): bzlas bya// shin tu skyo bar gyur pa na// mchod bstod byas la spyan drangs pa// rang bzhin gnas su gshegs su gsol// sprul pa rnams ni rang la bsdu// de yang mtshon pa'i dpe bshad pa// snying rje rtsa ba lta ba
332b3(1): la// byams pa sdong po yin par 'dod// dga' ba yal ga rgyas pa ste// tshogs gnyis lo ma lta bu la// rnal 'byor gzhan ni me tog 'dra// bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pa yi rgyud// yongs su smin pa 'bras bu
332b4(1): yin// bsdus pa'i cho ga rim pa bzhin// bya spyod rnal 'byor bsgom pa yang // bdag nyid lha ru bskyed byas nas// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mdun du sprul// mar me gyes pa'i tshul gnyis su// gcig ni dkyil
332b5(1): 'khor gtso bor snang // gcig ni las kyi lhar byas nas// mchod bstod de bzhin thams cad bya// de ni phyi nang thun mong yin// khyad par lam du bshad pa ni// rnal 'byor bla na med pa ni// bdag nyid lha ru
332b6(1): gsal byas nas// dbang bskur byin brlab spyan drangs nas// bdag dang gnyis su med byas te// bdag nyid lha yi snying ga nas// lha mor sprul nas bya ba'am// 'khor gyi lha mos bdag nyid la// mchod bstod
333a1(1): la sogs byas nas ni// yang ni bdag gi snying ga'am// sku la sogs par bsdu bar bya// bzlas pa'i dus ni thams cad du// mgal me bskor ba lta bu'am// zag mdung 'phen pa'i tshul 'dra
333a2(1): dang // sgro yi chun po 'dra ba dang // thig gu bsgril pa lta bu dang // sgrog spel lcags sgrog lta bu ni// skabs kyi stobs kyis shes par bya// de ltar bsgoms shing bsgrubs pa las// mtshan ma brtan po 'byung bar
333a3(1): 'gyur// mtshan ma thob nas mtshan med bsgom// mtshan ma med pa mngon gyur nas// phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub yin// de dag gsang sngags phyi nang gi/ thun mong lam de gnyis su dbye// de nas don gyi rim
333a4(1): pa ni// de bzhin gshegs pas tshad med bsgoms// tshogs ni rnam gnyis bsags pa dang // bdud rnams thams cad btul ba dang // thams cad la yang ma chags dang // snga phyi byang chub mchog sems
333a5(1): bskyed// thos pa'i shes rab byang ba dang // bsam pa'i shes rab dpyad pa dang // bsgom pa'i shes rab mthar phyin bslab// de bzhin rnal 'byor sgrub pa pos// tshad med pa dang tshogs gnyis dang // srung ba'i
333a6(1): 'khor lo pad+ma dang // zla ba dang ni yi ge dang // phyag mtshan sku ru gyur pa bstan// yang ni de bzhin gshegs pa yi// tshogs kyi lam dang sbyor ba'i lam// mthong ba'i lam dang bsgom pa'i lam// mi slob pa yi
333b1(1): lam dang ni// gzhan don sku gnyis byin brlabs so// de bzhin du ni sgrub pa pos// bsod nams tshogs dang ye shes tshogs// yi ge'am zla ba tshes pa'am// zla rgyas yi ge 'phro 'du dang // zla ba'am zla ba
333b2(1): gnyis pa'am// phyag mtshan dang ni sku dag brtan// de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phro 'du ni// mdzad pa spro dang bsdu ba dang // byin gyis brlab par bstan pa'o// de dag bya spyod rnal 'byor 'dod// yang ni bla med
333b3(1): rnal 'byor pas// bdud rnams gdul phyir mtshams rnams gcad// bsod nams rgyud ldan phung gtor brlab// ma dag rgyud la brten nas ni// tshogs bsag phyir na tshad med bsgom// dag pa sangs rgyas la
333b4(1): brten nas// tshogs bsag phyir na yan lag bdun// bsod nams tshogs bsag bshags pa bya// ye shes tshogs ni bsag pa'i phyir// sku gsum byung tshul ting 'dzin gsum// snod rnams sbyang bas gzhal
333b5(1): yas gsal// bcud rnams sbyang bas lha tshogs gsal// lam gyi dbang rnams blang ba'i phyir// ye shes rnam lngas dbang yang bskur// zab mo'i dbang gsum ldan pas na// sku gsung thugs su byin gyis
333b6(1): brlab// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med phyir// ye shes dam tshig gnyis med bsre// gang yang bdag las gnyis med phyir// mchod cing bstod de bzlas pa bya// rtag pa'i mtha' la mi gnas phyir// stong
334a1(1): nyid rang gi yul du thim// dgos pa de bzhin gshegs pa yis// bden gnyis lam bzhir bsgom byas shing // tshogs bsags sku gsum thob pa bzhin// rnal 'byor rnams kyis thun gcig
334a2(1): la// bsgom pa'i tshul yang de bzhin snang // goms pas phyis kyang de bzhin 'grub// de phyir khyad par 'bras bu'i lam// de yi grogs ni rnam pa lnga// gtor ma sbyin sreg rab tu gnas// tsha tshwa bum pas dbang
334a3(1): bskur ro// bdag gzhan bar chad nyer zhi phyir// gtor ma'i cho ga bya ba yang // ma chag gtor bas gtor ma ste// 'byung po spyi yi gtor ma dang // lha mgron so so'i gtor ma yin// lha tshim par chad bgegs
334a4(1): la sogs// zhi phyir sbyin sreg cho ga bya// rtogs sgrib nyams chags la sogs bsreb// gang 'dod dngos grub sbyin par byed// don dam sbyin sreg mi rtog bsgom// kun rdzob sbyin sreg phyi dang nang // nang ni rang
334a5(1): gis bza' ba nyid// phyi yi sbyin sreg rnam pa gnyis// las rnams thams cad sbyin sreg dang // las bzhi so so'i sbyin sreg go/ de nyid gang mos rigs lnga dang // phrin las dbang du bya ba yin// dngos grub shin
334a6(1): tu myur ba dang // sku gsung thugs rten khyad par phyir// rab gnas bzang po'i cho ga bya// khyad par gyur pas rab tu gnas// rab tu gnas pa rnam pa gsum// sku gzugs glegs bam rdo rje dril// bsod nams
334b1(1): khyad par can bsags phyir// tsha tshwa gdab pa'i cho ga bya// mchod pa'i yul gyur tsha tshwa bshad// dbye ba rnam pa gnyis yin te// cho ga rgyas bsdus phral du bya// bag chags sbyangs dang dbang bskur phyir// bum pa'i
334b2(1): cho ga rab tu bya// yon tan thams cad 'du ba dang // dgos pa byed phyir bum pa'o// bum pa rnam pa gnyis yin te// skabs su bya dang dkyil 'khor bzhengs// gnas skabs phyi nang gsang ba de// phyi ni rdza
334b3(1): pa rin chen sogs// nang ni thod pa mtshan dang ldan// gsang ba yum gyi b+ha ga nyid// dkyil 'khor dbang gi bum pa dang // khrus dang mchod pa tshe bum yin// spang bar bya ba rnam pa gnyis// ngan rtog sems
334b4(1): bdag mtshan 'dzin dang // bzang rtog sangs rgyas bdag tu 'dzin// spong ba'i thabs ni rnam pa gnyis// ngan rtog bzang rtog bdag gis spang // bzang rtog mi rtog pa yis spang // spyod pa 'gro nyal 'dug sdod
334b5(1): kun// nyid kyi lha yi nga rgyal ldan// 'gro dus lha yi spyod pa yang // lhag pa'i lha'am rigs gsum mam// lha'am lha mo gang 'dod bya// skabs su lus phyag bskor ba bya// maN+Dal dbul dang yi dam
334b6(1): bzlas// brtul zhugs spyod pa rab tu bya// yangs pa'i 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis// thun mong don shes grub chen brgyad// mchog la rig 'dzin rnam bzhi dang // sku gsum sku bzhi sku lnga sogs// phyag rgya chen po
335a1(1): mchog bsgrub bo// zhes gsungs so// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa dbang sdud kyi rgyud las/ gsang sngags kyi lam dbang du bsdu ba ste le'u gsum pa'o// // de nas 'khor gyi byang chub sems
335a2(1): dpa' la sogs pa rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das gar gyi dbang phyug chen po la rang rang gi mngon pa don du gnyer bar bya ba'i phyir/ mgrin gcig tu 'di skad du ces ched du brjod do// hUM mi gnas ye
335a3(1): shes thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// 'bar ba'i rgyal po khro bo kun gyi rje// gar dgu 'jigs pa'i cha lugs hUM sgra can// 'khor bcas khro bo'i tshogs rnams gshegs su gsol// dzaHhUM baM hoH/ e h+ye hi b+ha ga bAn
335a4(1): sa ma ya s+t+waM/ srid gsum 'dren mdzad thar lam 'dren pa'i dpal// rigs lnga bde gshegs sems dpa' sras bcas tshogs// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med 'gro don mdzad// rdo rje bkod pa'i dkyil
335a5(1): 'khor tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// dbang drag klu rgyal 'joms mdzad gsung nyid lha// thugs rje thabs mkhas phra men 'dul mdzad cing // phrin las sna tshogs rta mgo ljang gu ston// 'gro 'dul brjid pa'i sku la
335a6(1): phyag 'tshal lo// thig le chos sku gdal ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// gnyis med sna tshogs ma bsgribs sa ler gsal// thugs rje ye shes sems dpa' sngags kyi gnas// phyag rgya'i rten gnas 'phro 'du mdzad la
335b1(1): phyag 'tshal lo// mkha' 'gro bcu drug rab tu rngam chen sku// 'jigs pa'i tshon chas 'gro ba'i las rgyud stongs// gnas rnams so so sna tshogs ston pa'i sku// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// dregs
335b2(1): byed dbang sdud khro bo gnon pa'i stobs// mi mthun tshogs 'joms gnyen po'i tshul du gnas// brjid pa'i chas brgyad phrin las bla na med// bdud 'dul khro bo'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// thugs rje'i mdzad
335b3(1): pas khams gsum zil gyis gnon// thabs dang shes rab 'dam rdzab mun pa sel// gsang ba'i phyag rgya drug pa'i ting 'dzin gsal// khams gsum gnon pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// dus gsum sangs rgyas
335b4(1): kun gyi rang bzhin las// dkyil 'khor thams cad sku gsung thugs su sdud// gnas gsum ston pas chos bshad rgyud sbyangs shing // byin rlabs nam mkha'i mdzod la phyag 'tshal lo// bde bar gshegs
335b5(1): pa thams cad bskyed pa'i lam// yum gyi tshul gyis bde chen dgyes par mdzad// rang rig mkha' 'gro'i gtso mo dbyings kyi tshul// chags chen gzi ldan gtso la phyag 'tshal lo// chos sku mnyam nyid bde chen
335b6(1): byang chub sems// ma bsgribs phyi nang med pa'i bde gsal ba'i// zab mo'i tshul gnas rang bzhin g.yo ba med// snang stong bde ba'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// a ti pu hoH// pra tIts+tsha hoH// pad+ma ban+da naM ka ro mi/ a
336a1(1): la la hoH// oM dga' bo rol mo glu bro gar gyi tshogs// 'dod pa'i yon tan khyad par 'phags pa'i sprin// stong gsum mthun par snang ba'i spyod yul du// lha mo'i tshogs bcas zag pa med par
336a2(1): dbul// oM na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo bi shra mu khe b+h+yaHsarba tat+saM ung+ga te s+pha ra Na i maM ga ga na khaM swA hA/ oM badz+ra d+haM pe hUM swA hA/ oM badz+ra puSh+pe hUM swA hA/ oM badz+ra A lo ke hUM swA hA/ oM badz+ra nai bi d+ya hUM swA hA/ oM badz+ra gan+d+he hUM/
336a3(1): swA hA/ rang byung bdud rtsi lnga dang sman sna tshogs// mnyam pa'i don gyis dbyer med rang bzhin gcig/ dam rdzas lnga po legs sbyar byin brlabs pas// gnyis med dgyes pa'i dam tshig bskang gyur cig/ ma hA
336a4(1): pany+tsa a mr-i ta kha kha khA hi khA hi/ oM hu lu hu lu raM dza la oM e A ra li/ dzaHhUM baM hoH// a la la ho// oM ma traM rU tra ha la ha la hUM phaT/ dug gsum dngos po'i tshogs rnams sbyang ba'i phyir// rngam pa'i khro tshogs sprul
336a5(1): pa phyogs bcur spros// khro 'dzum phyag rgya'i tshogs rnams bsten mdzad cing // ha he ru lu gsang sngags drag tu brjod// ha la'i rdo rje'i bshug pa'i gad rgyangs kyis// bdud dang srin po'i tshogs rnams brgya la
336a6(1): bar mdzad// oM sarba pA paM ka ra hi ta sa bi shra ma tang rA tra hUM phaT/ oM pA pa ka ra hi ta sa bi shra kha T+wAM ga rA tra hUM phaT/ oM sarba pA pa ka re hi ta sa bi shra a ka ra ya rA tra hUM phaT/ hUM dpal chen thugs kyi pho nya'i
336b1(1): tshogs// dpal chen rdo rje thog thog ser chen 'bebs// hUM dang phaT kyis srid gsum 'khor ba 'jigs// hUM chen hUM gi byin rlabs bsam mi khyab// rdo rje khrag 'thung khrag gi rgya mtsho skem// rdo rje mtshon cha gnam
336b2(1): lcags mthu 'dra bas// gsang sngags log par lta ba'i bdud rnams 'joms// rdo rje'i ser chen rang bzhin thog bcas 'khrugs// nyams pa'i snying srog khrag bcas thang la phyung // ye shes rngam pa'i thugs rje
336b3(1): a la la// oM pad+ma ma hA shrI he ru ka b+han+d+ha b+han+da gardza gardza ha la ha la hUM phaT/ hUM thugs rje rnam dag pad+ma'i rang bzhin las// thugs rje'i sprul pa thar lam byang chub sems// phyogs bzhi dbus lngar brjid pa'i dbu
336b4(1): mchog ni// grub pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen lnga ye shes lnga// dpa' lus khyad par 'phags pa zhal gyi dbyibs// dbang mchog lhun gyis grub pa'i rta skad can// thugs las thugs rje thabs mkhas sprul pa ni// ye
336b5(1): shes byin rlobs khro rgyal 'bum du ston// smin mdzad smon lam yun ring las grub pa'i// dmigs pa'i mtha' bral pad+ma yum gyi tshul// chos rnams ma lus gsal bar gzigs pa yi// chags med thugs rje
336b6(1): pad+ma spyan gyi tshul// sgra skad thams cad mtha' las grol ba yi// zab dang rgya che chos kyi mtshan nyid gsan// shangs kyi rlung sgrom dug gsum rtsad nas gcod// zhal gyi hom lnga gdangs las rgyud lnga sgrol// rno
337a1(1): dpal mche bas ske shi rtsad nas gcod// le brgan ljags kyis gsungs rab rgya mtsho 'chad// rol pa'i phyag gis 'gro ba 'dul la mkhas// gshog bzhi brkyangs pas phrin las rnam bzhi
337a2(1): mdzad// zhabs brgyad rol pas gzir gnon mdzad pa'i tshul// sku che yan lag rags to ri bo bzhin// thugs mchog ye shes stong gi nyi ma brdal// lha yi lha mchog byin brlabs 'byung ba'i gnas// ngo mtshar
337a3(1): rol pas khro bo kun gyi rje// dpa' bo thabs mchog mnga' la phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rjes 'khor la dam tshig sbyin mdzad cing // gtor ma rgya chen byin brlab sngags kyis dbul// oM AHhUM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta sa
337a4(1): ma yo ga sid+d+hi hUM/ sa ho ka ma la pu ra ta hUM/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya ma hA kro ta oM AHhUM/ ma hA yo ga tsit+ta ri/ ba me la rak+ta khA hi khA hi hUM/ oM kha kha le le ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ i dan sa ma ya a la la ho// thun skabs tha
337a5(1): ma'i gtor ma la// bsreg sbyang byin brlab 'dod lnga bdud rtsi'i tshogs// rang gi sngags kyis mgron tshogs kun bsdus te// de dag sbyang zhing byin brlabs phyag rgya'i rgyu// sku gsung thugs gsal rigs kyi cod

338a6(1): swA hA/ nub nor sbyin gyi sngags so// oM bai shrA ma NA ya swA hA/ byang nor sbyin chen po'i sngags so// oM ke li mA li ne swA ha/ shar lho rol pa'i phreng ba'i sngags so// oM mu khen dra ya swA hA/ lho nub sgo'i dbang po'i

338b2(1): nA yai swA ha/ shar du zla 'od ma'i sngags so// oM Ar+ya yai swA hA/ lhor 'phags ma'i sngags so// oM su da t+ta ye swA hA/ nub rab sbyin ma'i sngags so// oM dat+ta yai swA hA/ byang sbyin ma'i sngags so// oM sa ra swa t+yai swA hA/

338b5(1): dbus ma ser// g.yas pa'i phyag na a ru ra// g.yon pa ne'u le'i rgyal bu 'dzin// de yi chung ma dgra bo yang // dbus ma gser mdog phyogs mthun 'khor// g.yas pa mchog sbyin phyag rgya la// g.yon pa 'bras
338b6(1): kyi snye ma 'dzin// yang na zhal gsum phyag drug ste// sku mdog rigs mthun phyogs kyi mdog/ g.yas na lcags kyu zhags pa dang // ne'u le'i rkyal ba 'dzin pa'o// g.yon na bi dza pU ra dang // rdo rje lcags kyu

344a2(1): nor dang zas dang gos kyis mi phongs pa'i dngos grub dang / de nyid chos dang mthun pa'i grogs su mdzad du gsol// zhes brjod gtsang sar gtor ba yis// sems can rnams la ci 'dod pa// gtor ma de
344a3(1): las 'byung bar bsam// tAM las rin chen phung por bsam// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa dbang sdud kyi rgyud las/ mkha' 'gro ma rnam pa gsum gyi dbang du sdud pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas bcom
344a4(1): ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i sgrub pa 'di gsungs so// dang po sgrub par 'dod pa yis// byang phyogs gnas su dkyil 'khor ni// gru bzhi pa yi rnam lngas byug/ de dbus dmar la zlum pa
344a5(1): bshos bu dag la ri bong snying // le'u brgan dar yang gdags par bya// hrIHlas gri gug 'od zhu bas// gnod sprin gzhan gyis mi thub dmar// gri gug g.yas la thod pa g.yon// ne'u le'i rgyal pa mtshan
344a6(1): khung bkal// yab yum nor sbyin sku mdog ldang // rin chen g.yas la rkyal bu g.yon// spyan drang bzhugs mchod sngags 'di bzlas// IM hri a pa ra dzi ta yag sha hUM/ oM u ma ri hring hring dza dzaH'bum tsho gsum
344b1(1): du bzlas par bya'o// rdza yi ga'u la sbyor du// pho mo'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bri// gser dngul bye ru mu tig shel// dkar gsum mngar gsum blug la bzhag/ nya nas gzug la nya la gdon// grangs them
344b2(1): dkar gsum mngar gsum za// ga'u dben par sba bar bya// ma d+ha la tsan+da chu yis bsil// oM hrIHIM hUM/ a ba ra dzi ta hrIH/ hUM u ma ri hring hring / dzo ba ri dzo ba ri hring hring hUM hUM/ a ka sha ya dzaHdzaH/ shIn+tiM ku ru puSh+Ti
344b3(1): ku ru swA hA/ bud med 'du dang nor 'phel dang // dgra yi gnod pa mi 'byung dang // lha min rnams kyis gter char 'bebs// dkar gsum 'bras chan khu ba sha/ shing thog bzang drug gtor ma chang // 'bru
344b4(1): gsum sngags kyi byin brlabs nas// rdo rje gsum gyi phyag rgya byas// IM a pa ra dzi ta yag sha hr-i u ma ri hr-i hr-i hUM hUM/ ba liM ta a mr-i ta kha kha khA hi khA hi/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ha na ha na/ sha truM pa tsa ya/
344b5(1): shIn+taM priSh+Ti ku ru swA hA/ sngags bdun brjod la gtor ma dbul/ au 'dod pa lnga la longs spyod cing // khams gsum dbang du sdud byed pa'i// ci bsam lhun gyis 'grub pa yi// dngos grub chen po bdag la
344b6(1): stsol// tshig 'di zangs kyis bris nas ni// gung mo bar du bcug byas na// nya yi nub mo kho 'ong bas// rnal 'byor mi smra brtan par bya// smras na bar chad chen po 'byung // bla ma mched la gnod pa dang // sangs
345a1(1): rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba la// dkyil 'khor gru gsum nang du ni// ri bong thod pa bzhag byas la// lhag par pha dang mes po bri// rna ba g.yas pa pha spun la// g.yon pa la ni bu sring bri// kha ru ming
345a2(1): rus gang yin gzhug/ IM ya sha a pa ra dzi ta che ge mo A kaR+sha ya dza dzaH/ dgug pa'i sngags so// a pa ra dzi ta 'ub tre ya yA/ gzugs la dbab pa'o// rbad bu ni rbad bu ni tsit+ta la dza dzaH/ yag sha che ge mo thum
345a3(1): laM thus ril rbad dza dzaH/ yag sha tshal pa tshal ba yA yA/ che ge mo ma ra ya a ba ra dzi tas sod sod// nyung dkar nyung nag dug khrag dang // skye tshes brdeg cing zla gcig bsgrub// dmag dpon byed dang srog
345a4(1): chags bshas// a tsar bskor ba byed pa na// ling+ga me la bsreg par bya// thal ba chu la bskur bar bya// dgra bo myur du 'chi bar 'gyur// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa dbang sdud kyi rgyud las/ gnod sbyin chen po
345a5(1): a pa ra dzi ta sgrub pa'i thabs bstan pa ste le'u dgu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spre'u sgrub pa 'di gsungs so// thugs rje chen po'i sprul pa ni// byang chub sems
345a6(1): dpa' spre'u ru bstan// dang po byang chub sems bskyed nas// stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin las// A~M las byang chub sems spre'u// g.yas na ri bong 'dzin pa la// g.yon na shing lo 'dab mas 'dzin// sngags

345b2(1): srin lag g.yas pa yis// smin phrag dag tu thig le ni// lan grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig bya// gnod pa kun las bsrung bar 'gyur// gal te thig le 'chor ba na// lus kyi gzugs kyis bsrung ba la// shing la pho
345b3(1): mtshan gzugs bya la// sngags bris gur gum chus byugs la// rang gi sked par gdags par bya// khye'u bu mo gtsang ma ni// chags pa ma spyad gzhon pa yis// bkal ba'i skud pa gsum sgril la// mdud pa
345b4(1): bdun nam gsum byas nas// brgya'am stong btab ske la gdags// yang na khyi yi rnga ma dang // ra dag gi ni og zhol dang // ra pho'i rmang kha'i spu gsum la// skud pa byas nas sngags bzlas te// sked pa dag la
345b5(1): gdags par bya// nga yi sngags 'di bzlas pa bya// oM ha ra ha ra/ b+han+da ni/ shu kra d+ha ra ni/ si ra the swA hA/ yang ni sa bon 'dzag pa la// seng ge dkar mo'i zag pa gcad// rang gi bu sring 'doms kyi spu// khyi
345b6(1): mo'i mjug spu'i skud pa yis// gang 'dzag gsang ba'i rdo rje bcing // seng ge dkar mo'i lcags thag gcad// gsang ba rdo rje'i gzugs bris nas// sngags bris bu mo gtsang ma yis// skud pa bkal nas 'khor
346a1(1): lo de// brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas rang sked gdags// oM shukra d+ha ra d+ha ra swA hA/ g.yon du bris pa'o// oM shu kra d+ha ra d+ha ra hUM hUM swA hA/ g.yas su bri ba'o// 'chang ba po ka s+ya rak+Sha rak+Sha swA hA/ dbus su bri

346a4(1): bar bri ba'o// h+ya then then then/ 'bras bu'i dbus su bkod pa'o// mo ri/ pho phul/ 'bras bu g.yas pa'i rtsa bar bri ba'o// thas has khyi sing lang lang / 'bras bu gnyis kyi bar du bkod par bya'o// b+hi mo khyi
