346b2(1): dang sa bdag bsrung bar bya// de yi sngags ni 'di yin no// badz+ra hUM sang ha kha ma/ badz+ra kA ya/ badz+ra bA ka tsit+ta badz+ra ha ri sang sang / rdo rje'i rgyal po'i lus ngag yid gsum la ka s+ya ye rak+Sha rak+Sha/ A~M gyi khog par
346b3(1): bri ba'o// sang sang her he ra b+ha dzo/ ne lo khi khi/ ka la sad mo ni na ti/ dz+nya ba kyi/ gru bzhi'i lcags ri'i nang du bri ba'o// tsakra badz+ra he ru ka rak+Sha/ he badz+ra mu seng kha rak+Sha/ ta lo le sa ra rak+Sha rak+Sha/ ma sa dz+ha rak+Sha
346b4(1): rak+Sha/ zur bzhir shar du bri ba'o// lam lam bdud/ lim lim klu/ phem phem sa bdag sa ma ya sde brgyad/ zur bzhi bri ba'o// pa ra ya/ se ba ra ni/ kang kha mo ni/ ba ra ya/ 'og tu bri ba'o// 'khor lo nam
346b5(1): mkha' bskor byas na// lha srin gnod pa dbang du byed// sa la brdung na klu rnams brgyal// shog dril mgul du btags pa na// rdo rje'i phub khur lta bu ste// cis kyang tshugs par mi 'gyur ro// thams cad dbang
346b6(1): dusdud par byed// dregs pa dbang sdud chen po yin// spre'u thal sbyar byang chub sems// spyan ras gzigs sbrul chen po ste// g.yas na kham shing 'dzin pa la// g.yon na 'khor lo 'phyar bar
347a1(1): bsgom// pad+ma dbang chen dregs pa dbang sdud kyi rgyud las/ rdo rje gur phub kyi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad nyid kyi ngang du
347a2(1): rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ gsang ba'i man ngag 'di dag gsungs so// rnam par shes dang bem rig las// mgal ma ma thag bde ba spro// sgo nga dag la brten pa yi// dmigs pa de la gsal ba na// mi rta chu dang
347a3(1): 'o ma bzhin// yul la 'brel nas byung ba ste// snang dang mched grogs nyer thob pas// gsum gsum dag tu gsal ba stong // snang stong gnyis med phyogs dag pa// gser gyi ba thag 'dra bar bya// g.yas pa me
347a4(1): la g.yon rlung dang // gnyis pa brdal chu khams kun stong // gtso dang 'khor du gang byung ba// lo zla zhag dang nyi ma las// srog dang rtsol ba bsgom par bya// gsang stong rtogs par gyur pa na// spyi mgrin snying lte

347a6(1): shes chen po yin// pho mo ma ning zod rgal gzung // tsha grangs rus pa yon tan zin// du ba smig rgyu srin me dang // mar me nyi ma lus sems mthong // rdo rje'i bzlas pa de ltar bya// gru gsum las ni gzhan
347b1(1): bzlas pa// yid bzhin nor bu lta bu'i oM// lnga pa'i dang por bzhi gsum sbyar// lnga pa'i tha ma lnga dang po// steng du i zhes bya ba dang // bzhi yi dang po bdun pa'i gsum// de la i yis spras pa ni// bzhi pa'i

347b3(1): pa'i dang po ni// gnyis sbyar oM gnyis brgyan par bya// bdun pa'i bzhi pa lan gsum la// u gsum sbyar nas thig le gsum// lnga pa'i gnyis la bzhi'i dang po// de gnyis spras pas bcu bdun pa'o// bzlas
347b4(1): pa'i sngags rnams 'di las byung // ka kha ga g+ha nga/ tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ Ta Sha Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha k+Sha/ a A/ i I/ u U/ e ai/ o o/ aM aH/ zhes gsungs

347b6(1): ru ka don yod pas// g.yas dkar g.yon sngo dbus dmar zhal// rta mgo ljang gu hrIHbrjod pa// g.yas na rdo rje kha TaM ga dang cang te'u// g.yon na me dpung zhags pa thod khrag bsnams/ yum gzi
348a1(1): ldan ma dang 'khril bar gyur nas/ nyid kyi 'khor rnams la bka' stsal pa// rnam par rtog bral gdod nas skye med dbyings// ma bcos mtha' yas chen por gsal// mnyam nyid bde chen byang

348a3(1): mdzad cing // de lta'i longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur bzhengs nas// dri med thugs rje'i 'od mdangs gsal ba yis// thugs kyi rtags ston 'od zer rgyal ba'i sku// rnam gsum sems dpa' gsang sngags 'od

348b1(1): // rgya gar skad du/ ma he sha sa mU dA ya ma hA tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ dbang chen 'dus pa'i rgyu chen po zhes bya ba dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/
348b2(1): rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po ji ltar dngos grub dam pa thob par 'dod na/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i stong pa nyid las langs te/ yi ge hUM du bsgom la/ yid kyis bar snang gi
348b3(1): khams thams cad gser gyi seng ge spyan gsum pa la 'od zer 'bar ba 'khrigs pa drug gi steng du rin po che'i khri phyogs bcur 'od 'bar ba'i steng du pad+ma le brgan 'od phyogs bcur 'bar ba/ de bas zhabs
348b4(1): gang tsam gyis mtho ba'i steng du/ ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gcig tu gyur pa dmigs la/ de'i steng du sbyor ba'i dbang phyug chen po/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya badz+ra hUM zhes pa
348b5(1): 'dis bcings nas/ mngon sum du bsgrub pa'o// hUM zhes bzlas pa tsam gyis phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhir rin po che'i ka ba 'phang du dpags tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong pas kyang dpags pa/ ka ba gcig la yang
348b6(1): sprin med pa'i nyi ma bdun bdun gyis brgyan pa/ 'od zer stong gsum gyi stong chen po bas kyang dpag par dmigs pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na/ skye gnas bzhi las skyes
349a1(1): pa'i sems can thams cad dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / rigs ngan thams cad dang rigs med pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags hUM zhes zer ba las/ bskal pa'i me 'bar ba mang
349a2(1): pos brgyan pa'o// g.yas kyi gshog pa gnyis ni/ steng ma rin po che'i rgyu las byung bar nga rgyal bskyed do// 'og ma sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i thabs la mkhas pa yin pas/ rgyun mi chad par rdo rje 'bar
349a3(1): bas 'joms pa'o// the'u gshog rnams ni gang gi snying la 'dren pa yin pas rdo rje lcags kyu rnon po'i mchog kyang yin la/ sgrol ba'i thabs ma brtson pa yin pas grol ba dam pa'o// phyag g.yon gyi dang po ni

349a5(1): bopo chen po brgyad kyi snying dang rgyu ma kun lhan cig du tshang bar bcug nas za'o// gcig gis ni rdo rje kha TaM ga dang / rje'u chung dang / lcags kyu lhan cig tu bzung ste gang gi snying nas 'dren pa'o// phyag g.yas dang
349a6(1): g.yon pa brgyad char yang sbrul nag po dang sngo bkra dag gis brgyan pa'o// kha nas byang hUM gis sgra grags par sha stag go/ de dag gis snying po 'di brjod par bya'o// oM ha ha ru lu ru lu phaT dzaHzhes brjod pas//
349b1(1): snga phyi'i brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / phra men ma'i 'khor mang po dbang du bsdus nas/ gzhan yang tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mang po sprin phung bzhin du dbang du 'dus nas/ de'i steng du bdag nyid chen pos
349b2(1): hUM thang gcig bzlas pas zhabs dmar po brgyad dus gcig la byung bar bsam mo// de nas shar phyogs kyi khams 'dul ba'i zhabs ni/ drag shul dpal 'bar ldan pas stag gi gdong gis dkris te/ shar
349b3(1): phyogs kyi hUM ka ra'i snying gar rdog pas brdzis te nyam thag pa'i 'bod sgrog chen po 'don pa'o// shar lho mtshams su Ar+ya a tsa le mdog sngo skya gan rkyal du mnan pa'i snying gar zhabs kyi bol man chod nub par
349b4(1): dmigs te/ zhabs bai DUr+ya sngon po zhu bas g.yogs pa'o// zhabs gcig ni lho phyogs gyi khams 'dul ba yin pas rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i na bzas bklubs te ya mAn+ta ka'i snying gar rdog pas mnan pas zhabs kyi bol
349b5(1): man chad nub pa'o// zhabs gcig gis lho nub kyi nI la daN+Da'i snying gar rdog pas mnan te 'bod sgrog gi sgrar 'byin par dmigs la zhabs pas khrab smug pos sgrib pa'o// zhabs gcig ni rdo rje phur par
349b6(1): dmigs pas sbrul nag pos dkris pas pad+ma kuN+Da li mdog nag po'i snying gar btsugs nas 'khor mang po dbang du 'dus pa'o// nub byang mtshams kyi 'dod pa'i khams dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir zhabs dmar
350a1(1): po'i mthil gnyis khro bo chen po'i khar dmigs la/ rkang pa'i nang gzhal yas khang du dmigs la/ zhabs kyi mthil nas kha dog dmar po las 'od 'phro bas 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i mgo rkang gi nang
350a2(1): du song ba dmigs la/ rdo rje mche bas bcom par bltas nas 'khor mang po 'phrog par byed do// zhabs gcig ni chu srin gyi smad g.yogs can byang phyogs su brkyangs pas a mr-i ta kuN+Da li kha bub tu mnan nas/
350a3(1): rdog pas 'gel ba thams cad bcom nas/ bol man chad rlon pa'i nang du nub par dmigs la/ sdug bsngal thams cad myong bar byas te/ phyi ma'i dus na rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po thob par gyur cig par
350a4(1): smon lam 'debs so// zhabs gcig ni 'dod pa'i lha mos phyag byas la gzig gi mgo yis dkris te/ byang shar mtshams su ma hA ba la'i ldan par mnan pas dung chen po bcom ste/ 'khor gyi lha mo'i tshogs
350a5(1): dang / ma sring mo dang chung ma dang bu mo dang tsha bo tsha mo rnams 'phrog go/ gshog pa g.yas dang g.yon pa'i steng ma ni/ rin po che'i rgyu las byung ba 'dod chags chen po yin no// gshog pa 'og ma khro bo'i rgyu las
350a6(1): byung bas rdo rje drag po'i tshogs yin no// the'u gshog rnams ni 'dod pa'i gtso bo yin pas shes rab kyi mchog dang sbyor ba'o// spyi'i gshog pa bzhi char gyi bar bar ni sbrul nag po'i rgyu las byung ba'o// bar bar
350b1(1): ni rdo rje rtse lnga pa las byas pa'o// bar bar ni rin po che'i rgyu las byas pa'i nyi ma stong gis bklubs pa'o// 'di dag thams cad kyi bzlas pa ni/ oM dza la dza la badz+ra hUM/ oM badz+ra a mo g+ha hUM/ zhes brjod cing
350b2(1): las thams cad bcol lo// gong ma'i rdo rje'i gra la 'og min lha mo glog 'gyu ma/ de la he ru ka khro bo thams cad kyi bzlas pa ni 'di yin no// oM ru lu ru lu hUM phaT/ e ma ra li hrI hUM dza/ nye ba'i snying po bzhi
350b3(1): 'bum byas na las nus so// de lta bas na dpal chen he ru ka khro bo mtha' dag gi mchog/ chos kyi dbyings yin pas/ 'dod chags chen po sbyor ba/ zhe sdang mchog la brtson pa/ nga rgyal gyi dbang du 'dus pa/
350b4(1): phrag dog gi 'dod pa'i dbang po tshur bcas nas/ dpal dbang chen pad+ma he ru ka nyid sgrub par dam bcas te/ dpal chen po'i sgrub pa la brtson pa la sdang ba dang gnod pa'i bgegs rnams tshar gcod pa ni//
350b5(1): dpal chen po nyid byung bas drag po'i bgegs rnams kyi dbang du 'dus par mi 'gyur ro// des na dpal pad+ma he ru ka la brtson zhing sgrub par byed pa'i rgyal sras kyi mthu bo che zhig byung nas/ des dngos grub kyi
350b6(1): khyad par gcig sbyin par gyis/ ma 'jigs shig dang 'dod pa'i dbang po thob par bya'o// zhes gsungs pa ni/ sngon mkhan po mkhas pa zhig gis sngon pad+ma he ru ka bsgrubs te he ru ka'i dngos grub kyi
351a1(1): mchog thob po// man ngag gi gzhung ni 'di yin no// de la 'di lta bu dag 'byung ste/ bud med kyi tshogs mang po dag rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan te/ rab tu mdzes pa mang po dag rgyan mdzes
351a2(1): par brgyan nas/ 'ong srid kyis des chags pa'i sems bskyed cing / bar bar du phra men ma'i tshogs mang po dag mi'i thod pa mang pos brgyan te/ lag na thod khrag dang mi'i thod pa mang po thogs/ mig gdugs
351a3(1): pa'i 'bru tshugs su blta zhing / mi snyan pa'i tshul gyis bdag la gsad do// bza'o brdeg go/ tshig chad dam/ thams cad 'od zer des bcom btags nas bla na med pa'i byang chub las bkod pa'i thabs 'dis
351a4(1): bya'o// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin yang dag yin la khams gsum gyi bdag po chen po yang dag kyang yin zhing / khro bo chen po yang dag yin no zhes dmigs la/ nyi
351a5(1): ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du snga ma'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin las/ sku mdog dmar po dbu lnga phyag bcu drug tu dmigs la rin po che dang / rdo rje'i rgyu las byung ba'i gshog
351a6(1): pa bzhi yang bskyed par bya ste/ dbu lnga po'i bzhi ni phyogs bzhir 'bar ba'i gzugs kyis blta'o// dbus ma'i klad par/ rin po che'i gzhal yas khang du byin gyis brlabs nas/ dpal rnam par snang mdzad
351b1(1): bzhugs par dmigs la/ thod pa'i ngos bzhi rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i/ rdo rje sems dpa' sku mdog dmar po phyag rgya tshul bzhin du bcas nas bsgom mo// g.yas g.yon gyi dbu ni sku mdog dmar
351b2(1): po/ spyan gsum du dmigs la/ ral pa dmar po'i dbus nas/ rta mgo ljang gu re re byung bar bsam mo// lhag par rta mgrin dngos su byung bar bsams te/ hUM rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra grags pa tsam gyis/ nub
351b3(1): phyogs kyi phra men ma rnams kyis/ 'khor mang po'i klu thams cad drag po'i brtul zhugs kyis dbang du 'du bar bya'o// lho dang byang du blta ba'i mgo yang hUM hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin pas/ gnod sbyin gyi
351b4(1): 'khor thams cad dang grul bum gyi 'khor thams cad dang / phra men gyi 'khor thams cad kyis/ hUM hUM zhes bsgrags pa tsam gyis zhabs 'og tu song bar dmigs la gnas la bstab par bya'o// shar phyogs su
351b5(1): blta ba'i mchog dmar po spyan gsum pa'i zhal nas kyang / hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra drag po bsgrag cing ljags 'dril ba tsam gyis kyang / spyi gtsug tu rdo rje kha T+wAM ga 'bar ba gsum gnas par bsam mo// yang shar
351b6(1): phyogs su 'bar ba'i gzugs kyis blta bar bya'o// smin ma glog bzhin 'bar ba/ smin mtshams kyi bar khro gnyer gyi rlabs bskyod par bya ste/ rdo rje 'bar ba'i tshig gi hUM zhes brjod pa tsam gyis brgya byin dang /
352a1(1): tshangs pa dang / de'i gnas thams cad/ phra men ma'i 'khor dang bcas pa zhabs 'og tu song bar dmigs la/ gnas la bstab par bya'o// hA ka ra rgud dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir/ phyag rgyas
352a2(1): bcings la dbang po cher nga rgyal bskyed do// phyag bcu drug la g.yas g.yon gnyis na rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas 'gugs pa'o// phyag g.yas gcig na sbrul nag gi zhags pa bsnams pa'o// phyag g.yas pa
352a3(1): gcig na rnge'u chung dang kha T+wAM gcig tu 'dzin pa'o// phyag g.yas pa gcig na thod rlon khrag gis bskang ba nas dung nang bsres pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab 'byams mtha' klas pa'i 'od zer
352a4(1): bdud rtsir byin gyis brlabs te za ba'o// phyag g.yas pa bzhi ni/ rgyun mi chad par zlos shing rdo rje 'bar bas brdeg go/ phyag g.yas pa'i dpung rgyan dang / gdu gu sbrul nag po mi sdug pa kha nas zer ba mang po
352a5(1): srid kyis/ de la ma 'jigs par khro bo chen po'i sku sgoms shig dang / bdag nyid ting nge 'dzin las ma g.yos pa dang / 'khor thams cad kyis rang dbang med par phyag byed kyis dngos grub dang po gcig dang
352a6(1): sbyor ro// de'i 'og tu gnod sbyin gyi tshul ston cing ral pa 'bar ba la/ mi mgo mang pos lus brgyan cing / lag na rdo rje dang ral gri thogs pa dag mi'i rgyu ma ske nas 'dogs shing / sbrul nag po dag lus la za
352b1(1): ba'i rnam par snang ba dag 'byung bas dkris te/ rtsib ma skra tshom dam du bsdam pa dag 'ong gis/ de la ma 'jigs shig dang / dngos grub dam pa gnyis pa thob pa yin no// de nas gnod sbyin dang grul bum gyi
352b2(1): dbang por 'gyur ba yin no// bar snang la gnas pa'i lha khro bo rnams kyis sdigs pa dang / gnod pa sna tshogs 'dra ba byed do// lha gshegs pa dag gis sgra drag po dag 'brug gi sgra sgrogs pa dang / sbrul nag po
352b3(1): dag me dang dug kha nas skyugs pa dang / a la la zer zhing sgra 'byin pa dang / mig g.yas g.yon nyi mar gyur te 'bar ba'i gzugs kyi blta ba dang / lto ba phyes nas mi ro gsar rnying dag ston pa dang / pho mo'i
352b4(1): mtshan ma thams cad za ba'i khar sgyur nas/ 'jigs tshogs kyi mche ba 'dar ba/ rkang pa phur par gyur te/ bdag la 'debs shing gnod par byed par de ltas mgo mi lpags rlon pas g.yogs shing / lag
352b5(1): pas rdo rje brdegs pa dag 'ong gis ma 'jigs shig dang / dngos grub gsum pa thob pa yin no// de ni lha thams cad kyi dbang por gyur to// dbang chen 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ de man chad kyis dpal dbang
352b6(1): chen pad+ma he ru ka'i gal po las/ sgrub pa don gyi le'u ste dang po'o// // sku gsung thugs kyi cho 'phrul cir yang bsgyur zhing cir yang ston pa thams cad du gnas te/ gcig tu ma nges pa'i phyir
353a1(1): na/ thugs kyi che ba nyid dang / sku'i che ba nyid la sogs te/ sku gsung thugs gang yang ma 'gags pa'i sgo nas/ byin rlabs so sor 'byung ste/ khams gsum rnam par gnon rab tu gnon
353a2(1): to// dper na nyan thos kyi dge 'dun rnams kyis/ blta ba theg pa chen po ma mthong ste/ 'dul ba nyi chol gnas pa'i sgo nas sbyangs pa'i bar snang la gnas pa gnod sbyin mthu bo che shin tu nye'o zhes dran pa nye
353a3(1): bar gzhag pa/ dge ba chung ba la gsal bar 'byung ngo // de bzhin du sbyar te/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun rnams las/ de bzhin gshegs pa dam tshig la gnas pa'i khro bo rnams shin tu rlabs che'o// de yang ci'i
353a4(1): phyir zhe na/ nyan thos skyes bu chen po rnams kyis zhi ba phyogs gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni/ dmangs rigs rnams 'dul ba dang / nyan thos kyi sa la bzhag pa rnams/ gdon nus par zad kyi/ bla na med
353a5(1): pa'i theg pa chen po'i don mi skyod pas/ khro bo chen po rnams kyis rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rnams spyod pa'i ye shes bla na med pa ston pa'i yon tan thogs pa med par spyod pas/ nyan thos pa'i mi
353a6(1): nye'o// rgyu'i dus na yang mi nye'o// de bzhin rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po ni/ snying ga'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du gyur pa las/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sa ler snang bzhin
353b1(1): du me long lta bu'i ye shes dang sbyor/ sems can gyi gnas dang / lha klu gnod sbyin la sogs pa/ sems can gyi rgyu la snang ba thams cad kyang bdag gi ye shes la snang bar zad kyi/ gzhan sus kyang snang bar mi
353b2(1): nus so// shAkya thub pa'i ye shes kyi dus yin no// dper na ri rab lhun po'i rtser/ dpal snang mdzad kyi skur brlabs nas/ lha'i rigs 'dzin gnas pa'i dus ni/ nga'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po yin
353b3(1): no// zhes sems bskyed do// bdag dang 'khor thams cad dbu mthon mthing lta bur gyur te/ bar snang gi khams bkang ste/ phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhi khro bo dang / khro mos bkang ste/ gser gyi seng ge spyan
353b4(1): gsum pa dang / glang po che dang / rta dang / rma bya dang / nam mkha'am lding la sogs pa'i khri steng / grangs med pa la gnas pa'i dus na/ 'og min gyi gnas na khro bo rnam par rgyal ba/ rdo rje rab tu 'bar ba zhes
353b5(1): bya ba/ sku mdog dud kar sbyor ba dbu gsum la tshar gsum pa/ tshar gsum nyid kyang bras pa'i mgo rlon pa btags pa zhig las tshar gsum du gyur pa'o// lag pa bar bar ni bcu drug pa/ bar bar ni zhi ba'i
353b6(1): ting nge 'dzin/ bar bar me long lta bu'i ye shes/ bar bar ni klong chen po/ bar bar ni bar snang gi khams lta bu/ ye shes hUM gi tshogs kyis khengs par byed pa dang / bar bar ni thibs pos stong gsum gyi stong
354a1(1): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad bdag gis lto bo che'i gzhal med khang du chud pa/ mche ba dkar po srid pa ma lus pa'i yar thal sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi steng du gtsigs pa/ ral pa dmar
354a2(1): po dpag gis mi lang bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad zil gyis gnon pa bar bar du rdo rje'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rnam par snang mdzad chen po nges par bsgying pas rdo rje'i gnas thams cad rab
354a3(1): tu sra bar gyur pas nam mkha' khengs pa rab tu 'khrugs par byed pa/ chos kyi dbyings dur khrod chen po zil gyis gnon par byed pa/ zhab bsring rdo rje'i rol mo byed pa khrag khrig/ rjes su 'breng ba/ rigs
354a4(1): sngags kyi rgyal po rta mgrin dang rdo rje khro bo thams cad thabs gcig tu gshegs pa'i dus na/ mda' shur du 'phangs na/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha thams cad/ mkha' dag pa byed pa'i gnas la bzhugs pa'i tshe na/
354a5(1): ye shes kyi lha la bltas nas/ bar snang gi khams bdag gi lha'i gzhal yas khang / nyi ma'i 'od zer mtshams kyi bar tshigs na dpal rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba/ seng ge'i gdan dang rin po che'i gzhal
354a6(1): med khang na/ 'khor dang ldan te bzhugs pa/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku bstan to// dpal rnam par snang mdzad lcang lo can gyi pho brang na lha'i 'khor mang po dang ldan te/ nga ni byang chub mchog dang ldan pas/
354b1(1): 'di las gong na med do// zhes nga rgyal skyes pa'i tshe na/ khro bo'i 'khor rnams kyi ye shes la snang bar gyur te/ de dag kyang nga rgyal gzhom zhing / rigs gcig pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes don rtog par bya ba'i
354b2(1): phyir/ thabs 'di lta bus 'dul lo// rdo rje khro bo he ru ka khams gsum rnam par rgyal bas/ bar snang gi khams thams cad yi ge hUM gis bkang ste/ bdag nyid chen po bus pa'i tshul du cha byad du bzhugs nas
354b3(1): sems kyi ye shes la snang ba'i tshad ni nyi ma 'bum 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor bas kyang gsal bar byas la bdag gi 'khor gyi lha mo grangs med pa rnams kyang bdag gi lus la 'dus nas phyag bzhi pa sku
354b4(1): lus thams cad kyang sbrul nag po khros pas sbyangs pa lus kyi yan lag thams cad kyang thod rlon gyi phreng bas brgyan pa dbu gsum pa ste/ g.yas dmar g.yon nag po dbus mthing ga spyan gsum gsum thad
354b5(1): gar drang por gnas pa/ dbu'i ral pa las me stag phyogs bcur 'phro ba/ phyag bzhis g.yas pa dang po rde'u chung / 'og ma na mdung rtse gsum pa/ g.yon gyi dang po rdo rje rtse dgu pa/ tha ma na rgyu ma'i zhags
354b6(1): pa thogs pas/ 'di skad ces smras so// tshar gsum can gyi rde'u chung gis// lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'joms// snang mdzad chen po a la la// gnod sprin chen po a la la// chos kyi dbyings nyid a la la//
355a1(1): sangs rgyas bden tshig a la la// sems dpa' chen po a la la// zhes smras nas/ rde'u chung lan gsum brdungs pas/ snga mas lcang lo can gyi 'khor thams cad kyang / rdul phra mo cha shas tsam du
355a2(1): gyis te/ stong pa bdag med par gyur pa dang / bar snang gi khams yi ge hUM gis bkang ba rnams de las/ hUM hUM zhes bya ba'i sgrar gyur pa las/ sngar rdul phra mo cha shas su gyur pa de dag thams cad dbang du 'dus
355a3(1): nas/ de dag thams cad tri shUl dang zhags pa thogs pa sha stag tu gyur pa ste/ stong pa bdag med par gyur pa dang / de dag thams cad kyang he ru ka'i 'khor du 'dus te/ rigs gcig tu nges par byas so// rdo
355a4(1): rje rnam par rgyal ba khro bo chen po bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad la snyoms par zhugs te/ khro bo'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ dbu mthon mthing lcang lo rin po che'i kha la reg pa dang / in+d+ra ni
355a5(1): la'i rgyu las byung ba dang / rin po che thams cad kyi lcang los brgyan pa rin po che 'bar ba lngas gtsug phud byas pa/ se mo do dang do shal dang / mgur chu la sogs pa thams cad kyi 'od gcig gis kyang phyogs
355a6(1): bcur 'khrigs pa/ smad g.yogs me tog ut+pal dang / pad+ma dang / dpung rgyan dang / pad+ma stong du spel bas smad g.yogs byas pa/ zhabs kyi mthil nas 'od gcig gis kyang / phyogs bcur 'khrigs pa 'od zer
355b1(1): bye ba phrag drug cu dus gcig tu 'gyed pa/ 'od zer rnams kyis kyang lha klu bye ba khrag khrig zil gyis gnon par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ nyi ma'i tshogs sprin phung bzhin du 'dus pa'i
355b2(1): steng du/ bdag nyid byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya bcings nas/ oM AHhUM/ zhes brjod pas tshul bzhin du gnas par bya'o// de nas bdag gi zhabs kyi sprul pas/ khro bo chen pos brgyad mnan pa de dag kyang /
355b3(1): lus kyi gzugs dgu ma lags/ rmi lam bzhin du bor te/ yang dag pa'i dbang gis/ gzhan thams cad zil gyis gnon par byed pa'i/ ji las kyang mi shigs pa'i hUM ka ra brgyad du dbang bskur te/ phyogs
355b4(1): bzhi gling brgyad bla 'og tu dbang thob par bya'o// de ltar rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos thabs phra ba ni mtshan nyid med par dbyings gcig ste/ ming dang mtshan mas mi thogs par tshul bzhin shes par
355b5(1): bya'o// chos kyi dbyings mnyam par nyid yin pa las/ dkon mchog dpal dang gtsug tor dang / lang kar shes pa bsam gtan dgra bcom pa rnams kyis so sor phye ba las/ rnal 'byor mkhas pa'i dbang phyug
355b6(1): ni// bdud rnams thams cad rab tu 'joms// bde gshegs mya ngan 'das rnams dang // bdud rnams thams cad 'joms pa'i lha// dper na rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po rnams thabs rnam pa sna tshogs pa
356a1(1): la tshangs pa brgya byin la sogs pas yang dang yang du mchod pa dang / des ci bya ba yod pa'i bsgo ba thams cad dag byed/ bran gyi tshogs ni de yin no// dper na dam tshig mchog rab ni// smad
356a2(1): par bya ba ma yin te// khams gsum kun gyi dbang phyug ma// btsun mo rab tu sdud pa las// drag tu smra ba gang byed pa// sgeg pa'i tshogs kyis brgyan nas su// sri zhu sems kyi gdung ba la// ye shes tshogs kyis
356a3(1): rab 'byor ba// mnyam pa'i dbyings nyid ye shes te// gnyis ka nges par mnyam na ni// stong gsum dbang bsgyur gdon mi za// 'jig rten khams na rgya mtsho bzhin// gzugs med kun la nam mkha'i
356a4(1): sgra// dper na rang gi gnas khang du// rang gi gur gum chag chag gdab// rang gi dri rnams maN+Dal bya// me tog phreng bas kun tu brgyan// spos dang du ru a ga ru// li shi dang ni ga bur dang // dza ti pha la mchog
356a5(1): tu bsngags// lag pa phur pa mchog yin te// zhi ba sor drug zlum po bya// rgyas pa sor brgyad zur yang brgyad// dbang la zla gam nges par bzang // drag po la ni sor drug pa'o// kun kyang rtse mor hUM bzhag
356a6(1): ste// ngos su ha ha ru lu ru lu bsgom// rgya mdud thogs tu oM bsam ste// pho nya'i 'od zer dud kha spro// hUM dang phaT kyi sgra sgrogs shing // bskal pa'i brag cha chen po bzhin// kun kyang rtse mor hUM bzhag ste// mig
356b1(1): gsum po la lcag sder can// mgo gsum po la rkang gsum po// mi sha za zhing bdud khyim 'joms// bltas pas bdud rnams tshig par byed// klu yi gnas rnams rab tu 'joms// mgo brgya po la lag brgya
356b2(1): ba// rkang brgya po la mig kyang brgya// lag pa rdo rje phur pa 'dzin// rta mgrin gnas ni nges par 'joms/ rkang drug po la mgo drug po// lag pa drug la mig kyang drug/ lag pa drug gis rgyud drug
356b3(1): 'joms// g.yon pa gsum ni gtor ma 'thor// g.yas pa gsum ni phur pa 'dzin// mgyogs pa'i rlung gi shugs dang 'dra// 'di rnams khro bo'i pho nya yin// ha ha ru lu'i sgra sgrogs shing // rang gi phyogs la
356b4(1): song ba'i tshe// khro bo kun kyang nges par 'chi// gang nas gang du 'gro ba'i tshe// rang gi rkang pa phur pa yin// lcags kyi phur par rab tu grags// 'od zer dud kha reg na ni// tshangs pa'i gnas kyang rab tu
356b5(1): 'joms// lag pa g.yon pa brkyang nas ni// phra men rnams kyang 'khor dang bcas// kun kyang ral pa 'bar ba la// lcags kyi dgra sta rab thogs te// zhing chen rab tu 'dzin pa'o// byang gi phyogs su rgyug pa
356b6(1): ni// lcags kyi khyi ste rkang gsum pa'o// lcags kyi lus la nyi ma'i gzugs// phub kyi lcags kyu 'dril ba bzhin// bang ni glog gis bskyod du med// skad ni nam mkha'i 'brug pas che// rab tu mi srun 'di dag
357a1(1): gis// phyag na rdo rje'i mthu yang 'phrog/ rkang gcig gyen du bsgreng ba ni// ya bdud chen po'i snying nas 'dren// dmyal tshogs me dpung rtsad nas gcod// rkang gcig mthur du brkyang ba yi// ma
357a2(1): bdud chen po'i snying nas 'dren// dmyal tshogs me dpung rtsad nas gcod// rkang gcig zad kar byung ba yi// dgra bo rnams kyi snying nas 'dren// 'byung po dag kyang dmyal zag chod// sku ni lcags zag 'khril
357a3(1): pa 'dra// tshems ni spu gri bshibs pa 'dra// mdangs la za zhing rengs par rgyug/ gnod sbyin mang po bsgral ba'i mchog/ de ni dpal gyi pho na ste// 'jig rten khams su za ba yi// gnod sbyin kun gyi rting na
357a4(1): rgyug/ glo snying nang khrol 'byin cing za// bar snang dkyil du khros pa'i tshe// nyi zla kun kyang thang la bzlog/ gza' skar kun kyang dum bur gcod// shin tu 'khrugs shing rbad pa'i tshe// bdud kyi snying khrag dron mo
357a5(1): 'thung // bar snang khams na gnod sbyin kun// rdul phran phra mo bzhin du brlag/ dza la dza la yak+Sha khA hi/ de bas 'di rnams bstan pa'i phyir// dbang chen nyid kyis bka' stsal pa// glu bro dam tshig mchog yin/
357a6(1): te// sgrub pa'i cho ga rdzogs pa'i tshe// sa yi 'og tu 'dom gsum bya// bru yin nam// bar bar rdo rje sems dpa' che// cha lugs ci 'dra 'khor dang bcas// sems kyis mnyam par dgod par bya// phra men 'khor
357b1(1): tshogs mang po kun// gnod sbyin mang po dang rol bar mdzad nas/ mang po bdag nyid rnam par rgyal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs/ sku mdog dkar por bsgyur byas te// glu dang bro ni bstan par bya'i// 'khor
357b2(1): mang po dang mnyam par 'dug pa'i dus na/ bdag gi sku mdog dmar por bsgyur ro// lam du zhugs te 'gro ba'i dus na/ sku mdog ljang gur bsgyur te/ he he zhes bya ste dgod cing 'gro'o// gang du phyin pa'i
357b3(1): dbus su hUM zhes bya ste 'dug par bya'o// 'on tang ma mo thams cad dbang du bsgyur bas nyal ba'i dus na a zhes bya ste tsog tsog por yud tsam zhig gnas par bya'o// bdag nyid gser btso ma'i kha dog bzhin
357b4(1): du 'tsher bar 'gyur te/ kun tu bzang mo nam mkha' la langs nas/ mngon sum du 'dzum par mdzad nas snyan par smra ba dang / 'dod sbyor gyi longs spyod rtse mo yang byas par bsam mo// sa'i 'og tu mda'
357b5(1): 'phangs pas// gnam gyi steng gi lha bran 'chi// spyod lam sgrub pa 'di ltar ro// mtshon thogs kun gyi rgyal po ste// ral gri 'dzin pa'i rgyal por gyur// 'jam dpal 'khor gyis phyag byas pa'o// gzhan zhig
357b6(1): nges par sgrol ba ni// rdo rje srin po'i ting 'dzin bsgom// rak+Sha mig gis blta bar bya// kha nas sngags kyi tshig zlos shing // pha rol rnam shes hUM gis drang // snying gar thim pa dmigs byas na// pha rol mngon
358a1(1): sum 'chi bar 'gyur// mgo dang mig dang rkang lag dag/ ya man+ta ka'i 'khor la dbul// gzhan rnams lhag par gang yod pa// he ru ka dpal dbul bar bya// mgo dgu po la rkang gcig
358a2(1): po// lus nag po la 'od phung nag/ ral pa nag cing mche ba nag/ mig kyang nag cing lus nag po// mgyogs ni rlung gis bskyed du med// 'di dag pho nya'i mchog yin te// zhum pa med pa'i stobs chen
358a3(1): 'joms// 'di dag dpal gyi pho nya ste// g.yon pa gsum ni lcags sgra 'dzin// g.yas pa gsum ni sta gri phyar// yan lag sbrul nag mchog gis brgyan// lcags kyu rnams kyis snying nas 'dren// g.yas kyi sta
358a4(1): gris nges par 'joms// 'di ni sgo srung mchog yin te// pho nya kun tu mngag par bya// bgegs rnams nges par phung bar byed// gnod sbyin phra men 'khor bcas kyis// bdag la rab tu gtses gyur na// phag
358a5(1): brtul zhugs chen po ni// sa yi 'og tu mngon sum bya// las kyi hUM zhes brjod par bya// mAM sa dag kyang mang du bza'// nam mkha' la ni sems dpa' bsam// bgrang phreng glad la bskor bar bya// de ltar
358a6(1): byas na bdag rgyal zhing // nad gtong rnams ni 'chi bar 'gyur// rkang gcig dag gi pho nya ni// kha dog zla ba ci 'dra ste// gcig la gcig ni rab tu 'khril// yang na lag pa sbrel te 'gro// mig kyang med de cang
358b1(1): mi smra// long ba kun gyi mchog yin te// stangs stabs dag gi pho nya ni// lan 'ga' drag tu mngags pa'i tshe// gnyis ka bsdongs te der phyin nas// gang la dmigs pa len par bya// sus kyang bzlog par mi
358b2(1): 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin rnams ni 'khol 'dod na// gnod sbyin gzugs ni khrag gis bri// dur khrod chen po mngon sum du// de yi snying gar phur mnan nas// 'gugs pa'i brtul zhugs hUM zhes bzlas// ma
358b3(1): 'ongs bar du bzlas na ni// zhag bdun dag gis khug par 'gyur// gnod sbyin kun la ci dgar spyad// bdag gi bran dang 'dra bar 'gyur// phra men rnams ni 'khol 'dod na// phra men gzugs ni khrag gis
358b4(1): bris// yan lag phur pas btab nas ni// snying gar rdog pas rab mnan te// dgugs pa'i brtul zhugs hUM zhes bzlas// zhag bdun gyis ni nges par 'ong // phra men rnams ni dga' bar 'khol// khong gis
358b5(1): 'gal na khong rnams 'chi// bdag gis 'gal na bdag nyid nyams// 'gro nyal 'dug sdod ci byed kyang // 'khor dang bcas pa'i bsnyen pa bzlas// nangs par mal nas langs nas kyang // yi dam mnos pa'i
358b6(1): sa phyogs su// gom gsum 'phags na dran par bya// bshang gci byed pa'i sa rnams su// dri chen lag tu blangs nas kyang // phyogs bcu kun tu kha bltas te// sus ma mthong bar khams gsum bza'// dri chu
359a1(1): khyor ba gang dag ni// sum ma mthong bar zengs gsum btung // shin tu dben pa'i sa phyogs su// yan lag bzhi ni sa la gzugs// phag skad zengs gsum ngur bar bya// ru lu ru lu tshal pa tshal
359a2(1): pa/ kha ya kha ya/ rak+ta rak+ta/ b+han+na b+han+na/ ma tang kha ru shag/ kha kha khA hi zhes byang gi phyogs su kha bltas te/ gnod sbyin dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir// dri chen mdun du bzhag nas ni// mi skad zengs gsum bos nas
359a3(1): na// ru lu ru lu kha long kha kha long kha/ ku ku rak+Sha 'grin/ ha la ha la khA hi/ nyin dang mtshan du zug phrad du// rigs ma 'chol bar sbyor bar bya// skye bos mthong na dam tshig nyams// sus ma mthong na dngos grub
359a4(1): yin// byang chub sems ni lce la bzhag/ dus dang rnam pa med par ni// sbyor ba kho nas las su bya// skabs la bab pa'i dus dus su// dur khrod gnas su byug par bya// zhing dang b+han+na mang po bsogs// rang gi
359a5(1): sman sangs gang yin pa// skye bo rnams la thag bsrings nas// srod dang tho rangs nam gyi gung // ro dang nyin phyed dgong ka'i dus// dbyangs kyi skad du shes par bya// dus drug kun tu rnge'u chung brdung // srod la
359a6(1): 'khor gsum bro brdung ste// nub kyi phyogs su kha bltas la// rta skad 'tsher ba'i glu snyan blangs// ru lu'i bsnyen pa 'bum bzlas shing // snum chen gsur gyi spos me btang // nam gyi gung la mi nyal bar// phrin
359b1(1): las gong ma bzhin du bzlas// byang gi phyogs su kha bltas te// dbyangs kyis shin tu brdung bar bya// de yang bsnyen pa gong ma bzhin// dus la bab pa'i bro mchod la// phyi nang drag tu mtshams bcad nas// rde'u
359b2(1): chung ldir ldir lan gsum brdung // dbyangs ni yid tsam gdung bar bya// de yang dus drug kun tu blangs// sha khrag gtor ma mchod pa bshams// glu bro shar gyi phyogs su dbul// gtor ma cha gsum btang ba
359b3(1): yis// nyi ma phyed kyi dus su ni// lho yi phyogs su kha bltas te// grul bum skad ni gtso ru bya// phrin las dgongs pa gong ma bzhin// dngos mchod dus la bab pa'i tshe// sgrin po klog pa'i cho ga bya// ha cang skad
359b4(1): ni mi che ba// de yang rde'u chung dir dir brdung // dbyangs ni yid tsam gdung bar blangs// de yang dus drug kun tu yang // gsang ba'i mchod pa rgyun mi gcad// mi yi bu mo bsten par bya// lan 'ga' de dang ma
359b5(1): ldan na// ku ku ra dang ra la sogs// ba dang bud med gang yang rung // shin tu dgon gnas med pa'i tshe// byes dang 'gron po byed pa dang // lus la sprul pa'i lha mo yis// sbyar ba'i dam tshig mi gcad
359b6(1): do// 'di ltar byas na dngos grub thob// rgyun dang rgyun mi gcad par ro// sman ni lus la bsrel bar bya// sgrub pa chen po byed pa'i tshe// srog la bab pa'i gal yod kyang // dam bcas de ni ma byung tshe// mi dang
360a1(1): 'phrad par mi bya ste// gtam dang kha rlangs 'dres pa bcad// de ltar byung na zhag gsum du// bdag gi phyag rgya 'bral mi bya// phyag nad dag gis 'chi bar 'gyur// las su dam rdzas bsags par
360a2(1): bya// grangs ni tshad ni 'di ltar te// zhing pa pho nya bslab pa bzhin// b+han d+ha bcu gsum lcang lo can// dgu las nyung na 'gal bar bshad// dung chen mtshan dang ldan pa la// ngas thob pa yi yo byad rung // zhal
360a3(1): bzhi'i gdong gas med pa la// kha dog tshon gyis mdog bsgyur te// yang na lnga'am drug tsam mam// min na dgu 'am bcu gcig go/ phyogs skyong gzhung dang mthun par bstan// mchog phur grangs kyang de bzhin
360a4(1): te// thod pa bu ga med pa la// kha dog tshon gyis mdog bsgyur te// mthug srab chung ba'i zlum po ni// dkyil 'khor dbus su bzhag par shes// skyon med gzhan ni phyogs mtshams dgod// sman dang rak+ta dri chu
360a5(1): dag/ mAM sa dkyil 'khor khyab par dgram// stegs bu'i tshad ni 'di yin no// 'dom gang gru bzhi lham pa ru// dbus su 'khor lo zur drug bri// yang na pad+ma kha brgyad bri// bar khyams kun tu thod pa bri//
360a6(1): bzhi chu srin kha yang bri// thod pa'i phyi rim re re bri// de yi tha ma rdo rjes bskor// le'u tshe dgu pa yan chad bgyi'o// dbang chen 'dus pa'i tan+ta las/ gal po las rgyud kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // thog
360b1(1): mar gzhal yas khang bsgom ste// tshangs pa chen po mngon sum du// dmigs pa'i ting 'dzin sngags kyis bsgral// nyan thos mdo sde kri ya dang // theg pa chen po yo ga dang // gsang ba yi ni theg pa
360b2(1): gsum// gzhung dang mthun pa'i gzhal yas khang // sgo bzhi rta babs mu khyud bcas// drag po khro bo'i khyams la sogs// tshangs pa'i gdung chen gshag tu gtams// yang na tshangs pa'i gzhal yas ni// brgya
360b3(1): byin lha yi dbang po bsgral// khyab 'jug chen po 'khor dang bcas// theg mchog a nu yo ga yi// lugs las byung ba'i gzhal yas bsgom// yang na tshangs pa'i gzhal yas ni// theg chen rgyal po a ti'i
360b4(1): gzhung // khyab dang gnas dang 'byung la sogs// rnam pa gsum pa'i gzhal yas khang // snod bcud 'byung ba'i yum du gsal// ting 'dzin gsal bas skad cig la// bskyed nas gsang ba yum gyi mkha'// b+ha
360b5(1): ga dgyes pa'i ngang du bsgom// de yi dkyil du bdag po dmigs// de la rang bzhin med pa ste// nam mkha' lta bur rab rtogs nas// gzhal yas khang ni zhes gsungs so// dbang chen 'dus pa'i tan+ta las//
360b6(1): gzhal yas khang tshangs pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // skal par ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// log rtog dngos po gzhom pa dang // cho 'phrul mngon du bstan pa'i phyir// hUM mdzad chen po'i tan+ta las// skal
361a1(1): ba'i thog thos thog gsal ba'i// le'u dgongs pa'i rgyud dang mthun pa'i phyir// dang po ting 'dzin rnam gsum las// rgyu yi ting 'dzin hUM dmar gsal// de yi skad cig ting 'dzin las// kha dog
361a2(1): lnga yi 'bru bsgom ste// dbang chen dkyil 'khor rim pa bzhin// kha dog gsum po'i 'bru nyid las// dbang po rkyen dang 'tshams pa'i gnas// thug pa med pa'i gzhal yas khang // chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam
361a3(1): par bskyed// de yin nang du dmigs pa yang // cho ga gsum dang ldan pa'i hUM// de las zhe sdang rdo rje'i sku// rgyu las pad+ma he ru ka/ pad+ma shrI he ru ka/ ha ha hUM dza/ sa bon sngags kyis gsal bar gyur// hUM hrIHphaT/
361a4(1): AM.oM a hrIHma dza dza hu lu dza shan pra be sha ya/ badz+ra badz+ra dza la/ yak+ka badz+ra hUM b+h+yo/ badz+ra hUM/ A ra li a ling a hi ni sha tsa ta ka ba ma ti tsakra/ sku bskyed gsal bar gyur pa dang // log rtog gzhom phyir 'di gsungs
361a5(1): so// thog ser 'bar ba dbab pa'i phyir// hUM/ dbang chen rgyal po thog thog 'bebs// hUM dang phaT kyis srid gsum 'khor ba 'jig/ hUM mdzad hUM gi byin rlabs bsam mi khyab// rdo rje khrag 'thung khrag gi rgya mtsho
361a6(1): skem// rdo rje mtshon chen gnam lcags mthur 'dril ba// gsang sngags log par lta ba'i bdud rnams 'joms// 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol gnyis su yang // gdung ba sel cing dug gsum rtsad nas
361b1(1): gcod// ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TaM/ ta ka ha na pa tsa hUM phaT/ log rtog dregs pa bsgral nas kyang // rab tu rngam pa'i tshig gis bsngags// skrag cing dbang du 'dus par 'gyur// tshangs pa la sogs lha chen
361b2(1): rnams// thog thog dbang gis myos gyur te// sems ni bla med gnas su sbar// tsakra zhes ni sngags dag gis// dbang gi sku bskyed che btsan sku// shangs kyi sgo nas thog thog 'khril// 'khor ba lus kyi rnam rtog
361b3(1): bcom// oM gyis nyes byas thams cad sbyangs// hUM gis sems kyi gzung 'dzin spang // sna yis nga rgyal ri bo bshig/ hA yis phrag dog gnas su dag/ khams gsum rgyud drug ma lus kun// ye shes mtshon
361b4(1): cha thog thog gis// sgrol bar ma gyur cig kyang med// nan tan thugs rjes bskyed pa'i phyir// 'khor ba'i dong spug chen po mdzad// mngon spyod ya mtshan chen po yis// mchog dang tsa ra 'byor tshogs la// nan
361b5(1): tan gyis ni pra be sha/ hUM gis rgyal sras gzhon nu'o// g.yung drung lta bu'i sku yang thob// 'du 'bral med pa'i dbyings su'o// de nas phung po bshig bya ste// lhag ma brgyad la bro brgyad brdungs// mgo la ling+ga
361b6(1): gnon pa'i bro// tsit+ta 'khor ba'i bro mo che// rnam shes ta kr-ita brgyad bro'o// yan lag lha mo za byed stabs// nang khrol ngan song gnas kyi bro// g.yang gzhi ma mo 'khrug pa brdung // brla bzhir khro bo zil gnon
362a1(1): bya// oM na sha ya sAm b+ha ya na/ yak+ka sum b+ha/ gan da ra ri sha/ b+han+d+ha de ri sha h+ma ka ra pra be sha phaT/ b+ha ga wAn/ ma hA ts+tshan+dan+na n+dan+da hA phaT/ kro d+ha ni kro d+ha ni hU phaT/ tshogs dang gtor ma'i las kyang
362a2(1): bya// thog mngon ser ba 'bebs pa yi// rdo rje dUr mo'i ting nge 'dzin// gsal nas sngags ni bzlas par bya// ma ha tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAn/ ha na ta ka pa tsa hUM phaT/ dza la raM/ raM dza la hUM rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM raM/ dzi na ta mo raM//
362a3(1): ru lu sha/ e h+ye hi b+ha ga wAn/ gser la btab te gtor ma bya// de yi tshig kyang rab tu brjod// ang+ku sha zhes bgrang bar bya// las ni nges par bsgrub bya na// mkha' lding rdzas la dpang btsug ste// chu mig
362a4(1): lkugs pa'i klu la gtad// thog thog 'bebs shing dgra bo 'chi// nges par 'di la the tshom med// dbang chen 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ thog 'bebs kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // gnod sbyin phra men 'khor
362a5(1): cas kyis// bdag la rab tu gtses gyur na// dka' thub brtul zhugs smon pa yis// sa yi 'og tu 'dom gsum bya// las kyi hUM zhes cung zad 'das// mAM sa dag kyang mang du bza'// nam mkha' las ni
362a6(1): sems dpa' bsam// bgrang 'phreng klad la lan gsum bskor// de ltar byas na bdag rgyal zhing // nad gtong rnams ni 'chi bar 'gyur// khyi yi brtul zhugs chen po yis// ru lu ru lu kha tang kha/ ku ku rak+Sha
362b1(1): rak+Sha g+h+r-i h+na g+h+r-i h+na/ ha la ha la/ dz+wa la kha khA hi/ nyin dang mtshan du thug phrad du// rigs ma 'chol bar spyod par bya// skye bos mthong na dam tshig nyams// sus ma mthong na dngos grub yin// sbyor ba'i byang sems
362b2(1): lce la bzhag/ rang gis dben ri gang yin pa// skye bo'i gnas dang thags bsrings te// dgug pa'i brtul zhugs chen po yis// dbyangs kyang drag tu blang bar bya// bya yi brtul zhugs chen po yis// dbyangs
362b3(1): kyang drag tu blang bar bya// rta yi brtul zhugs chen po yis// khams gsum dum bur gtub par bya// phag gi brtul zhugs chen po ni// srid gsum khron du brko bar bya// khyi yi brtul zhugs chen po
362b4(1): yis// dmyal khams zas su za bar bya// srod dang tho rangs bro brdung pa// dka' thub smyon pa'i bro brdung ste// ru lu'i bsnyen pa 'bum bzlas te// gnod sbyin phra men 'khor bcas kyang // bdag gi de ni dbang
362b5(1): du 'gyur// klu dbang gi skad byang du gzugs// khyi yi dka' thub smyon pa yis// nub tu rta skad 'tsher ba bya// rta yi bro ste dang po yin// nam gyi gung la phag skad dbyung // phag gi brtul zhugs chen po ste// gnod
362b6(1): sbyin bran du 'khol ba yin// de ltar byas na brtul zhugs su// hUM zhes bya ba'i brtul zhugs kyis// hUM zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor kun// bdag gi lus la gzhug par bya// dus la bab pa'i bros mchod
363a1(1): la// rde'u chung lan gsum brdung bar bya// de nas dgra bgegs 'dul ba'i phyir// brtul zhugs ting 'dzin zhugs nas kyang // glu bro dam tshig bzhin du blang // sgrub pa chen po'i bar chod
363a2(1): la// brtul zhugs chen pos bsgral nas kyang // dus gsum rgyal ba'i sras su bskyed// lho yi phyogs su kha bltas nas// grul bum skad du ku co 'don// dka' thub chen po yin pa'i phyir// su dang gtam yang de
363a3(1): mi bya// smyon pa'i tshul du mchongs pa yis// gnod sbyin phra men rnams kyang brgya la// nam yang bdag gi dbang du 'gyur// nyan thos dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir// sngags kyi dka' thub chen po yis// bdud rtsi lnga la
363a4(1): longs spyod bya// ma spangs par ni dbang du bsdu// nan dbang drag shul skyon thabs su// su dang 'phrad pa sbyor zhing bsgral// 'di ni dpal gyi thugs dam ste// rgyun mi 'chad par spyad na ni// bdag gi ji ltar
363a5(1): 'dod pa bzhin// dka' thub bsrungs pas dngos grub po// 'di la som nyi ci ste za// dbang chen 'dus pa'i tan+ta las/ dka' thub smyon pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // skal dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa pos// klu
363a6(1): rgyal zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir// gzhung las byung ba'i ting 'dzin bsgom// hUM las phyag rgya gdan dang bcas// dmar po'i dbu lnga phyag bcu drug/ gsal bar bsgom pa'i byin rlabs kyis// klu chen dbang du
363b1(1): bsdu ba'o// phyag rgya klu rnams rab tu bsnams// de ltar gsal bas ma lus bsgral// klu yi rigs bcas dbang du bsdus// g.yas kyi dbang po bsnams pa ni// klu chen rgyal rigs dang du bsnams// g.yas kyi
363b2(1): dang 'og dung skyong bsnams// de yi 'og ma stobs rgyu bsnams// 'khor ba 'di las sgrol ba'i bdag pos so// de yi 'og mas nor rgyas bu// 'og mas ma dros bu bsnams pa'o// sog ma med kyang rab tu
363b3(1): bsnams// 'og mas stobs ldan rab tu bsnams// 'og ma nyid kyis gzi ldan 'dzin// g.yon gyi phyag na 'dzin pa ni// thog mar kar ko Ta bsnams pa'o// 'og mas blta na sdug kyang 'dzin// 'og mas
363b4(1): stobs rgyu rab tu bsnams// 'og mas zla ba can yang 'dzin// 'og mas dung skyong rab tu bsnams// 'og mas gang ba bzang po ste// de 'og nor bu'i mgrin yang bsnams// klu yi rgyal po de rnams ni// snying
363b5(1): gar dbang gi zhabs kyis brkyang // tsham rngams stabs dang chas pa'o// rdzogs pa chen po yin pa'i phyir// sku bskyod 'og tu gzhal yas khang // sbrul nag grub pa'i 'byam klas pa'i// mtha' dang mnyam par
363b6(1): dmigs par bya// de yi dbus su bsgom pa yang // gtso bo yab yum 'khor dang bcas// hUM las rdzogs pa'i tshul du bskyed// de nas gsang ba'i bsnyen pa dbul// bsnyen pa'i sngags ni 'di dag ni// pad+ma ma hA
364a1(1): shrI he ru ka/ e ga de ma hUM sa ma ya ho// nA ga pra be sha dza zhes bya/ rdzu 'phrul mchog dang phyag rgya dang // drag po'i phrin las nyi tshe ba// sgrub pa'i dus su klu yang bsgom// bsnyen pa chos kyi dbyings
364a2(1): nas grangs// rdzu 'phrul 'phrog phyir bsnyen par zhugs// klu rnams dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir// mgrin sngon la sogs rnam shes ni// gser zhun lta bur gyur nas ni// gzi ldan b+ha ga'i dbyings su bla na// gnas kyi
364a3(1): rang bzhin lhun gyis grub// sku yi gshog pa mkha' dang mnyam// bar nas gser gyi me tog 'phro// bye mas 'jigs zhes de la sngags// khyung ltar gnas pas klu chen gnon// dbang du gnas pas klu rgyal
364a4(1): 'dul// rdzu 'phrul phrogs pas dngos grub thob// klu'i le'u zhes pa brjod// dkyil 'khor bsdu ba snga ma bzhin// hUM gi spro bsdus dbyings su bstim// dbang chen 'dus pa'i tan+t+ra las/ klu rgyal rdzu 'phrul gyi le'u
364a5(1): ste drug pa'o// // tshangs pa gnas kyi pho brang gis// tshangs pa dbyangs kyi klu drug ni// breng nge ba dang dung nge ba// shad+ha ba dang gardza ba// cang kar de dang pang ka de// glu drug blangs las don drug
364a6(1): 'grub// breng nge ba yi glu blangs pas// tshangs pa lha yi dkyil 'khor nas// sku yi dngos grub chen po thob// dung nge ba yi glu blangs pas// brgya byin lha yi dbang po yi// gsung gi dngos grub chen po thob// sha d+ha
364b1(1): ba yi glu blangs pas// rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams kyi// yon tan chen po'i dngos grub thob// gardza ba yi glu blangs pas// phyogs skyong chen po bcu rnams kyi// yon tan chen po'i dngos grub thob// cang ka de'i glu
364b2(1): blangs pas// 'bum phrag yangs pa'i mkha' 'gro ma'i// dngos grub brlabs chen 'khrigs pa thob// pang ka de'u'i glu blangs pas// srid pa dbang sdud bro mo che// dregs pa'i yul dag dbang du sdud// pad+ma gar
364b3(1): gyi bro drug ni// bdud bzhi thal bar brlag pa ni// 'khor ba'i phyi nas 'dren pa'i bro// breng nge ba yi glu dang sbyar// sdug bsngal nad sel thugs rje'i bro// dung nge ba yi glu dang sbyar// thugs dam dbyings su
364b4(1): bskul ba'i bro// sha d+ha ba yi glu dang sbyar// ye shes rgyan gyi bro mo che// gardza ba yi glu dang sbyar// tshangs pa dbyangs kyi glu dang sbyar// ma mo 'khrugs pa'i bro mo che// cang ka de'u'i glu dang sbyar// lang+ka bsgral ba'i bro
364b5(1): mo che// pang ka de'u'i glu dang sbyar// tshangs pa dbyangs kyi glu blangs nas// pad+ma gar gyi bro brdungs pas// khams gsum ma lus dbang du 'gyur// dbang chen 'dus pa'i tan+t+ra las/ bu mo drug gi glu blangs kyi bro
364b6(1): zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // stong gsum 'jig rten rab 'byams kun// mthu chen lang ka'i rgyal po yi// khyad par rdzu 'phrul rnam 'phrul te// gnyen por gyur pa gzhan med nas// gzhan las
365a1(1): bzang ba'i tan+ta las// nges pa'i lung du gsang ba'i le'u// lang ka gnon pa zhes kyang bya// srin po mnan phyir 'di gsungs so// dang po ting 'dzin rnam gsum las// rgyu yi ting 'dzin dmigs pa
365a2(1): yang // cho ga gsum dang ldan pa'i hUM// 'phro 'du rdo rje rab tu dmigs// de las gar yi glu gsal zhing // dbu lnga bcu drug bsgom pa yang // snying po sngags kyi 'phros par bsgom// hrIHphaT oM AHhUM/ lu raM a
365a3(1): badz+ra e A ra li dza// de las spro bsdu gsal ba las// rgyu ru brtan par gyur pa dang // nyid kyis 'dul bar zhal 'ches te// sdigs mdzub nam mkhar phyar ba yang // bskal pa'i me lce 'bar ba las// a la la
365a4(1): yi thog thog 'khrugs// de yang thugs rje gsang ba'i thabs// klu dang nam mkha'i snying nas 'dren// sgrol sngags drag pos rab tu bsgral// 'dren pa'i snying pos tsit+ta phyung // srin po bzhi yang rnam par sprul// me
365a5(1): sbrul rnams su de bzhin te// phung po las ni gzhal yas khang // tshogs brgyad dur khrod brgyad du grags// bka' dang mthun pa'i gzhal yas su// rgyan dang cha lugs gsungs pa bzhin// de yi nang du dmigs
365a6(1): pa yang // 'khor lo 'bar ba'i gzhal yas bsgom// gsang ba'i rdzas dang mchod par bcas// 'khor lo yon tan bsam mi khyab// lce la rtsibs dang gru chad dang // mu khyud par khyams sgo khyud bcas// sbas
365b1(1): shing dbyings su bstim byas te// dbyings nas 'bar ba'i sku yang bskyed// skad cig ma yi ting 'dzin las// hUM las sku bskyed 'bar ba yis// klu dang lang ka bcad gtub ste// nyon mongs lnga yang gnan par
365b2(1): bya// de ltar bzlas nas mnan nas kyang // 'khor gyi lha mos bstod pa gsungs// bsdu bar bya ba'i lung du grags// 'bar ba'i zhabs gang 'od lta bu// mchod rten chen po bzhi la 'dus// long ba'i tshogs
365b3(1): la rim pa bzhin// nga su ra bzhin bdag nyid de// skye ba med pa'i dbyings la bsdu// dkyil 'khor bsdu bar gsungs pa yi// mchod rten sgo khyud rim pa bzhin// de nas bsgrub rdzas bsu ba yang // sha khri mnan
365b4(1): pa'i khrag la bsu// khrag dang tsan ni snga ma bzhin// las kyi gnan pa bya ba'i phyir// spro ba'i thabs ni 'di dag go/ sku gsung thugs dang phyag rgya 'phro// mtshon cha la sogs snga ma bzhin// las kyi rnam pa bya ba'i
365b5(1): phyir// klu dang srin po mnan pa'i thabs// hom khung dag tu mnan pa'i phyir// ling+ga'i gnas su mnan par bya// me lha gzhung bzhin bsgoms la bzhag/ rab gnas sbyin sreg bya ba'am// rnga yi rol mos drangs te
365b6(1): bya'o// mi mthun phyogs bzhi hUM du gtams// dkyil 'khor bsdu ba bstan pa'i phyir// sgo lnga la sogs dbus nas len// dbang chen 'dus pa'i tan+ta las/ lang+ka'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // thod rgal
366a1(1): 'jigs pa'i phrin las kyis// rnal 'byor dgra bo 'dul ba'i phyir// rgyud las 'byung ba'i nges pa'i lung // 'di dag gis ni bkres skoms 'joms// bde ba chen pos thugs rje'i le'u// phra men
366a2(1): rngams thabs zhes kyang bya// de la nyi ma 'bum gyis rab bskor ba// srid gsum ma lus bsreg pa'i dbang dang ldan// sprin med gsal ba'i 'od zer 'bar ba 'phro// de steng pad+ma kha stong ldan pa las// rdo rje rtse
366a3(1): gcig pad+ma'i snying por gnas// de dbus hUM las byol song skye gnas 'jom// 'di ni gsal byed nyi zla 'od kyi lung // pad+ma'i lte bar gnas pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil// hUM las 'od 'phros mi rnams bag chags
366a4(1): sbyangs// 'khor lo rtsibs stong ldan pa'i hUM du grags// de'i steng b+h+rUM las yid bzhin gzhal yas khang // rgyal chen phyogs skyong la sogs ka dang gdung // me ri thod phreng la sogs sbrul gyis brgyan// de'i dbus
366a5(1): rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgyar gsal// de ni rdo rje sems dpa'i lung du grags// de las hUM gi 'od zer gsal ba las// zhe sdang rdo rje'i sku ru thun mong bsgoms nas kyang // shangs nang khro bo hUM drug sgra 'thon
366a6(1): pas// rgyud drug gnas pa'i 'khor ba'i rtsad gcod do// spros nas rim pa bzhin du thim byas nas// khro bor gyur pa'i hUM gi le'u'o// hUM de las 'bar ba'i sku bskyed gsal ba las// ljags kyi dkyil du hUM las
366b1(1): rin po che// oM la sogs pa'i 'phro 'du las// dpal chen 'bar ba'i skur gsal te// khang bu lnga dang ldan par dmigs// de dbus rta mgo ljang gur bsgom// sbrul nag stong gis rgyan du mdzes// thod pa tshar
366b2(1): gsum brjid par ldan// zhing lpags g.yas na sham thabs can// phyi nang gshog pa nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// gsang ba'i lha mo rdo rje dra ba can// 'gro ba ma lus dbang du sdud pa'i yum// bcu drug phyag na
366b3(1): mchod cha sna tshogs bsnams// zhe sdang gdug pa'i dgra bgegs mang po 'dul// zhabs kyi chas dang khro bo brgyad gnon sbyor// dpa' bo la sogs ting 'dzin brgyad dang sbyar// 'khor gyi me 'brug rlung 'brug la
366b4(1): sogs ni// rang sngags snying pos phyogs mtshams thim par ro// klu 'brug sngon po rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bsgom// rlung gi sha ba ljang gu rab tu sngags// long ba rgyab 'brel mang po dmigs pa yang // yang sprul bya
366b5(1): ba 'bum dang bcas pa ste// phyogs bzhi nas ni rnam par 'khrugs pa'o// phyi rim dmus long 'khor ba can// shwa ri ka li sgras bskyed cing // mtha' dbus med par khyab pa'o// kham rgya chen mo drug rnams
366b6(1): ni// dkyil 'khor grwa rnams su yang gsal// ye shes dpal gyi khyi brgyad ni// phyogs bzhi dang ni mtshams nas dgyes// ma lus dgra rnams mche bas gcod// phyi rim lcags kyi sbrang mo brgyad// dgra bo rnams
367a1(1): la zarbad par bya// de ltar phyag rgya rdzogs pa dang // sku nyid 'khor la sbas pa ste// phyogs bzhi dbus lnga khang bur sba// rta mgo la sogs rim pa bzhin// de yang chos kyi dbyings su bsdu// da ni phur
367a2(1): pa'i las bya ste// rgya mdud 'khor lo'i tshul du sba// spyi bor pad+ma khrag 'thung ste// zur brgyad logs brgyad rgyab 'brel tshogs// rgya mdud 'og mar dmus long dmigs// rtse mor lcags kyi khyi mo bsam// ngos
367a3(1): la lcags kyi spyang mo ste// rtse mor khro bo dmigs bya la// mgo dgu brtsegs pa zur la'o// da ni bsdu bar bya ba yang // sgo srung sbyang mo nyid la'o// spyang mo zhabs kyi chas brgyad la'o// spyang mo rnam shes brgyad po
367a4(1): la'o// de yang dur khrod brgyad la 'dus// dur khrod ye shes chen po ste// de yang mi gnas ye shes la'o// me 'brug gshog pa nyid la 'dus// gshog pa sku yi rgyan la'o// de yang tshon sna lnga la 'dus// tshon sna
367a5(1): dbu rgyan lnga la'o// de yang rin chen khang pra b+he// de yang sku gsung thugs la badz+ra// de yang chos kyi dbyings su bsdu// dbyings kyang kun gzhi nyid du b+he// mi dmigs chos sgra chen por gnas// dbang chen 'dus
367a6(1): pa'i tan+t+ra las/ yan lag spros pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // oM d+harma d+hA tu b+ha ga maN+Da la gu h+ya si ti hUM zhes brjod pas/ rin po che'i gzhal yas khang nam mkha' dang mnyam pa gcig bsgom/ yang 'od zer
367b1(1): grangs med pa gcig 'phros nas yang 'dus pa las// badz+ra satwa hUM/ ya za badz+ra sarba ta thA ga ta/ ta thA a hUM zhes brjod pas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' dbu gsum phyag drug pa/ g.yas dang po rdo rje
367b2(1): bar ma 'khor lo/ tha ma rin po che/ g.yon dang po dril bu/ bar ma pad+ma/ tha ma ral gri sku rnams rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa zhig bsgom/ hUM drag tu brjod pas lha'i shangs nas/ hUM dmar po 'jig rten gyi
367b3(1): khams gang bar bsgom/ 'phros 'dus pa las 'di skad do/ hUM gis srid gsum ma lus dbang du bsdus/ hUM gis nyon mongs dug gsum mun khang 'joms/ hUM gis thams cad 'jigs shing thams cad bsdu/ hUM
367b4(1): gis bla med byang chub gnas su sgrol/ hUM gis ngan song gnas kun stongs par byed/ hUM gis dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad bskyed// oM pad+ma shrI he ru ka/ pad+ma da ra hrI zhes brjod pas/ bcom ldan 'das pad+ma he
367b5(1): ru ka sku che la yan lag rags pa/ sku mdog nyi ma dmar zag 'dra ba/ dbu lnga phyag bcu drug pa zhabs dmar po brgyad pa zhig gsal bar bsgom/ de nas lag pa g.yon pa'i mdzub mo bsgrengs nas/ khams
367b6(1): gsum sdigs par byas nas 'di skad du/ phyag rgya chen po 'dis bcings la// khro rgyal dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis// bdud ni rnam par sdigs zhes bya// phung byed thams cad 'jigs par byed// bdud dang mu
368a1(1): stegs thams cad 'jigs par byed// bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad 'jigs par byed// thams cad ma lus dbang du sdud/ oM pad+ma shrI he ru ka/ da sha pa la te dzo ba le ma ma he me dra/ dpyid
368a2(1): ka ste pa pa shang ku ru hUM zhes brjod pas/ shar dri za/ lhor gshin rje/ nub klu dbang / byang gnod sbyin la sogs pa rnams/ gcer bu lhags pas btang ba bzhin/ rdzu 'phrul bsnyen cing mthur ldan pas// thugs
368a3(1): rje chen pos nan tan gyis// rgyud drug gnas su bsgral ba dang // sdang ba'i dgra bgegs gsad pa'i phyir// pha rol snying dag dbyung bar bya// dmar chen khrag dang bcas pa yang // zhal du gsol zhing 'dren
368a4(1): par bya// dmar 'byin le'u zhes de la sngags// rdzogs pa'i ting 'dzin skad cig mas// bdag nyid phyag rgya'i skur bsgoms la// hUM zhes pa ni rdzogs pa'o// dbyings las ye shes gzhug tshul du// du mar brjod
368a5(1): cing drang bar bya// khA hi raM las 'od 'phros 'dus// dza yi lcags kyus drang ba yang // rdo bar lcags ni 'du tshul du// du mar brjod cing drang bar bya// bdag gi phyag rgya gsal ba dang // 'dren zhing sgrol ba'i pho
368a6(1): nya ni// gang yang rung ba'i sems can de'i// lus ngag yid la rbad par bya// rta mchog rol pa'i shangs lnga yang // rlung gi mgo la sbyang ki'i gdong // mche ba bdud kyi snying rtsa gcod// rna ba sbrul gyi 'dzul khung
368b1(1): nas// sbrul gyi mi la sbyang ki'i gdong // kha rlangs sprin gyi dkyil 'khor nas// 'od kyi mi la gzha' tshon gdong // ral pa khrag gi zar bu la// khrag gi mig la sbyang ki'i gdong // spyan mig gru gsum 'bar ba
368b2(1): la// zangs kyi mi la spyang ki'i gdong // kha la ro sha rbad/ dgung tri dun dun rbad/ gang la bya ba'i sems can de'i// lus ngag yid la rbad par bya// bdag nyid phyag rgyar gsal ba dang // 'dren cing sgrol ba'i pho
368b3(1): nya ni// gshog pa rdo rje gdengs pa yis// pho nya yid mgyogs rlung bas myur// lcags kyi mig la mkha' gshog can// phyag ni bcu drug 'bar ba las// lcags kyi khyi mo brgyad sprul pa// lcags gshog khyung gi
368b4(1): 'dab ma can// sku gsung thugs las sprul pa ni// la la byan lag mgo bo la// lus ni lcags kyi sbrang mor sbrul// la la khyung gi mgo bo la// lus ni zangs kyi wa mor sprul// la la khra yi mgo bo la// lus ni
368b5(1): dril nag rkang gsum pa'o// la la khra yi mgo bo la// lus ni sdig pa rkang gcig pa// la la chun lag mgo bo la// lus ni dung gi spyang mor sbrul// la la chu byi'i mgo bo la// lus po bcu drug tshang mar
368b6(1): sbrul// la la bzhad kyi mgo bo la// lus ni byi ru'i seng ger sbrul// la la kang ka'i mgo bo la// lus ni lcags dri'u rkang gsum po// la la 'ug pa'i mgo bo la// lus ni dung phag dkar mor sbrul// la la pu
369a1(1): shud mgo bo la// lus ni lcags kyi sdig par sprul// la la mthing ril mgo bo la// lus ni dril nag rkang gsum pa'o// la la sbyin gyi mgo bo la// lug ni byi la rtsal po che// la la bya rgod mgo bo
369a2(1): la// lus ni gser stag ser por sprul// gang la bya ba'i sems can de'i// rgyud drug 'khor ba'i rtsad bcad nas// dmyal khams bcu drug khrims bsad de// thugs rje chen pos byin brlabs te// 'di la byin
369a3(1): gyis brlabs nas kyang // dmar ser 'byin pa'i pho nya 'gyed// dus las ma g.yel phrin las mdzad// bdag kyang phyag rgyar gsal byas la// gnod sbyin pa yi gsang sngags bzlas// las 'grub pa la the tshom
369a4(1): med// rdo rje sder mo can gyis gsang sngags kyis drang ngo // dbang chen 'dus pa'i tan+t+ra las/ dmar byin gyi le'u ste bcu pa'o// // skal bar ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// rigs gnyis lung gi brgyud pa'i
369a5(1): lung // chos kun gnyis med mnyam pa las// 'dzin rtog dngos po tha ba ni// zhing la gnas 'gyur gsungs pa ni// gdeng dang ldan na tha dad med// sa bon las ni 'bras bu'i tshul// rtog pa'i klong du 'dres pa
369a6(1): las// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// snang mdzad las gyur kun tu gzigs// byang chub sems dpa' nyid la rdzogs// mi bskyod pa sogs shar du'o// rin chen 'byung ba lho nyid do// mtha' yas la sogs
369b1(1): nub tu'o// don yon byang gi phyogs su 'gyur// 'byung ba yum gyi gnas gyur pa// sa bon las ni myu gu'i tshul// bzang mo las gyur gzi dang ldan// spyan ni 'gyu ba glog 'gyu ste// mA ma kI ni dra ba 'gyur// na
369b2(1): bza' dkar mo sder mo can// sgrol ma las byung gshog pa can// yab yum bcu ni rab sbyor te// skyes pa'i dbyings su bstan pa las// byang chub sems ni chags pa'i gzhi// rta mgo ljang gu yin par
369b3(1): grags// dbu lnga ye shes lnga yi dbyings// sems dpa' brgyad 'tshar dmus long tshogs// sems ma las gyur rgyab 'brel te// sems dpa' sems ma ldan sbyor bas// byang chub sems ni chags pa'i
369b4(1): rgyu// mkha' la 'phros pa'i 'od zer ni// sprul pa yin par sbyang mo brgyad// dbyings su 'dren pa'i ye shes kyi// lcags kyu la sogs sgo ma bzhi// bsgyur bas dbu dgu rab tu brtsegs// sbrul sku thub drug las
369b5(1): sprul pa// kham rgya dag tu sprul pa yin// gnas ni ma nor chos kyi dbyings su don rtogs na// dbyings la ye shes rol pa ni// gnas 'gyur mchog gi le'u zhes bya// zhi ba mi g.yo chos sku las// khro bor gyur
369b6(1): pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// ston pa'i bka' dang mi 'gal bar// phyi rabs rnal 'byor skal rab la// nges pa'i lung du brtsams pa ste// rtogs na the tshom med par 'grub// dbang chen 'dus pa'i tan+ta las//
370a1(1): zhi ba gnas 'gyur mchog gi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // rig 'dzin dbang phyug chen po yi// snyan khung brgud nas 'gro don du// khrag 'thung chen po hUM gi le'u// blta ba chen po 'di gsungs
370a2(1): pa'o// hUM las 'byung ba yum gyi dbyings// gzhal yas hUM nyid b+ha ga'i klong // 'dus ma byas te rnam par dag/ hUM las khrag 'thung rigs bzhir 'bar// spros med thig ler gnas pa'i phyir// ma bcos lhun
370a3(1): gyis grub par gnas// ma tshogs hUM gis dbang phyug ma// seng ge lta bu'i sgra sgrogs shing // sgra nyid sgra ltar stong pa'i phyir// stong pa'i ye shes rnam par dag/ mnga' bdag chen po hUM nyid de// thams cad yongs su
370a4(1): khyab pa'i phyir// thugs rje'i nyi ma rnam par dag/ hUM las pad+ma kha stong ldan// gsang ba b+ha gar lhun gyis grub// nyi zla dum bur brtsegs pa yang // shes rab thabs su 'brel ba yi// phyag rgya bskyod pa'i dkyil
370a5(1): 'khor che// hUM las zhe sdang rdo rje'i sku// 'bar byed chen por gyur pa ni// skye med chos dbyings rnam par dag/ sprul pa'i 'khor tshogs thams cad kyang // ye shes thugs kyi rang bzhin te// thig le hUM las rgyan
370a6(1): gyis bye brag rnams// dbyings las ye shes 'jug par byed// dbyings nyid lhun gyis grub pa'i rgyan// hUM las 'bar ba'i skur gyur pas// chos sku gcig pur sbyor ba'i don// hUM las dbu lngar snang ba ni// ye
370b1(1): shes lnga nyid dbyings la byon// hUM las spyan lngar grags pa yang // dbang po yul lngar rnam par grags// hUM las ljags lngar grags pa yang // dbang po ro la sbyor ba'o// hUM las shangs lnga'i 'tshubs ma
370b2(1): yang // dbang po dri la rnam par dag/ hUM las snyan lngar gsan pa yang // ma 'gags sgra la ci bder sbyor// hUM las zhal lngar gdangs pa yang // srid gsum dbyings su za ba'o// hUM las rta mgo ljang gu
370b3(1): yang // tshangs pa dbang du bsdu nas ni// ma chags dbyings la ye shes rol// e ma ho ya mtshan dbang gi sku// sna tshogs cir yang ston mod kyi// spros med thig le rnam dag pas// 'di ni rnam dag hUM gi
370b4(1): le'u'o// thams cad stong pa'i dbyings su blta// dbang chen 'dus pa'i tan+ta las/ khrag 'thung gi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // skal dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// 'gro drug thabs kyis 'dul ba
370b5(1): yang // ngan song gnas nas 'dren pa'i phyir// bskyed rdzogs chen po 'di gsungs so// ting 'dzin bskyed pa'i sa bon sngags// e dang yaM sogs rim pa bzhin// ma nor tsam du bsgom par bya'o// b+h+rUM las rin
370b6(1): chen gzhal yas khang // rin chen rgyan la sogs pas mdzes// de yi nang du dmigs pa ni// tsakra la sogs 'khor lo che// rtsibs dang rtsibs kyi mu khyud dang // lte ba bar khyams sgo khyud sogs// rdo rje dbyings
371a1(1): kyi dkyil 'khor ldan// lte ba zlum por gyur pa la// dpa' bo hUM las rdo rje che// de las phyag rgya bskyed pa ni// zhe sdang rgyal po rnam par bsgom// 'khor lo mdun gyi dang po ni// dpa' bo oM las
371a2(1): 'khor lo che// ma skyes pa las phyag rgya'i sku bskyed pa// gti mug rgyal po rnam par bsgom// g.yas su lta ba'i 'khor lo la// dpa' bo sA las rin chen che// de la phyag rgya'i skur bskyed pa// nga rgyal rgyal po rnam
371a3(1): par bsgom// nub tu lta ba'i 'khor lo la// dpa' bo oM las pad+ma ste// de las phyag rgya'i skur bskyed pa// 'dod chags rgyal po rnam par bsgom// g.yon gyi rtsibs la dmigs pa ni// dpa' bo hA las rgya gram
371a4(1): ste// de las phyag rgya'i skur bskyed pa// phrag dog rgyal po rnam par bsgom// dpa' bo 'bru lngar gyur pa'i sku// yab yum phyag rgyar sbyor ba las// byang chub sems kyi sa bon ni// dbang chen pad+ma gar gyi
371a5(1): sku// rdzogs pa chen po bsgom pa yang // dpa' bo lnga las bskyed pa ni// rtags su dbu lnga rab tu brtag/ hUM las kun tu thal ba'i dbu// 'dod khams dbang du sdud pa'o// oM las dri za gnon pa'i dbu// sna
371a6(1): las grul bum dbang du sdud// AM las klu yang grol bar byed// hA las gnod sbyin dbang po 'dul// thar ba brgyad dang ldan pa'i zhabs// khro bo brgyad la khyab par sbyor// bkra shis yum dang sprul pa'i
371b1(1): 'khor// dbang chen sku la yongs su rdzogs// dbang chen 'dus pa'i tan+t+ra las/ bskyed rdzogs kyi le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// // thugs rje byin rlabs rmad po che// 'jig rten yongs grags mdzad pa
371b2(1): che// sngon gyi las dbang drag po yis// gzung dang 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog dang // lhan cig ldan pa'i bag chags rnams// mnan pa'i don du 'di gsungs so// mtshan yang gdon gzir drag po'i le'u// phyi rabs
371b3(1): sngags 'chang rnal 'byor pa'i// don du cho ga 'di rnams so// na sha staM b+ha na d+ha yak+ka sum+b+ha na/ gan+da ri ri sha shan+da re sha ma ma tsa dur nan/ sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hUM/ skad cig ma yi ting 'dzin gyis// 'bar ba chen por
371b4(1): bdag bskyed la// lnga dang bcu drug phyag char ldan// ting 'dzin brgyad kyi byin rlabs las// dmar pa'i mdangs dang ldan pa'i zhabs// bag chags mi ldang gnon pa'i phyir// tsham rngams chen po 'di skad
371b5(1): brjod// mtshungs med che ba'i khyad par rab ston cing // nga rgyal dpa' bsnyems bdud kyi dpung bcom nas// 'jig rten 'das pa'i khro bo brgyad// che ba'i rtags dang ldan pas dbang phyug yang che
371b6(1): mnan// bdag nyid chen por gsal ba las// zhabs dmar po brgyad 'bar ba'i chas dang ldan par dmigs la/ 'di skad ces bskul zhing gzir bar bya'o// 'dul ba'i zhabs brgyad phyogs mtshams brgyad
372a1(1): du bgrad// snying gar mkhrig ma nub phyir sgal rtsib khong du 'joms// sdug bsngal nyam zag 'bod sgrog di ri ri// zhes brjod pas/ tsham rngams chen po dang bcas pas/ lan cig gzir bar
372a2(1): bya'o// gdul ba'i zhabs gcig shar du bgrad// dpa' bo stag gi chas dang ldan// hUM ka ra la rnam par gzir// tsham rngams chen po mnyam par sbyor// gdul ba'i zhabs gcig shar lho mtshams// gnod
372a3(1): gdug zlog byed lcags dang ldan// Ar+ya a tsa la nub par gzir// tsham rngams chen po mnyam par sbyor// gdul ba'i zhabs gcig lho phyogs su// shes rab ting 'dzin chas dang ldan// ya mAn+ta ka'i snying gar
372a4(1): gzir// tsham rngams chen po mnyam par sbyor// gdul bya'i zhabs gcig lho nub mtshams// dbang gi bse khrab chas dang ldan// nI la daN+Di'i snying gar nub// tsham rngams chen pos mnyam par sbyor// gdug pa'i
372a5(1): zhabs gcig nub tu bgrad// dpa' brjid sbrul gyis chas dang ldan// pad+ma kuN+Da li yi snying gar nub// tsham rngams chen po mnyam par sbyor// gdul bya'i zhabs gcig nub byang mtshams// dmar gsal che ba'i
372a6(1): chas dang ldan// Tak+ki rA dza'i b+han+na mnan// mche bas phye ma bzhin du btags// tsham rngams chen po mnyam par sbyor// gdul bya'i zhabs gcig byang du bgrad// mnyem lcug chu skyes chas dang ldan// oM mr-i ta
372b1(1): mgrin sgal rtsib bcom// tsham rngams chen po mnyam par sbyor// gdul bya'i zhabs gcig byang shar mtshams// gtum chen gzig gi chas dang ldan// ma hA ba la'i ldan par gzir// 'khor rnams dbang du
372b2(1): bsdus nas kyang // tsham rngams chen po mnyam par sbyor// hUM kA ra pra be sha phaT nan/ ar+ya a tsa la pra be sha phaT nan/ ya mAn+ta ka pra be sha phaT nan/ nI la daN+Da pra be sha phaT nan/ pad+ma kuN+Da li pra be sha phaT nan//
372b3(1): DAk+ki rA dza pra be sha phaT nan/ a mr-i ta kuN+Da li pra be sha phaT nan/ ma hA ba la pra be sha phaT nan// phyag rgya chen po'i skur bsgoms la// gzir gnon drag po'i las byas na// sdug bsngal chu bo'i rgyun skam pa// sngon
372b4(1): gyi rgyal ba rnams kyi bka'// zhi bas thams cad tshim par brjod// rgyas pas ma lus mngon sangs rgyas// dbang du ma bsdus gang yang med// mngon spyod byin rlabs rmad po che// thabs la mkhas pa'i
372b5(1): mdzad spyod kyis// bsad cing mnan pa ma lus kun// phra mo'i sku med sku don byas// slar 'dus chos kyi dbyings su thim// dmigs su med pa'i chos skur bsgom// dbang chen 'dus pa'i tan+ta las/ gdon
372b6(1): gzir drag po'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // rgyud la goms shing don la yid ches kyang // dbang bskur dbang rtags lag tu ma byin na// nor bu'i rgyal sa zin par ga la 'gyur// de bas dbang gi khyad
373a1(1): par 'di gsungs so// rnam grangs bcu po 'di dag ni// rgyal zabs spyi blugs theg pa'i dbang // bskur ba tsam gyis thob pa'o// de la zabs gang gis dbang ba dang / don ched ci la dbang ba
373a2(1): dang / dbang gi dngos gzhi bstan pa dang / dbang gi grangs bstan pa dang / dbang gi rtags bstan pa dang // dbang yul spyi la bskur bas bstan pa dang / dbang bskur ba'i thabs bstan pa dang / dbang gi khyad
373a3(1): par dang / dbang gi man ngag dang / dbang gi yon tan bstan pa'o// de lta bas na phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa'i rim pa ji snyed gsungs mod kyang / de'i nang nas 'bras bu'i theg rgyal gsang sngags zhes/ 'bras
373a4(1): bra'i theg rgyal nang nas dbang bskur gces/ shes dbang med rlom sems kyis// kha cig ya ma brla dang gsob 'dra la// don dang ldan pa'i skyes bu dbang chen la// rtags dang 'brel pas dbang bskur shin tu
373a5(1): rigs// dbang med kha cig rang dbang zos gyur cing // zug thub khong longs shes thob chod bzhag nas// tshe gzhi med bzhin yod pa'i las spyod pa// ngan song gsum gyi sa bon 'di yin pas// srid lam
373a6(1): 'khyams shing chos lam ring bas na// bka' la brten nas dbang med bka' rkun la// dbang lung tshad mar gyur pa'i skyes bu yis// bskur yang mi thob nong bu'i spyod pa bzhin// thob par mi 'gyur chags par
373b1(1): mi 'gyur ro// dbang chen 'dus pa'i tan+ta las/ dbang gi khyad par gyi le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// // rmad byung byang chub sems kyi le'u// 'bar ba'i dbu lnga rmad du byung ba ni// ye shes lnga dang yab lnga dbang
373b2(1): por sbyor// mnyam pa chen po'i ngang du lhan ner bsgom// 'bar ba'i ral pa rmad du byung ba ni// dbyings las ma g.yos chos sku mnyam pa la// khro bo mun dza'i cod pan bye ba 'bum// sbrul sku'i 'gro drug sgrol
373b3(1): bar lhan ner bsgom// 'bar ba'i shangs lnga rmad du byung ba ni// dbang po dri dang gnyis med sbyor ba yis// gsung ba mchog gi bye brag so sor yang // tshor pa nyams su myong zhing tshim gyur nas// skye 'gag med
373b4(1): pa'i ngang la lhan ner bsgom// 'bar ba'i snyan lnga rmad du byung ba ni// gsan pa ma 'gags sgra mtha' so so yang // de nyid sgra mtha' stong pa chos kyi sku// med la zad med shes par lhan ner bsgom// 'bar ba'i
373b5(1): zhal lnga rmad du byung ba ni// hom lnga 'brel pas sdug bsngal bsreg pa'i phyir// 'bar ba'i me dpung rab tu 'phro ba yi// sprul pa'i 'phro 'du nyid du snang mod kyi// gar yang ma 'phros dbyings su lhan ner
373b6(1): bsgom// 'bar ba'i ljags lnga rmad du byung ba ni// bden pa'i don ston gsung rab mang po 'chad// sde snod rgyud la rmongs pa mi mnga' ba'i// le brgan ldang nag sgrol bar bsgom// 'bar ba'i ag tshom rmad du
374a1(1): byung ba ni// chos sku mtshan ma med pa'i ngo bo las// gzugs sku gzha' tshon lta bur sprul par bsgom// 'bar ba'i tshems lnga rmad du byung ba ni// 'khor ba rtsad gcod ye shes chen po lngas// skye med
374a2(1): don rtogs dbyings su bzhugs pa'i phyir// ma g.yos chos kyi dbyings su lhan ner bsgom// 'bar ba'i phyag mtshan rmad du byung ba ni// rdo rje lcags kyu sbrul gyi zhags pa dang // khro chen snying 'byin rdo rje kha T+wAM
374a3(1): 'dzin// thod rlon khrag dang rdo rje lu gu rgyud// rdo rje be con dang ni rnge'u chung 'dzin// me yi zhags pa dang ni khyung gi khwa// sdigs mdzub rtse la me 'bar kha T+wAM 'khrol// rdo rje rtse lnga rtse dgu pa dang ni// rtse gsum rtse
374a4(1): gcig 'bar ba gsor zhing brdeg/ so so'i phyag mtshan mngon du gsal ba yang // snang tsam nyid la rang bzhin med pas na// stong pa chen po'i thig le sa ler bsgom// 'bar ba'i sku rgyan rmad du byung ba ni// rdo
374a5(1): rje rin chen las byung gshog pa dang // thod rlon sbrul dang glang chen stag la sogs// rngom brjid ldan pa'i cha lugs cir ston pa// nam mkha' lta bu'i dbyings su lhan ner bsgom// 'bar ba'i zhabs lnga rmad du
374a6(1): byung ba ni// phyin ci log pa'i dngos po gzhom pa ni// rdo rje mtshan ma sna tshogs mtshan med pas// so so'i na bza' go cha ci 'dra ba// ye shes dbyings la sbyor ba nyid du bsgom// 'bar ba'i gdan khri rmad du byung
374b1(1): ba ni// gzhan gyi dngos grub bdag gir bya ba dang // mnyam pa chen po'i don la dgod pa'i phyir// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med par bsgom// 'bar ba'i gzhal yas rmad du byung ba ni// sna tshogs mang
374b2(1): po'i rgyan dag dgram pa yang // nam mkha'i mtha' dang dbyer med stong pas na// spros med thig le byang chub sems su bsgom// de ltar bas na rmad du byung ba'o// dbang chen 'dus pa'i tan+t+ra las/ rmad du byung
374b3(1): ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// // rtse rgyal bstan pa'i theg pa las// ya rgyal ma hA yo ga'i gzhung // ma spangs lhan cig bsgrub pa ni// sgrub thabs zab mo'i spyi bstan pa// phun sum tshogs pa'i le'u 'di
374b4(1): gsungs so// sgrub pa chen po gang mdzad kyang // phun sum tshogs dang ldan nas brtsam// gnas phun sum tshogs pa btsal ba dang / dus phun sum tshogs pa btsal ba dang // 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan
374b5(1): pa btsal ba dang / rdzas phun sum tshogs pa btsal ba dang / yo byad phun sum tshogs pa bsags pa dang / ting 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa gsal ba dang / phrin las phun sum tshogs pa spyad pa dang / dngos grub
374b6(1): phun sum tshogs pa bsdu ba'o// de lta bas na sgrub pa chen po'i dus dag tu// gnas ma rtag dang dus las yol// 'khor dang mi ldan rdzas mi rnyed// yo byad ma tshang ting 'dzin g.yel// phrin las ma grub dngos
375a1(1): grub yal// 'di rnams bsgrub pa'i skyon brgyad do// phyi rabs sngags 'chang sgrub pa pos// don la yid ches ma gyur kyang // thos la rtse gcig sems kyis ni// rtags dang phun sum tshogs byas
375a2(1): nas// sgrub pa'i 'bras bu yal mi 'gyur// 'di la the tshom ci ste za// dbang chen 'dus pa'i tan+ta las/ phun sum tshogs pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// // dngos grub brnyes pa'i rnal 'byor pas// rigs
375a3(1): gnyis rgyud pa'i tan+ta las// ro sbyor bdud rtsi bya ba'i phyir// sgrub thabs gsang ba 'di gsungs so// dang por phun sum tshogs ldan nas// yid du 'ong ba'i dgon gnas su// bslang dang byin gyis brlab pa

375a5(1): gam bzhi pa ste// de dbus mthing nag gru gsum pa'o// kha bzhi pa la sbyin sreg bya'o// mtha' skor 'bar ba'i 'od kyis so// mthun pa'i rdzas rnams gnas pa'i sar// drug gnyis ldan pa'i ting 'dzin
375a6(1): gyis// mtshan mas btab ste hUM zhes bskor// brtul zhugs chen po spros pas ni// gar gyi dbang phyug chen po'i bro// brdungs pa tsam gyis las rnams 'grub// phud nyul chen pos las mdzad mnyes// bdag
375b1(1): nyid chen po'i skur bsgoms nas// gtsug gi rta mgo ljang gu las// rta yi brtul zhugs chen po ste// hrIHzhes du mar brjod cing bsdu// bdag nyid chen po'i skur bsgoms nas// zhabs las sprul pa'i khyi brgyad
375b2(1): kyis// bag chags gnas su sbyang ba'i phyir// khyi yi brtul zhugs chen po ste// ku ku rA zhes rbad cing brdung // bdag nyid chen po'i skur bsgoms nas// gshog pa rdo rje gtams pa las// gzung 'dzin gnas
375b3(1): su gsad pa'i phyir// bya yi brtul zhugs chen po yang // dzaHzhes brjod cing mgyogs par ro// bdag nyid chen po'i skur bsgoms la// mi dmigs sku yi sbrul mgo las// phag gi brtul zhugs chen po
375b4(1): yis// gti mug gnas su sbyang ba'i phyir// dgug pa'i brtul zhugs hUM dang bcas par brdung // chas brgyad las kyi spyang mor dmigs// thod pa dbye ba sder mo nyid// ngan song gnas kyi 'dul phyir sbyor// ting
375b5(1): 'dzin phyag rgyar bcas pas dbye// rdzogs nas maN+Dal nyid du dgram// rten ni drug gsum nyid du ste// lnga ni zla gam bzhi pa la'o// snyigs ma bar khyams grwa bzhi la// rtse mo ma traM ka la'o// sgo zur la ni brdeg pa

376a1(1): gtor ma'o// sul mang dbang gi b+han+da la// phyi ma rak+tar bcas pa rnams// g.yos sam yang na brdzis pa la// steng nas bcings te rgyas btab ste// sku gsum zod pa shar phyogs su// rak+ta chang
376a2(1): dang sbyar ba la// steng nas rdo rje rgya gram btab// gling gsum pa ni lho phyogs te// rak+ta 'o mar sbyar ba la// steng nas rin chen rgyas btab nas// dbang du bsdu ba'i b+han+da ru// rak+ta sbrang rtsi mar la sogs// steng
376a3(1): nas pad+ma'i rgyas btab nas// gling bzhi rgya gram byang phyogs te// rak+ta mngar dang cha bsnyams pa// steng nas las kyi rgyas btab po// rdzogs nas ting 'dzin chas su bsal// mtshams dang bsrungs dang go
376a4(1): cha'o// phyag rgya bskyed dang go cha dang // drod tshad bslang dang thugs rje dbab// tshe gnas bstim dang lnga pa'o// yang nas yang du bsnyen par bya// phrin las skabs dang sbyar nas bcom// dbang dang the tshom mi za/
376a5(1): ste// zhi ba ma yang dkyil 'khor gyi// 'phro 'du rim gyis bsnyem pas sbyang // bskul dang don byas 'dus pa dang // cho ga gsum gyis snang mdzad sku// sems su zhu nas dbyings su thim// skye med dbyings nas
376a6(1): dngos med sku// hUM du gyur nas rtse lnga 'bar// bskul nas don byas mi bskyod sku// sems su zhu nas dbyings nyid do// skye med dbyings nas dngos med sku// swA las rin chen zur brgyad 'phro// bskul dang don
376b1(1): byas 'byung ldan nyid// sems su zhu nas dbyings nyid do// skye med dbyings nas dngos med sku// AM las pad+mar gsal ba dang // bskul dang don byas snang mtha' yas// sems su zhu nas dbyings nyid do// skye
376b2(1): med dbyings nas gnyis med sku// hA las rgya gram 'bar 'phro bas// bskul nas don byas don grub pa'o// sems su zhu nas dbyings nyid do// 'phro 'du gsal dang las su rung // dngos grub 'grub nas mya
376b3(1): ngan 'das// mang du spel phyir bsnyen par bya// grub nas dngos grub gsol ba dang // brtan par bya phyir bdud rtsi'i snod// yum gyi gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// sngags dang ldan pas dbang bskur te// gnas lnga dag
376b4(1): tu bstim par bya// de nas rgya bshig mdud pa dgrol// bkra shis mtshan dang ldan pa'i yum// dar la babs pas skul ba'i dbyangs// pra be sha yis mdud pa dgrol// cha gcig 'phags pa mchod phyir
376b5(1): dbul// cha gcig slob dpon nyid la'o// gcig ni yongs la sbyin par gsungs// de nas bdud rtsi dam pa'i snod// de ni spyi bor blangs nas kyang // bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa bsgrag/ rang bzhin dkyil

377a1(1): ba ste// spros pa med pa'i ngang la'o// mig ni rdo rje sder mo ste// mtha' gnyis bral ba'i dbyings su gzhag/ lce ni rdo rje dra ba mo// mi 'gyur dbyings su yang dag nyid// rang bzhin mchod pa rdzogs

377a5(1): mtshams su ste// de bzhin kham rgya nyid la'o// dbyings dang ldan pa'i ye shes dang // rgyu ma lho nub mtshams su ste// de bzhin kham rgya nyid la mchod// lgang pa ye shes kham rgya la'o// dbyangs dang tshig ldan snga ma'i
377a6(1): nga // sgal tshigs phyogs bzhi gru chad la// long ba'i tshogs la dbul ba yang // dbyangs dang ldan pa'i tshig dag gis// ye shes lnga yi ngang la gzhag/ dkyil 'khor yan lag bar bar nas// dmus long
377b1(1): tshogs la dbul ba ni// ne'u seg dbyangs dang ldan pa yis// phul bas ye shes lnga yi dbyings la sbyor// gsang ba'i chu ba nang sgo nas// dbu dgu rab tu brtsegs pa la/ dbyangs kyi mnyes par snga ma'i
377b2(1): tshul// me ri la ni ba su ta// sbrang mo brgyad la mchod pa yang // dbyangs tshig ldan pas dbyings la thim// khrag gi lce yi bar bar nas// za byed ye shes ku ku rA// brgyad la dbyangs kyi mchod pa yang // ma skyes

377b4(1): ste// dmus long long ba'i tshogs la 'phros// long ba kham rgya chen mo la// de nyid gtso bo yab yum la'o// yum yang dpal be'u'i thugs la bsdu// dpal be'u skye med dbyings su ste// brjod pa med pa'i

378b1(1): dbu la brgyud// khro bo chen po mthu chen brgyad// bsgral nas zhabs kyi gdan la brgyud// rdzogs pa chen po yin pa'i phyir// ting 'dzin brgyad dang ldan par dmigs// rgyan gyi bye brag mang po rnams// rdo rje rin

378b6(1): 'byor gang zhig rtsom pa yang // mnyam pa chen po rtogs pa yang // don las nam yang 'da' mi bya// bsdams par bya ba'i dam tshig ni// srog gi phyir yang mi 'da' ba'i// sna tshogs dngos po snang ba
379a1(1): yang // dngos po med pa'i skur gsal bas// rtogs pa'i don las yongs mi 'da'// sgra mtha' sna tshogs sgrogs pa yang // smra ba med pa'i gsung du rig/ rig pa'i don las 'da' mi bya// bsam
379a2(1): du med pa'i sems gang yin// de ni thugs kyi rang bzhin te// de las 'da' ba ma yin no// sku gsung thugs las ma g.yos kyang // che ba'i yon tan sna tshogs 'byung // 'on kyang zad med 'phel med
379a3(1): pas// yon tan dam tshig yin par grags// de las 'da' bar yongs mi bya// rtsol ba med pa'i las gang yin// de ni thabs kyi spyod pa bas// phrin las dam tshig 'da' dka' 'o// lnga po 'di la gang gnas
379a4(1): pa// rnal 'byor skal ldan dam pa'o// bsgrub bya'i dam tshig chen po ni// byang chub sems dang sha rnams dang // khrag dang dri chu dri chen po// dbang po lnga dang bcas pa ni// bde gshegs lnga yi thugs dam
